hotel: Sankara Nairobi, Autograph Collection by Marriott
review: My wife and I loved the room. It was quite comfortable.  The overall ambience is amazing.  The staff do their best, are very courteous from the gate to reception to housekeeping to restaurant to room service. The fresh juices are awesome and the bacon... wow!   Sadly, the room service food options are quite limited.  Then the quality was rather wanting... steak ordered well done, but came bloody which was very disappointing.   2 Ginger and lemon drink ordered... came 1 ginger drink with some lemon and another lemon drink with some ginger. Apparently the recipient of the order decided that we wanted 1 ginger and 1 lemon despite our repeating that we wanted 2 lemon and ginger drinks.  Finally, the chat option of the app needs to be reconsidered... maybe outsource to a company that
title: Great room... but... needs better food variety and quality

hotel: Sankara Nairobi, Autograph Collection by Marriott
title: Christmas Day brunch

hotel: Sankara Nairobi, Autograph Collection by Marriott
review: We had a great day at Sankara, food was excellent (especially the jumbo prawns). The spread was well thought out with a grand variety and each dish was well prepared.  Was glad to see they took the COVID restrictions very seriously and managed guests and staff very well. Great value for money too with good quality beverages as part of the package.
title: 5 Star Experience

hotel: Sankara Nairobi, Autograph Collection by Marriott
review: It's always a family affair when we come through because Sankara is a special place, we have great memories there and we keep making more, the whole family comes over. I absolutely had an awesome experience from the service to the detailed touches of the 5 Star experience I had. The rooms are amazing the food was awesome and honestly we didn't want to leave. From breakfast to dinner, everything was exquisite. Each encounter we had was amazing, Nicholas took care of my Mama and made sure she got everything she needed for breakfast, she was pampered. Solomon was amazing he kept checking to ensure we were good and last but not least Beth, I only spoke to her for a few minutes but dang, she nailed everything I needed and wanted and went above and beyond to make our experience
title: Didn't Want to Leave

hotel: Sankara Nairobi, Autograph Collection by Marriott
title: New Years Eve

hotel: Sankara Nairobi, Autograph Collection by Marriott
review: Received the best service, especially from Vincent and koros ! Since I am a gold  member I usually would have the option to upgrade, but all of the executive suites were full so they arranged a special dessert basket for me! Sankara feels like home away from home.
title: Fav Nairobi hotel

hotel: Sankara Nairobi, Autograph Collection by Marriott
review: Had a high profile high pressure global conference and the Sankara team delivered beyond expectations in every detail from airport pick up, rooms, gym, food, event to drop off! Great culture! 7 stars!
title: Location location location!

hotel: Sankara Nairobi, Autograph Collection by Marriott
review: We held our wedding reception and evening party at Sankara. Our guests that stayed at the hotel were well received and well looked after. Our wedding night room was set into a honey moon sweet with roses in the room/bathtub, desserts, wine “o my” despite the fact that we forgot to request! Joyce Wangui, thank you so much for taking charge! Your team:- Vincent, James, the whole banquet crew! Thank you. Joyce, you truly exceeded our expectations! Thank you for being so much in your role that you offloaded all the anxiety of planning and executing our beautiful wedding! Thank you! We are definitely Sankara patrons!
title: Our Wedding at Sankara

hotel: Sankara Nairobi, Autograph Collection by Marriott
review: We stayed for only one night and still talking about it for all the right reasons! The view of the city by night from our room was special and romantic. After check in we whiled the afternoon away in the sports bar under the very attentive eye of the bartender.The variety on both the food menu and wine list is quite decent. The quality and quantity of the food was just perfectly balanced.Dancing on the rooftop was the best experience for me, with friendly staff and a live band with an eclectic repertoire. Fabulous!The breakfast spread was extensive and the ambiance welcoming.  It was such a rejuvenating  stay that it felt like more than just one night. We will be back!
title: Dancing Saturday night away with the live band on the rooftop is incomparable!

hotel: Sankara Nairobi, Autograph Collection by Marriott
review: We stayed at the Sankara only one night, but it was a secure restful stay. The location is more in the business district which was close to us leaving on our safari,  My daughter stayed two nights and all enjoyed it immensely. we are a Marriott platinum member and they gave us conceirge rooms with fruit and cookies, plus breakfast in the Concerige floor and a welcome gift. Rooms very clean the staff was extremely nice.  We are all glad we stayed there and would stay again in the acitve Nairobi metropolis area!  This area if close to upscale shopping areas as well.
title: Great night

hotel: Sankara Nairobi, Autograph Collection by Marriott
review: A few highlights: Front desk staff is exceptionally warm and helpful. And really smart too. Did not miss a single request, whether big or small. Some good Indian food on the menu, important of vegetarian Indian traveler like me. Croissants at breakfast are one the best I have had Cute little clay animals, kept in the room everyday bring Kenya to you in the most adorable way.
title: Excellent space to stay. Especially for business travellers

hotel: Sankara Nairobi, Autograph Collection by Marriott
review: Staff were professional & accommodating. Rooms were clean and Prestine. Food was delicious and well presented. Wonderful experience  Would recommend this hotel anytime. Hats off to Joyce Wangui 4 making our event and stay seamless. And the staff who exceeded all expectations
title: Wedding party & weekend in Sankara (December)

hotel: Sankara Nairobi, Autograph Collection by Marriott
review: As a titanium elite member hundreds of nights racked up I can easily say the Sankara has been one of my best hotel experiences ever. The amenities were amazing but what put it over the top was hands down the impeccable service. This will be the only hotel I stay in when in Nairobi.
title: Vacation stay

hotel: Sankara Nairobi, Autograph Collection by Marriott
review: Whenever I travel to Nairobi, if not fully booked, I stay at the Sankara. You can’t go wrong staying here, excellent accommodations, excellent restaurants and the friendliest staff anywhere I’ve traveled worldwide. It’s always a pleasure to be greeted by the concierge staff member John whom I met on my first stay here back in 2011.  The Sankara is truly my favorite hotel in Nairobi.
title: You can’t go wrong with the Sankara

hotel: Sankara Nairobi, Autograph Collection by Marriott
review: Sankara was nothing short of amazing!!! We had a wonderful time, and the service was incredible!! We were greeted with smiles at all times, and anything we asked for, the team made happen. From the emails before arrival to making sure we made it home safely, I can definitely say that I will be a guest again!!!! If you stay here, you will not be disappointed!!!! Special Shoutout to the following people who helped to make our trip one that we will never forget!!Sankara staff: Sharon,John,Joyce, Hezron, Emily Esther and the staff in the lounge Peter our waiter☆☆☆☆☆ Samson,Moses (2nd floor gift shop),JosphenMary, Marilyn The cooks in the Artisan The cooks in the Graze The security staff Housekeeping staff Sankura staff as a whole!!!!☆☆☆☆☆
title: Anniversary Trip - SIMPLY AMAZING

hotel: Sankara Nairobi, Autograph Collection by Marriott
review: I recently stayed at the Sankara Autograph during Jan 2020 and the one thing that sets the staff apart from everywhere else I've stayed is how serious they take customer service.  From how you're greeted at the door as you walk in until you check out. They make sure to remember who you are, what your preferences are and are perceptive of your needs - everything you really when travelling for extended periods:  Geoffrey & John - the best doormen with knowledge of the city spots. Very friendly and are ready to recommend activities for your stay to be pleasurable. Great guys.    Vincent - excellent guest relations ambassador. Vincent is a pro, very articulate, and trustworthy. He made sure my stay was well curated and he's also a great gym instructor. You can tell he's very
title: Customer-centric Excellence

hotel: Sankara Nairobi, Autograph Collection by Marriott
title: Very friendly and attentive staff

hotel: Sankara Nairobi, Autograph Collection by Marriott
review: I spent a week in Nairobi for a business trip and found Sankara to be comfortable, clean and safe.  What worked:  - Staff are very friendly and attentive. In particular Jackline, Christine, Koros and Hezron were very helpful  - Rooms are small but modern with comfortable beds and pillows  - Short drive away from many great restaurants  - Well serviced conference facilities  - Each night they provide you with complimentary tiny animal carvings which are a nice little momento from Africa.   What didn’t work:  We needed lots of wall space in our conference room however the paintings on the wall could not be removed  All in all, a great stay and ideal location for a Nairobi business trip
title: great hotel in Nairobi

hotel: Sankara Nairobi, Autograph Collection by Marriott
review: I am always amazed by how innovative the Sankara staffs are. They always find new ways make me feel welcomed and comfortable in this incredible hotel each time I visit. I cannot empathize enough how impressed I was with these staff’s efforts to go above and beyond to make me feel comfortable and relaxed, I stayed at this hotel for almost a month. The few little complaints I had, was addressed squarely and resolved with swift efficiency. The efficient and incredible customer service experiences starts from the frontline staff while you are checking in. staffs like Evelyne, Vincent, Joyce, Fridah, Sharon, Rebecca, tall John at the door, Brenda and Peter to name but a few. They all work like a well-oiled machine to ensure your experience at the hotel starts off in a good note.
title: Overview of dining/rooftop of Sankara hotel

hotel: Sankara Nairobi, Autograph Collection by Marriott
title: Simply the best hotel in Nairobi

hotel: Sankara Nairobi, Autograph Collection by Marriott
review: Very amazing customer service, very professional staff and truelly trained on how to handle children. Food is of top quality and very delicious. Good ambience both at the restaurant n rooms. Friendly activities for children.
title: Mr and Mrs

hotel: Sankara Nairobi, Autograph Collection by Marriott
review: We had a wonderful time..food was very nice the swimming pool area..staff were very helpful and was a comfortable nice looking place ...the food set up was also very good with broad choices.we look forward to visit again and to spend a weekend
title: David and Friends

hotel: Sankara Nairobi, Autograph Collection by Marriott
review: We went out to celebrate a big Business Milestone and from the moment we walked in we were blown away by the Artwork, architecture and Interior Design that represented the Spirit of Our Ancestors. Couldn't Believe I was in Kenya!  Our evening was made even more special by the Service of Paul Nzau. He was humble, polite, professional and took time to make sure all our needs were met. We have no doubt that we will be back.
title: Great Blend of Ancestral Vibe in an Ocean of Modern Architecture

hotel: Sankara Nairobi, Autograph Collection by Marriott
review: I really do love the rooftop vibe. The staff and the service. However, there needs to be consistency with your entertainment especially the Saturday band entertainment. For instance this last Saturday the band that was brought was too dull. Where is the normal band that is usually really good? Why the unnecessary changes? Style up on that front.
title: Entertainment

hotel: Sankara Nairobi, Autograph Collection by Marriott
review: I really enjoyed my time there.would definitely recommend Sankara to any traveler.hospitality was top notch and the Geoffrey, who works at the office was of so much help to my wife and I.we will come back another time
title: Best Vacay

hotel: Sankara Nairobi, Autograph Collection by Marriott
review: I adored my time at Sankara. I was so sad during the day that I had to leave. This hotel made me feel so special and so safe. James was an angel and Krishna was so accommodating and sweet. The food is absolutely to die for, both restaurants. The roof top pool is so calming with gorgeous scenery. I cannot thank the entire team enough for making my first time in Kenya so memorable. And the rooms are beautiful!! Adding the views from my room and some dinners.
title: A home away from home

hotel: Sankara Nairobi, Autograph Collection by Marriott
review: The Sankara is a wonderful place to stay. Very helpful staff--thanks to Soloman, Koros, Anne, Rinah, Jacinta and all the security staff for their warm greetings each time I came and went. The location is wonderful--very centrally located with nice restaurants nearby. Uber was available within 2-3 min each time I placed the Uber order. The gym was nice, spacious, and had the full range of equipment. Having breakfast available at the poolside was greatly appreciated.
title: Great place to stay!

hotel: Sankara Nairobi, Autograph Collection by Marriott
review: Occupancy is down, one of the hotel wings is shut, but the rest functions as previously: the lounge is open all day and serving a proper breakfast to order, then a light choice hot snacks in the evening, the outdoor poolside bar & restaurant is open, but last orders are at 20:00 due to the curfew. The food is still very good. The hotel team is welcoming and efficient, all housekeeping and laundry services function as before. I was upgraded to a Junior Suite, with a nice view (thank you Solomon @ Front Desk!).
title: Good to be back!

hotel: Sankara Nairobi, Autograph Collection by Marriott
review: The location is perfect with close proximity to almost everything. The view from the rooftop restaurant is spectacular. Without a doubt they serve the best steak. Their rib eye steak is not to miss. I'd definitely recommend the rooftop restaurant for anyone travelling through Nairobi
title: Best Steak in town

hotel: Sankara Nairobi, Autograph Collection by Marriott
review: Excellent Hotel. I will come back again. Joyce and Solomon were extremely professional. Bryan is the best gym guy ever. I did enjoy the food. The location was awesome, with close proxity to almost everything. Sankara is a must to stay.
title: Best Hotel in Nairobi

hotel: Sankara Nairobi, Autograph Collection by Marriott
review: Vincent and his team made my stay incredible. I needed a last minute room due to the issues at the airport and Vincent stopped up to help and did everything he could  to make check in quick, charming and a happy affair. I would come back to the hotel just for that warm welcome. It was better than any I’ve received due to my platinum status at other chains. The breakfast, room and pool were also delightful. Lisa
title: The front desk team is incredible!

hotel: Sankara Nairobi, Autograph Collection by Marriott
review: Security is marvelous taking into account the attack challenges Nairobi is experiencing but the hotel have strengthen their security and make guest to feel more secure and relaxed for the period you will be there, customer care is the best, you will feel more comfortable as if you are at home.
title: Service was great, we enjoyed having a meeting for a week there

hotel: Sankara Nairobi, Autograph Collection by Marriott
review: I have been traveling extensively around the world and have spent a great many of nights in various hotels around the world. The experience I had at the Sankara Nairobi was definitely within the top tier of my overall experiences world-wide and ranking high in most of the criterion that you would consider important for hotel stays. Aside from being a 5-star hotel with all the 'bells and whistles', the staff there were also a cut above the rest providing an incredibly personalized experience! It was a great pleasure staying there for the week that I was in Nairobi and I would highly recommend this hotel to anyone staying in the area.
title: Fantastic Hotel!

hotel: Sankara Nairobi, Autograph Collection by Marriott
review: The experience at this Hotel was great. The services were good especially the stuff members who were so accommodating and kind. The rooms were nice and comfortable as well as the meals.  I had a wonderful stay at Sankara.
title: Had a nice stay

hotel: Sankara Nairobi, Autograph Collection by Marriott
review: Hi love this hotel very good .its fantastic atmosphere.  Specially thanks front Desk Ms Evelyn she is very good copreations .she gave me very good locations for Indian food . All over all is good .will gave rating 4.8
title: Hotel sankara

hotel: Sankara Nairobi, Autograph Collection by Marriott
review: Used the hotel to hold a meeting and dinner for the Board in December 2018. The staff were extremely helpful, friendly and supportive. The rooms were beautiful, comfortable and relaxing. The service and food were excellent. We did not want to leave. A great hotel to host your Board activities.
title: Sankara Board Facilities

hotel: Sankara Nairobi, Autograph Collection by Marriott
review: This was the third time I stayed at the Sankara and each time it has more than met my expectation. The staff is extremely attentive and courteous. There is also a lot of security and so a sense of safety. The rooms are lovely and the bed and sheets so comfortable that I feel like I am sleeping in a cloud. A lovely touch is that each evening one receives a small animal with a card explaining a bit about the animal. If you stay 7 nights you end up with all 7 animals, called the Sankara 7! The hotel is also well-located and the surrounding area seems quite safe to walk around during the day. There are quite a few restaurants within walking distance, a shopping call and ATM.
title: Wonderful and well-located hotel!

hotel: Sankara Nairobi, Autograph Collection by Marriott
review: I had the pleasure of doing a photo shoot for my brand at Sankara in February 2019, and I have to say they exceeded my expectations which are very high.   The photo shoot required use of a suite, pool and common areas; Sankara staff went above and beyond to ensure we were comfortable had every we needed and accommodated our requests which is not easy for a crew of 15 for 16 hours.  After the shoot, my husband spent the night in the suite and continued to enjoy Sankara's exemplary service.  The bed was superb, the bathroom was fabulous and breakfast was scrumptious.  Sankara...You were phenomenal to my team and I.  Thank you!  Thank you!
title: Hospitality Excellence

hotel: Sankara Nairobi, Autograph Collection by Marriott
review: I don't mind paying close to 10€ for a good glass of wine, but it being served in a PLASTIC glass full of scratched really put me off - that is simply not done! When I mentioned this to the waitress, she bluntly said "this is what we use" .....
title: Plastic glasses

hotel: Sankara Nairobi, Autograph Collection by Marriott
review: This hotel is one of the nicest hotel I ever stayed in. I have been coming to Kenya since 2012 and have stayed in many other hotels. however once I stayed  at Sankara and discovered how great the rooms, staff, environment and services are, there was no going back for me and I have never stayed anywhere else after that. The front desk team makes checking in and out a child's play. they are so proficiency that I have used them as a point of reference for other hotels I visited around the world. fantastic individuals, they perform the job effortless and very efficient.  I will recommend this hotel to anyone that wants a clean environment, friendly staff, great  food and  home away from home feeling.
title: One of the best hotel in East Africa

hotel: Sankara Nairobi, Autograph Collection by Marriott
review: As a regular business traveler to Nairobi, I have stayed at several hotels. Sankara is my favourite thus far - the bed is unbelievably comfortable, don't know what mattress they use, but it works! The staff are friendly and manage to make the hotel feel like a home. The location is also very central - you'll be in the heart of Nairobi's commercial and residential district of Westlands. I enjoyed the little extra touches and attention to detail - others have mentioned the small animals that you can take home with you at the end of the stay. The only reason I can't give this hotel 5 stars is due to the poor quality of the food. Room service food was palatable (stick to the Indian menu) but the food at the Sarabi supper club is appalling. We ordered two dishes - one was insipid,
title: Incredible bed, great service, but the food

hotel: Sankara Nairobi, Autograph Collection by Marriott
title: Just excellent

hotel: Sankara Nairobi, Autograph Collection by Marriott
review: Sankara is a gem. Splendid and just excellent, Rosemary at Graze restaurant especially, who severally accommodated me and my needs as I articulated my needs to be, a big shout to Rosemary,  Sarabi staff, all excellent and always make me feel welcome, at home, and my needs are catered to perfectly, and even at times offered assistance in their suggestions.  I look forward to returning over and over again.  Thank you Sankara
title: Thank to Sankara hotel

hotel: Sankara Nairobi, Autograph Collection by Marriott
review: I was there in January, the experience was so nice! Above the average of East African hotels. Besides the good amenities and clean and comfortable rooms, staff is very commitment to make you live a lovely experience. They are the ones who make the difference at hotel, gym, restaurant, etc. I congratulate and thank them for their passion to work!
title: Outstanding Accomodation - Staff, Service, Security, Business Center, Gym

hotel: Sankara Nairobi, Autograph Collection by Marriott
review: I've stayed at the Sankara on numerous occasions over the past few years.  Each time they exceed my expectations.  Super friendly and helpful staff meet you as you check in at reception.  Wonderful room accommodations...clean, secure and comfortable.  A functioning and modern gym facility is a must during my travels...the gym staff are highly trained personal trainers with vast experience and knowledge is cardio, weights, stretching and physical therapy.  Steam and sauna facility is great as well.  This with wonderful lounge, roof top restaurant, steak house and main dining area offers something for everyone.  Sankara is among the best placed hotels in the city.
title: first class accomadation and service

hotel: Sankara Nairobi, Autograph Collection by Marriott
review: I was around for valentines day and i was impressed with the consistency of excellence food and service. Sarabi and champagne bar mood was serene and enjoyable an the DJ was excellent. Kudos the great joj done by Daniel and Lawrence at the rooftop. It is always great being back. George
title: Great food, Great service, Amazing staff

hotel: Sankara Nairobi, Autograph Collection by Marriott
review: I had the pleasure of lodging at Sankara hotel for three weeks while in Nairobi for work. The customer service is 100% top notch, everyone, and I mean EVERYONE is super courteous, professional, and goes way above and beyond to ensure you are well taken cared of and all your needs are met.   I couldn’t afford to give everyone the tip they deserve, so I ask management - please give all the staff a bonus or raise to reward them for their exemplary service! I want to give kudos and name all the staff that made my experience so enjoyable, but it would be too many to name!   It is obvious that Sankara only employs top notch staff and trains them to provide the BEST customer service.   Additionally, the location is wonderful and near to many good dining choices, supermarket, and malls.
title: Excellent excellent excellent experience!

hotel: Sankara Nairobi, Autograph Collection by Marriott
title: excellent service!

hotel: Sankara Nairobi, Autograph Collection by Marriott
review: We stayed 6 nights here and could not have been more pleased.  The staff was incredibly friendly and helpful.  We were looking for a battery to replace one we had that had died, and the staff took it upon themselves to check with all departments, and when one could not be found (it was an unusual battery), they were willing to personally run across the street to the mall to search for one.  We were greeted wherever we went--to the restaurants, on/off the elevator, through the security screening, sitting in lounges. They anticipated our wants/needs:  one desk person noticed that I enjoyed an afternoon tea of their kombe so he made sure I had a cup waiting for me when I went to the lobby to get some.  Every night, a small soapstone carving was left in our room as a token of
title: Amazing Hotel for Business/ Work Trips with Top Notch Staff

hotel: Sankara Nairobi, Autograph Collection by Marriott
title: Customer Service Top Notch

hotel: Sankara Nairobi, Autograph Collection by Marriott
review: My brother and I wanted to surprise our cousin staying at Sankara with a special room service delivery.  Charles Matu, Sr Sales Manager, assisted me in choosing a South African bottle of wine and a macadamia nut brownie. He was extremely helpful, quick, and courteous.  My cousin and her husband were delighted with their surprise.  Charles, thank you for making this so very special and easy to execute from the US.  When I come to Nairobi, I will definitely stay at Sankara!  -Rina Arline
title: Delivery of Wine and Brownie to Guests

hotel: Sankara Nairobi, Autograph Collection by Marriott
review: Sankara has splendid private rooms appropriate for private romantic dinner with your loved one..I engaged the love of my love in one of these rooms and the experience was awesome. Hospitality here is top notch
title: PRIVATE ENGAGEMENT

hotel: Sankara Nairobi, Autograph Collection by Marriott
review: Gorgeous hotel with stunning rooftop views from the pool-side bar with sumptuous hors d'oeuveres and plentiful libations served very nicely inside the well-appointed executive lounge.  Extremely accommodating, friendly staff (Brenda) recommended daily itineraries and organized transportation to local restaurants and attractions.
title: Lush and Comfy!

hotel: Sankara Nairobi, Autograph Collection by Marriott
review: I enjoyed my stay at Sankara and will continue to use it as my business hotel. The service is excellent and the staff is professional, courteous, and responsive. They are focused on their service and do not compromise on that. The rooms are very clean and modern. I would recommend Sankara to any business or casual visitor to Nairobi.
title: Fantastic experience and great hotel

hotel: Sankara Nairobi, Autograph Collection by Marriott
review: We made a short visit to the bar. Service was a bit nonchalant and drinks lacked imagination. We tried some of the food on offer but we were not impressed. The beef skewers in particular were too chewy (obviously the wrong cut of meat). It's a beautiful oasis in the heart of hectic Nairobi nonetheless. I would have expected better from a Marriott though
title: Rooftop bar- they can do better

hotel: Sankara Nairobi, Autograph Collection by Marriott
review: If you have not been to Sankara, then you are missing out. The facilities have been revamped; the gym has new equipment, restaurants are always refreshing the menu and staff serve you like you are the only guest in the hotel.   The support and service keep me going back.   Check it out
title: Highly Recommend

hotel: Sankara Nairobi, Autograph Collection by Marriott
review: Spent six days at the hotel on business. Quiet, extremely comfortable with light airy bedrooms, and excellent range of dining options. But beyond that quite exceptional service form every member of staff. Am returning in May.
title: Phenonemal staff

hotel: Sankara Nairobi, Autograph Collection by Marriott
review: This is my 2nd Stay in Sankara , and am sure that it is the begining of a long long trip with them. Cause the quality of the service is above of any expectation for someone who use to come in Nairobi and know all the best places.  I don't where does the name comes from but it is a big one like our Dear Thomas S@nkara.
title: Sankara

hotel: Sankara Nairobi, Autograph Collection by Marriott
review: Highly recommend this hotel!  A "MUST" when visiting Nairobi!  Both my husband (Wayne) and I loved it!    Secure, beautiful, comfortable, best [comfy] beds ever, love the shower and amenities, especially "The Sankara Seven," a collection of 7 little stone-carved animal figurines left at one's bedside (one each night), as a memento for guests to keep.  From the moment one arrives, employees of the Sankara welcome their guests with beautiful and genuine smiles, and a gentle and refined greeting -regardless of time of day or night!  My husband had arrived a few days before I did, and had the opportunity to interact again with Solomon (Solomon remembered my husband from a prior trip), and on the night of my arrival -past midnight, I had the pleasure to be welcomed by Solomon, too!
title: What a GEM!

hotel: Sankara Nairobi, Autograph Collection by Marriott
title: Good modern business hotel in Westlands

hotel: Sankara Nairobi, Autograph Collection by Marriott
review: My husband and I stayed at the Sankara Nairobi hotel March 11-19th and I must say that this hotel made my trip to Kenya!! The hotel is right in the heart of Westlands...there are tons of great lounges and wonderful restaurants..if you want Italian one night definitely pay a a visit to Meditteraneo which is 2 minutes from the hotel..it was delicious and very very reasonably priced as is most of the food items in my opinion are. Now to talk about our room----BEAUTIFUL! flat screen t.v. fully stocked mini bar..plush robes..turn down service..an amazing soaking tub..an electric scale in Ibs.. electrical cords that do not need transmitters...FREE internet with a very strong signal...housekeeping that delivers phone card minutes right to your room...a room bell...conceirge that
title: Amazing, Beautiful, and Beyond my Expectations!!

hotel: Sankara Nairobi, Autograph Collection by Marriott
title: The pride of Nairobi -- on the hotel front

hotel: Sankara Nairobi, Autograph Collection by Marriott
review: Have previously stayed at the Southern Sun and Intercontinental on several occasions. By comparison, I would give Southern Sun (Holiday Inn) 1*, Intercontinental 3-4, and Sankara a 5* by international standards. This hotel is just excellent! Some people have previously in thread pointed out that it's pricey. True. But judging by value, compared with others, there is no other option. Talking ranges in 250ish USD. We paid 242 per night, incl breakfast and internet.   Immaculate design, newly built with cool design all over. See pics. Splendid bed, haven't slept that well in ages away. The breakfast is so good, we were craving for it each morning. So nicely and fresh presented. Try their pancakes!   Pool area on roof top, the design is nothing for people suffering vertigo. Gym
title: Slow to non-exsistent service

hotel: Sankara Nairobi, Autograph Collection by Marriott
title: Don't waste your money!!

hotel: Sankara Nairobi, Autograph Collection by Marriott
review: Went for dinner to Sankara. Food took over an hour to come. Very average food. Service was excruciatingly slow. They have lots of staff, but they do not really know what they are doing. The kitchen is still very slow. The sommelier is excellent. Good wine selection.  I would not eat at Sankara. Walk outside, and there are a myriad of excellent restaurants in Westlands that offer better food, service and price.
title: This is better than the Fairview by a mile.........

hotel: Sankara Nairobi, Autograph Collection by Marriott
review: I stayed here with my father recently and cannot find 1 fault with this really amazing hotel. It has only been open just under 2 months and everything, from the decor, cleanliness and the staff were awesome.  The location was great (in Westlands) and right next to a shopping mall with food places, coffe shops as well as shops. (open till 10pm) Close to the city centre too. I was very concerned about safety in Nairobi whilst looking for a hotel and this one proved to be extremely safe, guards on each floor, and several at the front that check all cars (boots included) and greet guests to ensure maximum safety and security. I felt extremely safe. The breakfast had a wide choice and the juices and fruit were so nice. Everything was available that you'd expect and was presented
title: Awesome hotel - one of the best I've stayed in

hotel: Sankara Nairobi, Autograph Collection by Marriott
title: Impressive

hotel: Sankara Nairobi, Autograph Collection by Marriott
review: This hotel has vey beautiful rooms as compared to many hotels in Nairobi. The services are ok. Problem is when you order for food t takes close to have an hour to be prepared. Since expreriencing teething problems but its a place i wil definately go back to
title: Excellent!

hotel: Sankara Nairobi, Autograph Collection by Marriott
review: Am excellent hotel with perfect location for sightseeing.  Everyone was very polite and friendly and always ready to help Very well appointed hotel, amazing breakfast and an excellent restaurant. We had a great and relaxing time. I highly recommend this hotel.
title: Excellent service

hotel: Sankara Nairobi, Autograph Collection by Marriott
review: Sankara Hotel is very good Sevice excellent very claen Rooms . Is very sure on my next trip to Nairobi I will stay in the Sankara hotel. All Staff are very good all is very clean the Bar is also very good.
title: This hotel works perfect on the rezeption very frendly and all works perfect

hotel: Sankara Nairobi, Autograph Collection by Marriott
review: My favorite hotel in Nairobi, warm and friendly staff, extremely attentive, caring and helpful; great facilities, food, restaurant, and gym.   The front desk and guest relations are true ambassadors for both Sankara and Kenya, beautiful smiling faces and the highest degree of decorum.
title: Excellent Hotel

hotel: Sankara Nairobi, Autograph Collection by Marriott
review: Sankara is definitely the place to sta y in Nairobi if you are here for business. Well located and the staff is just amazing! Special shout out to John, he is the king.   The rooms and extra facilities are really good and well maintained. The only big thing is the amount of mosquitos but if you have good Peaceful Sleep you will be looking at a great stay.
title: Great place and great staff

hotel: Sankara Nairobi, Autograph Collection by Marriott
review: Sankara Hotel in Nairobi is like no other. The hotel is not only very modern but the staff are great at what they do. An amazing business hotel that truly makes you feel at home. I would recommend this hotel any day. The staff are kind, making it a point to remember your name, greet you everyday from a long day at work.  John at Concierge is a super star, adding personal touches to everything he does.  I truly am impressed!
title: Excellent Service, Quality Hotel!

hotel: Sankara Nairobi, Autograph Collection by Marriott
review: I travel to and through Nairobi a great deal.  I've stayed in many of the nice hotels in this capital city - Serena, Ole-Sereni, Hilton, Inter-Continental - and I've stayed in some of the finest hotels in the world -- so I know the competition and I have high expectations.  I needed to extend my stay in Nairobi, and the hotel I was staying in (one of the above mentioned) was booked full, and could not accomodate me. I had heard about a new hotel in the Westlands, so I was up for trying it - after all, it was just for two nights.  From the moment the taxi drives in, you know you're in a place that cares about its image, and about the comfort and safety of its guests.  The doormen were courteous. The reception desk agent was smooth, smiling and had answers to every question. The
title: OMG - This is an African Hotel?  Can't be - it's wonderful!

hotel: Sankara Nairobi, Autograph Collection by Marriott
title: Incredible, incredible hotel: STAY HERE!

hotel: Sankara Nairobi, Autograph Collection by Marriott
review: The Sankara is one of the nicest hotels of any I have stayed in around the world.  It was astonishing - brand new and absolutely beautiful, incredible service, beautiful pool on top of hotel, great workout room.  Rooms are really lovely and well appointed -- I would stay here in an instant all over again.  Really first class -- and good rates as well, due to the fact that they just opened.    Great location as well.
title: lovely stay

hotel: Sankara Nairobi, Autograph Collection by Marriott
review: we stayed at the Sankara for four nights this past week and it was an extremely pleasant and lovely stay. The hotel itself is spanking new and the rooms are lovely, the bathrooms gleam( which in the case of bathrooms is always a good thing!) the breakfast is lovely, the service is impeccable. All in all, a nice hotel and a great experience.
title: Absolutely excellent - Nairobi should be proud

hotel: Sankara Nairobi, Autograph Collection by Marriott
review: I travel all the time across the world and very often stay in five star hotels. This is one of the best, certainly for business travellers in Africa.  The tasteful and comfortable rooms are what one would expect in a modern, new (four months old) five star hotel. The linen and amenities in the room, the cutlery in the restaurants and room service, the outstanding quality and variety of the food (who would expect many 'organic' dishes for breakfast, for example, and feasts for vegetarians?), the free Internet, the modern gym, and spa that is on par with the excellent spas in Asia - these all contribute to make this on par with, if not better than the best hotels in Nairobi. But it is quality of the service, the 'fine touches' and the  finesse with which things are done that are
title: An oasis of calm

hotel: Sankara Nairobi, Autograph Collection by Marriott
review: Great to stay at Sankara, warm welcome as ever and the roof top pool bar relaxing as ever. Will be trying out the new Executive floor next trip and heard the hotel will become a Marriott brand soon, while still retaining the hotels identity.
title: Sankara Recommended

hotel: Sankara Nairobi, Autograph Collection by Marriott
review: Being in the heart of the City of Nairobi, Sankara, Nairobi exceptionally has a fantastic ambience with warm and kind Staff offering personalized service, always keeping a glance to ensure client satisfaction, bravo!!!
title: Pastor

hotel: Sankara Nairobi, Autograph Collection by Marriott
review: I've stayed in a number of hotels in Nairobi but since finding Sankara a couple of years ago it has become my hotel of choice in Nairobi.  Sankara is a large hotel but still manages to give personal service. From John who is always there to welcome you by name at the door and always willing to assist with any request to Vincent, Alan and Joan at the front desk and Mary and Mercy at breakfast. The team at Sankara are second to none.  The rooms are all well fitted and spacious with comfortable beds. The newly renovated rooms on the 7th floor are really great with coffee machine and pillow menu a.o. The soapstone "Big Seven" you get with the turndown service is a special touch.   Graze Steakhouse serves a mean ribeye, but if you are looking for something other than steak, Sankara
title: Best in Nairobi

hotel: Sankara Nairobi, Autograph Collection by Marriott
title: Sankara Hotel, Nairobi

hotel: Sankara Nairobi, Autograph Collection by Marriott
review: Often stay at the Sankara when I’m business in Nairobi. It the hotel of choice in the Westlands area. Great rooms, restaurant and most of all staff! They are all really accommodating and give a 5-star service, all of the time.  Most of all, and from a business frequent traveller perspective, the hotel is safe and secure. Essential, especially after recent event is Nairobi. All the team provide real security peace of mind.  Great location, hotel and most of all staff. I wouldn’t hesitate to return.
title: Mr Sandeep

hotel: Sankara Nairobi, Autograph Collection by Marriott
review: I stayed at the Sankara Hotel on two occasions in April 2011. On the last day of my first visit, i left some items in my room. My cell phone was left along with other items. I had left a suitcase with the hotel. I was returing for my second stay ten days later. I assumed my items would be safely returned. When I returned for my second stay I inquired about any items left in my room. They called housekeeping and very casually said only some clothes had been left, no cell phone. I was bothered by their lack of understanding. A day later I recieved a Welcome Back Letter stating that if they could do anything to please inform Guest Service Manager. It Had the name, but no email or telephone number. I called the front desk and ask them if I could talk to Guest Service Manager. I did
title: Modern Hotel with Rooftop Pool

hotel: Sankara Nairobi, Autograph Collection by Marriott
title: Great hotel, central location

hotel: Sankara Nairobi, Autograph Collection by Marriott
review: Very pleased with this relatively new hotel - excellent service, well equipped and spacious rooms, excellent location, good food. They also have the Angsana Spa in the hotel, which I was extremely pleased about - it used to be my favorite when living in Sri Lanka, and it really lived up to its expectations. The roof top pool is great, and the loungy bar up next to it very nice.
title: Good hotel in Nairobi

hotel: Sankara Nairobi, Autograph Collection by Marriott
review: Great hotel, great service. Sankara is located at a very prime location in Westlands area in Nairobi. The rooms are very modern and nice and the staff is very helpful. Most of all it has an amazing spa.
title: Fabulous

hotel: Sankara Nairobi, Autograph Collection by Marriott
review: I travel extensively for work and have done so for the past 15 years. Hence I've seen "hundreds" of hotels in many different locations. Admittedly I tend to stay in the chain hotels such as IC, Hilton or Marriott, mainly to limit the research effort and since I should know what to expect (although that is clearly a hit and miss between the member hotels...)  I' d never heard of Sankara before and it was booked through one of our foreign offices. I assumed it'd be part of an Asian chain or what have you.  OK. They messed up the pick-up from the airport. But that was really the only let down during our stay.From then on it was stella performance all around.  The standard is second to none (alright except perhaps for some of the high-high end and select Dubai hotels). The only
title: Great experience, will definitely return

hotel: Sankara Nairobi, Autograph Collection by Marriott
review: I stayed at Sankara in October for a couple nights and then had the chance to spend a week in early January. The hotel is very well appointed. My room (on 7th floor) was first-class. The business lounge was nice and the staff was extremely helpful. I had a meeting in one of the conferences rooms and we were well taken care of. I like the main restaurant, but the steakhouse is the place to eat. The spicy ketchup is delicious. I'm looking forward to going back - Sankara is my go-to hotel for business in Nairobi.
title: Best hotel in Westlands / Nairobi

hotel: Sankara Nairobi, Autograph Collection by Marriott
review: Espectacular hotel, very clean and modern. since before arriving and Vincent was contacting me by email to find out if I had any need, we arrived and the ckeck in was very helpful, Vincent received us super warm for being a platinum member, he honored me the late ck out and was aware of everything. They treated me at the bar too, recommended full
title: Amaizing Hotel & service

hotel: Sankara Nairobi, Autograph Collection by Marriott
review: As always Sankara Hotel staff took excellent care of me. Rooms and all services were fantastic . The staff remains very professional and so friendly at the same time. The standards of the rooms were very high. Also Sankara hotel is at an excellent location in westlands were all services are walking distance. The Sunday brunch is fantastic  and the rooftop parties on Friday and Saturday are to be experienced. Sankara hotel is the place to be in Nairobi in terms of Hotels
title: Last stay in Sankara

hotel: Sankara Nairobi, Autograph Collection by Marriott
review: Last week, two friends and myself (three professional and fun loving African American female in our mid-30s) visited Kenya for the first time and did all of our lodging at Sankara Nairobi. It was absolutely best decision we could have made.  Unquestionably 5 star service for the price of a mid-range hotel compared in the States. Whew! Where to begin......  Each and every staff member, from security, the doorsmen, the front desk, housekeeping, restaurant staff....EVERYONE was exceptional in warmth, knowledge, and professionalism. This was super important to me and my friends as we are a friendly bunch and enjoy interaction with the staff that is helping us with our stay. They were helpful with dining suggestions, currency questions, and even gave us recommendations on reputable
title: Unparalled service, safety, professionalism, and kindness

hotel: Sankara Nairobi, Autograph Collection by Marriott
title: Great hotel excellent restaurants

hotel: Sankara Nairobi, Autograph Collection by Marriott
review: I stayed at the Tribe Hotel during a conference and joined my friends for dinner on a Zairean night.  The service and food was excellent in contrast to Tribe Hotel and restaurant.  The Sankara Hotel has a choice of restaurants which area all excellent. We went to the Artisan Restaurant.  I had the Lamb shank with couscous and it was heavenly. Our waiter expertly assisted my blind friend and found a proper chair for my friend using a walker.  Superior service from the receptionist, to the server, to the chef.
title: Visit Artisan Restaurant at Sankara Hotel

hotel: Sankara Nairobi, Autograph Collection by Marriott
review: Our second visit. Excellent club lounge and rooms. Very friendly and efficient staff throughout the hotel. I very much liked the free and v efficient wireless. I've stayed in many hotels in Nairobi and for as long as the standards are maintained this will be our hotel of choice.  The menu is a bit up it's own bottom and needs to be a little more sympathetic and accessible.   But all in all a really good place!
title: Excellent, friendly, up-market and very comfortable

hotel: Sankara Nairobi, Autograph Collection by Marriott
review: A hidden gem of a hotel in Nairobi.We stayed here for a couple of nights to get over our jet lag and chill out before flying off on Safari.It was fantastic.Not too big,excellent staff,fab rooftop pool and very good food
title: Fantastic hotel to stay in before safari

hotel: Sankara Nairobi, Autograph Collection by Marriott
review: I visit Nairobi often, but this was the first time I've stayed at the Sankara.  My review may well be influenced by the fact that i was upgraded to a suite, but the room was outstanding, the service was excellent and the bar on top of the building was a great place to be on a warm Nairobi evening.  The only downside is the cost - there are certainly cheaper options in the city, but it's a great place to indulge
title: Excellent new find

hotel: Sankara Nairobi, Autograph Collection by Marriott
review: Lovely hotel in Nairobi, completely new and in a great location, right from the pickup from the airport with a Mercedes upto the check out all very very good.  Would recommend it to anyone who comes to Nairobi. would definately stay here whenever in Nairobi.
title: Paradise

hotel: Sankara Nairobi, Autograph Collection by Marriott
review: Went here with my friends for a coffee in the evening by the poolside. I was very impressed by the design of the hotel in general, however the service we recieved was terrible!!! It took almost 30 minutes to be approached by one of the waiters, we ordered drinks which took over 20 minutes to arrive and im walking a milkshake, nothing overly fancy!!! The hotel was not even busy at this time, so not too sure what was wrong with their service!!
title: Slow Service

hotel: Sankara Nairobi, Autograph Collection by Marriott
review: Very well located hotel, with beautiful rooms, extremely friendly people, excellent food and perfect service
title: Really good hotel

hotel: Sankara Nairobi, Autograph Collection by Marriott
review: As you drive in you are met by a delightful staff at the car and front desk. The hotel is extraordinary in terms of service and concern for their guests.   The rooms are attractive, comfortable and nicely appointed. The complimentary breakfast and wine reception are a plus and the room rates for this upscale area are terrific, but what sets Sankara apart is their care for their guests especially the pool area staff.   My only recommendation is for the team to make internet accessible on all levels. I would 100% recommended Sankara to everyone.
title: Top notch service and comfort

hotel: Sankara Nairobi, Autograph Collection by Marriott
review: Travelled to kenya for holiday with my wife and had one night to stay in Nairobi before heading to Meru National Park,Samburu and the Mara again. All i can say is that i thank our tours & travel agent in Kenya for choosing this hotel for us. It was the first time i was taking my wife to Kenya and she loved it too.Great hotel,ambience,service. Hopefully they maintain that service.
title: WOW

hotel: Sankara Nairobi, Autograph Collection by Marriott
review: best place to be. i would prefer to go there on my honeymoon. the staff are ready to help you anytime. the doormen are wau! they open the door with a welcoming smile oliver from the reception makes ua stay confy and irene of the coffee shop knows her work and the staff of the club floor.
title: good

hotel: Sankara Nairobi, Autograph Collection by Marriott
review: Probably the most enjoyable stay of many in Nairobi. And if you judge a property as to how they cope with a problem - and we had one - then I thought they coped admirably.   I've never really liked any hotel in Nairobi a lot but I found the Sankara to be good and comfortable and I shall be back their next month. A very pleasant experience.
title: Efficient, friendly and well run.

hotel: Sankara Nairobi, Autograph Collection by Marriott
review: This is by far the most modern and best hotel.  The service is great.  Looked in a part of city where it is ok to walk you'll love staying here.   Free WIFI and internet make it a great deal.  The food isnt great but passable.
title: The best hotel in Nairobi

hotel: Sankara Nairobi, Autograph Collection by Marriott
review: Sankara is one of several top-notch hotels in Nairobi. Given the horrible traffic in the city, choosing a hotel often comes down to the location that you need to be in. For the Westlands area, this hotel is perfect. It is centrally located in that area, it seems to have very good security, rooms are comfortable with all of the amenities you could want, breakfast is great, and there is a very nice Asian restaurant in the hotel. Staff were extremely friendly and helpful, and the price is consistent with that of other top hotels in Nairobi. Overall a very pleasant stay, and I will return.
title: Great hotel located in Westlands area of Nairobi

hotel: Sankara Nairobi, Autograph Collection by Marriott
review: It was my first time in Kenya and I stayed there for 5 nights. The staff are very good, food is nice and the club lounge is really relaxing. It is a bit pricy, but I think this is the standard for 5-star properties in Kenya.  There is a 'Gipsy bar' next to it (1 minute walking distance). you cna watch a game and have a beer. Proximity is important for safety reasons.  Just one advise.. make sure you get your local currency with you and do not exchange currency at the receptionist. Better have your own.
title: Excellent Hotel

hotel: Sankara Nairobi, Autograph Collection by Marriott
review: My wife and I stayed at Sankara on our wedding night. The reason for this is because of the location and reviews from other people. We had planned to stay for 3 nights, but we stayed for 4.  The first night we got there, we were in a room on the 3rd floor. It was about midnight, and we were both tired from the wedding. The staff had made a lovely arrangement on the bed with towels and rose petals all over the room. There was also a bottle of sparkling wine and lovely chocolate truffles along with a fruit basket.  I got into the shower, and 10 minutes later realised that the water wasn't draining properly. I got out and saw that the water had gone right to the front door and to the bedroom. We just placed towels all over the floor and didn't call room service as it was about 1am.
title: Great hotel located in the centre of Westlands.

hotel: Sankara Nairobi, Autograph Collection by Marriott
review: We stayed overnight on arrival from Europe and before departing for Tanzania.  The location of the hotel was perfect;  away from the hustle and bustle in Westlands suburb,  near Wilson airport.  It is a deluxe property - somewhat new - and the service matches it's high end market.  The rooms are large, for a city hotel and the style and design is modern and functions well.  We had a great meal which we ordered from room service and the presentation and taste was lovely.    There is a full gym and pool, with the latests equipment and extremely clean and attractive looking.    I was concerned that we should have stayed at Tribe Hotel instead, but in the end I was very pleased with our choice and would happily stay there again.
title: Wonderful!!!

hotel: Sankara Nairobi, Autograph Collection by Marriott
review: After checking out Sankara online i was in love with this hotel and set on staying there when i would be in Nairobi. However, my brother ended up staying there and i stayed at a friends house down the road. This was due to the fact that the hotel do not accept pre-payments. A customer from work tried to book us in to Sankara from London as a present to me and my brother, however they would only accept payment in person which was a HUGE INCONVENIENCE. This meant that my brother had to pay for the hotel bill, so he only booked 1 room so i stayed with a friend who lives next to Westgate shopping mall. They should be more clear about this on the website, although i have been all over the world and its never been an issue in any other hotels and i've travelled america, south america,
title: OVERPRICED

hotel: Sankara Nairobi, Autograph Collection by Marriott
title: Great for business, Great for Holiday

hotel: Sankara Nairobi, Autograph Collection by Marriott
review: I had read various reviews on Sankara most of which spoke highly of the hotel and as such I went with high expectations. I must say I was not dissappointed on ANY level. The check in process was smooth, the hotel room absolutely fabulous. I do particularly like the fact that I could take a bath and watch / listen to the news or a movie at the same time. The food I felt was quite pricey (rightfully) given the ambience. But since I am very familier with Nairobi, I ate outside of the hotel all the time. The breakfast (approx $30) was worth every cent. The only thing missing was oatmeal. But other than that, it was PERFECT. I loved the fact that they gave 4 hours for breakfast time unlike other hotels which give 3hours or less. The gym, spa, pool, rooftop bar were all excellent. The
title: Sleek hotel with wonderful rooftop bar and good food

hotel: Sankara Nairobi, Autograph Collection by Marriott
title: Teathing Problems?

hotel: Sankara Nairobi, Autograph Collection by Marriott
review: + Efficient airport transfer + Good security + Rooms are modern, clean and well lit.  + Great location. There is a small mall (Sarit Center if I am not mistaken) located right next door. However, the Westgate Mall is a much better bet. It has a Kazuri Beads Shop and a fairly large, modern cafe which serves decent food. To get to Westgate, the hotel arranged for taxi pick up and drop off. The taxi fare can be charged directly to the room which makes it very convenient and easy. It costs us less than USD5 taxi fare return for a ride that is about 7 mins one way. Down the road is also the nightlife area with some good bars.  + The Asian restaurant, Muhibbah serves decent South-east Asian cuisines. The roof-top bar is also a good place to have an early evening drink. + Angsana Spa
title: Clean, Modern, Friendly and Good Location

hotel: Sankara Nairobi, Autograph Collection by Marriott
title: Beautiful boutique hotel with excellent service

hotel: Sankara Nairobi, Autograph Collection by Marriott
review: Located in the bustling Westlands district of Nairobi, the Sankara is close to several malls, restaurants, and local businesses.  Given Nairobi's awful, awful traffic, this location is a godsend to travelers unacquainted with the city.  The hotel is an oasis of calm with understated, elegant interiors, wonderful restaurants, and comfortable rooms.  The Thai restaurant is absolutely fantastic--and the food authentic.  You can't beat the rooftop bar/lounge.  The staff were extremely accommodating, even with more difficult requests.  I was very impressed.
title: LOVELY BOUTIQUE

hotel: Sankara Nairobi, Autograph Collection by Marriott
review: So I was at the beautiful hotel recently and I must say the service is remarkable, especially at their boutique. The ladies are efficient, kind, they work with dilligence and their welcoming smiles will always make one want to visit the boutique. They are not clueless on what they are selling, as in every item has its own story which I found to be very outstanding, that aside, the service is excellent, world-class. One upside though was the constant lack of top up cards. The ladies were kind enough to actually go out of their way n got someone to fetch some from outside. That I would rank as WORLD CLASS service but the management should ensure the boutique is always fully stocked with the basics like airtime n spare the ladies the embarassment.
title: Lovely but too Expensive for Holiday Makers

hotel: Sankara Nairobi, Autograph Collection by Marriott
review: Rooms: 156 in total: 62 Superior, 51 Deluxe, 7 Junior Suites, 2 Executive Suites, 33 Club Rooms.  I had the opportunity to see both a superior and a deluxe room at the Sankara, unfortunately the suites were all occupied so I didn’t get the chance to physically see them.  All the rooms are very tastefully decorated in a cozy but contemporary style.  The furnishings have a very nice finish to them and the cleanliness was excellent.  An outstanding feature of the rooms here is the glass partition between the en-suite and the bedroom.  It allows guests to be able to catch up on the news as the TV is in full view and within the bathroom are speakers which are a nice touch.  Quite spacious, the rooms have large beds, bedside tables, lounge chair, desk and TV.  Through the main doors
title: Failed to live up to reputation and reviews

hotel: Sankara Nairobi, Autograph Collection by Marriott
review: I had a great stay here on business.  New hotel.  Superb staff.  Comfortable beds.  Very spacious rooms.  Good location close to Sarit shopping centre.  Food in hotel good but can be a bit pricey.  Nice Indian restaurant within safe walking distance.
title: Luxurious and comfortable

hotel: Sankara Nairobi, Autograph Collection by Marriott
review: We recently stayed here-and absolutely loved it. It has a fresh modern feel with an African chic decor. It is about a 20 min ride from the international airport (without traffic) in the westlands area of nairobi. We got the deluxe room online and it was pretty spacious. The rooms are decorated really nice.Beds super comfortable, clean bathrooms. The hotel is 7 stories-the rooftop pool is a nice place to unwind and grab a drink. We were there over a weekend and many locals came in the evenings-as it turns into a lounge with a DJ.  They do have free wifi. We ate a buffet breakfast which was so well worth it. Fresh breads , pastries, juices, fruits, eggs and crepes galore. The staff is very professional and attentive.
title: Great boutique hotel

hotel: Sankara Nairobi, Autograph Collection by Marriott
review: We had an excellent stay at the Nairobi Sankara Hotel.  The service and the support in the logistic of our workshop were perfect!  The staff provides impeccable service and the hotel is equipped with a gym and a swimming pool on its roof. The hotel got a large choice of dishes: international buffet, chinese restaurant, wine bar... We really recommand you this hotel.
title: Excellent service!

hotel: Sankara Nairobi, Autograph Collection by Marriott
review: I really enjoyed staying at this hotel. It was recommended by another frequent traveler to Nairobi and I'm so glad I took her advice!  Everything is clean, new and modern and the rooms were quiet and spacious.  I've stayed at several other hotels in downtown, and this location is much more relaxing. There's easy access to shopping and restaurants at the Westlands "mall" across the street. The spa was also lovely, with at least one great massage therapist!  As a solo female traveler, I always felt safe and comfortable here. Highly recommended for both business or pleasure travel!
title: Great boutique hotel!

hotel: Sankara Nairobi, Autograph Collection by Marriott
review: This is a great boutique hotel!  The staff were all very friendly and attentive.  The rooms are wonderful with excellent attention to detail in the design of the rooms.  Had a great meal at the Thai restaurant.  And the rooftop pool is relaxing and impressive.  Will definitely stay here the next time I am in Nairobi.
title: Love this hotel!

hotel: Sankara Nairobi, Autograph Collection by Marriott
review: Good if pricey, well located.  Beds overly soft - loved by some, hated by others.
title: Good food, nice decor, soft beds

hotel: Sankara Nairobi, Autograph Collection by Marriott
review: So, we didn't actually stay here. My girlfriend/long lost cousin and I took the kids out for breakfast after church (we are ex-pats living in Nairobi) and got to restaurant  at 11:15, 15 mins after they stopped serving breakfast. The staff were cordial but rigid that we couldn't order anything but would have to wait 45 minutes for brunch. The prospect wasn't all together appealing so we asked to see the manager . After a short discussion. he set us up in the coffee area, assigned the charming, Michael to wait on us and 15 minutes later we were tucking into well made beautifully presented dishes. The kids cleared their plate (always a good sign) and I ate most of my muesli served in a huge red wine glass with what tasted like home made yogurt. Michael was very attentive and the
title: ... and the manager was terrific

hotel: Sankara Nairobi, Autograph Collection by Marriott
title: Impressive Hotel in Nairobi

hotel: Sankara Nairobi, Autograph Collection by Marriott
review: This was my first time staying at the Sankara Hotel in Westlands.  I have stayed in a number of hotels in Nairobi including Tribe and Serena, but this one has the best rooms by far.  The rooms are larger, the beds are bigger, the bathrooms are spacious, and with satelittle tv.  There is a nice poolside bar upstairs where you can have wine, cocktails, tapas, or shisha.  There is a gym which is fine for cardio but could use some heavier weights.  The hotel restaurant is very good and features a really good breakfast with a mix of Indian, Kenyan, and other foods.  Cybercafe with several computers provided to guests with no charge.  If no traffic, it is ten minutes away from the UN Regional headquarters, and a number of embassies including the U.S. Embassy.   I plan to stay in this
title: Epicly good hotel with exemplary service

hotel: Sankara Nairobi, Autograph Collection by Marriott
title: Truly Outstanding

hotel: Sankara Nairobi, Autograph Collection by Marriott
review: The Sankara is a great hotel in the Westlands section of Nairobi.  It's not as opulent as a 5 star hotel, but still is an excellent property.  The grounds aren't much to speak of (no gardens, small rooftop pool and deck) but the guest rooms are very modern (bordering on futuristic) and quite large, especially the bathrooms.  The gym is pretty small, it has two bikes, two treadmills, and two elliptical machines for cardio, some dumbbells, and then a few universal machines.  Fortunately, it was never very crowded while I was there.  My room was one of the few that had a balcony but it had poor drainage and was full of rainwater.  The staff is attentive and will make up your room within moments of you requesting it.  The restaurant is good (not amazing) and is quite overpriced for
title: Very good hotel

hotel: Sankara Nairobi, Autograph Collection by Marriott
title: Again very good!

hotel: Sankara Nairobi, Autograph Collection by Marriott
review: Always a pleasure to stay at Sankara Nairobi. Very good staff, great rooms, perfect location!
title: Exactly what we were looking for!

hotel: Sankara Nairobi, Autograph Collection by Marriott
review: We stayed at the Sankara for stopovers on our way to the Masaai Mara and beach.  We were looking for a safe, boutique hotel with great service.  Sankara delivered on this!  After arriving from our international flight, we were easily checked in and shown to our room.  We stayed in a deluxe room which was modern, spacious, very comfortable beds and included any amenity we needed.  We found the staff to be very professional and arranged all our airport transfers, taxis and visit to the elephant orphanage.  The rooftop bar is a nice introduction to Nairobi to take in the city and have a glass of wine.  It was a great start to our holiday in Kenya!
title: niceee

hotel: Sankara Nairobi, Autograph Collection by Marriott
review: The wow factor here was the rooms, very large always clean fitted with all essentials from showera to bath tabs desk area e.t.c our room was facing the sarit centre mall so we would just sit by the window at night with all the lights outside and have a romantic glass of wine. The staff is always smiling and very helpful.  The food was great but a bit pricey so most nights we opted to eat out our favourite spot being havanna restaurant 5 minutes walk where they have amazing pork ribs i have ever eaten in the whole world they were soft and sinfully sweet we ate there everyday....i coul go on and on about my baby pork ribs Sankara is amazing and the fact that it is in westlands makes it more interesting as night runners like us we had plenty of bars with good music a few minutes
title: Wow. Just...wow

hotel: Sankara Nairobi, Autograph Collection by Marriott
review: Accommodation: a business hotel with all the usual facilities. Billed as 5 star, but by international standards feels more like 4 star. Has a great rooftop bar and pool as well as an excellent first floor wine bar, which give character to otherwise conventional place. The rooftop is a welcome haven from the hustle and bustle of Nairobi below.  Service: very good throughout and friendly.   Facilities: excellent pool, gym and business centre. Let down by poor wi-fi in the rooms, which is significant for a business hotel.  Food: we only had breakfast, but was good.   Value:accommodation feels a little over priced for what you get, compared to equivalents in many other major African cities such as Cape Town.
title: A haven among the hustle and bustle of Nairobi

hotel: Sankara Nairobi, Autograph Collection by Marriott
review: New Designer Hotel in good location. The smile you receife while checking in is the beggining of a pleasant stay in this Hotel. The rooms are comparabel with asian 5 star Hotels. Beautiful designed and well arranged. The breakfast fullfills all wishes the risk of eating too much is given.  The roof terasse is perfect for a sunset cocktail, lounge music and some tappas. The gym in the last floor is well equiped and the satff is very helpful if ou want some private lessons. After a stressful day there is no better place than the spa, well trained staff gives you a hour of relief and peace!
title: The place to be in Nairobi

hotel: Sankara Nairobi, Autograph Collection by Marriott
review: Had a great lunch here at the Muhibbah restaurant. We were kept waiting a while before our food arrived so were told we could help ourselves from the salad buffet in the meantime. When it did arrive it was well worth the wait. The staff were very attentive and the food excellent. Highly recommend it.
title: Lunch

hotel: Sankara Nairobi, Autograph Collection by Marriott
review: We chose this hotel as it is close to our daughter's apartment in Westlands where she is staying during a semester abroud in Nairobi.She could walk to us and we could get an understanding of her life in Kenya. We stayed two nights before heading off to safari in three game parks, and again upon our return.. It is the newest hotel in Nairobi and it showsThe hotel rooms were smallish, but very comfortable. The bathrooms sparkling with a great soaking tub, and fresh flowers at the sink.The staff was very accomodating with taxis. information, helping our daughter meet us etc. We enjoyed an afternoon in the pool (complete with glass window to the ground 7 stories below) before cathcing our late night flight home. Due to hieghtened security alerts, there were metal detectors and
title: Calm and quiet

hotel: Sankara Nairobi, Autograph Collection by Marriott
title: A soft start in Nairobi!

hotel: Sankara Nairobi, Autograph Collection by Marriott
review: Very perfectly located in heart of Nairobi. So close to Sarit Centre and all Indian restaurants. Rooms and service is good.
title: Great Place to explore Nairobi

hotel: Sankara Nairobi, Autograph Collection by Marriott
review: I have just returned from my 5th stay at the Sankara. This hotel is extremely convenient if you're doing business in Westlands. The service at the Sakara is excellent without being stuffy. The staff make me feel welcomed and at home every time I stay.   The modern rooms are extremely comfortable and meet all of the requirements of the business traveller.   The pool area is particularly lovely, although the drinks are rather pricy as is the breakfast buffet.   I look forward to my next stay.
title: Home Away From Home

hotel: Sankara Nairobi, Autograph Collection by Marriott
review: I have stayed at this hotel three times when I visited Nairobi.  The staff are wonderful and very helpful. Rooms are spacious and have full amenities. Breakfast buffet is top quality.  You feel very safe and comfortable here.  Only real issues are the temporary power outages which is not the hotel's problem (they have generators), and the spotty wireless internet. Also, they could have a wider choice of satellite TV channels.  But overall a great experience.!
title: Great Experience in Nairobi

hotel: Sankara Nairobi, Autograph Collection by Marriott
review: I have not stayed at the hotel (so ignore my room rating) but I had a chance to have some drinks and snacks at the Sarabi pool bar with a friend earlier this evening. The menu offerings are well thought out with sufficient variety to unwind. The service was fast but we found the waiters quite unfriendly and disengaged from the whole process of service..No smiles, no drink or snack recommendations. I hope that they can consider adding some personality to the pool waitering service and engage a little bit more with clients. However, on our way out of the pool bar, there was this happy  gentleman who really took his time to tell us more about the hotel including taking us round the various restaurants in the hotel. Now that was the highlight of the evening..great service. Overall,
title: Very sophisticated..chic..modern hotel

hotel: Sankara Nairobi, Autograph Collection by Marriott
title: Fabulous place to stay in Nairobi!

hotel: Sankara Nairobi, Autograph Collection by Marriott
review: Hotel is on smaller space, thus giving a clumsy feel inside. Rooms are small and less attractive.  Food is some what ok. The last place for people who only stay in 5 star and are not getting rooms else where.
title: 5 star choice in NBO

hotel: Sankara Nairobi, Autograph Collection by Marriott
review: I have made six business trips in the last three years to Nairobi. They don't get any easier. But they are made marginally more bearable when you are able to lay down your bags, dust off your shoes, literally, and relax in the comfort of a quality hotel. The Sankara is just that.  Located very conveniently in Westlands, the Sankara is an oasis of luxury in a desert of deprivation. However, it is only worth staying here if you have business nearby. The traffic is so bad in Nairobi that even the BBC World Service ran a report on it recently. I was lucky enough to stay here just after it opened, and what a blissful change it was from the clunky, dirty old Serena. It must be said, however, that the Sankara has fallen off the standard a little - high standards it set itself when it
title: A World Away from the World Around It

hotel: Sankara Nairobi, Autograph Collection by Marriott
title: Best choice in NBO

hotel: Sankara Nairobi, Autograph Collection by Marriott
review: We stayed at the Sankara for one night each way on the way out to Tanzania and on the return from Safari. We were fortunate to be upgraded to the junior suite. This meant a special rooftop clublounge check-in, complimentary soft drinks and snacks all day.  In the evening during happy hour all drinks were included with canapes.  It is an excellent rendezvous for business meetings.  The rooftop pool is an experience - I also met an airline crew member who said that this was the best hotel in NBO and he never knew it existed until recently. My wife enjoyed thought the massage was the best she had and felt thoroughly revived,  Staff are very friendly, the decor is modern (you are discouraged from taking photos internally). The first floor has a number of restaurants that are very
title: all of 5 stars

hotel: Sankara Nairobi, Autograph Collection by Marriott
title: Cracking hotel, thoroughly recommended for business

hotel: Sankara Nairobi, Autograph Collection by Marriott
review: Excellent breakfast, clean rooms.  Most staff are professional.  Many thanks to Krishna. The fitness instructor is the best.
title: A very extended stay at Sankara

hotel: Sankara Nairobi, Autograph Collection by Marriott
review: Ok it's obvious, it's a five star hotel, but sometimes you can be very disappointed by five stars hotels. Not here.  I asked for a transfer from the airport, the driver was waiting for me there and was friendly, he drove an almost new mercedes and brought me to the hotel in no time (ok, it was midnight, so no traffic jam at that time).= charge 55USD (easier than begin to negociate with the airport taxi drivers)  The staff at check-in is friendly and helpful (and working fast)  The rooms are not that big, but are big enough, but the king-size bed is really good !  The rooms are quiet as the hotel is situated in a small side street.  The airco is working very good and is silent, but ok in december it was not really needed.  The bar is ok, i read that the bar earned the award of
title: Very good

hotel: Sankara Nairobi, Autograph Collection by Marriott
title: 5 star stay!

hotel: Sankara Nairobi, Autograph Collection by Marriott
review: The Sankara was such a treat after a week long camping adventure. The rooms are on the small side, but well done and comfortable. The fitness center is one of the best I have ever seen at a hotel and even has a complimentary personal trainer. The rooftop pool was also quite enjoyable and the service was top notch. As for the area, I never felt unsafe walking around and it only took about 10 minutes to get to the city center via taxi. I highly recommend staying at the Sankara.
title: Very Pleasant

hotel: Sankara Nairobi, Autograph Collection by Marriott
review: I had a very pleasant stay here. Very courteous, almost too courteous. :) The room was really comfortable with the lighting and the mirrors. The bed was comfy but the bath tub didn't work. The plug was spoiled and i couldn't run a bath. Housekeeping was very timely and did a great job too.  You should stay here and oh, ask for Monicah at the Front desk. The nicest lady ever.
title: Good hotel

hotel: Sankara Nairobi, Autograph Collection by Marriott
review: In Nairobi, I've stayed at the Sankara, the Ole Sereni, the Intercontinental, and the Tribe.  Leaving travel times (i.e., traffic to other parts of the city) out of the equation, I'll book return visits at the Sankara.  (Tribe is a close second, Ole Sereni only for trips centered around the airport, and probably never again at the Intercontinental.)  The room was well-appointed, the bed was comfy, room service was good, check-in was fast and correct, and the gym was nice.  A few power outages, but that's fairly standard around the city.
title: Would Return

hotel: Sankara Nairobi, Autograph Collection by Marriott
review: This is one of the newest hotels in town. Its an extremely trendy hotel, quite unlike the other hotels you might find in Nairobi. Centrally located, right next to the Sarit Center. A walk down the road and you hit a few pubs.  They have a lovely rooftop pool and an adjoining cafeteria/bar where we had most of our business meetings. The rooms are excellent and modern. The staff was extremely friendly.  I stayed here for 5 nights and it was totally worth it.
title: Fantastic Property

hotel: Sankara Nairobi, Autograph Collection by Marriott
review: I have not stayed at the hotel but I have dined at The Artisan, had drinks at The Gallery, and at Sarabi pool bar. The ambience ofthe hotel is nothing but top class and commendable. The service however is quite wanting, with what appears to be lethargic staff during certain times of the day and possibly from their attitude, whom they serve.  Yes, it is human nature to warm up to people you are more familiar to, in this case visiting regulars, but this is the service industry! First impression is what you need to hit at hardest!  The food was beautifully presented even in buffet form with a wide variety of salads, vegetarian and non vegetarian selections.  I like that during the meal our hostess came to check on us, just took a while to get our drinks order.  I this the hotel has
title: Service is wanting

hotel: Sankara Nairobi, Autograph Collection by Marriott
title: Amazing staff, amazing hotel

hotel: Sankara Nairobi, Autograph Collection by Marriott
review: I stayed at the Sankara during a recent business trip and was overwhelmed by the level of service. Whether it was Nelson who greeted me by name each day in one of the restaurants or Iveen and Charles on the concierge desk who solved my transport needs in a flash, this hotel is a great, well located sanctuary.
