Don't miss the pool bar at sundown. A cold Tusker as the sun goes down is a must. After that, the hotel restaurants offer up delicious food and innovative menus. I can't wait to get back there soon.
title: Good property, but not ideal for business travellers with meetings in  town

hotel: Sankara Nairobi, Autograph Collection by Marriott
review: Stayed here for 2 nights on a business trip. First class experience - delightful superior room, very friendly, helpful & enthusiastic service, plus delightful ambiance.  Restaurant food is high quality & reasonable value.  If visiting the City, I would thoroughly recommend this hotel.
title: Sankara Hotel, Nairobi

hotel: Sankara Nairobi, Autograph Collection by Marriott
review: The new Sankara hotel is excellent. great rooms, good WiFi, lovely baths and centrally located. The room service was quick and helpful, the front desk helped me when i wanted them to accept a courier on my behalf when i was not going to be in Nairobi! All the rooms are non-smoking, so smokers be warned!
title: Excellent new hotel in Nairobi!

hotel: Sankara Nairobi, Autograph Collection by Marriott
review: The Sankara Nairobi is breath of fresh air amid the older hotels in Nairobi. The positives of this hotel are definitely that everything is new and planned with a lot of light and air. The rooms are what you would expect but the small touches like fresh flowers, fruit and cute little stone animals by your bedside (great souvenirs) make a huge difference.  The service is excellent - especially if you have custom requests (like we did). The choice of restaurants is ok but the rooftop by the pool dining experience is a must do if your're spending an evening in the hotel. The swimming pool is lovely and meeting facilities are perfect to host. The only thing missing is a view, the best ones are that of the pool, but I guess that cant be helped.
title: Good new hotel

hotel: Sankara Nairobi, Autograph Collection by Marriott
review: After two weeks in the African bush, we were welcomed to the Sankara and it was a wonderful place to rest up before a long trip home.  The food was excellent and they do an outstanding job of trying to accommodate a wide range of travelers from around the world.  Quality and service were perfect.  The rooms were spacious and comfortable!  A real treat was there gift shop, which had a very small but excellent collection of African gifts and collectables - not your typical items that you see everywhere.  It was a great place to pick up some last minute mementos of our trip. Their spa, workout facility and lounge are all exceptional.
title: Great Oasis in Nairobi

hotel: Sankara Nairobi, Autograph Collection by Marriott
review: I stayed in Sankara hotel Nairobi for 1 week,   It was a great stay, especially the food, also you have a pool and a bar in the roof.   The rooms are very clean, All the rooms non smoking   West-gate mall is not very far from this hotel,
title: Good place to stay

hotel: Sankara Nairobi, Autograph Collection by Marriott
review: Friendly staff and a good restaurant; largish rooms, and small health club. Mostly business travellers, it seemed. Building work next door causes some noise and the entrance backs on to a petrol station.
title: Good Hotel close to centre of Nairobi

hotel: Sankara Nairobi, Autograph Collection by Marriott
review: Excellent hotel, excellent restaurant (better than the Tribe), excellent service, great location near shopping centres and night clubs, wonderful hospitality! Sankara is the place to be while in Nairobi!
title: Super Sankara!

hotel: Sankara Nairobi, Autograph Collection by Marriott
review: This is just to confirm the positive reviews.  I like it because it reflects contemporary energetic Africa. The style is modern, rooms are comfortable and quiet with high quality bedding. The breakfast buffet offers a great variety of food. Good wine list. I've been here twice already and will come back again.
title: A modern hotel!

hotel: Sankara Nairobi, Autograph Collection by Marriott
review: This is our new favorite hotel in Nairobi, better than the Tribe which was our previous favorite.  We stayed in the Junior Suite which was very spacious and luxurious with excellent decor.  The service was unsurpassed.  The staff was friendly, helpful and professional throughout our two night stay.  Eliab at the front desk, in particular, was incredibly helpful and friendly.  The hotel is located in the heart of Westlands.  Two of Nairobi's bigger shopping malls are within walking distance.  Sarit Center is directly across from the hotel and Westgate is a few blocks away.  This is also the part of town with the greatest variety of restaurants although the Asian restaurant at the hotel itself was excellent so there is little need to go out.  If you are working downtown or in the
title: Favorite hotel in Nairobi

hotel: Sankara Nairobi, Autograph Collection by Marriott
title: Wonderful

hotel: Sankara Nairobi, Autograph Collection by Marriott
review: This is an excellent hotel.  If you look at my prior reviews, you will find that I seldom give any hotel a 4 or 5.  However, this hotel (based on the standards that I have seen and experienced in Kenya) deserves a 4 1/2.  The following is a brief summary of the quality of this hotel.  Safety: This is on the minds of most travelers from Europe and the States.  The drive up to the hotel opens your eyes to the security of this hotel.  With the steel bars that rise from the ground to keep unwanted traffic out of the parking area and the metal detector at the entrance to the hotel, along with all the other security measures, it is quite a comforting feeling to know you can relax.  Registration and check out:  Very simple.  Did not take me long at all.  The bellman was very
title: Safe and Excellent Quality

hotel: Sankara Nairobi, Autograph Collection by Marriott
title: Kenya's Best

hotel: Sankara Nairobi, Autograph Collection by Marriott
review: The restaurants, the rooms, minute details all at par with the best on the globe. Keep it up, viva Kenya another feather in our cap!!
title: African modern chic

hotel: Sankara Nairobi, Autograph Collection by Marriott
review: Nairobi was just a stop over to head to a safari trip. The stay at Sankara was a good surprise. I was really impress to see a hotel like this in Nairobi. The style is modern Afric chic, very well done. They have a nice roof top swimming pool where you can also have lunch.the cuisine is not extraodinary but its probably the best you can find there. The rooms are are confortable and nice. Expect to see many business people.
title: sankara

hotel: Sankara Nairobi, Autograph Collection by Marriott
review: i stayed in sankara for a week during a conference.  The hotel is very modern, luxurious.  The rooms were beautiful with a nice view of the city.  staff was very friendly. Dinner was well done.  Breakfast buffee was good, there was a lot of variety to eat.  Nice bar at the roof and at 1st floor, with entertainment.
title: Great business hotel

hotel: Sankara Nairobi, Autograph Collection by Marriott
review: Best Hotel to stay in Nairobi. Good is delicius. The bed and linens of top quality and the glass between bath and bed is a fun touch, if you are so inclined can soak and watch TV at the same time with sound piped in! Wi Fi is free all over and the breakfast buffet outstanding! The staff were wonderfully helpful and attentive
title: Best

hotel: Sankara Nairobi, Autograph Collection by Marriott
review: We recently spent 3 nights at the Sankara, a welcome, tranquil place after many days of driving! The rooms are superb, nothing has been forgotten when it comes to guest comfort! The bed and linens of top quality and the glass between bath and bed is a fun touch, if you are so inclined can soak and watch TV at the same time with sound piped in! Wi Fi is free all over and the breakfast buffet outstanding! The staff were wonderfully helpful and attentive!
title: High rise oasis in Nairobi

hotel: Sankara Nairobi, Autograph Collection by Marriott
review: The food and service are well above average. While NYC prices, or more, the wine list is well above other spots at a similar price point. Gym is also very nice.
title: Nice view, strange vista

hotel: Sankara Nairobi, Autograph Collection by Marriott
review: We just returned from a very enjoyable stay in the Executive Suite at The Sankara and want to thank Edward, Krishna, Rachel and Winnie for their personal attention and consistently high sevice quality delivered by the team looking after us.  Edward was very perceptive in understanding our needs and took decisive action to ensure we were looked after very well. We will return to The Sankara next time we are in Nairobi.
title: Great stay at The Sankara in Nairobi

hotel: Sankara Nairobi, Autograph Collection by Marriott
review: Stayed for a quick business trip. Thought this hotel was fantastic, staff are friendly with an excellent quality of service. The room I stayed in was really clean with a good level of furnishings, separate shower which i much prefer. Also internet access was very good & free (which it should be in all hotels, but often isn't).  It was my first trip to Nairobi for a couple of years and just couldn't believe how great the hotel was, previous places I'd stayed seemed very staid, so it could be all hotels have improved.  Didn't get to see the gym or pool, but hopefully on my next trip. Hotel is located at the end of a street with a couple of decent bars which is a bonus.
title: Fantastic Hotel

hotel: Sankara Nairobi, Autograph Collection by Marriott
review: The exterior and location of the hotel is not the most attractive. There is some construction work going on an the front of the hotel is surrounded by yellow corrugated iron. However, don't let this put you off it improves significantly. My stay at the Sankara was my first having tried many others and being a regular at the Nairobi Serena. There is a good level of security on entering the hotel both by car and on foot. The lobby is spacious, bright and airy. I checked in late at night and perhaps this wasn't the best time as there was only one receptionist on the front desk dealing with multiple issues. This could improve.   The rooms are of reasonable size modern and spotless far more than I was expecting. Large full size picture window although the view from the room was not
title: Best hotel stay in Nairobi

hotel: Sankara Nairobi, Autograph Collection by Marriott
title: Modern Luxury in Nairobi

hotel: Sankara Nairobi, Autograph Collection by Marriott
review: We stayed at the Sankara Nairobi in August, 2012, as a launching point for a safari vacation.  Given that we traveled to/from Nairobi from San Francisco to say that we were exhausted upon our arrival would be an understatement.  The Sankara was truly an oasis, and we loved our stay there.  The hotel is modern and very comfortable - the rooms are very well appointed and the shower helped revive us.  We got massages at the excellent spa and that completed our recovery from the long journey.  Security is very present and you always feel comfortable at the Sankara.  The rooftop pool and bar are very cool - I only wish we had more time to enjoy them.  We enjoyed several of the dining options and all were excellent - the buffets are loaded with way too many options (this is a good
title: Great business property in Nairobi

hotel: Sankara Nairobi, Autograph Collection by Marriott
title: Good Business hotel

hotel: Sankara Nairobi, Autograph Collection by Marriott
review: Overall a very good stay here. The rooms are very nice, bed is comfortable, etc. Nothing to complain about at all.  The rooftop bar is very popular and is a great place to get a drink. There are a couple different restaurants with different menus and price points but all offer a very nice dining experience and good food. There is also a great coffee bar/pastry counter for in the morning. The hotel is also in a trendy area, in walking distance to many other dining options.  There is also a nice, if somewhat small, gym on the top floor.   Also, as many are concerned about security in Nairobi: the security here is excellent.  Overall it was a great experience with only two complaints: - I arranged an airport transfer with the hotel in advance. However, when I arrived there was no
title: Absolutely Wonderful

hotel: Sankara Nairobi, Autograph Collection by Marriott
review: Not reviewing the hotel, but the SPA facilities at the hotel. Apart from the very nice lobby area of the hotel, the reception area of teh spa is also very welcoming. I have been there several times to enjoy a Javanese massage.  Clean, comfortoable, very well equipped, reasonably prized! Always happy when it is time a again for a treat! Spa manager very professional!  Only setback: one is not allowed to use the swiming pool, same is for hotel guests only
title: Great treat in the SPA

hotel: Sankara Nairobi, Autograph Collection by Marriott
review: What a great place to stay! New, clean, pristine condition...Top notch service from the greeters to the front desk, to the room attendants, to the restaurants and the lounge/patio/bar. Super friendly, helpful, courteous staff. Wouldn't hesitate to recommend this world class hotel to anyone! Can't wait for a return visit.
title: Better than first class!!!

hotel: Sankara Nairobi, Autograph Collection by Marriott
review: Just returned from a trip to Kenya.  Stayed in Nairobi for 2 nights at Sankara.  This hotel is a gem in a crazy city.  My husband and I arrived late at night, but check in was quick and easy.  Our bags were were taken to our room for us.  The room was modern, clean, and updated. After a long flight it was a nice to fall into a cozy king size bed.  Close inspection of the room shows that there are some cosmetic issues with paint, fixtures, wall paper, etc., but nothing major.  The bathroom was a decent size with separate bath and walk in shower.  The personnel are excellent and will go out of there way to ensure that you are happy and comfortable.  The restaurants are also very good, especially Muhibbah (excellent Thai food).  Artisan has a decent breakfast buffet.  There is a
title: Unexpected gem...

hotel: Sankara Nairobi, Autograph Collection by Marriott
title: Will definitely return..

hotel: Sankara Nairobi, Autograph Collection by Marriott
review: Stayed here in February 2012 for 4 days and was quite impressed with the hotel. In particular, the service of the staff there. The gym was 'compact' but did the job. The rooms and bathrooms where larger than expected which was plus. Room service was prompt. Overall a very good experience - one that I would gladly repeat.
title: Nice hotel but already showing age!

hotel: Sankara Nairobi, Autograph Collection by Marriott
review: After 3 tiring days in Masai Mara, Sankara was a bliss. Fantastic and quite luxurious hotel, very comfortable room and three of us had a very relaxing time. Bar on the 1st floor is quite reasonable and restaurant adjoining it serves indian and continental food. Although i was not impressed with the East Asian restaurant that we tried our lunch in. Tom yum soong soup was too sour and i realized that the restaurant still has miles to go before they claim authentic south east asian tag. However, everyone that i met in the hotel was warm and welcoming so i excused the 'Thai food' fiasco :)  Lovely ambience of the lobby, i asked for a taxi and it was promptly arranged at a very reasonable cost...its very close to West gate mall and other markets. Loved the place and would recommend
title: Out in Africa

hotel: Sankara Nairobi, Autograph Collection by Marriott
title: Great new option - everything works!

hotel: Sankara Nairobi, Autograph Collection by Marriott
review: Love the extra touches: luxury robe, great organic Kenyan in-room French press coffee service, DVD player, solid wifi, easy friendly service, cool rooftop bar and pool, legit security, and two shopping centers within 5-minute walk!
title: Awesome Hotel

hotel: Sankara Nairobi, Autograph Collection by Marriott
review: I only stayed in Sankara for a night but was blown away, this is one of the nicest hotels I have stayed in Africa. First, the room had a real nice smell when I first walked in, the bathroom was very clean with both bath and shower.  The bed was very comfortable and air con worked perfectly.  I ordered the Veg burger from room service, with an iced tea. It was awesome, I highly recommend this hotel.
title: Fantastic!!!!

hotel: Sankara Nairobi, Autograph Collection by Marriott
review: The hotel is lovely.  Rooms are modern and clean.  The bed is perfection!!!  Incredible pillows and pillow menu.   Staff is attentive and very helpful.  Roof top pool and lounge are a lovely surprise in Nairobi.  Highly recommend.
title: A 5* bolt hole in Nairobi

hotel: Sankara Nairobi, Autograph Collection by Marriott
review: Think the enterance of the hotel, is undergoing rennovation and the the location is nothing to write about i.e. behind a petro pump, in the middle of a commercial area.  The place is expensive- clearly the demand/supply equation, working overtime. Room and the hotel interiors were great. However what sucked big time was the service. Reached on sunday and I needed to work- using the hotel internet. The LAN based or the WIFI internet refused to work- called approx 5 times and after 6 hours, I get told that the IT person has left for the day. I then moved to the common area, to work (as I did get the WIFI signal there). The shower was broken, the house keeping guy came and fixed it- but he also took up approx 1 hour + and he came in when I was out working. When I came back, the
title: Average business hotel.

hotel: Sankara Nairobi, Autograph Collection by Marriott
title: Heaven in Nairobi

hotel: Sankara Nairobi, Autograph Collection by Marriott
review: My husband and I stayed there before and after our safari and we loved it. The hotel is modern and very well decorated. The restaurants offer enough variety so that you do not get bored with the food if you are staying there for a few days. The breakfast buffet is a bit expensive, but the selection is great. Try their lattes! The roof-top pool and the gym are quite enjoyable. They have a personal trainer at the gym; it is a nice touch. The one on duty when I was there was quite funny and he was able to make me work hard!  The staff was very nice. And the security at the hotel is also quite reassuring.
title: Watch out with your reservations

hotel: Sankara Nairobi, Autograph Collection by Marriott
review: I have staid in Sankara Nairobi for one night on my way back from my honeymoon (5 August, 2012).  The hotel has major works in front of the door and it seems you are entering a construction site.  As we were checking in, we were told that our reservation (made by our travel agency) had been cancelled. As it was Sunday, I could not contact my travel agent and I had no alternative other than paying myself for the stay with my credit card.  In check-in I had specifically asked for a nice room, as this was the end of our honeymoon. They were kind enough to get us a room... with separate beds!!!! Just what you wish for in a honeymoon, right?  But the worse was yet to come. When we arrived in Lisbon, our travel agent said that he reservation had not been cancelled at all. They
title: Great hotel for business, with excellent service

hotel: Sankara Nairobi, Autograph Collection by Marriott
title: Nice start and end to safari

hotel: Sankara Nairobi, Autograph Collection by Marriott
review: I had the opportunity of staying at the Sankara Nairobi recently.  I was greeted by very friendly staff on checking in, which was a very smooth process as well.  The room and bathroom were very clean and bed was very comfortable.  The animal figurines made of soap stone as a complimentary gift during turn down everyday is very unique indeed.  My stay at the hotel was short but I would definitely recommend it to friends and family.  I would definitely return myself.
title: Excellent Hotel

hotel: Sankara Nairobi, Autograph Collection by Marriott
review: This hotel is pretty nice and makes great use of it's small space. The decor is fabulous and high quality fittings were used. Natural wood keeps the rooms feeling light, yet cosy.  Room Service is fast and courteous. My one complaint was the security scanner visit everytime one entered the hotel.  Also service staff is courteous but not necessarily the friendliest.  Overall decent service though
title: Efficient use of space; luxurious feel

hotel: Sankara Nairobi, Autograph Collection by Marriott
review: I recently enjoyed a three night stay at this terrific city property.  The rooms are modern, comfortable and very clean.  The breakfast buffet is amazing and the staff throughout are exceptional!  They are attentive without being intrusive, kind without being "smarmy" and absolutely nothing was too much trouble.    The room was quiet, the internet service was free, easy to connect and surprisingly fast.  The bed was very comfortable, I'm only sorry that I didn't take the time to try out the "Pillow Menu" which included some very exotic choices!  We were attending a function at the Sarit Center and the location next door could not be more convenient.  Unfortunately the current construction meant that you had to walk around the block, but once that is done, the location for this
title: Wonderful Business Hotel

hotel: Sankara Nairobi, Autograph Collection by Marriott
title: Great Hotel

hotel: Sankara Nairobi, Autograph Collection by Marriott
review: This is a great hotel, spacious room and excellent facilities.  The restaurant prepares some awesome food and breakfast offers a wide variaty.  I would recommend the hotel to any traveller.  Friendly and very helpfull staff.  Sankara would see me again when i travel to Kenya.
title: Lovely. Fabulous

hotel: Sankara Nairobi, Autograph Collection by Marriott
review: Best location in town, particularly if you have meetings both downtown, U of Nairobi, and the UN compound. Design is clean, almost Nordic, but with a clear African flavour. Service is impeccable. Personalised, attentive, anticipating needs and, on top, a model of Kenyan hospitality and warmth. Food at Thai is of high quality, even if pricey. But restaurant is rather tight and awkward in shape. Breakfast is a treat, varied, with great fresh produce, European and worldly selections and service at restaurants maches rest of the hotel. Disappointment is with bar and swiming pool at terrace. They are well-intended and, again, very finely serviced by very competent barren and women, but space is uncomfortable, small, and unattractive. Swiming pool is not inviting, and exercise rooms
title: Great option for business trips

hotel: Sankara Nairobi, Autograph Collection by Marriott
title: Best Hotel in Nairobi!

hotel: Sankara Nairobi, Autograph Collection by Marriott
review: As a Kenyan, I have visited many hotels in Nairobi, but none comes any close to Sankara. The staff are extremely friendly and courteous, the place is clean and super beautiful, the food is to die for, their cocktails are the best, and just about everything about it is amazing!!
title: The friendliest staff, very welcoming

hotel: Sankara Nairobi, Autograph Collection by Marriott
review: I have stayed at the Sankara on business. Locality I can't really comment as it was perfect for Westgate Mall where we were based. The service of the staff was impeccable and they could not help enough. The Asian restaurant on site was lovely, really tasty and cheaper than the others strangely! The roof top champagne bar by the pool was very relaxing and again the service was top notch. The turn down service included little complimentary animal figurines that were a really nice touch and we were upset that we only got 4 and not the whole 7 as they were great keepsakes. The only very minor negative comment is the wifi is awful! I had to stand next to my kettle to get a sliver of a signal and I know other rooms suffered the same. Funnily the ipads seemed by ok but the smart phones
title: The BEST hotel I have ever stayed in!

hotel: Sankara Nairobi, Autograph Collection by Marriott
title: Modern Luxury Hotel in Nairobi

hotel: Sankara Nairobi, Autograph Collection by Marriott
review: We visited the roof top bar in the evening for drinks and shisha, the view is amazing and i love the glass bridge! Great place to go with a group of friends and the crowd was 25+. I heard the spa is amazing and will book there next time.
title: Great atmosphere..

hotel: Sankara Nairobi, Autograph Collection by Marriott
review: I travel extensively for work and pleasure and I enjoy the creature comforts, for me excellent food can overcome almost any other shortcoming a hotel might have.  If your tummy is full and happy, the noisy neighbor is less of a problem.  Sankara is excellent in all respects, the food is amazing, decor and service excellent, and the gym has a fantastic view if the entire neighborhood.
title: One of the Best Hotels I've stayed in

hotel: Sankara Nairobi, Autograph Collection by Marriott
review: Received an email with the offer for New Year for Sankara. Was very excited and speedily made our way to the hotel to make the necessary booking. This is where he epic saga begins. At reception we were requested to make the booking on the first floor. Got in the lift and went to first floor. On first floor informed they were only taking reservations for the restaurant and not the rooftop. Requested to go to the seventh floor to make the rooftop booking. Back on the lift and up to seventh floor. At seventh floor told all we could do was choose a table and go back to reception to make the payment. Further on making the payment on seventh floor the supervisor advised that we come back to seventh floor with the receipt as proof of payment. Confused? More like totally flabbergasted
title: What a disaster

hotel: Sankara Nairobi, Autograph Collection by Marriott
title: Pretty Ballin/dardy place to stay

hotel: Sankara Nairobi, Autograph Collection by Marriott
review: Man one of the best hotels in Africa, It has a pool on the roof, with a glass floor that allows u to see the street at the bottom.. pretty pricey $$ for a 19yr old, but well worth it.. The staff were good, place was spot less, had an amazing time being
title: Great Staff...

hotel: Sankara Nairobi, Autograph Collection by Marriott
review: What really sold me on the place was the little soapstone animals in lieu of chocolates with the turndown service. Too cute!   Good little gym; quiet air conditioning fully guest-controlled (just as well, since it's often not really necessary in Nairobi); fast service when my room safe needed its battery replaced; an easy walk to local malls; attentive concierge and porter service with links to a reliable limousine taxi service as well; excellent security (for example, room key required to access the elevators); comfortable bed, lighting and bathroom.  Breakfast buffet was lavish, but also lavishly priced -- after I realized it was $25, went elsewhere. Would not really have wanted to use the glass-bottomed pool on the top floor though no doubt there are people who like that kind
title: Fine comfort, safety, location -- and super service

hotel: Sankara Nairobi, Autograph Collection by Marriott
title: Big Time Holidays ltd Nairobi (Sankara Nairobi)

hotel: Sankara Nairobi, Autograph Collection by Marriott
review: I have been in Kenya almost 3 times and i have been having my accommodations either at stanley hotel or fair view hotel; after having searched carefully through the internet i came across the sankara Hotel , i did drop an e mail to Big Time Holidays limited who is my local operator asking more about this hotel (sankara) the response from them was very positive towards the sankara hotel. I was booked there for two nights and we found it very comfortable with great staff who were always willing to help at no fee. I have to give the sankara a credit because i left my money belt in my room unknowingly as we were leaving for a trip for maasai mara which we did book through Big time Holidays ltd and when i phoned the reception after almost an hour i was informed that it is safe and it
title: Pure luxury!

hotel: Sankara Nairobi, Autograph Collection by Marriott
title: Very nice, beautiful rooms, very good service

hotel: Sankara Nairobi, Autograph Collection by Marriott
review: We stayed at this hotel twice over the last 2 weeks. Once when we arrived in Nairobi for the start of our honeymoon and then again before we left Kenya on the flight to Zurich.  On our first stay we booked the honeymoon special and had an absolutely marvelous suite with a gigantic bathroom. We loved the free standing tub!  The staff is super attentive and nice - you feel immediately welcome here!  One mistake we made was to have the breakfast on our first stay at the Club Lounge. Yes, it's more private and quiet, but the food selection at the Artisan restaurant is better. Depending on your needs you might be better of just using the regular restaurant.  On our second stay we've spent only one night before flying back home so we booked just a regular room, which also turned out
title: Nice hotel

hotel: Sankara Nairobi, Autograph Collection by Marriott
review: This hotel pays attention to detail; free wifi in the rooms, classy interior design, great service, great restaurants, good location, and a nice rooftop bar/lounge/pool area.  Weekend rates are excellent value for money. Would definitely stay here again.
title: A good hotel by any standard

hotel: Sankara Nairobi, Autograph Collection by Marriott
review: This is a great new hotel in Nairobi if you are staying for more than 1 night...The hotel was clean and modern and had great facilities. Very comfortable bed and room and quiet. The breakfast was excellent with plenty of choices.  Staff very warm and welcoming and very helpful.  If you are only in Nairobi for a stop over of 1 night then please beware that traffic is so bad in Nairobi and between the airport and this hotel are 5 major roundabouts (one more roundabout than some other city hotels) which during peak-hour traffic can mean a trip between the hotel and the airport can take over 1.5 hours instead of 20 minutes in non-peak time.  Other than the location from airport, I would thoroughly recommend the hotel.
title: Great hotel if you in Nairobi for more than 1 night

hotel: Sankara Nairobi, Autograph Collection by Marriott
review: We stayed at the Sankara Hotel for 2 nights.The rooms were modern and very good.The rooftop bar/pool area is very enjoyable. The breakfast are very generous and good. Restaurants superb. Overall, was an excellent hotel.
title: Business Hotel

hotel: Sankara Nairobi, Autograph Collection by Marriott
review: We stayed here only one night before safari and one night after but my kids loved it! Rooms are so beautiful and comfortable, and staff very friendly..my only suggestion would be to have some children channels on tv....you had to buy movies because they have nothing for my kids to watch... Love it! (Also so close to shopping malls in case you need something) They also have a terrace bar by the pool on the 7 th floor, so nice at night
title: Our favorite

hotel: Sankara Nairobi, Autograph Collection by Marriott
review: After a long drive from the airport in chaotic traffic, and having got into the lobby having gone through airport style security it was relaxing to be in a safe and comfortable hotel. Check in was efficient and it was a few minutes before I was in my room. The bed was large and inviting. The bathroom layout was unusual but excellent with both shower and bath. The room was quiet and secure. Bed, duvet and pillows super comfortable. Roof top bar was a great place to relax after work. Tapas snacks were perfect. I would recommend the coffee bar on the first floor for excellent Kenyan coffee in a cafetiere. Great pastries too. Only complaint was the carpet in my room was dirty. Top tip? Go for the highest floor, the views are amazing.
title: Western style luxury in safe and comfortable five star hotel with roof top bar, a gym and very well equipped and spacious bedroo

hotel: Sankara Nairobi, Autograph Collection by Marriott
review: My husband and I stayed at the beautiful Sankara in December before and after our safari. It was a wonderful start and finish to our journey. The rooms are spacious, comfy beds and massive washrooms (with great bath products which are handy to take along on safari). The service was fantastic we had a small issue with our wake up call not working which delayed us for our flight outbound to safari but the Sankara made up for it when we returned as they upgraded us to a suite. The restaurants are very good. We enjoyed the breakfast buffet every morning which had everything you could want! Good veggie options, fruits, waffles, eggs, cold cuts and cheese, fresh pastries, hot food dishes. We also dined twice at the Thai restaurant which was delicious. There's a nice cafe in the hotel
title: Luxury & Great Location

hotel: Sankara Nairobi, Autograph Collection by Marriott
title: Best hotel we've ever stayed in, anywhere!

hotel: Sankara Nairobi, Autograph Collection by Marriott
review: After 2 weeks camping in Kenya & Uganda, we decided on a night of luxury at Sankara and what a good move!  The staff were extremely helpful and friendly; the decor is great, especially the amazing paintings all over the place; the room was huge and equipped with everything you can think of + more you probably wouldnt (eg. velvet lined snacks draw; slippers); the bed was super comfy; the rooftop pool bar is fantastic and the food was first class.  Security was really good too.  It didn't feel much like Kenya but if you want to be able to relax and enjoy when you get out of the bustle and traffic, Sankara is the place!   It was also not much more expensive than another distinctly average place in the same area we stayed at the start of our trip (Boulevard)... a different world
title: What a gem in westlands

hotel: Sankara Nairobi, Autograph Collection by Marriott
title: Good Service, Great Food

hotel: Sankara Nairobi, Autograph Collection by Marriott
review: I loved this hotel. I was only there overnight but i was treated like a queen and the room i booked came with a complimentary breakfast which was really good. The room was more that spacious and very clean. In fact everything looked new (probably because the hotel opened in the last 28mnths). I was very impressed with the rooftop bar and wished i had booked in for longer and in summer. The bar as with most 5 star hotels is very pricey so more of a treat than a place to have several drinks.   The breakfast was amazing , it had cereals, fresh fruit and juices and a whole buffet of hot feasts complete with an egg chef. They also serve this really nice ginger tea which was a treat. And in the morning they leave a newpaper outside your room complimentary. I would definately go here
title: Good hotel in Westlands

hotel: Sankara Nairobi, Autograph Collection by Marriott
review: Sankara is very good!! its lovely! i like it. its very luxurious!  its well located in Westilands, Nairobi. It has git customer focused staff.  i like the pool situated right on top of the hotel and the view is good from the poolside.  The food is lovely.   Sankara Hotel keep it up!
title: Sankara Hotel

hotel: Sankara Nairobi, Autograph Collection by Marriott
review: I travel to Kenya for business and stayed at the Intercontinental for my first trip and the Sankara for my second and third trips to Nairobi. While both are safe and well-run establishments, I will continue booking at the Sankara because of the quality of the hotel, the cost, and the amenities. I would say it's definitely on par with a modern business hotel in the States.  As a woman arriving at the airport alone, the car service could not have been easier to book, the staff were efficient and polite, and the hotel itself is very well-appointed and comfortable. While it's located in a very busy and noisy part of the city, my rooms were always quiet and I felt completely safe while on the property.   The food is really what stood out for me in comparison to the Intercontinental.
title: Gem of a hotel in a hectic part of the city

hotel: Sankara Nairobi, Autograph Collection by Marriott
title: Excellent Service and Good Location

hotel: Sankara Nairobi, Autograph Collection by Marriott
review: Staff very attuned to customer needs, and very helpful. Business Center staff went out of the way to call an airline when online check-in was not functioning properly. Relaxing bars and very good breakfast spread. Prompt airport pick-up and drop-off, at a decent price. When I had to travel to Burundi and Tanzania for a couple of days, hotel cheerfully held one of my luggage pieces, saving me excess baggage charges. Walking distance to Sarit Centre and Westgate where the Arts Cafe and Nakumatt can be found. A good place to stay in Nairobi.
title: Great Hotel in Westlands Nairobi

hotel: Sankara Nairobi, Autograph Collection by Marriott
review: Sankara is very luxurious! The amenities and services make you feel welcome and fully accomodated.  Location was perfect.  Close to my office, right next  to the Sarit center and within walking distance to Westgate shopping center. The food at the main restaurant was well prepared and very delicious.  The morning buffet was a great idea, but i would have liked to try a variety of breakfast items during my stay. Only a small complaint since I was there for 2 weeks on business and I did manage to switch between the savory part of the buffet and the fruit and cereal part of the buffet. I dont know where they get their granola and Mueseli from but it was excellent!!  The fitness center was small but it had what I needed for light workouts to keep me in shape.  The fitness
title: Great central niarobi hotel

hotel: Sankara Nairobi, Autograph Collection by Marriott
review: We stayed in the Sankara for a week upon relocating to Nairobi.  We had booked a club king room at a corporate rate, which came with breakfast and club lounge access (recommended!).  Room was nice though it felt a bit small (perhaps that was because we had a ton of luggage and nowhere to store it?).  I love love love the bathroom - excellent design and layout.  Wish I had that bathroom at home!  Hotel itself is quite luxe with good facilities - gym, club lounge, rooftop pool and bar, restaurant, bakery/coffee shop, etc.  The staff is generally incredibly friendly and helpful! The hotel is still doing some construction out front which isn't great but such is progress.  The location is excellent - within Westlands so near by restaurants, clubs, etc.  It's also walking distance to
title: luxury hotel in westlands

hotel: Sankara Nairobi, Autograph Collection by Marriott
title: Perfect Dining

hotel: Sankara Nairobi, Autograph Collection by Marriott
review: This was my second time dining here and we found the hotel parking space was full due to some event being held by some company. The security detail were nice enough to direct us to an alternative area we could park and even went ahead to pay the parking fees for us.  First time we went to the sarabi pool club-it's an open roof top club like design; cocktails were amazing!food was very good though small portions.music was good too not too loud...we loved it.Classy and chic.  Second time we dined at the Artisan restaurant i think.it's on the first floor.food was buffet.exceptional service...very friendly chefs manning the food stations.food was amazing.The cocktail though i had down here tasted more 'dilute' than the same kind i had at the sarabi club.quite disappointed in that.
title: I loved this hotel

hotel: Sankara Nairobi, Autograph Collection by Marriott
title: Good business hotel

hotel: Sankara Nairobi, Autograph Collection by Marriott
review: Love this hotel: common areas are stylish and chic and the room is lovely and very comfortable.  The bedding is one of the most comfortable I've ever experienced, like sleeping on a cloud.  In-room dining very good. Well-equipped gym, helpful business center, complimentary wireless that's fairly fast, excellent service all-around, cleaning of rooms could be of a bit higher standard (for instance carpets obviously need an update or cleaning).  i really like the feel and vibe of this place and will return for sure when i next come to nairobi!
title: Pretty Good - Great Roof-Top Pool

hotel: Sankara Nairobi, Autograph Collection by Marriott
review: Lovely and very friendly staff, the hotel was very vibrant. When they found out we were on our honeymoon they placed the red roses every where, was really lovely touch curtsey of the lovely staff and the flower shop owner..   Definitely recommend the hotel and it's also in a great location everything is a walking distance or just a short taxi ride away.
title: Excellent

hotel: Sankara Nairobi, Autograph Collection by Marriott
review: I had a great experience at the Sankara hotel where I stayed on and off over my three weeks in Kenya. Great for business and families alike. The breakfast was out of this world and the Thai food was, wonderful, and unexpected! The location is also good if you are going to be working in Westlands. I highly recommend the Sankara.
title: Beautiful/Wonderful service

hotel: Sankara Nairobi, Autograph Collection by Marriott
review: Stayed in the Sankara for 1 night before my honeymoon in Zanzibar. Was an Excellent atmosphere and checking was quick and efficient, Staff where friendly and polite. even though it was at 10:00pm. Having liven in Nairobi until i was 16 moved to the UK after, this was an new kind of experience in Nairobi for me . A Modern chic hotel. Rooms where amazing and the bathroom was excellent, had a view of the next door hotel so really did not feel like we where in a city. All in all have no complaints on this hotel.
title: Exellent hotel

hotel: Sankara Nairobi, Autograph Collection by Marriott
review: Stayed there several times, and exerience and service has consistently been good. Check-in was swift and friendly. Rooms are spacious, beds a very good, and the bathroom is excellent. Breakfast buffet is excellent, though gets dreary when staying a week or longer, as always the same. Agree with some reviewers that --whilst a nice setting-- the 7th floor bar is a bit over the top.
title: Consistently good

hotel: Sankara Nairobi, Autograph Collection by Marriott
review: All very modern and 'bling' but watch out for some ridiculous rules. We tried to have a beer on the 7th floor pool terrace, it was full so we were put in the 'Champagne Bar' (menu comes on iPads - bit cheesy, and you cannot deviate from the menu e.g. don't try ordering a gin martini..the menu say vodka martini and that is what you will have). In the Champagne Bar you cannot have a beer, even though we pointed out that they put us in there. Manager would not even contemplate it...bit childish and very unfriendly. That said their carpark is very nice....
title: Not a bad hotel but watch the rooftop bar's 'jobsworth' rules

hotel: Sankara Nairobi, Autograph Collection by Marriott
review: I visited the restaurant above their reception with my wife for late diner and was so disappointed, while they told us the buffet is not closed and we started with soup only to move and realize that there was not food but cramps, and we still had to pay the full bill. Worse staff were uncooperative save for one and as we were taking our cramps staff started mopping the floors while we and ther guests were still taking their meals. The building is nice they have created hype about it but really ts still below standard and their buffet food is very mean to say the list. With what they charge for buffet you could get into a five star hotel in the city, it's highly priced with little variety of food.
title: Lousy buffet

hotel: Sankara Nairobi, Autograph Collection by Marriott
review: I was here for a few days for a conference. My expectations were high because of all that I heard heard prior to visiting this place. The service was impressive. Everybody was really polite, which is great especially when you need information. The Wi-fi connection was down but they tried fixing it the whole time we were there. all, in all it was a great experience!
title: Conference services

hotel: Sankara Nairobi, Autograph Collection by Marriott
review: I am writing this review once again since my earlier review with the same title has been removed without giving me a notification. I guess this Hotel management asked to be removed due to not so positive review.  I had written that, I checked-in the Hotel at 3.30AM on 25 October 2012 with my Daughter on our way to safari. At check-in time, an Austrailan guy with a local women entered from security gate. Man had a mud and blood cover his face, holding a big broken big (baseball bat like) stick. He said the security personel that he just had a fight with Locals at the exit of a nearby bar.   Security personel let the couple in from the security gate as if noting happened in front of my Daughter's shocking eyes.   I challenge the Hotel Management sharing the security camera
title: Lousy Management and Security, Expensive and Very Clean Hotel

hotel: Sankara Nairobi, Autograph Collection by Marriott
title: Business in Nairobi

hotel: Sankara Nairobi, Autograph Collection by Marriott
review: I stayed here for a week long workshop for a project that my job had me involved in.  The hotel was really nice.  The room was nice, but little things like the towel hanging fitting being loose detracted from the 5* quality.  Personally I think the room was somewhere between 3 and 4 star quality.  The in-house restaurants (both of them) were brilliant.  Great food and reasonably priced.  The choice at breakfast was brilliant.  The conference centres were ok.  The room was large enough for us all to fit really well, and lunch was included.  I wasn't involved in the commercials of the room, so I don't know about value, but see the comments about the food and choice above, it still applies here.  We had some technical issues with the projector and AV conferencing (which was in
title: Great Hotel

hotel: Sankara Nairobi, Autograph Collection by Marriott
review: Certainly the best that I have stayed at in Africa, at any rate. Rooms are comfortable, staff are helpful, food is great, and the rooftop terrace is stunning. Nothing was too much trouble, and I really appreciated the little animal carvings which appeared in the room each day, they were lovely souvenirs of the trip.  I can't fault it.
title: Best hotel in Africa

hotel: Sankara Nairobi, Autograph Collection by Marriott
review: This was my second visit to Nairobi and this time round i did not manage to stay at Sankara. I had traveled with my partner and we visited the bar by the rooftop. The band that plays on Friday is amazing, service was supper.  We will definitely visit again when in Nairobi.
title: Roof top bar

hotel: Sankara Nairobi, Autograph Collection by Marriott
review: I usually connect though Nairobi from Paris but my flight always arrives around 8:30PM and I leave the next day at around 9:00AM. I have been doing that for a while (for work), and always staying at the Hilton hotel in town. So, on my last trip I decided to check out hotels suggestions on tripadvisor, that's how I found Sankara hotel.  Well, I was very impressed. I chose Sankara because the reviews were excellent but most importantly the restaurants were still open by the time I reached the hotel late at night. This was crucial to me because I had countless of nights at the Hilton where I was both starving and too exhausted to go out. So the cherry on the cake was that I was able to order breakfast in my room at 5:00AM before continuing my long journey. The only inconvenient is
title: Unbelievable service!!

hotel: Sankara Nairobi, Autograph Collection by Marriott
title: Great Hotel with Excellent Service

hotel: Sankara Nairobi, Autograph Collection by Marriott
review: I tagged along with my husband for business and we stayed at the Sankara. The hotel indicates that it is a 5-star hotel on their website and I was pleased when I arrived to see that the hotel lived up to my expectations. We stayed in a spacious Jr. Suite and had access to the Club Lounge which offers free breakfast and a happy hour each day from 5-8. Housekeeping kept the room spotless and made sure the room was comfortable. The pool bar on the top floor was nice and had great food.  I took advantage of the spa services and enjoyed every minute of my treatment. When plans changed, we had to extend our time in Kenya. We left the hotel to go on a safari and had to extend our stay at Sankara. At first they told us that they would not be able to accomodate the entire length of time
title: Great food, Great location, Great hotel

hotel: Sankara Nairobi, Autograph Collection by Marriott
review: I often come to this hotel for business and each experience is great. This hotel is safe by providing gards at the entrance and in several floors. Rooms are quiet, very comfortable and absolutely clean. Equipment is perfect. Food (bkfst and dinner) is high quality and clean. Staff is friendly and have good knowledge of their hotel. The gym equipment is in a good condition because brand new. Swimming pool is small but but attracting. I read people had a bad experience at the pool bar but be aware that a part of the bar is a Champagne bar... This means that no beers on this part... That makes sense for me. Situation is overall good but expect more than 1h to drive from airport in case of traffic jam. That.s a good hotel for demanding people.
title: Safe, nice and comfortable

hotel: Sankara Nairobi, Autograph Collection by Marriott
review: Wow what a difference after the Hiton debacle (see my review on that place for comparison). The Sankara is located in Westlands which was perfect for work. The location is reasonably central near Sarit center which makes is pretty convenient for everyday essentials.  The whole experience was excellent from start to end. Other have already commented on the rooms and I can confirm that they are finished to a very high standard so no complaints there. I booked a transfer from the Airport and it was brilliant. They picked my up in a nice big car ;-) but to my surprise the check in was actually in my room! I have travelled all over the world and this is my first experience of room check in and is definitely something I could get used to!  The restaurants are great and serve good
title: Probably best in Nairobi

hotel: Sankara Nairobi, Autograph Collection by Marriott
title: Felt like a little bit of Heaven

hotel: Sankara Nairobi, Autograph Collection by Marriott
review: This is a newer hotel, comfortably swanky and well appointed.  It isn't too far from JKIA, so if you have a long layover & want to relax, this is my pick!  I went with my Sweetheart, and we had a lovely time. It is a beautiful hotel, spa services, restaurants and my very favorite- the rooftop bar with a lap pool in the middle. At night, people also gather there to watch soccer games on a large screen. Even when it's warm, you get a nice breeze.  There are little touches I love around the hotel, like the lucite floors where you can see straight down many levels below.  There is a champagne bar, and a Thai restaurant. Rooms are airy and bright, and you could have just about any meeting there. If you are in Nairobi for a while, try one of their events which they host on big
title: Number One Hotel in Nairobi

hotel: Sankara Nairobi, Autograph Collection by Marriott
title: Great business hotel

hotel: Sankara Nairobi, Autograph Collection by Marriott
review: One of the best of East Africa... super service, great food, affordable rooms, comfortable beds and premium furniture. Area is always great and close to most of business offices. I will definitely go back there for my next trip to Nairobi
title: Best hotel in Nairobi

hotel: Sankara Nairobi, Autograph Collection by Marriott
review: Stayed atf the hotel for business for one day and ,everything was excellent ,with friendly staff ready to assist,good facilities,rooms clean and spacious  and easily accessible to the shopping center.Perfect place to stay.
title: Excellent place

hotel: Sankara Nairobi, Autograph Collection by Marriott
review: My husband took me to stay at Sankara for two nights for my birthday. We live in Nairobi so it was easy to find and we already knew about the local clubs and restaurants. Several times before we had been to the pool bar for drinks and appetizers.   This was the first time we actually stayed overnight. The room was clean, modern, and very nice. The two things that stand out the most to me were:  1. The Bed! It was so soft. The sheets and pillows were exceptional quality. I could have spent the whole two days in bed.   2. The Water Pressure! I probably took six showers. Anyone who lives in Nairobi has probably experienced a lack of water pressure, especially in the older houses like one one we live in. To me, this was a real treat!  We ordered room service. I had the beef fillet
title: Perfect birthday weekend

hotel: Sankara Nairobi, Autograph Collection by Marriott
title: Excellent place to stay

hotel: Sankara Nairobi, Autograph Collection by Marriott
review: I stayed in this hotel with my husband while he was in business in Nairobi. I do not have anything but good comments about this place.  Starting with the room: It is very roomy, clean, the bathroom is modern and provides anything you may have at home: a scale, a magnifying mirror, etc, the bed is very comfortable and there is a working space just in case you need to work from your room.  Internet is free and available, with no limits all over the hotel.  Talking about the food... the hotel has an excellent selection. You can choose international cuisine, buffet, thai food.. and everything is delicious. You can dine in any of the three restaurants or on the rooftop, which also has a nice Champaign bar with life music.  The service is excellent. All the waiters want to make the
title: Nice Hotel Apart From The  Waterfall

hotel: Sankara Nairobi, Autograph Collection by Marriott
review: I recently had the opportunity to stay at Sankara on a stop over business trip.The hotel has taken great care to ensure security of its residents with cctv cameras everywhere and rigorous checks at the entrance even for known hotel guests which can sometimes be annoying.The rooftop bar has good service and so is the spa on the 7th floor. They must be having a great chef too on their restaurant on the 1st floor as the food is great. The cost of these services is however on the higher side on a comparative basis to similarly priced new hotels in the city.I found it surprising and pretty disappointing that they have different rates for different days and even for these rates these exclude breakfast for the weekdays. It was also pretty disappointing that even after checking in
title: Underwhelming Stay

hotel: Sankara Nairobi, Autograph Collection by Marriott
title: Excellent Stay

hotel: Sankara Nairobi, Autograph Collection by Marriott
review: Coming from a Travel Agent who sees plenty of luxury hotels, this was by far one of the best I've stayed in. Room was fantastic - very modern and clean with uniquely African touches. Staff was phenomenal from check in to the waiters at the restaurant, very accommodating and pleasant.
title: Good Business hotel... we always stay here

hotel: Sankara Nairobi, Autograph Collection by Marriott
review: Good place, good food and nice location, if you want to stay in westlands, then its a good place.. traffic is very bad, so stay close to where you want to go. Coming back, the food is very good in the hotel and the service is also nice. The bed was too soft for my liking.
title: Rooftop lounge and cocktails

hotel: Sankara Nairobi, Autograph Collection by Marriott
review: I thought that the rooms and common areas were very well thought out and still looking in very good condition in spite of the hotel already having been open for a couple of years.  Bed was good and bathroom very well laid out with plenty of hot water.  Staff were very friendly and in general were exemplary.  My only minor quibble is the guest services desk where they let themselves down a couple of times ... We booked a day's safari via them and had expected something organised and professional.  We asked some quite specific questions when we booked (e.g can we pay on card) and had some awkward moments with the driver when we found he did not and we had to scuttle over to the ATM plus had to scape money together at the gate of the park.  The bus we hired was quite grubby and
title: Well designed and well run

hotel: Sankara Nairobi, Autograph Collection by Marriott
title: Pristine hotel, nice rooms, friendly staff

hotel: Sankara Nairobi, Autograph Collection by Marriott
review: Stayed here for an extended stay earlier this year.  Great rooms, nice large bathroom, decent gym, nice rooftop pool/restaurant, service is top notch (thru give you fruit basket upon arrival, a new miniature animal each night upon turndown).   Plenty of taxis available outside. Took about 30 minutes from airport.  Plan upto 1.5 hrs in case of traffic.   Would recommend anytime!
title: Magnificent Hotel in Westlands

hotel: Sankara Nairobi, Autograph Collection by Marriott
review: Sankara is a new hotel and looks so good.  Everything is new and glamorous.  I had breakfast and lunch with a business partner and we really enjoyed the selection.  Tables are well laid out and linen is perfect.  The treatment by the staff made me feel like a queen.  I will definitely go back to spoil myself.
title: Wonderful restaurant food but you need patience while waiting

hotel: Sankara Nairobi, Autograph Collection by Marriott
review: I was invited to dinner in the restaurant by a friend and her daughter who had booked a table in advance. So we were a little taken aback when it appeared that the reservation had not been made, although the restaurant was luckily not full. We then ordered fresh drinks - variety of juice and vegetable mixes and these took quite a while after we had  had to call a waiter to take our order. Then we had another wait as the food came- red clipper and two chicken dishes which were very well laid out and compensated for the wait. The dessert spread  was an endless selection and so were the herbal teas soon after.  Before we received our bill we heard the next table complaining about the time taken to take and bring orders so we were not alone.  It is a pity that the pace of service
title: Posh Hotel

hotel: Sankara Nairobi, Autograph Collection by Marriott
review: Just left the Sankara an hour ago. Was there Three days. The place is beautiful, rooms are great but the service is terrible. The staff are either incompetent or just plain rude. Customer care is a lacking concept in most of the staff. This place is too good for such. Otherwise everything else was in order :|
title: Almost right

hotel: Sankara Nairobi, Autograph Collection by Marriott
review: It is one of the best hotels in Nairobi for business, considering the facilities and location.  It only has two problems, the wifi conection is very poor in the rooms, and to walk around is not the safest place in the city.  Excelent Bar just 100 mts from the Hotel call Gipsy, very diverse, great music and food.
title: Perfect for Business

hotel: Sankara Nairobi, Autograph Collection by Marriott
review: I stayed at Sankara several times and every time I go I am pleased with the quality of the rooms and the restaurant as well as the roof top bar.  The design of the hotel is exceptional with magnificent lighting and attention to detail on every decoration from the lobby to the bars to the parking lots.  However the pricing is rather high.
title: Great customer experience

hotel: Sankara Nairobi, Autograph Collection by Marriott
review: We spent a night at Sankara which is in a very busy Westland area, next to the biggest mall in Nairobi.  The rooms were very modern and  well-furnished with all modern amenities.  The bathroom had a glass partition, which could be shuttered for privacy.  The security on entry was efficient and polite.  The breakfast included was fantastic.  Such a variety of hot and cold meats, cheeses, baked products, eggs on order, fruits and juices.  Service was courteous and friendly.  If you want to be in the centre (horrendous traffic snarls to get from place to place) within walking distance to the biggest mall Westlands, & restaurants, this is the place to stay.
title: Well located modern business hotel

hotel: Sankara Nairobi, Autograph Collection by Marriott
review: I stayed here for two nights on business and held a conference there too.  The rooms were modern and spacious and the staff helpful.  We dined here and the food was excellent and the service too.  The bathrooms were lovely but lack hooks for towels which was a big strange.
title: Would recommend this hotel

hotel: Sankara Nairobi, Autograph Collection by Marriott
review: Spent 3 nights in the Sankara Nairobi after a recommendation  from a work associate. Loved it. The staff were friendly and efficient, the hotel well designed, the bar on the roof vibrant and the rooms perfectly balanced between size and function.  For a business traveller like myself the wifi connection was effortless - staying connected even during power outages in Nairobi.  The small sculptures placed next to your bed as a gift creates a very special touch as each night offers a different one, to a total of 6 little animal sculptures of beautiful design.  Only complaint I had was during check-in when I challenged why they needed to lock (pre auth) $500 on my card for my prepaid room. After some discussion they admitted the policy is to lock $50 per night, giving a total of
title: Beautiful friendly efficient hotel

hotel: Sankara Nairobi, Autograph Collection by Marriott
title: Nairobi Surprise

hotel: Sankara Nairobi, Autograph Collection by Marriott
review: You always hear about classical hotels in town which i won't mention, but this one seemed to me the best option in town. Probably the location isn't the best in town, but the building has 2 or 3 years old, so it's clean and modern. As all they have security control at entrance. The lobby is small but modern with contemporanean pieces os furniture. My room, a standard one, was big enougth for me. Nice bathroom, with bath tube, separate shower and glass to room. The bed was large and very confortable. Nice desk area. The roof with the pool, bar and restaurant is a nice place to stay for a while before dinner. Gymn, spa are other options offered. The buffet restaurant was very nice and buffet ha excelent presentation. I did enjoyed my breakfast there, with good service and food
title: A wonderful venue for a party!

hotel: Sankara Nairobi, Autograph Collection by Marriott
title: Next best place to home

hotel: Sankara Nairobi, Autograph Collection by Marriott
review: Being lucky enough to live in Kenya, I have visited the Sankara several times, for drinks in the superb rooftop bar, lunch and a swim (again on the roof top) and most recently for a Graduation Dinner for the Year 13 students attending St Andrew's School, Turi. The dinner was held on the first floor in one of the suites. We had a balcony reception, a full dinner service and a disco in an adjoining room. The staff were efficient and friendly and the service was  excellent. The room had been decorated beautifully and it was a joy to watch our students faces as they walked in to their Graduation party. The food was quite stunning.The student and staff committee who arranged the Dinner had been given the chance to taste the various options beforehand and the Sankara had made every
title: Excellent all around

hotel: Sankara Nairobi, Autograph Collection by Marriott
review: Stayed for 1 night , if you need to cross town do not stay in yhis side , price is very exenssive ( usd 300 per night) . Rooms are large and fully equiped , breakfast is nice , and service is very good !!
title: Nice and exetrimily expensive !

hotel: Sankara Nairobi, Autograph Collection by Marriott
review: I checked in to the hotel after moving out of Serena. I was told a lot of good things about this property, however I was so disappointed by the lack of service standards and clear thinking by the staff and even duty manager. I had checked in the morning and dropped my bags at the check-in desk to be dropped in my room. Left for my office from the reception. Had a late night flight to catch and some official dinner to attend with senior management of my company. Once I reached my room in the evening and was getting ready to take a shower, realised my bags were missing from the room. I called the guest services, they said it will be up in a few minutes. Kept waiting for 20 minutes and no sign of my bags. After repetitive calls 5 times, still the bags were not delivered. Once I
title: An excellent and beautiful property spoilt by horrible service and staff

hotel: Sankara Nairobi, Autograph Collection by Marriott
title: World class

hotel: Sankara Nairobi, Autograph Collection by Marriott
review: First time in Nairobi. Stayed 1 night only. Could stay here for weeks. Great hotel, lovely rooftop bar & pool area. Truly world class facilities, food, service. Stylish, modern. Felt like being in a 5 star hotel anywhere in the top global destinations. Great Cappucino ! Beautiful rooms, with iron, gowns, etc etc. slightly pricey, but most good hotels in Africa are. Fantastic breakfast ! Overall - highly recommended
title: Best business hotel in Nairobi

hotel: Sankara Nairobi, Autograph Collection by Marriott
review: Very efficient, clean and well designed rooms and restaurants.  Great rooftop bar and good gym.  Excellent spa too!  The hotel has become a staple for my business trips to Nairobi.  Seems to have quite some turnover of teh senior management team but the hotel continues to provide great service.
title: Quite the host

hotel: Sankara Nairobi, Autograph Collection by Marriott
review: When we arrived we were welcomed with love especially my 18month old kids were warmly welcomed: We were only there to dine & just take a tour for personal future reasons! The service was great' I enjoyed the ambiance & I truly loved the cleanliness: Very polite & with ease we enjoyed our visit. Will be back again. Keep up the good job!
title: Excellent Patrons

hotel: Sankara Nairobi, Autograph Collection by Marriott
review: Sankara is the best place to stay in Nairobi. I've heard it many times until I tried... and this is very true. Accomodation, service, staff, atmosphere are simply outstanding. I spent an intense week in Nairobi and Sankara really helped me to rest after busy working days. Highlights - Roof bar and pool - excellent - Room decoration - Great quality in African style - Breakfast - good balanca of western and African cuisine
title: Best quality in Town

hotel: Sankara Nairobi, Autograph Collection by Marriott
review: stayed here for a week, and its was not bad at all, the staff were extremly friendly John at the conceirge is a good man. Rachel at the guest relations desk was also awesome.  The hotel is set in the middle of the westland close to a good number of bars and hangouts. The room was perfect and very modern and all amenities provided worked as expected.The hotel is clean and pristine.  the feature i loved most was the glass partition on the seven floor where you can see all the floors below :) as you walk across  The hotel has a pool bar on the seven floor which is quite kool but i never saw any guests use the pool i guess because you have no privacy if you want to, since its also a very busy functional hangout. The staff at the bar keep asking if you need a drink to a point you
title: Nice

hotel: Sankara Nairobi, Autograph Collection by Marriott
title: Modern Hotel - Great location - Mind the traffic

hotel: Sankara Nairobi, Autograph Collection by Marriott
review: First if you have never been to NBO before this may not be the place for you, however if you have been here before, are coming for business, or simply prefer modern Wyndham style accommodations then this is a great spot to consider. I say this simply because it is so modern that it does not have some of the old school quaintness (that a first-time visitor may want to experience) of some other more traditional "safari" hotels in NBO have.  As far as the hotel it is wonderfully located in Westlands, near (walking distance) to some of the best restaurants in NBO, and great shopping (Sarit Center,Triangle Market, Spinners Web). The downside of the location is that it is a big traffic bottleneck. This can be problematic if you are trying to get out of this area between 700-900am or
title: Just perfect!

hotel: Sankara Nairobi, Autograph Collection by Marriott
review: The hotel is very nice. Reasonable gym and nice roof top pool. Location seems to be not great. We were warned by staff not to go out on foot at night as it can be dangerous in the area. We did not eat dinner in the hotel but breakfast was very nice.
title: Great hotel great service

hotel: Sankara Nairobi, Autograph Collection by Marriott
review: Of all the hotels in Nairobi, Sankara is the only modern world class business hotel in town, other hotels are quite outdated, the bed is quite good and soft, but I prefer a bit harder, rooms are clean, but bathroom is see through, for couples is good but for friends not that good. Service is near perfect, only sometimes the staff respond a bit late.   Location is good near two large shopping malls, due to the mixed location, walking out at night is not that safe.   Overall experience is quite good.
title: Finally a world class hotel in Nairobi

hotel: Sankara Nairobi, Autograph Collection by Marriott
review: Arriving for the first time in Nairobi can be a shock. After a tiring eight hour, overnight flight from London all one wants to do is get to a comfortable, air-conditioned hotel. So sitting in traffic chaos for nearly an hour as one inches away from the international airport in suffocating heat can temper one's enthusiasm.  Even when our cab arrived we had one more delay, which was an airport style security check in meaning that off, again, came the belt, watch and out with the laptop. At last I was checked in.   My room was just what I had hoped for. Up on the sixth floor it was spacious, had lots of storage, a big, soft comfortable king-sized bed and both a deep bath and a large shower. I was told that if I wanted to I could even use the executive breakfast room, although
title: Stylish hotel, but could still do better.....

hotel: Sankara Nairobi, Autograph Collection by Marriott
title: Very good all round

hotel: Sankara Nairobi, Autograph Collection by Marriott
review: My first trip to Nairobi made all the more enjoyable thanks to the Sankara. Very friendly staff, excellent, comfy rooms. Service in the bar / cafe a little hit and miss at times and it would have been nice to have got to taste some Kenyan rather than international food in the hotel's various eateries but overall Sankara is a great hotel.
title: A top quality hotel

hotel: Sankara Nairobi, Autograph Collection by Marriott
review: Stylish well equipped and designed rooms. Good service. Good food.good security. Great place to stay on business and travel. I enjoyed the gear dud buffet breakfast and especially the beds... Could steal that bed and linen and take it all home with me.
title: Stylish relaxed place in Nairobi

hotel: Sankara Nairobi, Autograph Collection by Marriott
review: I stayed at the Sankara Hotel over a long-weekend escape and checked into one of their junior suites. Although the suite's aren't really that big, I must confess that the small touches everywhere in the room really did make it worthwhile for me. The bathroom alone was in itself probably worth the extra money. The service was incredibly warm, attentive, friendly and staff seemed to anticipate your needs and were ready with suggestions or advice when needed. The club lounge staff were particularly impressive and helpful in assisting with various requests.The rooftop bar and pool has a very funky atmosphere and seems to attract quite a few of Nairobi's young and vibey after work crowd for a pretty good selection of cocktails. From the rooftop bar you can then head to one of the
title: Funky, Professional and Friendly

hotel: Sankara Nairobi, Autograph Collection by Marriott
title: Did not Stay, but went for meals

hotel: Sankara Nairobi, Autograph Collection by Marriott
review: Sankara was a highly recommended hotel to stay, however, was fully booked during my stay in Nairobi, so I ended up going to an adjacent hotel Jacaranda (check out my review before you book there).  I stayed at the other hotel, however, came for my meals to Sankara. They have a good variety of buffet, Japanese and Thai food. Highly recommended with very service.
title: Excellent Hotel

hotel: Sankara Nairobi, Autograph Collection by Marriott
review: I stayed for one night and I don't have any bad thing to say about it, the room was comfortable, clean and well decorated, the staff  (entrance, cleaning, restaurant, etc) is absolutely amiable. I had lunch and dinner and was very tasty, also the breakfast buffet is very very good. Highly recommended !!!!!
title: Perfect Business Hotel with Spa athmosphere

hotel: Sankara Nairobi, Autograph Collection by Marriott
review: Went to the spa with a Family member, spent 2,5 hours indulging myself into the good and healthy in a massage and a facial. Booked by phone and was very well received. Apprecited the  service, the competent staff, the ambiance. Recomend. Thanks for your great hospitality.
title: The spa is great!

hotel: Sankara Nairobi, Autograph Collection by Marriott
review: This is a fantastic hotel. Great rooms, great staff and good food. I would not hesitate to recommend it for business travel. A world class business hotel. The staff were extremely proactive. My airport transfer was slightly delayed and there was numerous apologies by many folk for the inconvenience, which was really minor. The room is spacious, a proper good desk to work at, free broadband and quick room service. The bar and pool on the top floor is a very chic modern space.
title: Fantastic

hotel: Sankara Nairobi, Autograph Collection by Marriott
review: I spent a night there 2 days ago on Saturday 20/7/13 en route for Lagos the next morning. Check in was fast and efficient. Bellboys were on standby for luggage. Rooms were modern and well equipped(for a standard room), beds were super comfortable, pillows were the best I ever had in a hotel. They form any shape you want them to.  We each got a basket of fruit in our rooms. Room service was fast. Food was delicious. Check out was fast after a delicious breakfast as early as 6am in the restaurant which had an open plan kitchen. Very modern  and clean hotel. Worth every shilling!
title: Impeccable!

hotel: Sankara Nairobi, Autograph Collection by Marriott
review: This hotel was recommended to me by a friend, and I was extremely happy.  The hotel is located in a great neighborhood and is easy to get to (traffic in Nairobi is horrible, but you can't blame the hotel).  As an international traveler, the Sankara lived up to my standards for a first class hotel.  The bed was extremely comfortable and the staff were extremely helpful.  I would recommend this hotel to everyone.
title: Beautiful hotel

hotel: Sankara Nairobi, Autograph Collection by Marriott
review: I stayed two times in Sankara. Very nice hotel. Personnel is friendly and always willing to assist you. Room are well designed even is the surface is a little bit under what should be for this category of hotel. Breakfast buffet is awesome with very good products.  Only two points of complain: 1) When I was there AC in the gym room was not working and it was more a sauna than a gym.  2) Internet problem due to strange security certificates.
title: One of the best hotel if not the best of Nairobi

hotel: Sankara Nairobi, Autograph Collection by Marriott
review: I'd caution anyone against staying at the Sankara these days; seems true that their best staff have been poached by the new Kempinski given the level of service received on my last visit. i have stayed here countless times on business but this time from start to finish the service was poor as was the response to my complaints. The only positive to the hotel was the restaurant on level 1 - the service and food were both up to the standard I had been used to at the Sankara. After several comedy of errors and customer service that, at best, was standard and, at worst, was insulting, I will never stay at the hotel again nor recommend it to anyone. It turned a family weekend into a weekend full of stress all because the staff were generally clueless (slow check-in, noise in hotel
title: Abysmal service - Not what it used to be

hotel: Sankara Nairobi, Autograph Collection by Marriott
title: great place to stay

hotel: Sankara Nairobi, Autograph Collection by Marriott
review: Amazing hotel in the middle of Westlands so easy to go out and about.  The pool and bar on the top floor are fab; service, food and rooms are great and we were always made to feel welcome.  It's a great place to stay in Nairobi.
title: Nice stay

hotel: Sankara Nairobi, Autograph Collection by Marriott
review: Overall, this was a very nice stay for business purposes. It's quite a busy area, so it wouldn't necessarily be my top choice for a vacation/personal stay, but it was a good place for people to come meet us and relatively central (meaning equally long time sitting in Nairobi traffic!) to all our outside meetings. Staff was generally friendly and helpful. Lots of small seating options on the mezzanine which are not too busy in the mornings and we often took a table in the bar for our meetings and just kept ordering coffees - and the coffee and bakery was quite good. The rooftop pool/bar is a nice place for a drink, but defintiely more of a "see and be seen" scene than a pool for exercise. The gym is small but adequate, though a bit warm. Hotel food and drinks are expensive, but
title: Top 5 Star New Hotel in Nairobi

hotel: Sankara Nairobi, Autograph Collection by Marriott
title: EXCELLENT STAY IN THE HEART OF NAIROBI!

hotel: Sankara Nairobi, Autograph Collection by Marriott
review: Weather you are on business or on an exploratory leisure stay, this hotel is a inland of service and luxury in the city.  Attention to detail is there, staff are friendly, capable and in the know. Rooms are spacious with as good views as you can get in this city (although the hotel is only 7 floors there are no tall building around obstructing the view).  Bathroom deserve a special thumbs up, as it is large and combined with the wardrobe space which increases its functionality. Rooftop pool bar is ok, although quite scarce in space. Executive club is great with nice views.
title: Best you need for Nairobi

hotel: Sankara Nairobi, Autograph Collection by Marriott
review: Food is out of this world - separate room for desserts! Service is so prompt they attend to you before you ask. Brought me a complimentary cake to my room on the eve of my birthday. Truely top of the list for luxury and decadence.
title: Exquisite luxury

hotel: Sankara Nairobi, Autograph Collection by Marriott
