The room was equipped with: Free Standing Shower (very nice), Internet access, Desk, Fridge, Shoe cleaning Kit, Air con, Iron and Ironing board...Just about everything a traveler requires.  Rooms are comfortable and clean.  Bathroom clean! Reception available 24 hours a day. Room service available.  Every evening the FRIENDLY room cleaning staff would come around to do "Turn Down".  All staff very friendly and helpful.  Hotel has 2 Restaurants (one Asian cuisine), however there are other restaurants and takeaways very close by.  Perfect if you on business.  Taxi Service available. Overall - Beside the fact that the telephone calls are extremely expensive it's a very good hotel.  I would highly recommend it.
title: Great Hotel

hotel: Sankara Nairobi, Autograph Collection by Marriott
title: Beautiful lounge

hotel: Sankara Nairobi, Autograph Collection by Marriott
review: Only one word can describe the beautiful sunset as you sit on the roof lounge and enjoy your perfectly made cocktails ...I am yet to find a word that captures this much beauty .Romantic ,beautiful ,serenity .I would highly recommend this lounge for Saturday afternoon sun downers.The service was excellent the ambiance was great.The cocktails were fantastic and anything not on the cocktail menu can be made by the bar man who is very efficient . There is a cover charge past a certain time not so sure when it starts and why the charge .It gets a bit packed as the night progresses so come early . The band is usually very great but on the day we visited last they were not up to their usual standards. Would recommend the lounge
title: My favorite hotel in Nairobi

hotel: Sankara Nairobi, Autograph Collection by Marriott
review: The staff work very hard at making sure you feel pampered, and provide small touches to make your stay special.  They found out that it was my birthday, and came to my room with cake and singing!  The food is very good - although I generally do not partake of the enormous buffet (I'd eat too much).  I have been coming to this hotel for years, mostly short stay, and they have rewarded me for my loyalty.  The hotel is also nicely located for most of my business meetings.  I do wish that on this long-stay visit they had given me automatic upgrades to the business class lounge - my last hotel did so in Jakata, which was lovely and very helpful.  Oh well!
title: Champagne Bar at Sankara Hotel

hotel: Sankara Nairobi, Autograph Collection by Marriott
review: No internet for 3 days, satellite tv freezing a lot, 45 min wait for 2 eggs at breakfast; just a glimpse of a very disappointing service in an actual nice hotel. Probably because was paid in advance, the front desk lady seamed unfazed at my complaints and didn't offer any compensation in return. Because of the service, next trip to Nairobi, I will try to find another hotel.
title: Not the best hotel for a business trip

hotel: Sankara Nairobi, Autograph Collection by Marriott
review: So let me start out by saying that I haven't actually staid at Sankara. But they do have an amazing rooftop bar with a pool which I have been to a umber of times with friends that's really nice.  The hotel itself is quite something too - up market, very modern, definitely a 5 star I believe, great decor and very chique. I must warn you though that it's kinda pricey but that comes with the territory, you expect it the moment you walk in through the doors. Nairobi's weather is fantastic most of the year so nothing like a bar under the stars next to a pool with a great view to enjoy a cold drink after a long says work. check it out :)
title: Reeally swanky! :)

hotel: Sankara Nairobi, Autograph Collection by Marriott
review: My husband and I visited Nairobi for a friends wedding and we thoroughly enjoyed our stayed at the Sankara. The hotel is located in a central location, not too far from the airport but close to restaurants and shopping area. The room was spacious with a soaking tub and an amazing shower to just wash away all the stress and strain of that long flight. The beds are super comfy and room service was great. The rooftop pool and bar area is really chic. I felt like I was in NYC but I could see all the stars at night. lol We had such a great experience staying here, we will be back next time we visit Nairobi.
title: Best hotel in Nairobi!!

hotel: Sankara Nairobi, Autograph Collection by Marriott
review: Hello. My husband and I have been staying here for a week. He works for Barclays and is here in a project. We used to love the Sankara, but this trip has unfortunately highlighted that this hotel is not what it used to be. How can a 5 star hotel have no wifi and no tv for a week? Apparently The Winston is good. Will go there next time
title: No wifi, no TV and no service

hotel: Sankara Nairobi, Autograph Collection by Marriott
review: For service, this hotel is excellent and we were very well looked after.  We were met promptly at the airport as arranged and Joyce was wonderful arranging a day of outings for my mother and me on our last day.  Linet in the Boutique was lovely- friendly, helpful and very informative about the social projects the items supported. The rooms are clean, comfortable and well stocked with towels, slippers, bathrobes, soaps etc. The only negative was the very poor wi fi which only worked on our 3rd day there. After 2 weeks in the middle of nowhere with no running water or electricity, we were keen to be able to contact home without calling in the middle of the night. This was not possible and not what one would expect from a 5 star hotel. However, overall, this was a very relaxed and
title: Great service, poor internet

hotel: Sankara Nairobi, Autograph Collection by Marriott
review: The Place is fantastic and the two different views is amazing. I liked the fact that you could enjoy the national park (Nairobi) and the amazing beautiful buildings as well. Decor is very artistic and the rooms are beautiful.
title: Stunning

hotel: Sankara Nairobi, Autograph Collection by Marriott
review: This is the third hotel I have stayed at in Nairobi (the others being the Crowne Plaza and the Serena) and being the best, I feel persuaded to write a review! I really enjoyed my stay. The rooms are just lovely, and the rooftop pool and service was excellent. My only complaint was slow checkout, but overall a great stay.
title: Great stay in Nairobi

hotel: Sankara Nairobi, Autograph Collection by Marriott
review: I have stayed at this hotel several times now when I have been to Nairobi on business. It's bright, spacious, with comfy beds, lovely white linen, huge airy rooms, very good wifi, proper coffee in the room, good room service and great breakfasts. Staff are [mostly] really friendly and recognise me if I have been back a few times in a short space of time, which is lovely and welcoming. I love the little soapstone animals that housekeeping leave when they prepare the rooms at night - fun to look forward to after working hard all day!! A great hotel!
title: Great for business or leisure trips!

hotel: Sankara Nairobi, Autograph Collection by Marriott
review: The stay at sankara was one of the best . The food was great and i admire there theme to more african and yet remain classy . The rooms are clean , ther designs are original and very attractive. There food is beatifully presented and well severved . The staff is very professional and kind . I really enjoyed myself at the hotel. But last but not least the heated pool is a great relaxation area and is a good place to have a drink.
title: spectacular, classy place

hotel: Sankara Nairobi, Autograph Collection by Marriott
review: I stayed at the Sankara Hotel for 10 days recently and found it to be generally excellent. Food quality and choice was good and the staff with the notable exception of one female receptionist who was surly, rude and most unhelpful, are warm, friendly and very obliging.  A special thanks goes to John and James in the reception area who were wonderful !   The rooftop bar is a great meeting point.   A criticism is that there's nowhere to sit and relax with a drink or coffee and watch the "world go by".
title: A SUPER HOTEL. GREAT FOOD CHOICES !

hotel: Sankara Nairobi, Autograph Collection by Marriott
review: Great breakfast.... kudos to the kitchen team. Comfortable beds and immaculate bathrooms. Great bar upstairs at the infinity pool:-) That said, I have to criticize the wifi (so weak in the rooms) for a hotel of this standard that is disappointing! Another critic is the gym; it is far too small and comes across as a home gym and not a gym belonging to a hotel of this calibre. Kindly expand the gym and add more training equipment. Thanks!
title: A little room for improvement

hotel: Sankara Nairobi, Autograph Collection by Marriott
review: My husband and I really enjoyed our stay here. We were so exhausted the day after our wedding & evening party and the staff were amazing to us!! My wedding dress was so muddy as it rained during the wedding, the laundry service staff really did a great job and it was as good as new when I got it back.
title: Honeymooning in the City

hotel: Sankara Nairobi, Autograph Collection by Marriott
review: I have to start with the service and to be fair I didn't get exposed to in this hotel but excellent service. Starting from front desk, gym and as  concierge employees.  Breakfast menu was good and the hotel offers as well nice open air dinner by the pool.  I will consider visiting again..
title: Good business hotel

hotel: Sankara Nairobi, Autograph Collection by Marriott
review: Having had a long few months, I decided to go to the spa to ease my achy muscles. I shall not name the treatment I got to remain anonymous but it was a range of treatments. I arrived 20 minutes before my appointment time - they recommend you arrive 15 minutes prior. Despite arriving early, they were not ready for me and by the time I was shown to the treatment room and quickly disrobed for the massage, it was already 20 minutes past my appointment time. As we walked to the treatment room, I had asked if starting late would affect the duration of the treatment and I was assured it would not. However the reality is that the entire treatment should have taken 3 hours but when it was complete and I checked the clock, only 1 hour and 40 minutes had elapsed. After getting dressed, I
title: Not as good as it looks anymore

hotel: Sankara Nairobi, Autograph Collection by Marriott
title: Good business hotel

hotel: Sankara Nairobi, Autograph Collection by Marriott
review: I had a nice stay at the Sankara. The hotel is beautiful, and the staff always very friendly and helpful. The breakfast buffet was fantastic and very tasty (but expensive). The little animals that the housekeeping staff leaves behind with turndown service are so charming and gave me something to look forward to each evening! There was some confusion with a restaurant dinner reservation but otherwise my stay was lovely.
title: Lovely hotel with friendly staff

hotel: Sankara Nairobi, Autograph Collection by Marriott
review: A very good hotel! The staff very friendly, my room was very clean. The everyday gifts and newspapers was pretty good! Lunch and dinner was very delicious. The better hotel I stayed! The next time only this hotel!!!
title: Very good hotel

hotel: Sankara Nairobi, Autograph Collection by Marriott
review: I have visited Nairobi many times and stayed in different hotel, such as Serena, Laico Regency, and 3 years ago i have discovered Sankara, since then it has been my home away from home everytime i am in nairobi, it is really a first class hotel with great effiency in the services and also best value for money, Keep it up guys and great improvement over the years.
title: The Pearl Of Nairobi

hotel: Sankara Nairobi, Autograph Collection by Marriott
review: Fitted my requirement perfectly...rooms were nice...restaurants were adequate....the small roof top pool was cute actually....staff was efficient....some of them lacked warmth though....but overall good experience
title: Efficient business hotel

hotel: Sankara Nairobi, Autograph Collection by Marriott
review: The Sankara is an excellent hotel, one of the best I've stayed at for a long while.  The staff were extremely competent and professional and really everything seemed first class.  Though I was there for pleasure, it would be a prize choice for business travel, the facilities were excellent.  With everything I was delighted.
title: First class

hotel: Sankara Nairobi, Autograph Collection by Marriott
review: all the friends visit me from abroad .. stays at Sankara... i would say one of the best Hotel in Nairobi when it comes to Location.. close to all the happening places of Nairobi.. choices of clubs and pubs around the Hotel are many.. the rooms are very comfortable and the sleep quality is just the best.. if you are a party animal and you work hard play hard kind of guy.. stay at Sankara..
title: jewel of westlands

hotel: Sankara Nairobi, Autograph Collection by Marriott
review: Excellent hotel with clean and big rooms. Food was good but they lacked vegetarian options for breakfast. Free wi-fi was a plus. View was okay but cannot expect much since it was in Nairobi. We stayed here for a night, mostly as a transit hotel since we were leaving early morning the next day for Maasai Mara. Would definitely stay here again.
title: Comfortable & Convenient

hotel: Sankara Nairobi, Autograph Collection by Marriott
review: My fiance and I stayed at the Sankara over the Christmas break and then returned for the New Year. We found all members of staff to be warm, welcoming and friendly. David (Executive Assistant Manager) made a point of speaking to us whenever he saw us and the chefs, in particular David and Les, were very helpful, even coming up to the roof bar after midnight on New Years Eve to wish us a happy new year. Victoria in the 1st floor bar was also very friendly. Although buffet style, the food was of excellent quality, always fresh, and constantly being replenished. There was plenty to choose from and the Christmas and New Years buffet were amazing. The bars were well stocked, the choice of wine/champagne was vast and the bar tendwers knew how to mix o good g & t and cocktail! The
title: Christmas & New Year 2014

hotel: Sankara Nairobi, Autograph Collection by Marriott
title: 5-star in heart of Nairobi

hotel: Sankara Nairobi, Autograph Collection by Marriott
review: I had an excellent stay here for 5 night over Xmas and for a further night post-New Year. Completely secure, attentive and fast service and good facilities and food made this hotel stand out. Spa facilities were excellent. Having lived in Nairobi for 6 months in 2008 I am familiar with the surroundings in Westlands, and some of the other hotels nearby - but I will undoubtedly return to Sankara the next time I return to Nairobi.
title: Excellent place to stay.

hotel: Sankara Nairobi, Autograph Collection by Marriott
review: I stayed for 6 nights in Dec'14. The Hotel is easily accessible, it is right next to the freeway and in the center of the Westlands neighborhood of Nairobi, close to many businesses, casinos and a mall. The hotel is modern, safe and secure.  The rooms and bed are very comfortable, meeting the 5 star standards. The room (mine was in 3rd floor) was calm as well. Only issue I found is that the wash basins are a bit lower and hence you would have to bend over more than normal.   Being a vegetarian, I found ample amount of vegetarian items on their room service menu. The chef was very nice to make me vegetarian pancakes for breakfast. Interestingly, I found some of the items in their room service menu cheaper than the nearby restaurants! Room service, Laundry service were prompt and
title: Excellent Stay, Fantastic Service

hotel: Sankara Nairobi, Autograph Collection by Marriott
title: Probably Nairobi's Best

hotel: Sankara Nairobi, Autograph Collection by Marriott
review: An excellent hotel in Westlands. The rooms are very well laid out and modern with attention to detail. Service was as good as I've experienced it in Kenya. Probably the best hotel in Nairobi - the Serena can still compete with its beautiful grounds but that's about it. There is a great bar on the 7th floor with an open deck which is worth going to. A nice gym and spa on the same floor. Breakfast was good as well. Wi-Fi works like a bomb. Will definitely stay here again.
title: Perfect business hotel in Westlands

hotel: Sankara Nairobi, Autograph Collection by Marriott
review: Ankara came on the scenes a few years ago, and was probably the only real 5 star offering when it hit the market.  Since then, it has become a strategic place for business travellers to stay at if working at Westlands.    The hotel is well appointed, the rooms are comfortable, food offerings are good and consistent, not too pricy, so overall, I keep staying at the Sankara when visiting Nairobi.  The hotel suffers from normal issues encountered when travelling in Africa.  Check in/checkout sometimes takes too long, internet is always slow, but other than that, no complaints.
title: Expensive, but probably worth the money

hotel: Sankara Nairobi, Autograph Collection by Marriott
review: This was the second time I visited Sankara, and I was not as excited as the first time. I have difficulties pinpointing any particular reason for this. Maybe it is a small detail, like the very expensive in-house taxi services, or the lack of good lunch options, or the ugly air cleaner in the room, or just the fact that the experience wasn't as novel this time. Nevertheless, it is still a really great hotel that has all the amenities you will need. And the location in Westlands is good, with many restaurants a short taxi ride away. I will most likely select Sankara the next time a stay at a hotel in Nairobi.
title: Poor customer service!!

hotel: Sankara Nairobi, Autograph Collection by Marriott
review: This is a sweet hotel.  Very modern, next to the Sarit Center Mall, in the Westlands area... it's fairly new and everything still works.  My wife and I came here for a weekend so I could watch the Superbowl on TV.  Where we live outside of Nairobi, we couldn't get the game, so we splurged and pampered ourselves for the weekend.  It was worth it... a great time together, and New England won! Yes!  The room is very nice, the bed is heavenly, wifi works but is a bit slow, TV is good but not as big as it should be for the price of the room. The bathroom is great.  Excellent breakfast, and we love the rooftop pool and cafe -- very nice and relaxing.
title: Love this hotel - 5th time back!

hotel: Sankara Nairobi, Autograph Collection by Marriott
review: From the moment my fiancee and I stepped in Sankara,I felt like a Queen .We had booked for a Junior Suite ,but when we arrived it wasn't ready so we were given another room,and surprisingly,the 'standard room' was still amazing..very spacious ,clean and airy...so i assumed each and every room there is meant to make the guests happy and very comfortable Another thing I loved about Sankara is when they made sure we had our breakfast before leaving since we were checking out very early, and our breakfast was served in our room...Everything about this place is awesome... Maybe too expensive,but it's worth the experience
title: Amazing Experience

hotel: Sankara Nairobi, Autograph Collection by Marriott
review: The hotels location is good. Great staff and great food.  The rooms are amazing and spacious and just beautiful. The hotel is clean and ambiance is beautiful. My wife and I spent our valentines night and the hotel organised everything we requested for perfectly.. even better than we expected :)  Would definitely go back again and again.
title: Fabulous

hotel: Sankara Nairobi, Autograph Collection by Marriott
review: Everything worked perfectly.  Hotel is clean and secure, with good food, and very hospitable staff.  They have a good gym, and a small but popular roof top swimming pool with a bar and bistro.  This is a happening spot in the evenings.  Which was great because this was a business trip.  It is one of those well functioning (not over the top) hotels you find in the US, Europe, Hong Kong, etc.- and you leave behind the madness outside.  Great if you want the peace of mind.  Not great if you want the adventure of being in Kenya.  What did not work well at all was the reservation.  I had booked on the hotel's website, but was sent on a wild goose chase to Expedia (and other travel sites I had not heard of) to make a change. This was majorly annoying and the last thing I wanted to do
title: First world efficiency and convenience!

hotel: Sankara Nairobi, Autograph Collection by Marriott
title: Happiness in Nairobi is Expensive :)

hotel: Sankara Nairobi, Autograph Collection by Marriott
review: I've stayed here on many occasions the last few years and it's hard to find any negative points to mention regarding this hotel, it's just stunning!!   Most enjoyable is the lovely pub and pool on the top floor.
title: One of the best in Nairobi

hotel: Sankara Nairobi, Autograph Collection by Marriott
review: Stayed here for a day for a seminar / meeting. Staff are very helpful and professional, the food was quite decent and the room was good. I would recommend this hotel to anyone who has to travel to Nairobi for work or business.
title: Good business hotel

hotel: Sankara Nairobi, Autograph Collection by Marriott
review: We stayed at the hotel for 3 nights. The booking did not include the tax which is significant so it's worth paying attention - we paid it on check-in. The room was nice but nothing exceptional to other 4/5 star hotels we have have stayed in outside Kenya.  The hotel have security guards and metal detectors on the doors and patrolling the floors, which although reassuring are a reminder of the heightened security in Kenya. The pool on the roof was a highlight although there aren't many sun loungers so I can imagine it gets quite packed in high season.  The breakfast was nice - we were going to have it on the terrace outside but the tables and chairs were heavily soiled by birds so we stayed inside. I would stay here again, but will probably try other nice hotels in Nairobi first.
title: A pleasant stay in Nairobi

hotel: Sankara Nairobi, Autograph Collection by Marriott
review: I came least week in this hotel to share an event with my company. It was a very nice moment.  the quality of the food is very good. furthermore people were very nice also.  We took a buffet and South African wines
title: Artisan Restaurant in Sankara hotel : Great Moment

hotel: Sankara Nairobi, Autograph Collection by Marriott
review: We were here only overnight before a safari.  The hotel is very nice.  It is quite modern and beautifully designed. Hotel staff was friendly and courteous so we felt at home. Although we didn't have time to enjoy it, there is a very nice roofdeck with bar and pool.  We went there in the morning after breakfast and it provides a fairly good view of the city.  For breakfast, there is a fantastic buffet, very international and the food is delicious.  We ate outside on a balcony and it was wonderful! There's a mall right next door that has a huge supermarket where we bought some snacks and a few personal items. Across the street is an artisan bazaar where you can buy handicrafts. As an American, it was my first experience with local salesmen and I found them quite friendly and very
title: Fine hotel

hotel: Sankara Nairobi, Autograph Collection by Marriott
review: This is the most lovely hotel ever in my opinion, it has spectacular rooms and great food. The only things I don't really like about it is that it had a door which leads to the street which in my opinion is not very safe and the fact that the pool is not very clean and it has bugs in it. Otherwise I completely recommend this hotel. The security is good and everyone who works there is very nice.
title: Beautiful

hotel: Sankara Nairobi, Autograph Collection by Marriott
review: The Sankara Hotel was lovely! It was like living in an art gallery for 2 was - art work for sell by  local artist was through out the hotel. Very comfortable bedding and great staff. The fitness center was great overlooking the main road in Kenya! The food was amazing - great seasoning & spices (but a little pricy).  Complimentary gift each night! The gift shop sells items from local groups and donate a portion of the sells back to the villages - great partnership!  Great Hotel!
title: Very Nice Property

hotel: Sankara Nairobi, Autograph Collection by Marriott
review: Stayed in a club room at the Sankara for a 4 night business trip and couldn't have been more pleased.  Impeccable service from all staff we encountered.  Poolside bar/restaurant was a treat to come home to.  Club staff went above and beyond to meet our needs - including organizing packed lunches for our small film crew on short notice.  Rooms were always spotless.  A truly exceptional stay.
title: Fantastic Place to Stay in  Nairobi

hotel: Sankara Nairobi, Autograph Collection by Marriott
review: Came to Nairobi with mixed expectations having travelled through East Africa but was truly surprised by how good this place was. I ended up staying 5 nights and loved every moment.   The main restaurant is outstanding. Each of the buffet dishes I had was fantastic and the desserts are to die for. I still dream about the macaroons. The pool side restaurant is more cafe than anything else and also serves hookah. I spent a good few nights drinking wine and working on the deck. Brilliant.   The rooms are simple and clean with the normal luxury style bathroom (closed off toilet with the room lit by blinds to the main room).   The only down side I found was the transport with the drivers arriving late to fetch me a few times which is why I haven't rated this hotel as 5 stars. This
title: An absolutely fantastic hotel

hotel: Sankara Nairobi, Autograph Collection by Marriott
title: Nice hotel well situated

hotel: Sankara Nairobi, Autograph Collection by Marriott
review: It feels both boutiquey and businessy, which is great! Service is fab and rooms have everything you expect from a high-end hotel. I have also held small events there in the past and had a very good experience.   Only downside is that I have never found the food that good. It's certainly not bad but I would rather go elsewhere for a meal. Nick cocktail selection, though.
title: My fave Nairobi hotel

hotel: Sankara Nairobi, Autograph Collection by Marriott
review: I spent three nights at the Sankara in March 2015. The location is very good and the service was excellent. This was my first stay, but even so, I was given a room on the 6th floor, which is supposedly the Club Floor. The breakfast buffet was enormous and had lost of fresh fruit. I even tried the spa and it was beautiful, clean, and relaxing. The rooftop bar by the pool has a fantastic view over Nairobi and was was quite busy for a Wednesday evening.
title: Beautiful rooftop

hotel: Sankara Nairobi, Autograph Collection by Marriott
review: I have just spent three nights on business at the Sankara hotel and have been extremely impressed by the quality of the hotel and the professionalism and friendliness of the staff.  The accommodation is excellent and the staff extremely professional and friendly.  For a change I was in a hotel where the internet works well and efficiently.  Breakfast is great and the room service has been delivered quickly and presented well.  There is also tight security which sadly seems to be important at present.  I would definitely return here.
title: Excellent business hotel in Nairobi

hotel: Sankara Nairobi, Autograph Collection by Marriott
review: Stayed here 2 days before our safari.  Excellent service and food was fabulous.  Felt very safe here.  You have to go through what looks like airport security , your bags are checked  through a machine and you are  security wanded to make sure you are not carrying anything dangerous.  I also liked the fact that you are only able to access your floor the dining floor and the club floor via your key card.  Very secure in knowing that people are not going floor to floor roaming the halls or what not. We purchased the club package which was a bit confusing.  We were told that we would have complimentary sodas throughout the day, but it was a bit frustrating when we were charged for our  drinks  at the bar on the rooftop.  Apparently you can only get your free drinks and appetizers
title: Things to know

hotel: Sankara Nairobi, Autograph Collection by Marriott
title: Killer rooftop, breakfast and rooms~ don't miss it!

hotel: Sankara Nairobi, Autograph Collection by Marriott
review: The Sanakara, Nairobi, is a haven from the dust, noise and traffic of Nairobi.  The staff of friendly and efficient.  Security is excllent and unobtrusive.  Rooms are very clean, comfortable with excellent amenities.  The Roof Top bar is good with attentive staff.  Food is excellent and well presented throughout the hotel.  Taxi service though is expensive.  Overall an excellent experience.
title: Haven from the dust and traffic of Nairobi

hotel: Sankara Nairobi, Autograph Collection by Marriott
review: I have been to many hotels in Africa , also that's my first visit to east Africa but I have to say thumbs up for the hotel stuff from the smallest person to the hotel manager , they do everything in hand just to make you feel home and comfortable, rooms are really nice , clean and comfortable .  Food is delicious , people are always smiling and that what makes you feel home  Thank you for a pleasant 1 month stay
title: The best in town

hotel: Sankara Nairobi, Autograph Collection by Marriott
review: in my humble opinion, the best hotel in Nairobi, very good service and outstanding rooms. the top floor pool is a must use for a view of the city. walking distance to clubs at night make it a excellent choice.
title: Magnifique

hotel: Sankara Nairobi, Autograph Collection by Marriott
review: If you are paying for it, go elsewhere. There are many attributes of this hotel that are quite good (rooms, WiFi, etc.) but since I am paying full price for a Club Floor room, and 1/2 the way through what it a minimum of 10 day stay, recommend elsewhere for "value for the money".   The rooms are great. The bathrooms are fine. The beds, linens, etc. are what you should expect from a hotel of this quality. Club Floor people are very nice. I guess the reason that people stay on the club floor is the free drinks in the evening. As a non-drinker, I find the club offerings in terms of food and munchies very limited, the same every day and certainly doesn't compare to Club Floor in similar hotels, including in Nairobi. The staff on the Club Floor are very helpful, but each time you
title: Mixed Reviews

hotel: Sankara Nairobi, Autograph Collection by Marriott
title: Excellent

hotel: Sankara Nairobi, Autograph Collection by Marriott
review: Just completed a business trip to Nairobi and the Sankara provided the perfect base. Terrific service and an outstanding executive lounge. Beautiful rooms also. Staff always attentive. Will definitely stay again.
title: Business Trip

hotel: Sankara Nairobi, Autograph Collection by Marriott
review: I have been to this establishment a number of times and my friends and I have noted with concern that the staff is discriminatory against people of colour. once on Saturday went to have a calm evening as we listened to the band and we were asked to move reasons being the table was reserved( please note there was no reserved tag on the table). After a while we were forcefully evicted from the table as some Asian family came to take the table. as recently as Saturday where my friends and I went to listen at the band that plays there. got there pretty early so as to get a good spot. about half an hour later a group of whites(about 7 couples) came in and we were asked to squeeze for them. as it was our table was pretty full already. We asked the waiter to accommodate them in other
title: Discrimination

hotel: Sankara Nairobi, Autograph Collection by Marriott
title: Very good hotel and great position in the city

hotel: Sankara Nairobi, Autograph Collection by Marriott
review: Comfortable, clean, modern, spacious and nicely kept in the various environments composing the property: the first floor restaurant, the rooftop bar, the rooms and the corridors. Rooms are not huge (like some other available 5 stars hotels in NBO), but they are perfect for business trips, couple/family vacations, long-transfer in the city and they have all you need. I think the entrance/reception is a bit ‘closed up’ and small, not very spacious, but then the building develops in height rather than horizontally. Absolutely the 3 plus and added values compared to other hotels are: the buffet breakfast (really excellent and well served), the location in Westland where you can even walk around to nearby locations by yourself, the roof top bar (nice view, nice and friendly staff and
title: Well suited for business travellers

hotel: Sankara Nairobi, Autograph Collection by Marriott
title: Great Experience

hotel: Sankara Nairobi, Autograph Collection by Marriott
review: I loved the rooms. I had a great view overlooking malls. There was some nice art work too and I like that. Spa was really nice and although I had to book two days prior,  I loved it. The buffet was on point and room service was excellent. Location absolutely great..proximity to malls too very nice. Definitely going back!!!
title: EXCELLENT VALUE FOR MONEY

hotel: Sankara Nairobi, Autograph Collection by Marriott
review: Very secure location.  The meals were extremely well prepared and very tasteful.  The atmosphere was very comfortable and the staff was extremely helpful.  The Sankara Seven were a delightful touch to a very enjoyable stay.
title: Great place to stay

hotel: Sankara Nairobi, Autograph Collection by Marriott
review: The simple facade hides a beautiful boutique hotel with the quality touches that make you feel special - excellent rooms, superb linen, a modern feel, high quality technology, and warm and welcoming service. And don't under-estimate the conversation value of the surprise ceramic animals at turn-down time! Staff in the restaurant are charming and helpful, and the quality of food from room service to the restaurant and intriguing rooftop bar is consistently high standard. The only thing - don't expect to swim at dusk as you are then entertainent for the bar guests! Lovely stay, I would stay again in an instant!
title: A personal haven, with a professional touch

hotel: Sankara Nairobi, Autograph Collection by Marriott
review: I have just had four nights in this hotel on a business trip.  You can't fault it really:  the room was big and provided me with all the extras such as an umbrella and lots of water. It's modern, and there are some interesting works of art displayed.  A nice touch is that you get a little pottery animal by the bed each night. The service is very attentive.  The swimming pool on the roof is a good place to go and sit (there is no garden) and they are not pushy about trying to sell you drinks etc up there.  It can get very full in the evenings as it is a local night spot.  Particularly bearing in mind that Kenya is not the safest of places, there is commendable security, friendly, but you feel that you are safe in the hotel. We had some early starts, so it's worth remarking that
title: A great place to go if you are new to Nairobi!

hotel: Sankara Nairobi, Autograph Collection by Marriott
title: Very good business hotel

hotel: Sankara Nairobi, Autograph Collection by Marriott
review: The Sankara Hotel is excellent - excellent service and facilities with wonderful staff. I loved the artwork around the hotel.  I used most of the facilities, such as the spa (for a facial and massage), the gym, the executive lounge, the pool bar, the restaurants, and the shop - and all of the provided great service. I liked the special lunches they provided on Sundays too.   I've stayed there twice for work, and would readily go back again.
title: Gorgeous hotel

hotel: Sankara Nairobi, Autograph Collection by Marriott
review: Very good service.The food was more than I expected.At dinner time the chefs next to the buffet are very nice and helpful.The food is delicious and many varieties. Staff is always smiling and very helpful. The rooms were nice. I would advise you to stay at Sankara.
title: Very Good

hotel: Sankara Nairobi, Autograph Collection by Marriott
review: The Sankara Nairobi is a well run and comfortable hotel. Front desk welcome is nicely executed and security procedures are in place without being obtrusive, Rooms are a good size, functionally designed and quiet. Only criticism would be that the carpets and upholstery is showing its age with lots of stains. Public spaces in the hotel feature all kinds of Kenyan art and handicrafts, a nice touch. The breakfast buffet is nicely stocked with a wide assortment of hot and cold items. Not inexpensive, but a good, secure choice for doing business in Nairobi.
title: Good Lodgings in Nairobi

hotel: Sankara Nairobi, Autograph Collection by Marriott
review: Located in the heart of city centre this hotel is simply complete. The only problem I'm finding is WiFi from inside my room in level 6. In fact I'm writing this review out from my room for a connection. Anyway restaurants simple great gym too good rooms spacious clean hotel staff superb so it's complete. Go for it. You will not regret. Bdway over weekend rooms are cheaper.i mean Friday and Sunday. It's 255 usd instead 308 usd
title: This is Africa at its best

hotel: Sankara Nairobi, Autograph Collection by Marriott
review: Really outstanding food - especially the wonderful variety and originality of the salads; excellent conference room with very responsive service; but I really wish the Sankara would manage the parking fee/voucher process better. When there is a problem - which too often there is - the front desk people lack the authority to resolve it.
title: Everything wonderful... except the usual hassles over sorting out the parking fee

hotel: Sankara Nairobi, Autograph Collection by Marriott
review: Clean rooms, friendly staff and central. Consistent great service on all occasions i have stayed with them. Great for business and near the arcades in case you are travelling with a child. The staff were able to pint out a hospital with personal recommendation.
title: Best service in Nairobi!

hotel: Sankara Nairobi, Autograph Collection by Marriott
review: The food at Sankara is superb. The spa session i had was wonderful. Its hard to believe you are in the heart of westlands as its so quite and peaceful inside. I would recommend you try it if in nairobi
title: Dinner and spa

hotel: Sankara Nairobi, Autograph Collection by Marriott
review: Stayed in the hotel for 5 nights, friendly staff, nice clean rooms, rooftop bar, lovely buffet breakfast, excellent fitness facilities, close to banks and business center. You get a animal carved from stone with a little story everyday, there are 7 of them. Would recommend this place to anyone and I will also be staying there again when I go back.
title: Excellent!

hotel: Sankara Nairobi, Autograph Collection by Marriott
review: Been to the hotel, very nice and comforting staff with good food, a terrace swimming pool sauna gym and beauty centre. I would recommend this place to any business person from outside to experience it yourself. Hotel is next to Sarit centre shopping mall where you can enjoy your evenings shopping, movies, banking, post office, food court, mobile network shops etc. come direct from airport to this place and you will get everything you need around . Westland has over 300 restaurants for different cuisine
title: Entertainment

hotel: Sankara Nairobi, Autograph Collection by Marriott
review: Sankara  Another fantastic stay at this wonderful hotel which is located in the heart of Westlands and ideal for business meetings in Nairobi.   Firstly, it's important to highlight the fact that security is amazing. Obviously Nairobi has several issues ongoing at present and they embraced this by reassuring visitors that they are scanning everyone and everything that enters the building. I find this very reassuring indeed.  A warm welcome on arrival. A fantastic room with all the amenities you would expect of a top-class hotel. Probably one of the comfiest beds I have ever slept in.  Sumptuous breakfast and although I went the healthy option, there was everything for those that like to "take out"!  A heated pool on the rooftop makes for a welcome dip after a day's work in the
title: OUTSTANDING - SECURE - WELCOMING - QUALITY - VALUE

hotel: Sankara Nairobi, Autograph Collection by Marriott
review: The hotel has very pleasant staff and the facilities are first class. Ideal for business meetings providing you can get people to come to you. However if your business is in the industrial area or out of town leave plenty of time to commute as the traffic is painfully slow.
title: Excellent facilities

hotel: Sankara Nairobi, Autograph Collection by Marriott
review: This was an amazing hotel. The customer service was exceptional. The food was delicious. It was buffet and i could not stop eating. The rooms were superb. They left gifts for you everyday. In the evening we went to the roof top bar. There were a lot of foreign business travelers and locals . I did not want to leave. There is high security which made you feel very safe. You have to go through a metal detector as you enter.  I can't wait to go back.
title: Best Hotel

hotel: Sankara Nairobi, Autograph Collection by Marriott
review: Re: My recent stay at Sankara Nairobi in February 2015.  The Contact Us page to leave feedback is incomplete  Really nice hotel, however, unexpected issues with my stay (1) I paid for a spa treatment in cash and subsequently requested a receipt, despite my requests this was not provided (2) I left an envelope with money in it at reception and they said it would be delivered to my friend's room -  they never received it.  My fault entirely.  I have learnt my lessons from this experience.  If you want a nice place to stay, this would be a good choice
title: Beautiful Hotel BUT.....FRAUD

hotel: Sankara Nairobi, Autograph Collection by Marriott
review: Perfect hospitability, very clean, all people who is working are so kind and sweet. It is 5km with car to The centre.  Good choices for breakfast as well diner with open buffet or steak house or lounge.
title: Perfect

hotel: Sankara Nairobi, Autograph Collection by Marriott
review: I was very comfortable the hotel is well accessible to the road there is security and their services are very good. It is located near four shopping moles rooms and bathroom are very clean. If you want to access to Nairobi town its just few minutes away, The Nairobi Museum is few minutes drive.
title: Its eloquent from the entrance, rooms, swimming pools and thier services are very good.

hotel: Sankara Nairobi, Autograph Collection by Marriott
review: Overall Sankara is a good business hotel.  Gym and club are decent, though can get crowded during the week.  Leaving a different curio by the bed each night as a small gift to the traveller is a nice touch.  Rooms are tastefully decorated.  Staff is friendly.  The hot water was an issue during the period that I stayed; I felt the management should have offered a small discount as a result, but they did not.  Other areas that were a bit off included a crudely photocopied and laminated do not disturb sign which was clashing in the otherwise high end environment.  Overall, I would stay at the Sankara again, and think they will continue to try hard to be top end.
title: Well located business hotel in Westlands

hotel: Sankara Nairobi, Autograph Collection by Marriott
review: We only had Lunch at the Main Restaurant, The service was not the best, we ordered 1 Appetizer, 2 Salads, 1 Soup and 1 Main course, an simple order,  but we waited at least 30 Minutes until the first dish arrived on the Table. The presentation was nice, but the quality and taste of the Food was by far not up to Standard, for the Price it was a total disappointment. The Tuna Tartar when it arrived on the Table was grayish, first I was thinking that it was not fresh, but my Friend told us that it does not taste spoiled, later he was busy running to the Washroom many times and had severe Stomach pain.  After Lunch, we went upstairs to the seventh Floor to the rooftop Lounge and Pool. One of our Friends went to the Lady’s Room and she then was not able to open the Door again,
title: Needs improvement

hotel: Sankara Nairobi, Autograph Collection by Marriott
title: Feels as coming home

hotel: Sankara Nairobi, Autograph Collection by Marriott
review: Sankara hotel is Westlands is well located and, though no parc or lush greens, feels very comfortable. Next to Sarit centre (a small mall) and close to well know bars and clubs. Management is excellent and for a premium you can enjoy the facilities of the clubroom. Only two restaurants, a outdoor pool on the rooftop (windy) and excellent gym. Spa is ok, could be improved though. I come already for many many years to Sankara and it feels as coming home to me.
title: Everything

hotel: Sankara Nairobi, Autograph Collection by Marriott
review: Being a hotelier myself, i could say that i had a memorable stay, very good service from the entrance, Front office, House keeping, FnB.... the list could go on. Mr Elijah from FO was very welcoming explained all procedures and smoothly checked me in. Keep up the wonderful service. I will definitely come back and recommend the hotel as well.
title: Lovely Stay

hotel: Sankara Nairobi, Autograph Collection by Marriott
review: never found another luxurious,cool,and refreshing environment than in Sankara..located right in the middle of Nairobi city, it's convenient for visiting business persons like me..and the green and brilliant environment furnishes it all... the next trending hotel this season without doubt is surely Sankara..proudly associated with it..Sankara u are the best!
title: Great service,Relaxing atmosphere...Worth my money!

hotel: Sankara Nairobi, Autograph Collection by Marriott
review: I really love the place very much and the service is wonderful... And Eric is very great at service,he is great at his work he was very welcoming... I would recommend it to everyone they won't regret it
title: The place is very wonderful

hotel: Sankara Nairobi, Autograph Collection by Marriott
review: This was my 8th stay at this hotel. For an aid worker travelling from hardship duty station on rest and recuperation, then Sankara offers all the comfort, relaxation and luxury. The food was mouth watering; the beddings and linens very comfortable; customer service was exceptional and responded to all my needs very timely; bathrooms were very clean. Will return back to this hotel
title: My favourite hotel in Nairobi

hotel: Sankara Nairobi, Autograph Collection by Marriott
review: I was in Nairobi for 7 days on a business trip, I really enjoyed my stay there. The location was suitable and it took me 10 minutes everyday to reach downtown. The staff was really helpful & friendly. The room was larger than expected & the gym was good. The 1st floor restaurant was very nice, I enjoyed my breakfast & morning coffee every morning. The rooftop was really charming and I enjoyed a lot the Hookah:) I liked the idea of leaving souvenirs everyday in the room (Sankara 7)
title: Very nice business trip

hotel: Sankara Nairobi, Autograph Collection by Marriott
review: We had brunch in the first floor restaurant on Sunday and had a lovely time.  We had a great table outside with great service - attentive but not intrusive.  The choice of dishes was good for each course.  The star attraction for me was the desert room! Yes room!  The reality was I only had room for ice-cream which was delicious.  To drink you could have what you wish for extra but Prosecco (either with or without alcohol) was included in the price.  We turned up at 12.45 without a booking thinking it would be busy but it wasn't which as it was our first time I don't know if that is unusual.  It was clear that others had made reservations so something to consider.   Will definitely return as it would be good to share a meal with friends / family also.
title: Relaxed Sunday brunch hit the spot

hotel: Sankara Nairobi, Autograph Collection by Marriott
review: As you guys know by now I travel a fair bit for business. Not BA Gold yet but a fair bit!! I was asked to come to Nairobi for 3 days of training and had some trepidations obviously. My local office recommended this hotel and what a revelation! Fabulous rooms with shower and bath (call me old-fashioned but I like a soak after a long flight) and decent wi-fi. Attentive and friendly staff made sure that I had everything that I needed whilst not being overbearing. Breakfasts were to die for (I am particular about the consistency of my baked beans and these were perfect) and the one buffet meal I had was inexpensive and just what I needed at that point in proceedings. I am sure that I will return and I will definitely be staying here - the little carved safari model animals left by
title: Seriously can't fault it

hotel: Sankara Nairobi, Autograph Collection by Marriott
title: Disappointed about parking fees and Wifi

hotel: Sankara Nairobi, Autograph Collection by Marriott
review: Extremely disappointed that we had to pay for our parking whilst we dined at the hotel restaurant. The parking fee was the highest I have ever paid in the whole of Nairobi at 300/- for an approximately 2 and half hour stay.  What happened to the ticket validation????????? What is the motivation for introducing this??? I  No free wifi for dining guests....I don't understand this concept...
title: Luxury

hotel: Sankara Nairobi, Autograph Collection by Marriott
review: Super modern, great decor, quiet rooms, comfortable beds, great showers, awesome breakfasts, great service.  The only downsides are the elevated price, but I guess that goes with the 5* territory, and the location, which means you usually have to spend quite some time in a cab if your meetings are downtown.  I'd love to stay again but the Nairobi traffic might put me off...
title: Not bad... but not great.

hotel: Sankara Nairobi, Autograph Collection by Marriott
review: As far as hotels go the Sankara is very nicely situated with shopping and other amenities nearby. The suite I had was nice with a desk for working at which made it good for business travel. The room layout was average and I actually preferred the layout at the Dusit. The iron they left me was old and actually had some grime on which near ruined one of my work shirts. They were gappy to ablige and provide a new one-but something that should have been checked by staff. The TV was a bit smaller-but still quite nice. The bed was very comfy with the bathroom being impecible. The closet being in the bathroom is for me not ideal and a bit inpractical (but that might just be personal taste). If you don't mind the drive- I would actually go elsewhere,  but fir convenience sake its very
title: Lovely Hotel in heart of Westlands

hotel: Sankara Nairobi, Autograph Collection by Marriott
review: 5 star hotel, Certificate of Excellence, #13 hotel in Nairobi, the other reviews have spoken for this place.  It's very nice.  If you're looking for a very comfortable, swank place to feel luxurious this was made for you.  I went to the rooftop to listen to a friend play in his jazz group.  Cool clear flooring entering the rooftop area and in the pool.  You don't need to go up, but beers are pricey compared to any other place.  They have some machine that lets off a weird woody smell so you don't smell anything unpleasant from Nairobi.  The view from the top is of a parking lot and a hotel, nothing special.  I wouldn't go here again, but it is a high quality establishing without question.  I don't visit distant places to spend time in a place I could find at home.
title: Rooftop

hotel: Sankara Nairobi, Autograph Collection by Marriott
review: The location is great with the shopping malls around and loads of activity to do at night.  The hotel is great, with the service. The rooms are well maintained with a great view of the city. Continental food is OK. Nothing wow about it.
title: Great stay in the centre of entertainment!

hotel: Sankara Nairobi, Autograph Collection by Marriott
review: Sankara was recommended to me so I already had great expectations and they were met.  Friendly staff, lovely food and a very sociable roof top bar.  The Sankara is an oasis in Nairobi and is equally comfortable for a tourist and business traveller.  Nice room and welcoming atmosphere, will definitely stay again.
title: Great Hotel

hotel: Sankara Nairobi, Autograph Collection by Marriott
review: Very nice hotel with friendly staff. Rooms were clean and comfortable. Food in the newly opend steakhouse "Graze" were absolutely fantastic. A bit pricey but excellent. Pool and bar at the top of the hotel is a good place to enjoy a drink.
title: Excellent

hotel: Sankara Nairobi, Autograph Collection by Marriott
review: Having travelled a lot, it is remarkable when a hotel still manages to surprise and amaze. The Sankara in Nairobi ranks as one of the best we’ve ever visited.  The room, a suite, was spacious, clean and had over and above the usual amenities including a shaver and shaving cream, set in a gorgeous bathroom with a window looking into the main bedroom. The detail the hotel room went into, was wonderful, from little African animals next to the bed – a different one every night to take home, to an embroidered fabric bag for the internet cable.  The entire hotel oozes quality and luxury offering a premium experience from the hotel lobby right through to the top floor swimming pool and bar.  The room service and breakfast room food was marvelous with friendly service. We’d be lucky to
title: One of the finest hotels anywhere

hotel: Sankara Nairobi, Autograph Collection by Marriott
review: The hotel was a real treat and worthy of all of its accolades...As a first time visitor to the country and Nairobi, I didn't know what to expect from a lodging accommodation perspective as star ratings can be inconsistent as one finds when traveling the world.  However, this beautiful welcoming space did not disappoint...It is refreshing and inviting, grand yet unassuming, palatial but welcoming!  I enjoyed every element/aspect of the Sankara Nairobi hotel.  Beyond the physical structure and well appointed, attention to detail offerings of guest rooms to public spaces the warmth, professionalism, and accommodating staff raised the bar for all others to follow.  Their customer service is unmatched and highly valued.  We made several requests for changes to various issues
title: Understated Grand Urban Oasis in the busy/bustling city...par Excellent!

hotel: Sankara Nairobi, Autograph Collection by Marriott
title: Beautiful, modern hotel in the middle of Nairobi

hotel: Sankara Nairobi, Autograph Collection by Marriott
review: The roof top pool is a must-visit! Relaxed environment with nice cocktails, shisha, and yummy bitings. It gets a bit cold and windy, so dress warmly if staying into the evening.  We ate dinner and breakfast at Artisan and I was very impressed by the service and quality of the food. The chef even customized my entree to fit my vegan criteria. Breakfast was delicious as well and there were many options to choose from. The room was superb! Quiet, clean, really comfy bed, and well-stocked mini-fridge. Absolutely no complaints. **Only point to note--if you plan on going swimming be sure to check in by the gym to get a towel. I made the mistake of using my own kikoi and the staff followed us out to ask if we were guests!
title: Superb

hotel: Sankara Nairobi, Autograph Collection by Marriott
review: Unfortunately, due to the situation in Kenya, the hotel was very quiet. I, however did not mind this as it meant all the helpful staff had even more time to help me, which they certainly did. The hotel itself is beautiful. Rooms are luxurious. The pool and rooftop bar are wonderful. It is right next to the Surit Centre, which itself has amazing restaurants. The hotel staff are impecabily well trained. Very curtious and helpful.
title: An oasis

hotel: Sankara Nairobi, Autograph Collection by Marriott
review: Stayed here for the 8th time now. I love this hotel. It provides everything you expect from a luxury hotel, but in an understated elegance with African inspired decor (without becoming safari camp). Very elegant, understated and welcoming. Love the rooms. The new Blaze restaurant is the best I've found in Kenya. The icing on the cake is the roof top bar, lounge, swimming pool. Fantastic atmosphere on Friday and Saturday nights. Don't miss it! But what really stands out us the personable, professional and warm service. I truly feel as if I come home when I stay there. This time special mention goes to Bridget from room service. When she learned that I had come down with a cold, she immediately went and got me honey and lemon slices to make me a healing tea, on her own initiative.
title: Still one of the best in Nairobi

hotel: Sankara Nairobi, Autograph Collection by Marriott
review: Was here for three days, good service and nice staff. Hotel is modern and clean, decent food also. Would recommend it to anyone doing business in Nairobi. It's pretty close to the airport, about twenty mins in a taxi...
title: Great business hotel

hotel: Sankara Nairobi, Autograph Collection by Marriott
review: I could not have been happier with my stay at Sankara. It was my first visit to Nairobi and my only complaint is that my trip was too short! The hotel itself has a great vibe and even though I can tell most guests are there on business, it does not feel like a business hotel. The room itself was very spacious, very clean and very comfortable. The bathroom is really well-designed, feels very spacious and luxurious. The restaurant (esp the breakfast- delicious and plentiful) and the hotel bar are great, and quite busy on the weekends with people from outside the hotel- especially the rooftop bar. The hotel is also centrally located and easy to access, the staff all very friendly. The hotel amenities are also great, nice, if small, pool and good gym. My favorite thing, however, was
title: Wonderful hotel! Luxury in the details.

hotel: Sankara Nairobi, Autograph Collection by Marriott
title: Rude Roof Top Manager but Good food,Good service.

hotel: Sankara Nairobi, Autograph Collection by Marriott
review: My first experience at Sankara was not a very good one, sat at the bar and not long after 3 friends joined us which made us two black females and two white males, i'm emphasising this for i feel how we were treated was because of our race.    We had few drinks and one of us (white male) accidentally dropped a Tusker Malt and this is where trouble started. The so called manager, whom i presumed he was as he was wearing a suit and tie unlike the other staff, he came over and shouted at me in a rude manner  ( Ladies why are you dropping the drinks ) i asked him, we are four of us here, what makes you think we the ladies dropped the drink, and if we did, we surely wouldn't do so intentionally, we exchanged few words for i refuse to be discriminated because I'm black, if he knew it
title: Sankara Hotel. The place to be in when in Nairobi

hotel: Sankara Nairobi, Autograph Collection by Marriott
title: Not quite

hotel: Sankara Nairobi, Autograph Collection by Marriott
review: Tremendous personal service - all the amenities are up to scratch and first class as would be expected; room, restaurants, gym, rooftop pool, but it's the quality of the exceptional service that stands out. Each & every member of staff I came into contact with was helpful, proactive & well trained, whether on the check-in desk, restaurants, housekeeping or the gym. Although a large hotel with the facilities to match it feels like a family run boutique hotel & I'm looking forward to staying here again on my next trip to Nairobi.
title: Business Trip in Nairobi - amazing service

hotel: Sankara Nairobi, Autograph Collection by Marriott
review: I always loved Sankara since it opened and I have been a frequent client. It is actually where my husband and I had our first date. The food is good and the service is good too. However, they have introduced parking fees. Why would an establishment want to chase away customers by introducing parking fees? And exorbitant fees at that. Kshs. 100 per hour is a bit much. Which finds me asking myself, should I wish to use their hotel spa, shall I be relaxing or worrying about the parking fees accruing as a result of my stay at the hotel? In my view, this is an epic fail. A recipe for disaster in my view. Since my last visit in April, I no longer visit this establishment. Unless it is a business necessity and I do not overstay my welcome once my meetings or conferences are over. I
title: Lovely Place But Losing It

hotel: Sankara Nairobi, Autograph Collection by Marriott
title: My new go-to hotel in Nairobi

hotel: Sankara Nairobi, Autograph Collection by Marriott
review: Great property with fantastic service.  Bar on the top level was a lovely respite and the room were clean and comfortable.  The only draw-back is, that like most of the higher end hotels, is that it's on the opposite side of town from the airport...so allow ample time to fight NBO traffic.
title: Nice Hotel with Great Staff!

hotel: Sankara Nairobi, Autograph Collection by Marriott
review: The Sankara is tucked away from the hustle and bustle of the nearby main road.  It is convenient to local shopping and several eateries.  As with most high end hotel, they have security protocols that require you to scan your bags prior to entering.  We stayed over night on our way to Zanzibar - we had to depart prior to the restaurants opening so the hotel staff offered a bagged breakfast and it was much appreciated!  The bonus of this hotel is the Sankara 7 - you get a nice carved animal for each night you stay at the hotel which was a nice touch.  The roof top pool / bar was very nice, the only draw back is the pool closes early for the after work happy hour crowd.  It is definitely a spot that locals and business travelers frequent.
title: Worth it!!

hotel: Sankara Nairobi, Autograph Collection by Marriott
review: Always a pleasure to be at the Sankara from Johannesburg.  As soon as we step in ( 3rd stay now), my team and I are welcomed by Rachel's smile and professionalism. "Sir your rooms are ready. John will take you upstairs. May you encounter any problem, please call and we Sankara will be at your door". There's no time she has not assisted. The business centre is her second post when there is no one to assist there. And when you ask her why she is always ready to help, her answer is "we are Sankara". Thank you Rachel, thank you Sankara Nairobi.
title: Guest's relation

hotel: Sankara Nairobi, Autograph Collection by Marriott
review: I had two stays at the Sankara Hotel and both were excellent.   At the first check-in  I was given a room on the third floor with a view of the parking lot. After I asked about the view,  the man at reception tried to upsell me to am Club Room  (at $40. a nite extra) but I didn’t think it was necessary as I had booked a deluxe room anyhow.  Since I was staying five nights I asked for a room on a higher floor with a view of a small park and pool (which belongs to another hotel). I was given room 5010 which was excellent.    It is rare to stay in such a well-designed room. Lighting was excellent for reading and work, there was ample desk space for any work I needed to do, the bed and extra seating was comfortable and wi-fi was complimentary and fast.   I especially liked the
title: Excellent in ever way

hotel: Sankara Nairobi, Autograph Collection by Marriott
title: Sankara

hotel: Sankara Nairobi, Autograph Collection by Marriott
review: A very modern and trendy hotel from both outside and inside. It's gallery located on the third floor is a treasure to visit. It's roof bar is a great place to hangout with friends in the evenings. Great spa service with (ask for the Thai massage). Room is not super clean and some facilities is starting to get wore out despite that the hotel is relatively new and modern. But for now it's still okay.  Gift shop is small but have nice stuff. No outdoor gardens. There is a roof-top pool but it's often too windy to swim there.
title: Perfect

hotel: Sankara Nairobi, Autograph Collection by Marriott
review: Probably one of the best in Nairobi. Excellent rooms, very clean and spacious. Top notch service. Great restaurants. Friendly service. You can stay there with your eyes shut. Totally worth it. would recomend for a honeymoon or business travelers.
title: I love this place

hotel: Sankara Nairobi, Autograph Collection by Marriott
review: We were well taken care of from the gate to the restaurant. All staff were courteous and helpful. The ambiance was great and so was the food n service. What we didn't understand was the parking fee... As I thought the longer we stayed there the more money spent and that's a good thing... Felt a little punished by that...also because we had no idea until we were done with dinner...
title: Interesting well organized place in Westlands Nairobi Kenya

hotel: Sankara Nairobi, Autograph Collection by Marriott
review: We stayed here overnight before proceeding to Masai Mara. It is very centrally located. The room was very well decorated with local artifacts. The room was quite big. The food was also good. There is a mall just across the road from where we could get the local simcard. Overall a pleasant stay
title: Great Service and food

hotel: Sankara Nairobi, Autograph Collection by Marriott
review: for the most part the service and the location are good. hotel has a car service, but the drivers overprice the foreign guests.  That is cheating. I complained about this at the concierge and at the hotel's maanger, but the complaint has still not been dealt with satisfactorily. The hotel should have reimbursed me for the exorbitantly high cost of the taxi service, but they did not. this shows that the management has weak skill management skills, and are not able to deal with complaints properly, that is a pity and thus not worthy of a 5 star rating
title: Good hotel, but overpriced car service

hotel: Sankara Nairobi, Autograph Collection by Marriott
review: I've stayed here on 3 trips now and the hotel is always good. Staff are okay but I find you do have to ask 2 or 3 times to get something...hakuna matata I guess! With only one restaurant apart from the buffet the choice can be limited during a longer stay but the food in the grill is good (tuna particularly). Nice that you can sit outside at the buffet restaurant. Rooms and bathrooms all good and not too much noise. Nice rooftop bar next to the pool in the evenings
title: Great hotel for business

hotel: Sankara Nairobi, Autograph Collection by Marriott
review: Perfect for a few days stay in Nairobi.  Efficient and attentive staff. Convivial atmosphere, choice of eateries and a wonderful roof top pool/bar.   No hesitations in recommending. Will be top of the list for any return visits.   Convenient location, suitable for business or leisure.
title: Ticks all the boxes

hotel: Sankara Nairobi, Autograph Collection by Marriott
review: As a regular traveler , I found this stay at the Sankara quite disappointing compared to  previous trips.   ( I have traveled to Kenya / Nairobi quite often in the past year , but stayed at another hotels )   The service  which used to be very good is not there anymore   I  was expected to take my own  luggage to my room .   ( and I had some banners etc to carry as well as  a suitcase ).    Service  ( al a carte )at dinner with colleagues was appalling; we all got our food at different times - some were already  finished before  others got their meal.   Food choices at the Buffet are pretty standard.   Drinks order also became a bit of a night mare .  Standard things like Diet coke - not available ?  They had to go and get from room service ?   In general the hotel is clean
title: Business Stay - Disappointing - still a comfortable place to be .

hotel: Sankara Nairobi, Autograph Collection by Marriott
title: The good, the bad, and the ugly

hotel: Sankara Nairobi, Autograph Collection by Marriott
review: The good- felt very safe, friendly staff, and clean nice bath  The bad- shower door system horrible + stone floor = skating rink .  Had to use nearly every towel in room to avoid a wet dangerous floor, price way to high when you can get same quality, service, and food in surrounding areas  The UGLY- room did not look like room pictured at all.  Did not have nice glas surround from room to bathroom, was smaller, and was run down.  Was going to complain but at the end of the day who wants that negative energy while on vacation of lifetime?
title: 2015 October Kenya Mission Trip

hotel: Sankara Nairobi, Autograph Collection by Marriott
review: I have stayed at the Sankara Nairobi on several trips to Kenya. The service level was awful as well as the food and food service.  On previous trips service, food, etc had always been excellent.  The experience this time at the Sankara Nairobi was so bad I don't want to come back.
title: Excellent Business Hotel in Westlands, Nairobi, Kenya

hotel: Sankara Nairobi, Autograph Collection by Marriott
review: I have stayed in a bunch of hotels and I must say the service at the Sankara is one of the best I had the chance to experience. I had a very pleasant stay, thanks to the professional staff and the great room setup. Their rooms are spacious, clean, and all their systems well thought out. The room card works, the internet is fast, and unlike in other hotels the internet password is issued only once during check-in and it worked all through your duration of stay. Generally the guest experience is very well thought out by the team at Sankara.   During the meetings the coffee never ran out or late :D, and there were staff members on call through out the meeting times to respond to your requests. The hotel is in a great location too, you can walk to major shopping malls, night clubs,
title: Services at this hotel were good

hotel: Sankara Nairobi, Autograph Collection by Marriott
review: Was in Kenya for a conference and I stayed here for 2 nights which was good as the hotel was a nice place to stay nice clean a spacious rooms. The food was brilliant and the staff were very very friendly.
title: Good place

hotel: Sankara Nairobi, Autograph Collection by Marriott
review: I spent two nights in Sankara while on Safari and wanted to stay in central luxury hotel from where I could experience the Nairobi city life. Service and location are spot on. The food was exceptional and roof top bar was busy every night
title: Great location

hotel: Sankara Nairobi, Autograph Collection by Marriott
review: We were pleasantly surprised with Sankara as it offers high quality accomodation in modern rooms with an element of luxury and surprise. The rooms are spacious, light and tastefully decorated. The bathrooms offer a bath tub and rain shower with good quality soaps, shampoos and body creams. Robes and slippers are available. The staff are all professional, friendly and excellent from the manger, reception staff, room service, Valet and wait staff. This is more of an adult hotel as there is no garden for young children to run around as the heated pool on the roof top is situated at a club, ( and at night permits only adults). Complimentary water and wifi comes with the room. It is a peaceful hotel as the rooms are fairly soundproof especially from the traffic outside. There is a
title: A truly amazing and luxury hotel with a difference

hotel: Sankara Nairobi, Autograph Collection by Marriott
title: Nice hotel in the city

hotel: Sankara Nairobi, Autograph Collection by Marriott
review: We were only in Nairobi for one night and decided to stay at Sankara. The hotel was very nice and rooms were great. The rooftop bar is very popular, especially on a Friday night. Also a popular line of bars in just one block walking distance from the hotel.  The staff was very nice and breakfast was good with a nice spread.
title: Nice place. And like all hotels, food is expensive

hotel: Sankara Nairobi, Autograph Collection by Marriott
review: Modern and well maintained hotel and facilities. I was located on the 6th floor and was troubled by machinery noise throughout the night, which may have been the lifts. Food for Dinner was middling and expensive and the Breakfast buffet uninspired. The service in the food and bar outlets was slow with a long time lag between placing the order and  serving of the requested drink or dish. Security is visible and efficient. Good free Wi-Fi service
title: Two night business trip

hotel: Sankara Nairobi, Autograph Collection by Marriott
review: I stayed at the Sankara in September and had a fantastic time! Everyone was very attentive, courteous and generous with time and assistance.  I travel a lot and rarely expect to sleep well but I did sleep quite well at the Sankara.  The bed was surprisingly comfortable. Ms. Peninah Kimani made reserving a room seamless and efficient.  Check in was no problem at all.  In fact, I was on a late flight and arrived after 10:30pm, staff at the front desk was very aware of this and said "let's get you to your room so you can rest."  Now that's kind and attentive service.  What I really enjoyed was the breakfast buffet - Chef Denis Kala makes a spinach and poached egg on an English muffin dish that is excellent...and I don't really care for poached eggs!   Be sure to ask Chef Denis Kala
title: I had a great time at the Sankara!

hotel: Sankara Nairobi, Autograph Collection by Marriott
title: Have tried and tried......

hotel: Sankara Nairobi, Autograph Collection by Marriott
review: I have visited Sankara many times. I like the hotel and their previous Thai restaurant was amazing. But the reason I give this place a low rating is that every time I visit or try visit I find their service absolutely appalling. They never manage to take reservations correctly, call often to say they cannot take a reservation because they have overbooked restaurants and try fob you off to another one. Their food is extremely average and very expensive.  But the biggest issue has got to be the service and staff at Sankara. I always find them slow, moody and usually unwilling.  Hope this gets fixed cause it's a complete disappointment.
title: Good Business Hotel - well located

hotel: Sankara Nairobi, Autograph Collection by Marriott
review: A very impressive and professional hotel for the seasoned business traveler. I was able to have productive breakfast meetings in the club lounge as well as the business centre. The team at the pool restaurant were very accommodating, going out of their way to assist me with a special meal. Good location and was able to walk to most of my meetings and Uber also worked great in the Westlands vicinity.  If I do have one comment for improvement it would be with the check-in. Considering the welcome emails received prior to my trip the check in desk were in a bit of disarray and it did take time to find my reservation and to also confirm the specific requests I had made prior to my trip.
title: High cost for an appalling service!!!

hotel: Sankara Nairobi, Autograph Collection by Marriott
review: Although the hotel is modern and very good with outstanding facilities, what makes Sankara truly fantastic are the people there:  Daniel in reception Jeffrey the manager Edwin the doorman Dickens in guest relations  And last, but most importantly Rachel who is one of the best guest relations managers in the industry.  If you want great service in a wonderful location then I would highly recommend Sankara.
title: World-class service with the best staff

hotel: Sankara Nairobi, Autograph Collection by Marriott
review: i went for hackathon intending that i was going to miss my home, but i got myself just at a home far from my home. i really enjoyed the stayed because you always provide people with unexceptional condition things that makes never to regret where they are staying
title: My home which is far from my country

hotel: Sankara Nairobi, Autograph Collection by Marriott
review: I spent a night in sankara in October 2015 with my mum.  The room was very clean and quiet.  Most facilities available ie wifi/room service/laundry etc.  great food and service excellent.  Location of room better at the front therefore no traffic noise but it appears to be sound proof so only very little noise if room is at the back.   Great selection of wines and breakfast is excellent.
title: Comfortable stay with great service

hotel: Sankara Nairobi, Autograph Collection by Marriott
review: My wife and I definitely enjoyed our stay with Sankara Hotel.  The staff was very friendly and always helpful.  We booked a Club Lounge room and enjoyed the complimentary breakfast and evening happy hour that were part of that package.  We ate dinner at Open House right around the corner, and due to it raining a staff member was nice enough to escort us to the restaurant with an umbrella.  The hotel has a very nice gym, with a view of the city; and the roof-top pool/restaurant is definitely a scene on Friday and Saturday (and probably other nights, but we were only there over the weekend).
title: Very enjoyable stay

hotel: Sankara Nairobi, Autograph Collection by Marriott
review: The hotel has 3 different restaurants (all very good), a well equipped gym, a good rooftop swiming pool and a spa. The service is excellent. Good laundry, housekeeping, service overall is there to help. Fast internet everywhere you go. Good bed and bathroom...  Try to face the back of the hotel.
title: Everything is good

hotel: Sankara Nairobi, Autograph Collection by Marriott
review: I firstly loved the hotel, their service, I was staying at a beautiful, expensive suite... Until I left my necklace at their Spa, in a little jewellery box they give you. It was booked under my room number and they didn't have the decency to return it, it was gone! Then on the last day my iPhone disappeared too...  They made a whole scene with security, promised to contact back.... one week later I'm still waiting for even a call from the manager. I go to Nairobi often and they can rest assured I'm never stepping a foot again.
title: Things kept disappearing...

hotel: Sankara Nairobi, Autograph Collection by Marriott
review: Service, food, & accommodations were all top knotch. Exceptionally accomadating staff, beautiful facilities, and a welcoming environment made my stay very pleasent.   The only negatives I can cite to were that the gym was only open between 6 and 10pm & the WiFi was spotty in some of the rooms. Security and safety were cited as reasons for the gym hours. As for the WiFi, the hotel management was dillegently working to improve reception while I was there. The sturdy concrete construction of the hotel had an impact on signal strength in some spotts, prompting them to install repeaters in some to extend coverage.   These negatives were outweighed by the positive, customer centric attitude of the management & staff. Overall I'd highly recommend the Sankara if you're staying in
title: Excellent hotel!

hotel: Sankara Nairobi, Autograph Collection by Marriott
