title: Great hotel

hotel: Sankara Nairobi, Autograph Collection by Marriott
review: Third time I have stayed at Sankara. All in all its a great hotel with world class facilities. Rooms are luxurious although depending on location some can be a bit noisy(3rd floor near the extraction fan) gym is great, pool brilliant. Graze is an excellent choice for a great steak and the conference facilities are top notch. In summary a hotel that could proudly take its place anywhere in the world.
title: Dinner

hotel: Sankara Nairobi, Autograph Collection by Marriott
review: The hotel has a cold atmosphere. Before any hotel staff attend to you it takes ages. The choice of vegetarian menu is very limited. The staff are very busy with their work and customer service is rubbish, most lack creativity when arranging for an evevnt. Sitting arrangement is very constrained.
title: The Gym operating hours ruined it for me

hotel: Sankara Nairobi, Autograph Collection by Marriott
review: It was a great trip but the staff ruined it for is. When we checked in the member of staff said to us we had breakfast included, we therefore set our alarm each day and enjoyed the breakfast as it was free so we thought. The staff at breakfast also said it was included when we signed the bill. We then found out as we left that this was not true and got charged for all out breakfast. Just a let down to be honest we had a few hotels booked for our trip and I did not know it wasn't included but the fact we had been told it was twice I went with it. A clean nice hotel other than that. The staff we spoke to on reception were not too friendly either when trying to tell them what happened which was 100% a misunderstanding of their staff but they made us pay.
title: Nice bit a bit of a con

hotel: Sankara Nairobi, Autograph Collection by Marriott
review: Just love this hotel and would recommend it both for business and private travelers. It provides an excellent service and a great dining experience. E.g. at breakfast I was often served coffee with a customized foam drawing and every evening you can find another small carved animal figurette on your pillow. These little extras really make a difference!
title: Exotic chic

hotel: Sankara Nairobi, Autograph Collection by Marriott
review: It was my first trip to sub-Sahara Africa, and Sankara was the right choice to expirience Nairobi in very nice, safe and relaxing enviroment. The room was nice good size and everything in good quality, like a 5 star anywhere in Europe. Several good restaurants, and we spend a lot of time on the rooftop bar/lounge, which is a great place for relaxing after a day in Nairobi's traffic. One evening we even had a business dinner up there, and Chef Joshua made the most fantastic platter to share mixing products from the Menu, and my business partners and I was very impressed. We also tried the Steak Restaurant and had a really good T-bone steak, with great wine and very good service. The Executive Chef was even kind enough to come and advice us about the food. So overall great place
title: Really impressed

hotel: Sankara Nairobi, Autograph Collection by Marriott
title: Choose your standards

hotel: Sankara Nairobi, Autograph Collection by Marriott
review: Sankara you need to learn a thing or two on service. You can't charge people for parking and Internet and still charge them 900 ksh for a glass of wine! It's like having Posh high standard service that you don't fully deliver on while being cheap on the wifi! I mean how much would u get by charging wifi!!  Don't take the easy road! Get good service and more to offer and people will come. Am sure an extra glass or two of wine will pay for the parking!
title: Great Hotel and Good Location

hotel: Sankara Nairobi, Autograph Collection by Marriott
review: They continue to refuse to refund for nights that I never stayed there. They make up excuses and are always "looking into it". Never pay in advance with this hotel. Only AFTER you check out do you pay them.
title: Refund impossible to get

hotel: Sankara Nairobi, Autograph Collection by Marriott
review: I was at the Sankara for 2 weeks. Everything was lovely and clean. Staff are very friendly. Breakfast is delicious. The soap stone animals are a whimsical touch. The laundry prices were a bit high, but the room service was very affordable/reasonable. I will definitely stay here again.
title: Excellent Stay

hotel: Sankara Nairobi, Autograph Collection by Marriott
review: The staff members are friendly and very helpful. Service is great from the staff. Enjoyed good food at the artisan restaurant and thereafter some drinks at the Bar area on the top floor. Me and my hubby we had a great stay here. Location is great next to good clubs and shopping areas. The room was very spacious and very clean.
title: Great Hotel and good service

hotel: Sankara Nairobi, Autograph Collection by Marriott
review: Stayed here for a few nights, and very much enjoyed it.  Without traffic its about 30mins from airport, with traffic is a long 2-3 hours...  Check-in was efficient, and porters were helpful. Rooms are very nicely decorated, and come with a complimentary Kenya carved animal (the sankara 7) each day you stay. Also beds are comfortable, and pillows a delight!  Room service was prompt, and the food was good.  Wired internet worked well (5Mbps DL Speed), however myself and a colleague had issues here and there with wifi- seemed unstable.  I would certainly stay here again, and highly recommend it.
title: Great Hotel- Nice location

hotel: Sankara Nairobi, Autograph Collection by Marriott
review: The hotel is in Westlands near some fun bars and restaurants - and was the perfect overnight pit stop through Nairobi. Comfy rooms, a good poolside bar which on Friday night had an interesting mix of people there - not too expat! I thought it was far more tasteful than the Kempinski which seemed to be about the same price. Overall very good value for money and ideal for a night or two.
title: Great pit stop - well located

hotel: Sankara Nairobi, Autograph Collection by Marriott
review: For a business trip the hotel meets all expectation. Checkin/check out process was quick, good sized rooms, ample lighting, plug points at bed stand for charging your phone etc. breakfast spread was good with the outdoor seating.  The shower cubicle needs a shower curtain
title: Meet expectation

hotel: Sankara Nairobi, Autograph Collection by Marriott
review: Of many hotels I have experienced, this one is at the top. Excellent service all-round, good food and reasonable prices. Will choose Sankara again. The "Sankara Seven" is a nice touch - icing on the cake.
title: Faultless week=long stay

hotel: Sankara Nairobi, Autograph Collection by Marriott
review: Booked a twin room, but upon check in we were allocated a king. The hotel took an hour to look into the problem, while we waited in reception, past 11pm and tired after a days travelling and early start.  In the end a manager upgraded us to a Club room which was nice. After a couple of days of using the Club Lounge a member of staff told us we were not entitled to be there, which was highly embarrassing in front of other guests. It took a member of staff who had seen us in their previously to convince her otherwise. We received an apology but not before a long wait wondering if we were to be thrown out!  Also booked a day room at the hotel for after our safari - check in experience was poor as they had no record of our reservation. We got a room in the end but not without a
title: Nice hotel, but patchy service

hotel: Sankara Nairobi, Autograph Collection by Marriott
title: Evening Oasis!

hotel: Sankara Nairobi, Autograph Collection by Marriott
review: Sankara Nairobi! The definition of modern art and architecture, tranquility and refreshing ambience.  Sankara has definitely lived up to its standards over the years.  The modern decor and contemporary flower arrangements are highly visually appealing and a touch of class.  I had the opportunity to savor a light afternoon snack at The Gallery one afternoon. The Cappuccino I ordered was freshly brewed and had a mellow and uplifting flavor, this was accompanied with a fresh crisp butter cookie.  What a treat! A brief observation during my visit, the staff should be slightly lower toned when communicating with each other. But indeed pleasant staff. Keep up the wonderful spirits. I recommend Sankara to anyone who wishes to relish in the festivities this season! Sankara is my all
title: Still very good but beginning to show some age.

hotel: Sankara Nairobi, Autograph Collection by Marriott
review: We spent only one night at Sankara for a connection flight. We were in honeymoon and they knew that, even for one night only, they prepared a very good surprise with sparkling wine and chocolates, accommodation looks very business oriented which is good, and the neighborhood didn't seem to have good options for food or entertainment, but again, we stayed one night and it's hard to measure these things.
title: A Surprise overnight in Nairobi

hotel: Sankara Nairobi, Autograph Collection by Marriott
review: I had a very nice short stay in the Sankara Nairobi. Very very friendly staff and the room on the executive floor was comfortable and functional. The rooftop pool area is a pleasant location for checking emails after a busy day.
title: Comfortable with a friendly atmosphere

hotel: Sankara Nairobi, Autograph Collection by Marriott
review: We stayed three nights there and really felt at home even for business visits. Bright and clean facility, warm staffs and excellent service. We like the buffet breakfast very much. The mall near by which is 5 minuets walk has a large supermarket, bookstore and a chain cafe - Java.
title: Very good hotel for business

hotel: Sankara Nairobi, Autograph Collection by Marriott
review: I have five executives staying here and they needed a meeting room during their stay.  I was in contact with the POC for meeting room.  The room was booked, food & beverages arrive 20 minutes late for a 1 hour meeting.  The POC would not give the group a discount.  I asked several times if we could get the room at no cost because my executives was staying at the hotel and the meeting was only for 1 hour.  The POC ignored my requested and charge for the room.  She made up excuses continuously.
title: Not Very Accommodating

hotel: Sankara Nairobi, Autograph Collection by Marriott
review: The Sankara hotel is located in the heart of Westlands. The location is great to enjoy the busy area, restaurants, shopping, market and night live. It is very exclusive and the rooms are beautiful, not very big but very well accommodated. The buffet breakfast is very good and the roof top is very beautiful.
title: Excellent service

hotel: Sankara Nairobi, Autograph Collection by Marriott
review: Remember.....your meeting location in Nairobi should dictate your hotel choice.  Traffic can be REALLY bad.  I love the Sankara.  Great rooms. Friendly staff.  Excellent breakfasts.  Two restaurants serving above quality food for hotels.  Oh a tip....if you enjoy your coffee.....there is an excellent coffee shop which can also supply coffee to have with your breakfast!  I will stay again.  I would have given 5 stars but.....this time I landed in room 4032 which is at the end of a corridor.  My guess there is a service access above this area on the 5th floor for cleaning trolley's etc... It is not carpeted so the wheel movement and vibration above you can get tiresome (up until 1030 pm and from 0600 am).   Perhaps all floors have the service access in the same place?
title: Very professional and comfortable

hotel: Sankara Nairobi, Autograph Collection by Marriott
review: Having tried several Sunday Brunches in Nairobi, I have to say the Sankara Brunch served at the Artisan restaurant between 12 noon and 4pm is simply to die for!  The time allocated is simply not enough to sample all the fresh delicacies the team at the Artisan restaurant diligently prepare each and every Sunday.  The restaurant has an amazing team who always ensure one is comfortable not to mention diligently refilling the champagne flutes with the crisp chilled bubbly which is served throughout Brunch.   I recently had a Birthday party comprising of 28 guests hosted by the Artisan team who really made us feel at home. We had a private corner all to ourselves and the entire party really enjoyed all the food.  A big thank you to Geoffrey,Susan, Randu and Frederick.  We shall
title: Exquisite Sunday Brunch at the Artisan Restaurant,

hotel: Sankara Nairobi, Autograph Collection by Marriott
title: The only place to stay in Nairobi

hotel: Sankara Nairobi, Autograph Collection by Marriott
review: I have now stayed here three times. Based on location in Westlands, a fairly reasonable price and great staff, it is the only place I will consider staying. I used to stay at the downtown hotels but they are all run down and not in a great area anymore. The only area they could improve is that the restaurant service is a bit slow and they play their music way too loud up at the Club Lounge. But I am quite happy with them overall.
title: Good repeat visit

hotel: Sankara Nairobi, Autograph Collection by Marriott
review: My husband and I last visited 5 years ago on our first night after our wedding. This visit was 5 years later. Still good food on offer and attentive service. Loved the wine selection, good quality wine by the glass!!! Room was good and clean. Getting dated, I guess its a function passage of time. The pool area has broken tiles. I had fun, but it looks like repairs are due. Downside was that we booked and were clear it was our anniversary, but not even a note recognising this during our stay.
title: Fantastic hotel!

hotel: Sankara Nairobi, Autograph Collection by Marriott
review: This hotel provides a wonderful example of premium African hospitality. On arrival the reception is well organized , luggage taken to your room with the necessary assistance in the room. Some rooms have a better view than others , ask for the petrol station side which gives you a nice view of a vibrant African city - see photo. The amenities are fine and pricing reflects what you would expect from a luxury hotel. Go and visit the shopping center adjacent to the hotel which has some decent restaurants and a supermarket where you can get you Kenyan coffee and tea. Convenient neighborhood to be in.
title: Fine African hospitality

hotel: Sankara Nairobi, Autograph Collection by Marriott
review: We had a large family gathering . over 30 people for a friends daughters graduation. We sat on the private balcony dining area which was ok. However service was very patchy at best. They seemed to be stretched either because we were a large table. However for a big hotel such as this i expected better. Our food arrived after an hour of waiting.  And some plates were not consistent . but mostly it was tasty . THE WORST PART OF THE EVENING WAS AFTER DINNER AND SPENDING OVER 100K SHS WE HAD TO EACH PAY TO PARK IN THE HOTEL PARKING.. EVEN the city stops charging after 4pm..  We complained. Bitterly and left disapointed because it felt thankless.
title: Dissapointed .

hotel: Sankara Nairobi, Autograph Collection by Marriott
review: Sankara was my favorite hotel in Nairobi I only stopped going there because of their plus plus mentality to everything you buy. This changed and they were offering an all inclusive rate for January so I thought let's give it a try. The 'upgrade' room I was given had a stained carpet, a shower cubicle with the door missing, loose taps and a TV with many channels not working. The gym is a disaster, the treadmills have not been maintained and reset themselves frequently, this results in a sudden stop. This is potentially life threatening as someone could be thrown off the machine. Heart monitors did not work. I did complain the evening I received the usual 'we are sorry' I complained again in the morning same 'we are sorry'. I had then decided to check out early I went to a website
title: Trying hard but is losing its former glory. Money before quality attitude still remains

hotel: Sankara Nairobi, Autograph Collection by Marriott
title: As always...an absolutely wonderful stay at The Sankara!

hotel: Sankara Nairobi, Autograph Collection by Marriott
review: I stayed at the Sankara for almost 4 weeks from October to November for business.  It has truly become my home away from home.  The staff are the best that I have encountered while traveling. My every need, no matter how small or large, was met with a warm smile and a quick resolution.  They simply attend to your every need with such grace and perfection.  Ms Jane on the third floor treated me so good that I cannot describe it in words!  The staff in the restaurant had a hot cappuccino waiting for me each morning and nice glass of red wine each evening.  Where does one get that kind of service without $100 tips!  If you stay in Nairobi you must stay at THE SANKARA!
title: Food is terrific. Communication skills need work.

hotel: Sankara Nairobi, Autograph Collection by Marriott
review: This was a very good experience for me. I liked their service, although it was a bit slow for a busy week like NRW. The food was superb too.  Amazing ambience, do they have music though? Didn't check that.
title: Nairobi Restaurant Week

hotel: Sankara Nairobi, Autograph Collection by Marriott
review: I was in Kenya for a week for a business trip and I came down sick on day 2.  I ended up in the hospital for the rest of the week.  The staff at Sankara were amazing.  The first day they were going out to get me medicine.  Then when I ended up in the hospital, they helped me get there, sent me a huge beautiful bouquet of flowers, came to visit every day, and made sure I had everything I needed. It was a scary week for me, but they made it so much better than it could have been.  I never would have expected that level of care and concern from a hotel and I'm so incredibly grateful and appreciative.  They truly exemplify the gold standard.
title: Best care I've ever experienced

hotel: Sankara Nairobi, Autograph Collection by Marriott
review: Beautiful hotel, lovely location, excellent service, security is good, lovely food, rooftop bar is amazing,friendly staff, vallet service is good, love the look of the hote, amazing view from pool side
title: amazing

hotel: Sankara Nairobi, Autograph Collection by Marriott
review: Spent much of last week booked at this hotel located at a very  point in Nairobi's busy Westlands. The check in machine is well oiled and thus smooth, the check in staff welcome you with a smile or a welcome message that makes you relax!. The seurity staff, concierge and restaurant staff just make you feel elevated like a King or crown prince!  The rooms are very clean and the beddings superb! The ambience at the bars and restaurants are very much up to International standards and those you find in 5 star hotels elsewhere outside Africa.  When I feel low and want to be elevated, will come again.
title: Be ready to be shocked at Sankara, they treat people like KINGS!

hotel: Sankara Nairobi, Autograph Collection by Marriott
review: I had a Sunday Brunch in the Artisan Restaurant and the experience was so good I made a return visit just to make sure. To begin with the live music is at the perfect level with music from varying genres. I am middle aged (plus) and have never experience such a choice of foods from starters right though to the exquisite choice of sweets. I challenge anybody not to find at least three courses on which they could feat on. I am unable to recommend any particular dish they are ALL worth trying, I can however recommend to take the unlimtted presecco option and make an afternoon of it. We will be back SOON
title: DON'T MISS THE SUNDAY BRUNCH

hotel: Sankara Nairobi, Autograph Collection by Marriott
review: Had a wonderful evening here recently while on a business trip to Nairobi. Excellent wine, good food and great service. Located in the uber cool Sankara hotel, my experience at Artisan was totally excellent.Will be back!
title: Artisan

hotel: Sankara Nairobi, Autograph Collection by Marriott
review: Hotel is very nice, staff very friendly. Room large and nice. The gym is well maintained and nice roof top bar. But the latter is also an issue, I spent a sleepless Friday night in a room on the third floor when the music was raving on the 7th and it lasted till 4 a.m. Really after a hard week's work in Mombasa, I wanted a night's rest before my connection, but it wasn't to be. I do not know if there are other quieter spot or rooms, but really there needs to be some soundproofing done if not.
title: Sleepless Friday night

hotel: Sankara Nairobi, Autograph Collection by Marriott
review: Nice place, good food, expensive but good. Great breakfast buffet. Staff are great during the day but the top floor staff are ok but not fantastic, they do what they have to do and nothing else, but they are polite. Place looks clean and nice.
title: Nice place

hotel: Sankara Nairobi, Autograph Collection by Marriott
review: I went to one of the restaurants on the top of the building, where me and my friends had some drinks, smoked shisha and also had dinner. I chose a mocktail and a vegetarian cheese platter. Everything was really nice, and I also enjoyed the view. There's also a swimming pool (and all the tables are around it) that makes the place look even better, and a live band was playing some very good music. A place that I would definitely recommend!
title: Drinks and shisha at the restaurant

hotel: Sankara Nairobi, Autograph Collection by Marriott
review: Services in the hotel are charged in Kenyan shillings, not US dollars. However, on checkout, your bill will be handed to you in US dollars.  Beware - it is 8% higher than the midmarket rate. This is absolutely disgusting. There's not a bank on earth that would dare to add 8%. Even your credit card will add at most 3%. (My credit card adds 0%.)  My room was fully prepaid, and I'm British, so nothing about my stay had anything to do with US dollars. But my bill of KSh. 3850 was presented to me as US$ 40.53. The midmarket rate at the time was US$ 37.51 - an 8.1% premium, hidden by default in my final bill.  If nothing on your bill is in dollars, insist on paying in Kenyan shillings, and tell them what to do with their 8%. If the room rate is in dollars, insist on two bills - pay
title: On checkout they will convert to dollars and add 8% in currency conversion fees

hotel: Sankara Nairobi, Autograph Collection by Marriott
review: This hotel situated very closer to the Nairobi CBD. And also right next to one of the most well known shopping malls in Nairobi.  closer to the hotel are various restaurants and eating places.  the breakfast is really fantastic, rooms are state of the art, clean and vibrant.  The roof top pool lounge is a perfect place to relax and enjoy your evenings.
title: Top Stay

hotel: Sankara Nairobi, Autograph Collection by Marriott
review: Hotel is comfortable and conveniently located near sarit centre and west gate mall . There are plenty of eating options available at a walking distance .  The west gate mall is the newer mall and has food court . There were many new restaurants which were in the process of opening
title: Good location in Nairobi for a short stop over

hotel: Sankara Nairobi, Autograph Collection by Marriott
review: I spent nearly three full weeks at the Sankara hotel for a business related trip. I was in Kenya a total of 6 weeks and the time spent at the Sankara Hotel this November 2015 was the best experience I have ever had at a hotel or resort outside of the United States.    The hotel is definitely a 5 star hotel and the entire staff goes out of their way, bends over backwards to do whatever they can to make you feel at home and welcome. This was without a doubt the best first time welcome to Kenya I had.  The rooms are very nice, beds extremely comfortable and the nightly turn down service and complimentary soap stone animals "The Sankara Seven" were a nice touch to the service.    This hotel was my home away from home during my 3 week stay in Nairobi and all of the staff were simply
title: 3 weeks at the Sankara was amazing

hotel: Sankara Nairobi, Autograph Collection by Marriott
title: Good Business Hotel

hotel: Sankara Nairobi, Autograph Collection by Marriott
review: Stayed at the Sankara for two nights. We kept complaining that the a/c unit in our room wasn't working properly. Despite friendly responses and well intentioned maintenance  guys, the problem hasn't been fixed.  Otherwise we had a good stay. Rooms are lovely and service is very friendly.
title: Leisure

hotel: Sankara Nairobi, Autograph Collection by Marriott
review: We stayed one night prior to a safari. We also returned to the hotel for a few hours after the safari before travelling to Zanzibar. The hotel kept our luggage and allowed us to rearrange our luggage before the next leg of our trip. We then stayed for a final night (new years eve)before travelling home.  Everything was good. Staff very helpful and rooms nice and clean. Rooftop bar was great and food really tasty, particularly the burger!   Recommended as a nice place to stay for a safari stopover.
title: Safari stopover

hotel: Sankara Nairobi, Autograph Collection by Marriott
review: I rarely write reviews for hotels i visit but my experience at sankara was superb. Racheal the guest relations officer was very welcoming.My overal five star service was climaxed when the IT guy Dennis (🏆Mr Solutions🏆) came to assist with the internet he went beyond fixing what i had requested for and noticed my phone had an issue. He taught me some tricks on my mac book . I work for a bank and we experience problems in connection in many hotels we visit but Dennis showed me how to solve that. Beyond all that service we found ourself discussing Dennis in one of our boardroom meetings with my department, his service has been felt by each team member that has visited sankara. Through his service beyond expectations we found a theme to guide us as we start our financial year.
title: TROPHY EMPLOYEE 🏆🏆🏆🏆🏆🏆

hotel: Sankara Nairobi, Autograph Collection by Marriott
title: Adorable place to visit

hotel: Sankara Nairobi, Autograph Collection by Marriott
review: My first time here. Went for tea and snacks at the lounge. The level of care and attention from the staff is breathtaking. Have not experienced that anywhere else. The ambience is superb. The tea and snacks were very well done. Very fresh and tantalizing. I really felt pampered and will definitely visit again!!
title: Karibu to Nairobi

hotel: Sankara Nairobi, Autograph Collection by Marriott
review: Very highly recommended!!! Friendly, helpful staff who are genuinely concerned with your well being. Beautiful food, rooms and art around the hotel. You truly made my week's stay away from home very enjoyable. Thank you!
title: Splendid experience

hotel: Sankara Nairobi, Autograph Collection by Marriott
review: The room was very excellent, my wife and I stayed in the superior room for in night. The service was good and got information pronto as soon as we inquired.   The chefs were also very helpful in explaining how their food is made and even giving awesome alternatives to the meals that we didn't prefer.   Rachel the guest relationship manager was also very friendly and promised a late checkout next time we visit.  Overall our experience and stay was very excellent.
title: Sankara Stay

hotel: Sankara Nairobi, Autograph Collection by Marriott
review: This was my 6th stay in this hotel in last 1 year. Comfortable and clean rooms, well equipped gym, fine roof top bar are few of the things worth mentioning. Excellent restatement with Indian vegetarian food in the menu and a well spread breakfast are the highlights ..
title: Excellent place with Indian menu

hotel: Sankara Nairobi, Autograph Collection by Marriott
review: We enjoyed a drink at the rooftop bar---great service and ambience. DJ music provided  good background. Lots of energy here! Though we didn't eat anything, there are plenty of choices on the menu. Just one stop on our "pub crawl" of Nairobi!
title: Great rooftop bar!

hotel: Sankara Nairobi, Autograph Collection by Marriott
review: This is my first evening here and so far everything has been wonderful. I want to write specifically about what a great job Julius did at the rooftop bar. He had great energy and it should be noted. Very nice hotel.
title: Julius was a wonderful waiter!

hotel: Sankara Nairobi, Autograph Collection by Marriott
review: We booked a full day conference a few weeks ago and were surprised at the deteriorating standards of this hotel. Sankara is a shadow of its former self. We had issues with sound and lighting throughout the day. The breakfast selection they served was below average, probably the worst we've had at a conference in the recent past, no baked beans, the scrambled eggs were runny and tasteless as was everything else in their buffet. The roast potatoes were literally crisps. Lunch was better, though not the best. I particularly liked the dessert. The juices and sodas had a very weird unpleasant taste. Service was slow too. And there were some visibly dusty areas all round the hotel. I highly doubt our company will be doing any meetings here in the near future.
title: Disappointing conferencing facilities

hotel: Sankara Nairobi, Autograph Collection by Marriott
review: Stayed here for four nights for work. The room was spacious and modern and had all the amenities you could need. Everything worked perfectly. The hotel is also clean, fresh and modern. Breakfast buffet was good, nothing out of the ordinary but also nothing to complain about. The best of all was the staff. Usually only notice the service unless something is wrong but here the service was impeccable. Any request to their central service centre (room service, housekeeping) was handled immediately. Staff were friendly and just the right amount of attentive. Would definitely recommend this place especially for business travellers. Those with families may prefer somewhere with more gardens and outdoor space. There was also some music coming from somewhere nearby, but nothing too loud.
title: Faultless

hotel: Sankara Nairobi, Autograph Collection by Marriott
review: I went there yesterday for lunch and had a grilled rib eye. Probably one of the best I've ever had. Cooked to almost perfection, with an amazing smoked grilled flavor. I'd definitely recommend this restaurant if you're looking for grilled meat.
title: A delightful lunch

hotel: Sankara Nairobi, Autograph Collection by Marriott
review: Hotel is centrally located in Nairobi close to Westland shopping centre- it is secure with very good security which is reassuring. Room rates are high but the service is of very high standard and the rooms are large and well equipped and comfortable. Wifi  is free and reasonably reliable. There is a pool are on the top floor and seating area which is very relaxing,  and there are good gym facilities. The breakfast buffet is good with a wide choice. The Sunday buffet is excellent and good value especially if you like Prosecco. However evening meals were disappointing given the price, though maybe our choice wasn't good.
title: excellent, comfortable but expensive

hotel: Sankara Nairobi, Autograph Collection by Marriott
review: Hotel has fantastic decor and has highly professional staff.   The ideal "be seen" venue that is a costly retreat in the middle of the city madness.  The pool area is quite a site, overlooking most of the city.   Place is worth a visit.
title: Great Pricey Ambiance

hotel: Sankara Nairobi, Autograph Collection by Marriott
review: my stay at this hotel was very pleasant was there just for 2 nights but worth it , good and comfortable rooms , the terrace bar was a pleasant surprise , more than expected , most of the staff was helpful except a couple of wrong guys around , minimum hassles during arrival in terms of security issues , value for money ..would visit again
title: lovely place to stay ..lacks food choices

hotel: Sankara Nairobi, Autograph Collection by Marriott
review: I spent 5 nights in this Hotel and it was a wonderful experience.  Service was really nice and the Executive lounge on the 7th floor was awesome. The pool and the well equipped Gym also on the 7th floor was very useful.
title: My stay at the Sankara Nairobi

hotel: Sankara Nairobi, Autograph Collection by Marriott
review: Hotel is extremely well presented from the minute I walked in. Staff were very friendly, rooms were tidy and spacious. Room service was quick and easy. One of the days I turned up late for breakfast (my own faults) but it wasn't an issue the staff made sure I had everything I needed. Rooftop bar was a nice touch, the sunset view was pretty amazing! Gym was easy access with good equipment and clean.  Everything about the hotel was excellent Food, room, staff  I will definitely be staying in the Sankara again!
title: Excellent stay and service

hotel: Sankara Nairobi, Autograph Collection by Marriott
review: Great food, great staff . I always hear that Kenyan people are friendly got to experience that firsthand. First time in Africa and the experience was magical. Dennis the computer guy service was exceptional , taught me some Swahili  and told me I was a natural :-) Asanti Dennis.He also assisted to purchase a selfie stick for my visit to the national park. Sankara is a true beauty keep t up guys
title: African Paradise

hotel: Sankara Nairobi, Autograph Collection by Marriott
review: Wooow  great to  here tonight.i am loving everything about sankara.There comes another updated hotel.Quite modern.Exactly what everyone is looking for.classy and relaxed enviroment .I feel like meditating here.Am proud of it.Its quite warmly.staff here ?woow Amazing.
title: AMAZING EXPRIENCE HERE!!!

hotel: Sankara Nairobi, Autograph Collection by Marriott
review: Visited rooftop bar as a couple. Nice for sundowner after which you can relocate to your place of choice. Not much ambience and floor seems to be aging. Service is OK. You pay for parking.  Atmosphere is relaxed with fresh air at the roof top. Average prices for its class.
title: Roof top bar good for sundowner

hotel: Sankara Nairobi, Autograph Collection by Marriott
review: We had gone for some drinks the pool bar. Firstly, no one bothered to come and ask us if we would like a table or whether we were looking. We had to ask for a menu. Got a few rounds of drinks. Every other customer was given a plate of nuts, except for our table. We were clearly the only Asians around. When my husband asked, the waiter just walked off without saying anything, came back a few minutes later and slammed a tray of nuts.
title: Skin colour seems to make a difference at the pool bar!

hotel: Sankara Nairobi, Autograph Collection by Marriott
review: Room was excellent. Super comfortable bed. Aircon system easy to operate. Check in very easy. Customer service excellent. Great shower. Water is very, very soft due to treatment so hard to wash out shampoo!! But great shower. Gym is easy and ample, quality equipment & also nice clean space. Very good food. Great location. Felt safe.
title: Gentle landing into Nairobi

hotel: Sankara Nairobi, Autograph Collection by Marriott
review: Great place to stay in Nairobi ! Service food fitness all is great ! The rooms are spacious and well equipped the hotel is in excellent condition well maintained and located in one of the best business location in town highly recommended  I will certainly go back there
title: Excellent !

hotel: Sankara Nairobi, Autograph Collection by Marriott
review: The Sankara is a superb hotel and the fact that it is in the middle of Nairobi makes it that little bit more special.     Our room was incredibly well equipped.   I spent a lot of time in the room completing work and the amenities on offer show that the interior designer knew what they were doing.   Next to the desk, on desk-top level is an array of electrical sockets.   I counted four different sockets which meant I didn't need to search for a universal adaptor AND I could plug in multiple devices!   The air-conditioning is very effective, there was a fridge in the room, loads of free water and fresh fruit that was replaced daily.    The television picture was clear and there were loads of relevant and good channels to choose from.   Those that travel a lot in Africa know this
title: Fabulous hotel topped off with incredible art

hotel: Sankara Nairobi, Autograph Collection by Marriott
title: Ok food, great drinks, slow service

hotel: Sankara Nairobi, Autograph Collection by Marriott
review: Go somewhere else if you want a posh hotel in a cured neighbourhood. This is a excellent business hotel in the middle of real life: good but not perfect part of the city, with real people around it. Super nice and helpful staff, with concierge and doorman working in excellent cooperation to provide one with what they need to have a good stay (ever forgotten your medication at home, anyone..?). Good quiet rooms. Good quiet areas here and there. Good bar on the roof. Good limo service to attend meetings, with drivers driving safely. Relatively good restaurant: food is good, but choice is limited. Maybe the one thing to improve to go from "very good" to "excellent"...
title: Not flashy, but very good

hotel: Sankara Nairobi, Autograph Collection by Marriott
review: I really loved this hotel---it is comfortable, clean, modern, quiet and extremely conveniently located in the center of Nairobi right opposite a major mall. I appreciated the attention to detail--for example, multi-system outlets are installed in the room so no worry if you forgot your voltage adapter.  Also, during turn down each night, the housekeeping staff put a different soapstone animal carving on the nightstand as a souvenir.  Fresh fruit is provided in the room each day as a healthy snack.  I would especially recommend paying a little more for the Club Room---it includes free drinks, happy hour, and private breakfast daily in the Club Room, free access to printer/scanner etc, and free use of conference facilities, including refreshments, for scheduled meetings.
title: Friendly staff make the experience incredible

hotel: Sankara Nairobi, Autograph Collection by Marriott
title: Business visitors

hotel: Sankara Nairobi, Autograph Collection by Marriott
review: Although the rooms are beautifully and luxuriantly furnished in a five star hotel was disappointed in service follow up and ambiance.  One did not get a welcoming feeling in this modern environment and so would prefer to stay in older homely feel hotels in Nairobi.   I still gave the hotel a 4 due to its luxurious environment but don't highly recommend.
title: Top Class Service

hotel: Sankara Nairobi, Autograph Collection by Marriott
review: On my trips to Kenya i usually stay in Serena but a friend recommended Sankara. The Hotel offers the five star experience,staff are welcoming. I was offered early checking which im usually charged in other hotels. What will keep me coming back is the quick response and top notch service offered by Dennis when i was unable to connect  to the internet. héroes no haga vestir tapas  nunca más.
title: Roof top bar... Very cool place for hangouts.

hotel: Sankara Nairobi, Autograph Collection by Marriott
review: The ambience, Music and overall Service at Sarabi is Superb!  Nairobi Sankara is Definitely the hangout spot over the weekend. The cocktails and Tapas menu are to die for and I definitely recommend you to try them out. It's a great Venue for birthday parties and office parties too.
title: ROOFTOP BAR best for evening drinks

hotel: Sankara Nairobi, Autograph Collection by Marriott
review: It was truly a 5-star experience. The ameneties, food, staff and service were excellent! Woke up each morning to the sun rising over Westlands and ended each day watching the sunset from the rooftop bar. I spent two weeks at the hotel and was able to take care of business in comfort. The best part is I've built up my collection of The Sankara Seven!
title: Sankara Superb!

hotel: Sankara Nairobi, Autograph Collection by Marriott
review: Staff is very friendly and helpful. Roof top bar and swimming pool presents a great view of the Westlands. Nigerian actor Mike Ezuruonye was here too! My stay in the Superior King room was worth it. Free WiFi and Airport transfers were a good experience too.
title: Great service all round

hotel: Sankara Nairobi, Autograph Collection by Marriott
review: Excellent place with a good restaurant and even better service. Food quality was good and quite healthy to eat. They took good care of my daughter and kept her busy and entertained. My only issue was charging for parking. An establishment which is a 5 star this is definitely not required. Rest all is fine and I will definitely visit this property again.
title: The Artisan - Sankara

hotel: Sankara Nairobi, Autograph Collection by Marriott
review: I love being at sankara, on my own, with my friends or with my family. It's always a great time! Especially when the weekend start and they have this amazing dj on Friday which has been the reason for me dancing shamelessly at this place &  then this fabulous live band on Saturday, perfect for a chilled down start of the evening. I consider this place my second home and highly recommend it if you're visiting nairobi.
title: Best hang out spot for the weekend.

hotel: Sankara Nairobi, Autograph Collection by Marriott
review: Vacation in Nairobi is nice, all people are smiling all the time. weather is good. Best hotel in Nairobi. Roof on the top is perfect there is a gentleman called Julius is the perfect and nice man also all the staff and service, shesha, food with cold beer are good 👍👍
title: Amazing sankara hotel

hotel: Sankara Nairobi, Autograph Collection by Marriott
review: Whilst staying at Fenesi Serviced Apartments, I visited Sankara not far to walk. Beautiful, lovely place. Very well organised Hotel and classy!  I enjoyed sitting in the bar listening to the easy music and a drink. Next time I will spend a night or two.
title: VERY VERY NICE

hotel: Sankara Nairobi, Autograph Collection by Marriott
review: Visited the hotel due to doctors appointment, therefore had an 11 nights stay.  One of the best hotels ever.  To begin with the rooms are very comfortable and well cleaned. Room service is brilliant and very friendly.  Breakfast was rich and very satisfying.  The rooftop has a unique atmosphere especially on event nights, and I enjoyed every night with a few drinks and some shisha as well as good music.  The steakhouse on the first floor had one of the best and tasty steak I have had in my life.  The gym is not massive but it's well organised and always with instructors.  Internet was fast and coverage was good.  Overall had an amazing time would be staying again anytime I am in Nairobi.  Highly Recommended
title: Amazing hotel in Nairobi

hotel: Sankara Nairobi, Autograph Collection by Marriott
review: The setup was awesome. Great job Geoffrey and the team you guys are quality.My friends are amazed by your first class service. The live band, ambience every thing is on top of the game. Would love to come back more often.
title: Birthday party at rooftop bar

hotel: Sankara Nairobi, Autograph Collection by Marriott
review: Superb All round Hospitality and services to the guests.. Will definitely go back again!!! Special thanks to the Guest Relation Officers.. Good Location, restaurants are fantastic, Spa gives a good experience, a home away from home, keep up the good work, Thank You😀
title: Excellent Hospitality

hotel: Sankara Nairobi, Autograph Collection by Marriott
review: Loved this hotel!  It has a fairly small reception area, but it is peaceful enough to sit and wait.  Checking-in was simple and easy.  I felt very secure here:  it is gated, and with security on entry.  My room on the 3rd floor had nice enough views of Westlands area, and was very comfortable.  The bathroom was very clean and had Aromatherapy Associates amenities, which were lovely.  Breakfast was a simple hotel buffet, but with a choice of inside or balcony seating, and decent coffee!  Seriously, in a region famed worldwide for its incredible coffee, it astounded me how many hotels produce gruesome coffee at breakfast!  I had dinner on the rooftop bar a couple of times, which were both good.  Wifi was steady and reliable.  As a business hotel, I really couldn't find a fault,
title: Six nights in April

hotel: Sankara Nairobi, Autograph Collection by Marriott
title: Comfortable family stay

hotel: Sankara Nairobi, Autograph Collection by Marriott
review: We visited Nairobi for a couple of days in early April and choose to stay at the Sankara. It is a centrally located hotel with easy access to malls and lots of eating out places. The hotel itself is beautiful with all the services that one expects from a hotel of this standard. The service was excellent throughout. The breakfast spread was extensive and tasty. The only gripe i have was that the bed linen had holes in it but that too was taken care of by the hotel management. If you want a safe haven in the center of Nairobi then Sankara is the place to be.
title: Date nite... well worth it

hotel: Sankara Nairobi, Autograph Collection by Marriott
review: We chose GRAZE the steak house on the first floor for our date nite.we were well greeted by the Matire de George. Extremly proffesional and quickly gave us our choice in seating areas. The restaurant notably has a small smoking deck...convinient, appriciated and rare in Nairobi.  The ambiance is warm, rich and exurbes a sense confidence in what they serve. The staff and service definately compliment that. Though primarily a steak house, the menu is diverse and has decent choices. They pride their source of meats ... And George tone evokes confidence in his recomendations.  Warm bread & butter... large selection of drinks.. I ordered the TBONE steak with hand cut fries on the side... My wife had the grilled Chicken with spinach side.  Served on Hot skillets, they get an A for
title: Sankara Rooftop Bar.....The place to be !

hotel: Sankara Nairobi, Autograph Collection by Marriott
title: Very comfortable stay

hotel: Sankara Nairobi, Autograph Collection by Marriott
review: Wonderful personalised service! I was recieved by the staff at the door on arrival and was escorted to my room. The staff remembered my name and paid attention to everything I had to say. Really enjoyed my stay!
title: Wonderful service!

hotel: Sankara Nairobi, Autograph Collection by Marriott
review: The ambience is impeccable. The food is amazing and the servic is to die for. Very friendly staff. The champagne bar caters to all with affluent variety of whiskey, wine and cocktails. This is the place to be anytime of the week.love it always
title: Best place to be in Nairobi

hotel: Sankara Nairobi, Autograph Collection by Marriott
review: i wanted to do something special for my wife just for one weekend since holidays are few and far between. i heard about this new 5 star hotel in westlands with a swimming pool that floats in the sky...i wasn't dissapointed..the swimming pool is on the top floor. it was fun for the whole family
title: Swimming in the sky

hotel: Sankara Nairobi, Autograph Collection by Marriott
review: This was my 3rd stay at this hotel and by far the worst. I had to change my room on the first day as the Wi-Fi was non existent. The new room was not much better and as i was there on business this was a big problem. When I needed to make a whatsapp or Skype call I had to go to the 1st or ground floor.  Also the food at the breakfast buffet was very poor. The bacon was beyond crispy and virtually burnt. The chef had no idea how to cook eggs. I tried describing sunny side up eggs and that I didn't want the underside burnt but they had no idea. I changed to poached eggs cooked soft but again no idea. The toaster would not be good enough for home use but I found it amazing to find a basic 2 slice toaster being used in a 5 star hotel restaurant. There was building work going on from
title: Not worth the money

hotel: Sankara Nairobi, Autograph Collection by Marriott
title: The perfect weekend spot...

hotel: Sankara Nairobi, Autograph Collection by Marriott
review: First and Last time I will stay at this property. Mix up at pick up.  Took almost two hours to get to the hotel. Musty  room, uncomfortable bed. Poor food quality, stains on the carpet. Not vey well kept at !
title: Worst Experience Ever!

hotel: Sankara Nairobi, Autograph Collection by Marriott
review: First time visitor. The hotel is in an extremely difficult part of town.  2 1/2 hours from airport to hotel. Yes, it is true.  Everything you've heard about Nairobi traffic is true and then some. Check in easy, but registration requests all ignored. Lower floors reverberate with bass from restaurant.  So if you stay here, absolutely request a higher floor. Room service a mess.  Got a simple order wrong twice. Lovely decor. But this hotel needs a huge improvement of its human capital's professionalism.
title: Beautiful on the outside...a mess inside

hotel: Sankara Nairobi, Autograph Collection by Marriott
review: Excellent everything at Sarabi on the roof top Service was phenomenal.  Julius ,who came to me many times to check up on everything made it easy to get what i wanted. Love this place,  Their Sarabi sandwich and Tandoori chicken wrap, Can't get enough of them. I'm definitely coming back for that recommended steak by Julius.
title: Service and ambiance

hotel: Sankara Nairobi, Autograph Collection by Marriott
review: Sankara Nairobi is my comfort zone whenever I visit Nairobi. I consider it my second home, home away from home. I stayed in Sankara each time I visited Nairobi starting from 2012 to date. Sankara will remain home whether for business related or family trip. The ambience and services are superb. Keep up the excellent work.
title: My Favouraite Hotel

hotel: Sankara Nairobi, Autograph Collection by Marriott
review: I really enjoy staying here because they just get it right.  The rooms are quiet and logically arranged to work and relax.  The restaurants and bars are pricey but worth it.  The gym is great!  What really makes this place my favorite in Nairobi is the staff and their attention to detail and customer satisfaction   Lots of places are glitzy but this place is excellent.   It's Westlands location is a huge plus as well.
title: My Favorite Business Hotel in Nairobi

hotel: Sankara Nairobi, Autograph Collection by Marriott
review: A fantastic place i always love visiting especially the roof top bar.my recent visit couple of weeks ago was refreshing.fantastic food,wine and service especially from a Mr David Gitei was exceptional.keep up the good work
title: Excellent service

hotel: Sankara Nairobi, Autograph Collection by Marriott
review: I have stayed twice at the Sankara: in 2015 and 2016. Wonderful hotel, nice rooms and bathrooms and very nice breakfast. Very central location as well, and friendly staff. The hotel has the motto of the "Sankara Seven" and they place little soap stone animals representing the seven wild animals, every day in the room, which is a very nice detail. I definitely would return again.
title: Very nice hotel

hotel: Sankara Nairobi, Autograph Collection by Marriott
review: The Sankara always has great service, and comfortable rooms. Ask for the pillow menu to make it even better! The roof top bar is good for relaxing or even working during the day. The restaurant and room service are fine, but there are a number of good restaurants and bars close by.
title: Good service and comfort

hotel: Sankara Nairobi, Autograph Collection by Marriott
review: I was there last week friday with some friends and i would want to commend and appreaciate your service and specifically our steward David Gichuru for the warm welcome and stellar service. certainly i will recommend this to my friends
title: immaculate service - roof top bar

hotel: Sankara Nairobi, Autograph Collection by Marriott
review: It is the third time I stay at Sankara. And it is getting even better. It is com on that the service gets relaxed after some time but in Sankara, it is still excellent. And you even get animals' miniatures made of sandstone. Highly recommend
title: Getting even better

hotel: Sankara Nairobi, Autograph Collection by Marriott
review: I was refered there by a friend and truly it was the best choice for a weekend hangout, we felt safe and the service was amazing, my waiter was polite and very knowledgeable, the music and general atmosphere was incredible.,. We shall be back .
title: Rooftop bar .... must visit  when in Nairobi

hotel: Sankara Nairobi, Autograph Collection by Marriott
review: The best place to be,having visited so many places and exotic ones,I consider Sankara one of the best places to be in Nairobi!check out the (Unlimited Live band)on Saturday n dance your soul out!i just love this place!any day any time.its a blast!
title: Sarabi bar @7th floor

hotel: Sankara Nairobi, Autograph Collection by Marriott
review: Positive:   Restaurants conveniently situated nearby. Java house, Brew Bistro and the shopping mall are just a few hundred meters away.    Swanky interior and finishing. Despite the shacks and unwelcoming neighborhood, the interior of the hotel is modern and plush.   But:   Bam-wham in the middle of a 'slum' - hotel overlooks a dingy part of town one end and the other end faces a busy street.   Busy part of town. Took close to 3 hours to drive from Jommo Kenyatta airport to the hotel.    Not sure what the selling point is for the window partition between the bathroom and bedroom.  Air conditioner could do with a remote control.  One has to get out of bed to make any adjustments.   There was no turnover of beds.
title: Poor location ....great rooftop bar

hotel: Sankara Nairobi, Autograph Collection by Marriott
review: I have stayed here a number of times and returned at the end of May for seven nights. Great room once again and as always the staff make this place with their welcome friendliness and professional service. This stay however seemed a little better. Dining options seemed a step up, and the staff also seemed even more motivated and showing a new pride in what they did. Really enjoyed my stay so thanks to everyone including Lillian from Housekeeping who remembered me and my linen and towel requirements!!  Thanks to everyone.
title: Now even Better

hotel: Sankara Nairobi, Autograph Collection by Marriott
review: Sankara is a lovely place, i loved the food, the service, the rooms are well serviced, and now what I loved the most is the pool, it is small but really cute, with a translucent glass  at the bottom; The is also great!
title: Nice pool bar

hotel: Sankara Nairobi, Autograph Collection by Marriott
review: From security point of view , to impeccable service we really enjoyed. My server Daniel was all there for us...keep up. Though the floor is aging the ambience is still on top. Good music complimented our night and we keep on asking more. Geoffrey accommodated most of our unusual request especially  one local music which was played twice. Great night....👍
title: Rooftop bar.....We shall be back!!

hotel: Sankara Nairobi, Autograph Collection by Marriott
review: This hotel stands out for its cleanliness, friendly staff, good food and live music. If you arrive by car, a secured parking area is next to the hotel. On the seventh floor is a nice bar, with tiny pool to wind down after a busy day. The rooms are large and clean and the beds sleep well. Today the hotel is actually replacing matrasses, so the beds can be expected to sleep even better as of now. On the seventh floor is also an executive club with limited access, and can be used for a more secluded breakfast or lunch or (business) meeting. The gym is well equiped and an instructor is on standby. For full relaxation, a spa is located on the seventh floor as well. The first floor houses the restaurant. Breakfast, lunch and dinner are provided here, and can be recommended. If you go
title: Sankara hotel, oases of rest in busy Nairobi

hotel: Sankara Nairobi, Autograph Collection by Marriott
title: Great business hotel in Nairobi

hotel: Sankara Nairobi, Autograph Collection by Marriott
review: Last minute business trip to Nairobi and was recommended this lovely hotel by a colleague. Staff were very friendly and bent over backwards to help and offer recommendations.  Hotel facilitated pick up and drop off for airport with possibility of either official Taxi or Limo which you can have charged to your room. Really useful as no cash machines were working in airport on arrival.  Great pool area on the roof with a fairly decent menu selection, otherwise nice place to hang out and grab a cool drink after work.  Will definitely stay here again if I get the chance to return.
title: Visit IFTEX2016

hotel: Sankara Nairobi, Autograph Collection by Marriott
review: I stayed in the Sankara for 3 days. Nice hotel, security at front, clean convenience room. Breakfast is very good and divers. At the 7th floor there's a pool bar, great for lunch and cosy at night. We had diner with a group of 20 colleques, buffet, live music. Very good food and friendly staff. Check-out process was smooth. I would certainly stay here again.
title: Solid hotel. Highly priced

hotel: Sankara Nairobi, Autograph Collection by Marriott
review: A very good hotel and you do get what you pay for. Upmarket, lovely restaurant and extra pool bar/restaurant on the roof. Breakfast really good, and a good venue for a business function. Rooms clean and modern, everything works and good attentive staff.
title: Business and Event

hotel: Sankara Nairobi, Autograph Collection by Marriott
review: Its a nice break away from the chains. Very friendly and attantive staff in a save neighbourhood. Some nice restaurants and bars within 5min walking distance. Don't expect lush gardens and cosy pool area. It mostly caters to biz travellers. But they do it nicely. Would always come back.
title: Nice hotel with very good standard

hotel: Sankara Nairobi, Autograph Collection by Marriott
review: This is a great hotel that puts many of its European or American counterparts to shame.  Modern, trendy and comfortable, it has a variety of different bars and restaurants within.   The stuff are extremely polite and attentive, they really are a pleasure to deal with and nothing is ever too much trouble.  The rooftop bar is a great place to relax but take a jumper or jacket in the evenings as it gets a bit chilly. There are a small group of 'working girls' who attend but they are clearly under instructions not to badger the guests and will leave you alone unless you approach them.  Overall I can't fault this place. It's one of those hotels where you'd check in for a weekend and happily never leave the place.
title: Excellent Kenyan hospitality

hotel: Sankara Nairobi, Autograph Collection by Marriott
review: Sankara met all my expectations and more. In all honesty I appreciated more than anything the great service from the friendly thoughtful staff and this was consistent across all staff. I was there on business and it catered for that. WiFi was good at the rooms and room setup allowed for work to be done. The 7th floor brings the fun and vibrancy of Nairobi right to your doorstep.
title: Service excellence

hotel: Sankara Nairobi, Autograph Collection by Marriott
review: Very good hotel with modern aminities. Nice,  secure, neat and clean hotel. Breakfast spread was also lavish. Unfortunately our room was so pathetic. It was at backside, lower floor, facing car park of other blg, As if our room was located  in car park.
title: Nice,  secure,  clean hotel but...

hotel: Sankara Nairobi, Autograph Collection by Marriott
review: Have stayed in most of the top Nairobi hotels and the Sankara consistently delivers. Good rooms. Great service. Superb location. 7th floor pool deck and bar is a great escape with an eclectic mix of local and foreign patrons.
title: Best for business in Nairobi

hotel: Sankara Nairobi, Autograph Collection by Marriott
review: From the initial, late arrival, it was obvious that we were in the care of the hotel staff and they went to all lengths to ensure a high quality experience at the Sankara. Food and wine in the restaurants was very good, as were the breakfasts and service for visiting clients. Rooms were above average size, spotless and nicely decorated with high quality fittings. A very relaxing and enjoyable stay.
title: High quality, secure hotel with excellent service and facilities.

hotel: Sankara Nairobi, Autograph Collection by Marriott
review: We didn't stay at this hotel; however, we went there for dinner and had the buffet. The service was amazing and the food was some of the best food we had ever tasted. I would highly recommend the buffet. It's about 35 USD (drinks not included) but worth every penny. I will definitely return.
title: The Dinner Buffet is Excellent

hotel: Sankara Nairobi, Autograph Collection by Marriott
review: Brought my family for safari and stayed in Nairobi for 3 nights.    Hotel was very nice and secure.  Bar on 7th floor was lots of fun and the executive lounge was worth the extra money.   Julius from the 7th floor made all of us feel welcome and comfortable even tho we were so far from home!
title: 5 star hotel in Nairobi.  Great facilities and service!

hotel: Sankara Nairobi, Autograph Collection by Marriott
review: I was here with my wife for lunch. Sankara's location is conveniently out of the CBD but very near and easily accessible. The staff are very relational and ready to assist. We had a buffet lunch and the chef was there to personally explain each serving, what it contains and what combinations go best. We particularly enjoyed the seafood on offer and the dried tomatoes :-) The flip side was not so rosy. The signage to the entrance is poorly done and one can miss the entrance and drive on to the exit. Then I was disappointed to realize that parking is paid for separately even for customers. That was a let-down, but overall the service was great!
title: Personalized service, yummy seafood, poor signage!

hotel: Sankara Nairobi, Autograph Collection by Marriott
review: Everybody is warm at this hotel services with a smile is real here everything is beautiful from the food to the amenities I looooove the gym  love working out here...breakfast is my favourite meal time ample parking space and very organised.all time favourite hotel.
title: Me time

hotel: Sankara Nairobi, Autograph Collection by Marriott
review: If your in town the Sunday brunch is a must. It's set up buffet style with many selections and offer endless champagne. The food was good and they have something for everyone. They also have a live band playing. What really makes this place special, is the hotel itself often houses the celebrities and entertainers that come to town, so you never know who you might run into.
title: Great food amazing atmosphere

hotel: Sankara Nairobi, Autograph Collection by Marriott
review: Stayed for 2nights at the beginning of our 21 day trip.  Comfortable beds, great shower. Good food, also liked the area it is in, closer to the BAPS temple and Diamond plaza , both places we wanted to visit while in Nairobi.
title: Great hotel , good location.

hotel: Sankara Nairobi, Autograph Collection by Marriott
review: This is the  place you wouldn't want to miss on a friday!!the staff is just so welcoming and have excellent services...I remember misplacing my phone and it was Brought to me by the manager and his team ...couldn't be more amazed!!lovely place
title: Ladies night

hotel: Sankara Nairobi, Autograph Collection by Marriott
review: The rooftop bar is great, but the restaurants need a bit of atmosphere/communal area.   Rooms are great. Everything you could want. Really good showers; comfortable beds; and one of the best burgers I've ever eaten.
title: A great spot for a couple of nights in Nairobi

hotel: Sankara Nairobi, Autograph Collection by Marriott
review: Excellent staff, tranquil and breathtaking views of the sunset on Nairobi skyscrapers, the rooftop bar is a great place to be over the weekend, they have a lovely DJ and the food was delicious try their grilled salmon on hand cut fries and a side salad.. we felt secure here and definitely will be back. Geoffrey and his team made our evening great despite the huge crowd that turned out for the weekend out.....i  know where to hold my upcoming birthday party, the rooftop bar!
title: A Hidden jewel in Nairobi.

hotel: Sankara Nairobi, Autograph Collection by Marriott
review: Stayed here twice in the space of 2 weeks in August. Overall, I liked the hotel for the great location close to lots of good restaurants and the Sarit Centre shopping mall. Good security. Mostly friendly staff at entrance, check-in, in the restaurants, at the fitness center, and with house-keeping -- especially Ester who was my night-time turn down housekeeper. Decent main restaurant (Artisan), Swimming Pool and Fitness Center. I liked my room on the 1st stay -- well appointed, nice view and quite private room at the end of the corridor. It was marred by an air-conditioning outage for several hours one of the nights which made for a less than restful night -- they didn't bother asking me at checkout if everything was satisfactory during the stay and never offered any apology or
title: Centrally located, luxury class hotel -- some glitches

hotel: Sankara Nairobi, Autograph Collection by Marriott
title: Sarabi

hotel: Sankara Nairobi, Autograph Collection by Marriott
review: Great service and very welcoming  staff our waiter Julius  was amazing. Made us very comfortable. Had a great  time and like the rooms. Very safe and like the fact that their room keys don't have room numbers on them .
title: Terrible service

hotel: Sankara Nairobi, Autograph Collection by Marriott
review: I keep bringing people here and I don't know why. Possibly the worst service I've had in Nairobi. Never have the wines listed on the menu, attentiveness is non-existent, mixed drinks are no good and food is terrible. No free WiFi to top it off. Honestly if it was not for the location I'd never ever come here again. Even staying as a guest in the hotel I found it severely lacking. Room of mildew and was not well cleaned. Just very subpar. Consistently dissatisfied.
title: Good location, Modern hotel

hotel: Sankara Nairobi, Autograph Collection by Marriott
review: Room: Brilliant/Clean...just really nice and comfortable.  Staff: Friendly/Polite/Accommodating  Food: A huge variety and just splendidly tasty... from Breakfast to coffees/cocktails to Dinner in the evening- Amazing  Overall I cannot recommend this hotel enough....   SPA- probably one of the best treatments i have had.
title: Amazing

hotel: Sankara Nairobi, Autograph Collection by Marriott
review: Team Sankara i don't waste time doing Hotel Reviews - So you MUST be very special. Honestly how on earth can you DARE block the pool at the roof top? Whoever advised you on this one is totally misleading (Go back to the drawing board).We love Sankara because of changed and improved services at the Artisan Restaurant on Sundays and swimming over the weekends. I couldn't believe it when i heard from a friend that you are currently blocking the pool and advising clients to seek alternative elsewhere - please give us a break. We like it at Sankara Not   "elsewhere" Sankara management please put your house in order otherwise you will lose our business I'm giving you excellent because of Jesse's coffee and Artisan's improvements in all aspects
title: Clear the Mess at the Pool

hotel: Sankara Nairobi, Autograph Collection by Marriott
review: This was my second time visiting this hotel, first time was a mere 3 weeks after it opened in 2010...   The amenities and the service in this hotel is excellent. My favorite is obviously their spa, so professional, beautiful and inviting.   I love the rooftop bar, great place to unwind after a long day. The Steak restaurant on the 1st floor is a must, the food is of the highest quality and tastes amazing. I still think about my tuna tartare starter and I wish I could get back sooner...   This is my hotel of choice in Nairobi and I have stayed in many others in the city.!
title: I love Sankara

hotel: Sankara Nairobi, Autograph Collection by Marriott
review: Bedrooms are really nice and comfortable with access to Sky Sports which is great.  Roof top bar has a great view and nice place to relax with good food menu as well.  Breakfast is really nice and healthy.  You got nice clubs and local shops near the market.  Highly recommended hotel
title: Nice place

hotel: Sankara Nairobi, Autograph Collection by Marriott
review: I stayed at the Sankara for 3 nights on business and it was a really great experience. Facilities -the rooms are spacious and well equipped the television has a wide range of channels. Service -is exceptional all staff that I cam across were genuinely friendly and helpful yet not intrusive. The front desk and concierge are truly customer service oriented understanding needs and proposing alternative.  Extra touch- on Wednesday evening we the guests were invited to a cocktail function with the GM and his team, they do this knowing business travelers can find it lonely and it's nice to network at the hotel with both the management and other guests. This was very sweet and sealed the deal for me to return to Sankara on my next visit.
title: 5 stars for attention to detail

hotel: Sankara Nairobi, Autograph Collection by Marriott
review: I have stayed at the Sankara several times now and it continues to impress me. On the 1sy floor it has a patisserie with the best coffee and tea I have found yet in Nairobi. Service is particularly good at this hotel and it is in a great location in Westlands for business meetings.
title: Best coffee in Nairobi

hotel: Sankara Nairobi, Autograph Collection by Marriott
review: Excellent amenities. The hotel is located in a serene environment with a good view of its environs. I was delighted by the warmness of the staff and honestly the hotel has kept the standard I know it with. I happily recommend this.
title: Excellent. I love the bathroom. So spacious.

hotel: Sankara Nairobi, Autograph Collection by Marriott
review: From the security checkpoint to the check in counters my first impression was that they could improve on welcoming guests. The room was badly decorated and was not cleaned to the high standard I'd expect in a hotel. The bar on the seventh floor however is a nice surprise loved the entertainment. The food overall was nothing to write home about.
title: Underwhelmed

hotel: Sankara Nairobi, Autograph Collection by Marriott
review: Just enjoyed an awesome spiced aubergine, pomegranate and yoghurt salad with seared peppered salmon at the rooftop bar and supper room.... Yum!!! Great light meal after a long flight. My waiter Julius was adorable, took feedback on my martini, and bang!!, came back just as I prefer for the second, and always service with a smile and a chat for a solo traveller :) All round great meal and service for a high end hotel when I often find them quite bland.... I'll be back!!! 😊
title: Great food, drinks and service

hotel: Sankara Nairobi, Autograph Collection by Marriott
review: This place works for me because of its proximity. Funny enough I think it has great value for money. Security checks can be annoying. Parking at the basement helps. They have a good system for repeat clients where by they would not need all your details at check in again.Breakfast was good. Very comfortable bed. Would not want to get up and I am the kind of person who is up at 6. They were very accommodating when we went during Ramadhan and got served hot breakfast at 4am in our rooms.
title: Location Location

hotel: Sankara Nairobi, Autograph Collection by Marriott
review: You can't go wrong with the Sankara whether you are in Nairobi for business or holiday.  The facilities are terrific, but the people are really what makes the Sankara Hotel truly special.  The staff are all top flight and wonderful throughout the hotel.  Do ask for a club level room. Their facility is especially great for business travelers. Sharon, Peris, Naomi, Brenda, Evelyn are all so wonderful, and Chef Joseph makes a terrific eggs florenitne/benedict and an interesting array of appetizers in the evening.  The gym is well equipped and the staff are super helpful/engouraging, and the spa is a fabulous treat as well.  Well done!
title: Fantastic hotel for business or holiday

hotel: Sankara Nairobi, Autograph Collection by Marriott
review: Have been staying here on multiple occasions and it is a great hotel if you jot down all the plusses. Firstly the location is better than lets say the tribe hotel or Hemingway. The food is good at all the outlets. The rooftop bar is great and buzzing in the evening.  Also one of the few places you get decent quality shisha! Rooms are decent sized, much nicer than the kempinski and you don't have to hear main road traffic. Staff is efficient and professional. Extremely friendly place. Wound recommend anyday.
title: Great hotel well located

hotel: Sankara Nairobi, Autograph Collection by Marriott
review: Located in a central place,  the rooftop bar is a must visit especially on Fridays and Saturday's the cocktails and tapas menu is on point.  We loved every bit of the evening,  service was of very high quality and my friends enjoyed the entire period... Keep up the good job,
title: The place to be .Roof top bar.

hotel: Sankara Nairobi, Autograph Collection by Marriott
review: I've stayed over at the Sankara many times for extended periods and it's a top location. Impeccable services and top quality. Would never hesitate to go with family either, excellent facilities, food and very friendly staff.
title: Great Hotel for all Occasions

hotel: Sankara Nairobi, Autograph Collection by Marriott
review: I popped into Sankara a while back for lunch for the very first time. The place is very beautiful. I enjoyed the lunch served by courteous and friendly staff. Would definitely like to taste how a stay would feel like :)
title: Lunch at Sankara

hotel: Sankara Nairobi, Autograph Collection by Marriott
review: I mostly enjoyed my recent 5 nights stay at Sankara Nairobi, on business. My room was nice and spacious, comfortable with a full bathroom, gown and slippers, mini bar,spacious cupboards and work desk. Given my busy schedule, I mostly ordered food and wine via room service and every meal I had was delicious and well presented. I also really loved the rooftop bar on the 7th floor - great ambiance, good selection of wine and delicious light meals. Sankara's turn down gifts are a pleasant surprise- something to look forward to. I rate the hotel lower than excellent only because I found the breakfast monotonous and on some mornings, just skipped it. Another disappointment was the street noise and music at night from nearby bars. Make sure to avoid main-street facing rooms if you are
title: Very Good

hotel: Sankara Nairobi, Autograph Collection by Marriott
title: Great experience

hotel: Sankara Nairobi, Autograph Collection by Marriott
review: This is a fabulous hotel! While the rooms are nice and not necessarily luxurious, the staff is WONDERFUL and is what makes the Sankara so great! I have special dietary needs and Chef Joshua was a gem!! He was amazing and made me special meals every night. When Chef Joshua was off, Chef Fred stepped in and took care of me. Julius was awesome and saved me a table every night. The bar on the top of the hotel was just awesome!!! The hotel is centrally located with restaurants close. The cleaning staff was also awesome!! When I needed a specific animal to complete my collection, they would look for it. The staff was amazing!
title: Outstanding and totally worth it!

hotel: Sankara Nairobi, Autograph Collection by Marriott
review: I was on business and we also had an event scheduled in the same hotel.   Firstly, I was extremely surprised with how friendly and happy the staff were. Whether it was someone you met in the elevator or housekeeping staff or the guard at the entryway.  Secondly, I really liked the facilities in the hotel including the menu options for dining in.  Thirdly, I loved the small soapstone animals that the housekeeping staff keep along with an information card on the bedside table with turndown service. They are called the Sankara seven. Fourth, the breakfast menu has decent options. Fifth, the conference room facilities were also fantastic and we barely had any hiccups. The staff was very accommodating. The cookies they served with coffee were totally addictive to! 😃  The only con
title: Elegant comfort

hotel: Sankara Nairobi, Autograph Collection by Marriott
title: Excellent !

hotel: Sankara Nairobi, Autograph Collection by Marriott
review: This place is a dump,stayed for 9 nights in July 2016,rooms are smelly,had to downgrade ,the front desk staff,Anna,Patrick were repeatedly rude and unprofessional,the taxi guys also unprofessional.The hotel is beautiful from the outside,modern but the rooms are dirty and disgusting,never going back there again
title: Never again

hotel: Sankara Nairobi, Autograph Collection by Marriott
review: We were group of 4, two couples, heading for 9 days safari covering Kenya and Tanzania took a 1 day break at this hotel. We landed at about 10 am and reached hotel around 11. Check in was smooth and overall we like this hotel. Few points to note -  1) nice and cozy hotel 2) neat and clean rooms  3) good food (we ordered few Indian dishes and they were done well) 4) located at convenient location - near mall, eateries and restaurants  5) value for money
title: 1 day break before Ambesoli

hotel: Sankara Nairobi, Autograph Collection by Marriott
review: Extremely Bad!!!!! I stayed for 5 days and it was one horror after the other  First the TV was not working  Then the fuse blowed up and had no power all night  Then on several occasions the food was delivered cold  Last but not least they forgot my orders... And much much more   Scary moments, when on 2 occasions out of my 5 days there - the staff walked into my room while I was sleeping!!!!  Can you imagine??!?!??   I had come here to relax and energize the Spa was fantastic (independently managed ),however the Sankara Hotel was a disaster.   It's my last day of my birthday week celebration and  Sankara Hotel ruined it this year.....  Disaster!!!!!!
title: Birthday Week Celebration Spoiled @ Sankara Hotel

hotel: Sankara Nairobi, Autograph Collection by Marriott
review: Just finished having dinner. It was my second visit with my girlfriend and what a contrasting service level. Absolutely poor. Came for dinner with a reservation yet we were presented lunch menus. After asking the female waitress if the menu had changed as my girlfriend is a fan of the seared tuna which was not on the menu that was given to us. We were given a reply that no the menu had not changed however upon requesting for the desserts menu, is when we discovered the menu given to us was wrong as the menu that had  the desserts now had the seared  tuna and also the tartare.  We asked a young waiter(male) to call the supervisor but no supervisor came to our table. When our waitress did come to the table and when we notified her of the menu that she had given us, we were given
title: Poor service
