hotel: Sankara Nairobi, Autograph Collection by Marriott
title: Rooftop Bar

hotel: Sankara Nairobi, Autograph Collection by Marriott
review: I was in this hotel for training  conference. The services are so excellent, the workers were very welcoming and the food was divine. Sankara Nairobi , is one hotel that has class, constant internet and satellite TV. I was opportuned to spend three nights there and the hospitality, the wonderful services, the food and the strategic location will for ever remain green in my memory. I enjoy every second in this semi heaven.
title: Excellent services and very welcoming people

hotel: Sankara Nairobi, Autograph Collection by Marriott
review: I spent three nights in Sanakar during a business trip. The room as very nice and quiet. Servcie always nice nice and efficient. The rooftop bar is definitely a great place to start the evening. The Spa is also great ! Tried a massage there and service was excellent ! A few things to be noticed: - Swimming pool is very small, and just to freshen up, nothing more - Same for the gym: very small fitness room. The staff at fitnes is however very helpful and welcoming.
title: A nice place to relax in nairobi

hotel: Sankara Nairobi, Autograph Collection by Marriott
review: We only stayed at Sankara Nairobi for one night, and we checked in late at night, and left early morning; but the experience was great.   The hotel has security check at the entrance, which makes you feel dry safe; the check-in process was smooth; our room was clean; and the highlight of our stay - amazing breakfast; this was our first meal in Africa, we were surprised to find out how good it was! a lots of hot or cold dishes, fresh juices, fresh fruits to choose from, and very good service too.   Will definitely recommend this hotel.
title: Nice hotel to stay

hotel: Sankara Nairobi, Autograph Collection by Marriott
review: First time staying at the Sankara though I have known about it since construction.  It is a perfectly nice and well run 5 star hotel, staff is professionel and the hotel is well maintained.  The Sankara not only wants to be the business hotel of choice in town, it also wants to be a hip go to place. This means that the amount of people, music, singing and noise in general blows your mind when you arrive after a long overseas flight. I could hardly hear what the receptionist was saying at check-in.  You also need to choose a room well away from the whole pool area to get some sleep at night.  It only gets an average rating as Sankara is everything you would expect from an expensive international 5 star hotel - but nothing more. It does not have this "extra" that makes you
title: Business Trip

hotel: Sankara Nairobi, Autograph Collection by Marriott
title: Jambo Nairobi

hotel: Sankara Nairobi, Autograph Collection by Marriott
review: I want to preface my note by saying that I absolutely love the Sankara. It is the perfect hotel for business travelers. The staff is wonderful, the art is phenomenal, the food is delicious, the rooms are perfectly laid out, etc...However, I was bitten by bedbugs during my last stay -- all over my arms and back. These are not mosquito or other types of bites, definitely bed bugs.  I hope they will consider doing a heavy fumigation / treatment, or I will not be able to (sadly!) bring myself to stay there again.
title: Beautiful hotel but has bedbugs

hotel: Sankara Nairobi, Autograph Collection by Marriott
review: The ambiance is very calm and the service is excellent.  I really liked the service the waiters gave us; they are very attentive and pay attention to details.  Its a nice place to go for lunch or a quiet dinner.
title: Exotic Experience

hotel: Sankara Nairobi, Autograph Collection by Marriott
review: Been to this hotel several times before and as indicated in my previous reviews, I can not get over this amazing experience. I would definetely return to this hotel during my next visit to Nairobi. Excellent service tailored to my needs and requirements and the workers are very knowledgable of the city and surroundings and very helpful.
title: Amazing experience ........as usual

hotel: Sankara Nairobi, Autograph Collection by Marriott
review: Visited this hotel during a work week in Nairobi. Arrived late to a friendly and hassle free check-in. Excellent service, comfortable room, good food and safe. Easy check-out. This hotel offered provided the service I needed to let me focus on work.
title: Great service and comfortable room

hotel: Sankara Nairobi, Autograph Collection by Marriott
review: Been to sankara over n over n the service is incredible.  Had the grilled salmon recommended by Julius n it was really nice. Thumbs up to Geoffrey as well for making me feel at home...awesome place to dine n have an amazing time
title: Excellent service...Julius

hotel: Sankara Nairobi, Autograph Collection by Marriott
review: My wife and I decided to treat ourselves to a night at the Sankara Hotel last weekend.Unfortunately, we had a less-than-stellar stay. The room was well-appointed with a nice view, but things went downhill from there.    For one, the hotel has a very small pool, which wasn't made clear to me when I booked our stay (although I specifically asked about this).    In addition, there was terrible noise in the hotel from 1 a.m. to 2 a.m. A group kept shouting periodically, awakening both my wife and me.    And finally, although I made a reservation at Graze Restaurant through the hotel's service center, the host insisted that he didn't have my name on his list. He allowed us to stay only after we promised to eat quickly. (The food, fortunately, was very good.)    This is not what we
title: Surprisingly disappointing.

hotel: Sankara Nairobi, Autograph Collection by Marriott
title: Nice stay!

hotel: Sankara Nairobi, Autograph Collection by Marriott
review: I spent two nights at the hotel and was very happy.  Rooms were very clean, excellent service and great food.  The only reason I didn't give it a 5 is because the food was a bit expensive.  It was all great with good selection but somewhat pricey.  I will stay again though as the room was great!
title: Nice & comfortable

hotel: Sankara Nairobi, Autograph Collection by Marriott
review: We stayed at Sankara Nairobi for 1 night at the end of our Kenya safari in August 2016.  We stayed at Hemingway's Nairobi for 2 nights before the start of our safari.  Even though Sankara is no Hemingway's, it was good.  I wanted our group to have the experience  of staying in the suburb where Hemingway's was (posh area of Karen) and of staying close to downtown Nairobi where Sankara was.  This was a perfect business hotel.  The lobby was small & unimpressive.  The room was modern & clean.  It had all the things you need:  safe, hair dryer, iron, ironing board, air condition, coffee server, etc.  The bathroom was nice with a tub & separate shower.  Hotel & housekeeping service were very good.  The Artisan restaurant had a wonderful ambiance, decor and excellent service.  We had
title: Hotel accommodation

hotel: Sankara Nairobi, Autograph Collection by Marriott
title: Stunning hotel with personalised service

hotel: Sankara Nairobi, Autograph Collection by Marriott
review: The roof top is a great place to go hang out with friends. I loved the band it had great music, the service was excellent especially from this one lady Fridah, elegant is what i would use to describe her with her grey trouser suit and white she looked imppeccable, she made us feel totally with it, every now end then she would come to where we were seated just to enquire how we are doing, the food was amazing. One of our highest highlight is at 2 in the morning, Fridah walks to us and asks if we have a car to have a ticket validated. Oh how happy we are with the services..........we definitely coming back on the 10th........
title: Hang out

hotel: Sankara Nairobi, Autograph Collection by Marriott
review: I was hosting an important regulatory delegation for a visit. The delegation was going to arrive late, towards midnight. The hotel staff kept the kitchen open for us to have supper around 12 midnight. The rest of the stay was equally fantastic, with the business center providing efficient assistance for things such as photocopying and scanning of documents. We had a Great Stay at the Sankara Hotel in Nairobi.
title: Great Stay

hotel: Sankara Nairobi, Autograph Collection by Marriott
review: I stayed here for work in early November.  A lovely hotel, very well appointed. The rooms are a little tired but still very comfortable. The staff are all very helpful. You are gifted a cute soap stone animal each morning with an information card. Nice touch.   The breakfast set up is good, very diverse although coffee orders take a few reminders to arrive.   The hotel has a lovely roof top pool and bar area.   Finally, the hotel is well secured. Located in a busy commercial area, it was great to see thorough bag checks and car checks on the site.
title: A secure business trip

hotel: Sankara Nairobi, Autograph Collection by Marriott
review: Its always a great place to hang out with friends...especially on a weekend...excellent service provided security is tight... this is the place to be on a friday night,the manager and his team  are very friendly!!!!am always going to come back again and again
title: Night out

hotel: Sankara Nairobi, Autograph Collection by Marriott
review: the roof top is awesome what a view it provides. Best service from the waiters. One can enjoy swimming when sunny and enjoy having breakfast at the same time.Love the reception too. The food is delicious and quite a big variety to pick from
title: hang out with friends

hotel: Sankara Nairobi, Autograph Collection by Marriott
review: The Sankara Hotel is simply beautiful. What a great atmosphere to be in. The staff was friendly, food was great!! A variety of choices for the customer which is always a plus. All in all, worth every penny!!
title: Beautiful!!!!

hotel: Sankara Nairobi, Autograph Collection by Marriott
review: Went with high expectations on scones and pastry but scones were average and no clotted cream surprisingly no jams accept papaya jam strange for such a high standard hotel  Staff really needs training as there was no care attitude may not be their fault it seems management needs to relook
title: Coffee shop

hotel: Sankara Nairobi, Autograph Collection by Marriott
review: Loved Sankara. It's central with great service. Must say Joyce at front desk made our check in a very welcoming experience. We were tired and cranky after a long sleepless night travelling and she managed to change our mood instantly. The club rooms are lovely and spacious, big comfortable beds with comply pillows options for everyone.   The spa... omg (no words to describe it) must try
title: Business and Pleasure

hotel: Sankara Nairobi, Autograph Collection by Marriott
review: Dickens and Monica at the Front Office- thank you so much guys!! My wife and I will always be grateful. We were so surprised when we got back from dinner to find our favourite wine in the room along with a lovely fruit basket featuring the most delicious grapes ever! We'll be back :)
title: Wow!!

hotel: Sankara Nairobi, Autograph Collection by Marriott
review: World Class Hotel and great ambience, it meets all your expectations and leaves you with a lasting experience. It is a hotel like no other and it's located in a very convenient place reachable to all at any time
title: Awesome

hotel: Sankara Nairobi, Autograph Collection by Marriott
review: I totally enjoyed my time in this hotel. The staff are extremely friendly and helpful. Very attentive to details and were so nice to my baby as well. It was indeed a good decision to stay here. It's central too so visits to the park as well as the malls were pretty easy. We visited the Westgate Mall. Would definitely recommend it.
title: Amazing.

hotel: Sankara Nairobi, Autograph Collection by Marriott
review: Sankara rooftop bar has been my hanging out joint for quite a while BUT I must say am watching it fade away everyday .Visited the place on 1st with my friends and they didn't have half of the items in the menu.! Why then give me the menu at the first place.The floor is also getting soo old, wonder last time it was polished. We ended up going to the wine bar which was really great with great service.
title: Rooftop bar getting worse everyday

hotel: Sankara Nairobi, Autograph Collection by Marriott
review: This place made the highest moment of my wife's birthday this year. The chocolate cake, the petals all over made her heart melt. You are the absolute best. Customer care is excellent. I felt like a king for a moment
title: Wifes birthday and christmas

hotel: Sankara Nairobi, Autograph Collection by Marriott
review: Am a regular at sankara sarabi pool bar, the services offered here is simply in a class of its own. The workers are the best, personally I would like to thank the manager Mr. Geoffrey I name him Mr etiquette not forgetting the lady with the most beautiful smile Regina. Regina is an awesome person and believe me she is an asset to this hotel. Thanks.
title: Excellent service

hotel: Sankara Nairobi, Autograph Collection by Marriott
review: This being my second time at the hotel, i was really impressed with everything from the entrance to the pool bar. The hotel  ambience was really commendable, everything went on perfectly, friendly staff  though it seemed busy. My server Reggina was fabulous, always smiling, thanks to  the management's good job.The rib steak was sumptuous, though a bit pricy. Am looking foward to another exciting experience
title: "a great evening"

hotel: Sankara Nairobi, Autograph Collection by Marriott
review: My family and I went in this hotel for an over-night stay for a safari tour in Kenya, and we have to say, it was one of the best experiences of hotels we've been through. Everything was positive, and the service was excellent. The room we have stayed in was good quality in every form. The bathroom was very efficient and modern, as well as being pleasant to see. The TV system was very well organised with especially something we enjoyed when we first entered, which was welcoming us with a message mentioning our names. The restaurant food was very good and at breakfast, there was a lot to choose from. Overall, it was a superb hotel and worth the price.
title: Excellent hotel, modern and clean

hotel: Sankara Nairobi, Autograph Collection by Marriott
review: I can't get over the decor each time I visit the place. The poolside is great and the team warm and welcoming. Great bites with drinks.  Pool more of decor than practical given that one swimming would shy off the view of revelers.  No doubt I will be back.
title: Nice place

hotel: Sankara Nairobi, Autograph Collection by Marriott
review: I had a memorable  experience at the rooftop bar while ushering in the new year and everything was superb. Every bit, the food, and the dancers were magnificent. the entire staff were super friendly and great  with their attires. kudos my server Reggina, she was exquisite.Thanks to everyone and the management for an excellent job.
title: a perfect ending

hotel: Sankara Nairobi, Autograph Collection by Marriott
review: We went for dinner with the family and were very well taken care of by the Sous Chef, Simon and his team. The food was well prepared, tasty and everyone in the family had an abundance of choice. The service staff were kind and patient.
title: Food Well Prepared

hotel: Sankara Nairobi, Autograph Collection by Marriott
review: Sankara is in a great location near a shopping mall with some restaurants and other nearby restaurants.  The staff are pleasant and try to make your stay nice.  The gym is decent located on a top floor, where, if you are up there early enough, you can watch the sun rise over Nairobi.  The hotel, though, is in decay.  The rooms are small and drab.  Most of the electrical outlets in the room do not work.  The hotel is pretty stingy with bottled water. Poor wireless internet connectivity in the rooms--you need to use the cable at the desk.  Really for the price, there are MUCH better hotels in Nairobi.
title: For the price, below average

hotel: Sankara Nairobi, Autograph Collection by Marriott
review: We stayed on a family trip and would really recommend it. The staff were lovely and the breakfasts, and other meals, were excellent. They were very accommodating of people with specific dietary requirements.  The pool is heated and in a brilliant location on the top floor.  The gym is also very good.  The only issue we had was with loud music playing into the night from the rooftop bar. We were ~6 floors below so I'd say there's an issue with sound insulation!
title: Lovely hotel

hotel: Sankara Nairobi, Autograph Collection by Marriott
review: Nice Personal touch, makes one feel welcome. Rooms are clean. Hallways are clean and so are the lifts and stairs. Dinner and breakfast location is good and easily accessible. Access from outside the hotel is well monitored and safety are one of the top priorities.
title: Very Friendly and subject expert staff

hotel: Sankara Nairobi, Autograph Collection by Marriott
review: A clean, safe, modern hotel in a central part of Nairobi. Decent food , but more options would have been great. Also a dedicated coffee shop with quiet areas for small meetings would be a very useful addition. Leave early for the airport - traffic is unpredictable and can take an hour easily,
title: Good Hotel, Central Location

hotel: Sankara Nairobi, Autograph Collection by Marriott
review: We went there for the second time and loved the consistency of service, though the place was full we enjoyed every bit of it. The acrobat were amazing so was the ambience, Mr Yeri gave us a table after along wait but it was worth, our server Regina was on point and my friends enjoyed the end of the year in style, the servers attire was second to none and reminded me the south American cowboys  , we felt safe here and for sure will be back, despite the huge crowd that turned up for the night, we enjoyed the entire night though the live band could have done much better.
title: WHAT A NICE WAY TO USHER THE NEW YEAR AT ROOFTOP BAR!

hotel: Sankara Nairobi, Autograph Collection by Marriott
review: i love this hotel. I stay here every time i visit Nairobi. The hotel is beautiful and comfortable. I love the decor. Its filled with african art, so you really know that at you are in Africa, whereas most luxury hotels look and feel the same everywhere. The staff is very efficient and friendly. I feel like i see my friends again when i meet them. splurge on a junior suite, it is worth it. and check out the roof top bar with restaurant and swimming pool. It is the best spot to hang out in Nairobi on a Friday or Saturday night.
title: My home away from home

hotel: Sankara Nairobi, Autograph Collection by Marriott
review: Had an excellent stay at this modern hotel in Nairobi. I particularly loved the design of the common spaces and restaurants. My Superior Room was great - bright and spacious, with a large bathroom. Not as sleek as the rest of the hotel, in my opinion, but still very nice and comfortable.  One of the best features of Sankara is the incredible selection of restaurants on site. Graze was particularly delicious. Overall, Sankara is a wonderful place to call home while visiting Nairobi.
title: Excellent Stay

hotel: Sankara Nairobi, Autograph Collection by Marriott
review: A pleasant stay at the Sankara hotel. Excellent customer service, modern fixtures and good location. Helpful staff, notably Monica from the front desk.  Highly recommended.   Home away home.   I will definitely return.
title: A lovely stay...

hotel: Sankara Nairobi, Autograph Collection by Marriott
review: I chose Sanaka mainly because of its security. The receptionist was welcoming and the check-in was fairly quick. However, the bell boy or whoever the person taking my bags to the room was, seemed unhappy to be taking them and seemed unhappy with the amount I had tipped him. He kept looking at me and then at the money and again at me for some time, yet I had tipped whim three times what I was advised to give.  Check out was not so great. The same man who took my bags up was hesitant to take them from the room and put them in the cab; the swipe machines they initially used on my card was not working, it was 5:00 am and I was rushing to the airport.  The rooftop bar is nice but the restaurants lack ambiance. The food is good, room service should improve their in-dining menu,
title: Good Hotel

hotel: Sankara Nairobi, Autograph Collection by Marriott
title: Luxury to the Core

hotel: Sankara Nairobi, Autograph Collection by Marriott
review: An upmarket Lounge with fantastic views of Westlands Nairobi. The ambience is magnificent with a relaxing vibe and friendly staff. The open architectural design adds to the experience and overall comfort.
title: Comfort and Luxury...at a price

hotel: Sankara Nairobi, Autograph Collection by Marriott
review: I regret in my life for ever stepping again at rooftop sankara worst service , the manager ,we had dinner and shisha accidentally because of the slow service I decided to put the shisha down it NEVER broke only the top that I pulled out forgetting to hold the bottom.Only the charcoal that fell and on my bad luck one coal did touch my arm  within seconds the manager who was and is a man who dint even care about anything other than a specific table with several ladies sitting opposite us and was giving all the attention to one certain lady surprisingly he dashed to my table where I was with my friend because he heard the shisha top fall I dropped it once I got burnt"he came angrily shouted "Do you know much this shisha costs?" Angrily shouting looking at me! I said its not broken
title: Service

hotel: Sankara Nairobi, Autograph Collection by Marriott
title: Staff lied and disappointing stay

hotel: Sankara Nairobi, Autograph Collection by Marriott
review: When I checked in, I was informed I was on a bed and breakfast rate. I therefore had breakfast each day and at the end was informed I was only on a room rate. The hotel staff denied saying it however cancelled the charge as a gesture. As I know the hotel are lying about this, I asked them to check the cctv as would clearly show me asking. They have since disconnected 7 phone calls I have made to the manager, and are not responding to my emails asking for an alology.  I wouldn't stay here again out of principle, and be wary of what the staff tell you.  It'll be interesting to see if I receive a response following this...
title: @Sankara

hotel: Sankara Nairobi, Autograph Collection by Marriott
review: It is great up market hotel wouthout being over the top however meets the expectation of an up market hotel. The hotel in in the heart of Nairobe. Service was excellent. The in room office space with the multi international plug configurations is a winner. The buffet meals at the hotel is great.
title: Very nice Hotel

hotel: Sankara Nairobi, Autograph Collection by Marriott
review: Second time staying here. Still very nice hotel. Friendly and helpful staff. Amenities are superb. Free WiFi (limited to two devices). Very good showers and comfortable beds. Only lost a star because I thought the breakfast buffet had gone down hill since last visit. Still love the turn-down service with soapstone animal each night. Check out the curios market across the street.
title: A misdemeanor

hotel: Sankara Nairobi, Autograph Collection by Marriott
review: The hotel is clean, food was good but very expensive, The staff who checked me out was not familiar with the hotel check out systems. Took a long time to check out. I was over charged buy $165:00. When complained through Booking.com, the hotel refused to refund the difference. In the end Booking.com has to refund the difference. Full 10/10 for Booking.com and their professional staff who handled my case. Not too happy with Sankara.
title: Over Chared what the agreed price was through Booking.com

hotel: Sankara Nairobi, Autograph Collection by Marriott
review: Very nice, clean hotel with very good service. However the hotel is one concrete building with no outdoor space. The pool is on the roof with a bar but there is little space for enjoying the pool. There are no green areas to walk around.   The location is great for the Westlands area of Nairobi. It's convenient to many offices and businesses.   The business center is pretty good. Internet acces is decent but can be very slow during peak hours.
title: Business only

hotel: Sankara Nairobi, Autograph Collection by Marriott
review: I was in Nairobi for a high-profile and important international meeting and my luggage was lost for almost the entire time I was there. While nothing can make up for or fix that nightmare, the staff at Sankara came awfully close. They went above and beyond to help me find/get my luggage and also went so far as to send staff out into the local markets to buy me toiletries that I needed. They were SO helpful and lovely!   The room was very nice as well - comfortable bed, convenient setup, nice bathroom. The breakfast, which was included in our rate, was excellent and offered a huge variety of international selections (plus a waffle, crepe and omelette station). Good offering of business support services and the location was central and convenient. Security very savvy and well run
title: Great hotel, TOP NOTCH customer service!

hotel: Sankara Nairobi, Autograph Collection by Marriott
title: What a disappointment after a great evening . . . . . . .

hotel: Sankara Nairobi, Autograph Collection by Marriott
review: My girlfriends and I went to Graze last night to celebrate two birthdays. Food was good, service was excellent, and I would make special mention to wait staff Mary and hostess Margaret for their attentiveness and making the birthday girls feel special. After settling our bill, we asked to validate our parking tokens - we had done the same thing at the restaurant when we were last there last September.  We were directed to the front desk for this.  Getting there, we were informed that parking is no longer validated and we would have to pay for parking.  That did not make any sense.  We had just spent a good amount of money in their restaurant, and now we had to pay for parking?  We noted to the front office staff, and to the manager Dennis Mwai when he showed up, that we were not
title: Early Saturday Dinner

hotel: Sankara Nairobi, Autograph Collection by Marriott
review: Haven't been back here since they started renovating the pool area, that's a month ago. This very minute am seated here n totally love what they did with the floor. Much easier to move about in heels n the lighting at night is just spectacular. Sankara gives me a reason to love this place all over again...#madlove
title: Renovation

hotel: Sankara Nairobi, Autograph Collection by Marriott
review: Our experience at Sankara Hotel was excellent! We were very impressed by the attention to detail of the hotel and restaurant staff. They took the time and made the effort to place roses, rose petals, fruit, wine, fresh chocolate-covered strawberries, and truffles, among other things, into our room. The table at the restaurant was also all decked out and the service was outstanding, as was the food. It was a magical night, thanks to Monicah (hotel management) and Mary (hotel florist) as well as Margaret and George at Graze Restaurant and their team. What a blessing it was to get engaged at Sankara ... the night could not have been more special!  We owe a huge debt of gratitude to the warm, friendly, meticulous, and professional staff of Sankara--THANK YOU SO MUCH!!!
title: Perfect Engagement Experience on Valentine's Day at Sankara!

hotel: Sankara Nairobi, Autograph Collection by Marriott
review: Hotel Located in Westlands not so far from the city business district. Located right next to the Sarit Centre shopping mall. Wonderful interior design, the rooms are clean and spacious. They have a rooftop pool and bar which brings out a nice ambience in the evening. Cant complain about the food, loved the buffet breakfast. Would definitely be back.
title: Just Superb

hotel: Sankara Nairobi, Autograph Collection by Marriott
review: This hotel is located in Westlands; lots of parking and tight security. Entry / exit from the parking lot is a little underwhelming because of the convoluted route. Security and wait staff extremely helpful and attentive
title: Fantastic hotel in Westlands

hotel: Sankara Nairobi, Autograph Collection by Marriott
review: On the surface the Sankara is very nice - the rooms are comfortable and the French press and real coffee in the rooms are a nice touch. However, when when we checked out we were charges a higher rate than what we were quoted when booking the room. When we tried to dispute the rate we were told that we could not make any changes because the room was booked through a travel agent. When our agent contacted the hotel, he was told that we requested upgrades at check-in which of course we did not. In addition we were never allowed to speak to a manager. Throughout the stay we experienced generally poor service at the restaurant including billing errors which staff were reluctant to fix. Managers were never available when we requested their assistance in fixing billing issues. On the
title: Beware of deceptive pricing

hotel: Sankara Nairobi, Autograph Collection by Marriott
review: Great place to stay in Nairobi   Modern well equipped great rooms real fitness and a very good restaurant   Not to forget the glaze restaurant for meet But above all it's the staff which is genuinely friendly !
title: Excellent !!!

hotel: Sankara Nairobi, Autograph Collection by Marriott
review: The first time staying at the Sankara Hotel in Nairobi, it felt like a good standard business hotel. Nice rooms, bedding, exercise room and business lounge. The staff were very friendly.  The second time I had to visit Nairobi I stayed at the Sankara.  I was checked in by a very lovely woman named Monicah who welcomed me back.  Really?  She knew I was a returning?  I later saw a newsletter that noted her as employee of the month.  Oh, that explains it I thought.  But no, as I entered the business lounge, everyone welcomed me back by name. The Sankara was not the typical business Hotel, it was a home away from home. I later learned that Monicah was promoted - a great move on the part of management. If she spreads her magic, the hotel will flourish!
title: Sankara Hotel

hotel: Sankara Nairobi, Autograph Collection by Marriott
review: We went back after they did the floor refurbishment and it was worth waiting, my high shoes are save from leaving marks on the former old tiles which was uneven. security as usual was  tight and service was excellent,my shisha mint was very good though i had to wait for the pot, everyone looked like came for these stuff. These time we didn't have meals but every drink comes with a complementary salty peanuts. we loved the ambiances and the music from the DJ was to the point.  The sarabi team for making our night.
title: Sarabi Rooftopbar--A must visit.

hotel: Sankara Nairobi, Autograph Collection by Marriott
review: The highlight of my stay was my interaction with hotel staff. Very friendly and receptive as well as proactive in anticipating your needs. The rooftop bar is a great place to hang out on Friday night  Only itch I had during my stay was with regard to AC setup in the room and if I wanted to turn off the AC I had to hop out of bed to press the panel since there was no remote.  Great view of busy Nairobi as well
title: Awesome staff and service

hotel: Sankara Nairobi, Autograph Collection by Marriott
review: Stayed at Sankara for 4 days last week, then travelled to other cities in Kenya for business meetings, reconfirmed my reservation with Sankara before leaving for my return night and final night in Kenya. Upon arrival for final night in Kenya along with 5 other members of the group we were told that our rooms would not be available until 2am As they had crew staying at the hotel and their flight was delayed so they gave them our reserved rooms. We were told we could wait until 2am for our rooms or be sent to another hotel. Not what you want to hear when you arrive back from 3 days on the road at 9pm at night. The worst part though was that Sankara knew earlier in the evening that they would not honour our reservation so why didn't they ring us, they had our mobile numbers, and
title: Reserved rooms given away

hotel: Sankara Nairobi, Autograph Collection by Marriott
review: A perfect hotel for a lighting fast trip to Nairobi for business - a very relaxing place to "come home" to after a long day in the office.  Clearly newer construction with all of the nice touches.  Elevator is clean and fast.  Hallways have sparkling new carpet and nicely decorated walls, all in calm colors.  Rooms are spacious and well appointed.  Extra power outlets, night lights next to the bed, very well designed L shaped desk for work, thoughtful features light automatic night light in the hallways, powerful and hot shower, separate tub, comfy fluffy pillows and mattress.  I could go on and on.  Just a place that makes you smile and relax.  The breakfast buffet was plentiful and diverse and the service quite attentive.  As a matter of fact, everyone in the hotel seems
title: Made my Business Trip Relaxing and Enjoyable

hotel: Sankara Nairobi, Autograph Collection by Marriott
title: excellent stay

hotel: Sankara Nairobi, Autograph Collection by Marriott
review: Second time for me, I enjoyed the place again. Unfortunately my room was located close to the airconditionning cooler outside, had some noises overnight but not a big deal for me. The bar at the top is an amazing place!! The Sanakra Spa, tested just before taking my plane back to Europe, was the greatest idea I ever had : getting an indian head massage was the top of the top. I will come back to Sankara for my Third Stay without any hesitation.
title: Fantastic stay

hotel: Sankara Nairobi, Autograph Collection by Marriott
review: I stayed here for 3 nights a couple of months ago and had a superb time.  The staff were incredibly friendly and helpful, any dealings with each one of them was a delight.   On arrival late at night, my card had been blocked due to a fraud alert, and the staff couldn't have been more understanding and kind, letting me sleep off the long flight and sort all the guarantee bits out the following morning.   The rooms were great, very spacious, immaculately clean & kitted out with everything you'd need to turn it into a home from home for a couple of days.   One of my colleagues fell ill one morning, and within half an hour of asking reception to recommend a doctor there was one in her room writing her out a prescription.   The dry cleaning service was lightning fast, and the lovely
title: The building is great; the people are greater

hotel: Sankara Nairobi, Autograph Collection by Marriott
title: Classical African beauty and punctuated with modern design sophistication!

hotel: Sankara Nairobi, Autograph Collection by Marriott
review: I always  enjoy my stay at the Sankara, everything about the hotel itself is fantastic; the rooms, club lounge, restaurants and the health and fitness facilities. A shout out to the staff at the Sankara, there are the ones that make the experience an "at home" one for me. I love the personalized service, I appreciate that everyone knows you by name, they pay attention to detail and service is always with  a smile!!
title: Unbeatable service- Home away from home :)

hotel: Sankara Nairobi, Autograph Collection by Marriott
review: A wonderful oasis in Nairobi, always peaceful and welcoming. Staff are wonderful always happy to ensure your stay is the best. Hotel steak restaurant is second to none with wonderful food and the pool bar on the roof is a great place to unwind after a busy day. Will always be back.
title: Never fails to satisfy

hotel: Sankara Nairobi, Autograph Collection by Marriott
review: Great experience at Sankara, the Staff there are always welcoming and happy, always smiling. I have been made to feel at home away from Home. Being on Business travel, the Club Lounge makes it so easy to host my meetings. I have been amazed about how, the staff have taken time to know my name. Whenever they see me they refer to me by name, which makes one feel, they are offering personalised service.  Being away from Family, the Staff at Sankara, made me feel like I have an extended family there, which is Great for me.  The rooms, are clean and immaculate, all what you would be expecting from a 5 Star accomodation/hotel.  Great variety of Food, The Chef was even nice enough, to come to our table, and make a special request which is not on the menu.  Whenever I am in Nairobi, I
title: Great Overall Experience and Hospitality

hotel: Sankara Nairobi, Autograph Collection by Marriott
title: Great Service and hospitality

hotel: Sankara Nairobi, Autograph Collection by Marriott
review: I thoroughly enjoyed my stay with this hotel as i always do.The room was spacious with a stunning view and the staff were all attentive.I especially enjoyed the service i received from the rooftop manager Geoffrey who was very welcoming and attentive and ensured my table got top notch service.I look forward to visiting the hotel and the Graze and rooftop bar especially soon.
title: Fantastic hotel in the heart of Nairobi

hotel: Sankara Nairobi, Autograph Collection by Marriott
review: Can organise to pick you up from airport. Reception is accompanied by a cold glass of juice. Be sure to check out the rooftop pool and bar, splendid breakfast. Furthermore, the in-room mini bar is genius.  Wifi is guaranteed and all service comes with a smile. It's located in a less crowded place in Nairobi, so be certain to benefit from the quiet and calm.
title: Great reception, great hospitality

hotel: Sankara Nairobi, Autograph Collection by Marriott
review: A central location in Nairobi and excellent for business trips. An ease to stay here, with all modern facilities that work. Great dining options too. There is a rooftop pool restaurant and bar which are a must when in Nairobi.
title: Uncomplicated luxury hotel in Nairobi

hotel: Sankara Nairobi, Autograph Collection by Marriott
review: Sankara Nairobi provided us with hospitality and customer service that exceeded far beyond our expectations. The entire staff was friendly and inviting from the start, immediately making Sankara feel like home.   It was nice returning after a long day to familiar, smiling faces greeting you by name as you walk through the door. So warm and courteous, yet always professional.   After an unforgettable stay in a wonderful hotel, there are a few gentlemen absolutely worth mentioning below:  First would be Mr. Solomon. This gentlemen went out of his way multiple times to assist us during our days at Sankara. He is extremely polite, well spoken and an absolute pleasure to be around. It was nice having a "go-to" whenever you were in need, and he was always willing to help with a smile
title: Sankara- Excellent Staff and Customer Service

hotel: Sankara Nairobi, Autograph Collection by Marriott
title: Very good services

hotel: Sankara Nairobi, Autograph Collection by Marriott
review: was at sankara rooftop for the second time just to chill out and have some good time;Wow very nice food and customer service was just perfect.Julius was so friendly and kept on checking on us,Will definitely go back again.Thank You Sankara for improving your customer services.
title: Welcoming atmosphere

hotel: Sankara Nairobi, Autograph Collection by Marriott
review: I've had to travel frequently to Nairobi lately for business and I've stayed in a few different places. But I am settled now on Sankara. The staff are great, , rooms are world class, service has been fantastic and I've had no complaints about food. There's a lively poolside bar upstairs or a more refined bar downstairs, plus a nice restaurant. Its well located as well.
title: Now my Nairobi Favourite

hotel: Sankara Nairobi, Autograph Collection by Marriott
review: I had drinks at Sarabi last Friday with my friends and the bar attendants were efficient, responsive and they seem to know my favorite coketails. I highly recommend Sarabi Bar where they also have heated pool.
title: Drinks at Sarabi Bar and Restaurant

hotel: Sankara Nairobi, Autograph Collection by Marriott
review: I visited Sankara Hotel over the Easter holidays and the reception was amazing. The front office team were friendly, helpful, full of smiles. Enjoyed the warmth and personalised service. I highly recommend the graze restaurant @Sankara and the Sunday brunch..
title: Excellent Service

hotel: Sankara Nairobi, Autograph Collection by Marriott
review: Highs The staff are amazing. House keeping staff really went out of their way to make sure everything was perfect. Rooms are large and comfortable - bathrooms are heavenly. Breakfast is the best!! Variety and selection is awesome. The pool /bar on the top floor is a great area to relax.  Lows Really expensive to do laundry :)
title: Exceptional!

hotel: Sankara Nairobi, Autograph Collection by Marriott
review: Sankara is one of the nicest places to stay in Nairobi, with very clean rooms, great food and friendly staff. The Sunday brunch is delicious with a huge number of things to choose from. Would definitely stay at Sankara again.
title: Excellent easter weekend

hotel: Sankara Nairobi, Autograph Collection by Marriott
review: Good location close to the popular Westgate mall. Room and amenities are world class. Most inviting is the bathroom with modern accessories. The beds are comfortable and the audio visual in the rooms are great.
title: Sankara makes me feel at home making a business trip pleasurable

hotel: Sankara Nairobi, Autograph Collection by Marriott
review: The Sankara will always have my business when I'm in Nairobi for work.  The staff have become friends and I truly look forward to seeing them when I come "home" from work each day.  Sharon and Joanna at the front desk and are simply wonderful.  They make you feel special, tend to your requests in a timely manner and make sure that you have everything you need to feel comfortable.  I also can't say enough about the staff on the 7th floor.  One of the staff members noticed that my group was always rushing to get our breakfast, eat, drink coffee, and hurry downstairs for our early departure.  Seeing this scenario play out everyday, he asked us one evening to place a standing order for breakfast for a specific time, that way we wouldn't have to wait for our food.  And the next two
title: Home away from home

hotel: Sankara Nairobi, Autograph Collection by Marriott
title: Great food, great nights

hotel: Sankara Nairobi, Autograph Collection by Marriott
review: We visited the Artisan restaurant at Sankara and we were not disappointed. Great and delicious food and the staff were very welcoming and friendly.Samuel our waitress was very good.I will definitely be visiting the restaurant again.
title: Enjoyable stay at the Sankara - All you need at hand

hotel: Sankara Nairobi, Autograph Collection by Marriott
review: Nice and comfortable venue with a great team always willing to assist you. Nice amenities with different themes where you can relax or meet with customers. I always go there, good value for money compared to other hotels I have tried in Nairobi...
title: Mr. Nilesh Kacharia

hotel: Sankara Nairobi, Autograph Collection by Marriott
review: The hotel was beyond my expectations! The hotel staff treated me so well that I cannot imagine staying anywhere else. The concierge took great care in arranging my needs so that I wanted for nothing. My room was very satisfying, spacious and clean. Close in proximity to whatever shopping needs I had. I highly recommend this hotel for your visit.
title: Fantastic Stay in Nairobi

hotel: Sankara Nairobi, Autograph Collection by Marriott
review: + very clean + spacious rooms + good desk in the room for work. In case you need to do some work from the hotel. + friendly staff + excellent breakfast buffet + good coffee + good location to get around the city  - VAT and taxes: pay attention on your final price as charges are relatively high
title: Comfortable place to stay

hotel: Sankara Nairobi, Autograph Collection by Marriott
review: The Sankara is a wonderful hotel that I highly recommend to anyone visiting Nairobi. I stayed here for almost three weeks between April and May, and I plan to stay again. The best thing about the hotel is definitely the staff. John, in the lobby, goes above and beyond his actually duties. On Mother's Day, I was almost in a panic because I could not get my wifi to work such that I could call my mom. John, who is not IT but who I know well, helped me find someone in the hotel to solve my IT problem. Further, he is always friendly, polite, and professional no matter the time. I sincerely appreciate his warm personality. The front desk women, and the men and women who work at the roof top pool bar and restaurant are always professional and friendly too. After the staff, the rooms
title: Lovely Hotel with the Best Staff in Nairobi

hotel: Sankara Nairobi, Autograph Collection by Marriott
title: A great stay in Westlands!

hotel: Sankara Nairobi, Autograph Collection by Marriott
review: Sankara is the most comfortable way to stay in Westlands. A true oasis in the middle of the crazy bustle. But also close enough to the Sarit Centre mall to allow me to stretch my legs a bit. Wonderful staff at the restaurant, bar, gym, and security. Typical warm Kenyan hospitality. And some of the best Indian food in Nairobi is in Westlands, so don't pass it up.
title: Sankara: Promises more than it delivers

hotel: Sankara Nairobi, Autograph Collection by Marriott
review: Oh Sankara where do I even start.I have had the best nights of my life here and the best brunch and catching up with friends here ,The rooftop ambience is just incredible the waiters the bar- tenders the security the Managers,Everyone is just Awesome .My favorite champagne guy would be Daniel,He is always concerned about the customers and always going out of his way to help me drink water when I have had one too many.The manager George is Really friendly.The waiter Enock,funny man with his entourage Casper,Thomas,David and everyone else are truly a Five star waiters.If you havent been to the Sarabi pool bar yet I would recommend you do because it's truly a Nairobi Five star experience.Not forgetting the Amazing mouth -Watering steak from the Graze ...The Whole Sarabi Team are a
title: BEST ROOFTOP BAR IN NAIROBI

hotel: Sankara Nairobi, Autograph Collection by Marriott
title: An oasis of peace in a busy city !

hotel: Sankara Nairobi, Autograph Collection by Marriott
review: First time in Kenya. Hotel was recommended by business partner. Pricey, bur large nice room, BEST COFFEE EVER in the room (yeah we are in Kenya stupid!) with porcelain french coffee press, many restaurants and huge gym, rare in Africa. I have not tried the steak house, but it looks really good. Service is outstanding.
title: Very good standard hotel fantastic staff

hotel: Sankara Nairobi, Autograph Collection by Marriott
review: I stayed a week in Sankara and must say that the staff at this hotel genuinely do their very best to make you welcome and get the best out of being "out and away" You can book tours and excursions in the lobby and the prices are not exaggerated but fair.  The hotel is good standard but the people there makes your stay fantastic.  I highly recommend Sankara Nairobi.
title: Amazing hotel in Westlands

hotel: Sankara Nairobi, Autograph Collection by Marriott
review: I discovered Nairobi with Sankara hotel and it was a real treat. The location is ideal to get to know the city for a foreigner like me. At least two shopping centres within 5min walk, a couple of restaurants and bars if not at walking distance at worst a 5 min taxi drive. I choose the place because of their rooftop bar - pool: a trendy place with nice cocktails and overall good atmosphere. Then I discovered that the hotel restaurants Graze and Artisan were getting good rating on Tripadvisor. I did only try the daily breakfast there though, buffet with all we need, and I ate in nearby restaurants (there is a famous rodizio across the road). The rooms are top notch and design. There is a lot of security on the ground so you really feel safe. Uber taxis can pick you up just in
title: Exquisite

hotel: Sankara Nairobi, Autograph Collection by Marriott
review: I recently stayed at the Sankara on a hectic business trip and would highly recommend the Sankara for business travel. In particular, the staff in the Club Lounge and it's facilities, including private meeting rooms, made it 100% worthwhile to stay on the club floors. The staff went out of their way on a daily basis to take care of us, including making us food at odd times as we had late night and early morning calls, etc. They were friendly, helpful, and even encouraging.  The rest of the hotel was also amazing - cheerful, clean, all the staff were friendly. I'd highly recommend it.
title: Business trip - exceptional service

hotel: Sankara Nairobi, Autograph Collection by Marriott
review: I am reviewing the Sankara after what is likely my ninth stay at the hotel. Each and every experience I have had with the Sankara staff, service, and amenities has been far superior to my stays at other similar hotels around the world. It is my Nairobi home away from home! I would highly recommend that anyone traveling to Nairobi for work or pleasure stay at the Sankara...you will not be disappointed!
title: Superior Staff, Service and Atmosphere

hotel: Sankara Nairobi, Autograph Collection by Marriott
review: First time I stayed in Sankara from March 26th to April 2nd and what a wonderful experience. All the personnel is dedicated to make your stay as enjoyable as possible. They even have a special pillow menu ...
title: Good experience, Excellent service

hotel: Sankara Nairobi, Autograph Collection by Marriott
review: The Sankara is my favorite place to stay in Nairobi. Service is excellent. Rooms are nicely outfitted, clean and efficient. Wifi is reliable and good quality. Food at the restaurant is always good quality and prompt. The club at the top of the hotel is a gathering spot for business and social life of Nairobi's elite. Hotel staff go out of their way to make you feel comfortable and safe.
title: Always excellent service

hotel: Sankara Nairobi, Autograph Collection by Marriott
review: It is a very good hotel and close to all the facilities like malls, hospitals, night life etc.  Very specious rooms with nice interior. Staff is just a call away. Cuisine from around the world which you can enjoy including vegetarian.  Great service and courteous staff.
title: Very good

hotel: Sankara Nairobi, Autograph Collection by Marriott
review: Staff are great, rooms great, food is good. Safe hotel with good security. Great rooftop bar with music sometimes. Really liked this hotel. Good bathrooms. Good beds. I would recommend this hotel as a good choice.
title: Great Hotel

hotel: Sankara Nairobi, Autograph Collection by Marriott
review: Went for a networking event that was at the rooftop. It was really nice. The bitings in the event were great and so was the service. enjoyed the small hamburgers to the dessert hamburgrs too hehe.  Thanks Chef.
title: Great cocktail

hotel: Sankara Nairobi, Autograph Collection by Marriott
review: Stayed 4 nights in May 2017. Good business hotel, good room, good bathroom, nice staff, nice breakfast, good internet. On the Friday night (and on the Thursday night to a lesser extent), there was terrible noise from the bar opposite the street. Just terrible nuisance. Get a room to the other side of the building if you can.
title: Reasonable business hotel, the street side gets noisy on Friday nights.

hotel: Sankara Nairobi, Autograph Collection by Marriott
review: Visited the hotel with my family and enjoyed the Sunday Brunch. Staff were friendly and helpful all the way from the front office, full of smile. We enjoyed the warmth and personalized service. Thanks to Eric, you made us feel special and will definitely come back.
title: Sunday Brunch" Excellent"

hotel: Sankara Nairobi, Autograph Collection by Marriott
review: Hotel is extremely upmarket. World class 7th floor amenities with skyline views. Has a Pool and bar area, champagne bar, grill house and private dining room.  Very nicely finished. Service is extremely good , and all staff are alert and very responsive.Location in Nairobi, walking distance from Westgate mall with latest movies. Hotel shuttle very happy to drive to mall and back, till late Fantastic stay
title: First visit in Nairobi

hotel: Sankara Nairobi, Autograph Collection by Marriott
review: I recently chose to hold a  breakfast meeting at the Sankara Hotel,  went to the first floor restaurant where everything was world class,  from the wide variety of items to choose from, they even  have lamb sausages! ! ! the breakfast pudding will definitely bring me back .. The staff from the  waiters, the supervisors to the manager were excellent,  a  lot of attention was given a and with the best attitude. . The only down side was the security at the entrance, they did their job well but with no customer care , very dull , not welcoming ..However I will surely be back...
title: Amazing breakfast and service

hotel: Sankara Nairobi, Autograph Collection by Marriott
review: Sankora still leads Westland hotels in service and style. The food is also wonderful and delicious. The service was attentive and detail oriented which made me feel right at home. The roof top bar is great for quick meetings during the day but at night it gets busy. The hotel also boasts a great gym and pool.
title: Nice rooms

hotel: Sankara Nairobi, Autograph Collection by Marriott
review: Sankara is the place where Staff value the Customers , From Friendly  security check to the Restaurant i rate Sankara as a real home for the homeless!  I must appreciate the Management for the sacrifice done to ensure the level of service delivery  is never compromised , the Restaurant team nailed it.  The food was prepared to the perfection - the pork belly was soooo yummy and the Chefs were  at hand to add more food.The sparkling wine was flowing -- until  i stopped Samuel. Ididn't pay for the parking!! save it to the manager and his amazing  team.be sure of more business from my family.  kudos to chef for being good to my gals at the play place and band for playing good music.
title: Service Masters

hotel: Sankara Nairobi, Autograph Collection by Marriott
review: Had a really pleasant stay at Sankara. Stayed for 3 nights on a business trip and have no complaints.  The staff were fantastic; very helpful and friendly without being over bearing. Rooms were comfortable and most importantly for me - exceptionally clean. The wifi in my room was a little iffy but I believe this was not the case in all rooms.
title: Great business hotel in central Nairobi

hotel: Sankara Nairobi, Autograph Collection by Marriott
review: We booked a table for 4 at the fine dining restaurant. After arriving and being seated they started setting the table. We asked for wine list 3 times...it took an age to get the wine we ordered. Food took so long we left...very disappointing....tried this as somewhere new in Nairobi, will not rush back.
title: Poor restaurant experience

hotel: Sankara Nairobi, Autograph Collection by Marriott
review: Despite having traveled fairly extensively within Africa, I never had the opportunity to travel to Nairobi till recently. The confluence of some business related opportunities recently necessitated a business trip on my part to Nairobi .  Fortunately for me, I was travelling from Singapore (my current base) with a colleague who is familiar with the CIty and I never really gave it much thought when he took it upon himself to arrange the local logistics. That included a reservation at Sankara for the duration of our stay.  We were scheduled to arrive separately. Airport pick up had been arranged through the Sankara and efficient coordination on the part of their airport staff made it a breeze getting settled in my vehicle. The chauffeur greeted with me with - "Long flight Sir? You
title: My first trip to Nairobi made memorable by Sankara

hotel: Sankara Nairobi, Autograph Collection by Marriott
title: It was okay

hotel: Sankara Nairobi, Autograph Collection by Marriott
review: We visited Sankara for Sunday brunch,I loved the ambiance. I have IBS, therefore I made sure I let them know in advance so they can include a few gluten free items. When we got there, the host was so helpful, making sure we had everything we needed, except gluten free bread, desert. Everything was well labeled "gluten' I hoped to see 'gluten free'. I was pretty disappointed. I'm not sure if they got the message or opted to ignore it. I'd advice you call, write, tweet to make sure the message is well received.
title: Terrific staff

hotel: Sankara Nairobi, Autograph Collection by Marriott
review: Stayed at Sankara for 6 days in late-May / early-June 2017 for a business trip. The hotel is well situated in Westlands, and has terrific staff.  They are helpful, friendly and efficient.  Overall, the hotel is lovely.  The rooms are comfortable, and the bed linens and pillows divine.  The restaurant breakfast is as you would expect in any business hotel.  Their 7th floor "supper club" has a fun atmosphere for casual snack or after dinner drinks.
title: Excellent hospitality

hotel: Sankara Nairobi, Autograph Collection by Marriott
review: I have stayed several times at the Sankara. It is a fabulous hotel .  warmth and natural hospitality is extended by the staff at ALL levels. The staff who picked me up at the airport/airport transfer driver said "You will be home soon" which is wonderful way to welcome a guest.   Food is excellent. Graze (steakhouse) restaurant has wide variety of cuts and a pleasant ambiance. The club lounge gives you access to meeting rooms and a nice selection of F&B.  The rooftop terrace bar and lounge provides a relaxed atmosphere to have informal meetings or catch up with friends. The best part of the Sankara are its staff - they make you feel very much at home. thank you to the Sankara team and look forward to staying there again.
title: great rooftop experience

hotel: Sankara Nairobi, Autograph Collection by Marriott
review: We visited Sankara for Sunday brunch and the offers was worthy visiting.Hostess was dressed in a long bluish dress which set the mood for the party !  Our waiter explained to us all the details of the buffets offer patiently.The  service was first class.It was such a wonderful time.  By 4PM we were ready to leave Sankara with good memories only for the Band and Staff o add more by singing Happy birthday to me..  mmmmmmmmmmmm-Next time i will use you to surprise my love.  Thank you Sankara for a nice experience !
title: Specialized Services

hotel: Sankara Nairobi, Autograph Collection by Marriott
review: You know you are at Sankara when you are ushered in with a warm welcome by the Lobby team. The service was seamless and attentive - the servers are trained to address the patrons by their names.The moment was created at the first floor Restaurant when my business partner who was staying at the hotel was served without his order being taken.When i asked how did they know your preferences, He said "These are real professionals" they know business people hate constant interruptions when in deep conversations.  A tour to their seven floor Bar was worth it and the piped music complimented the environment.  Sankara you are the best and keep on setting the standards.I will visit with my Family soonest.
title: Memorable Expirience

hotel: Sankara Nairobi, Autograph Collection by Marriott
review: Checked in Monday and Checked out Friday.  everything was awesome and Sankara never ceases to amuse me with the big 5 souvenirs.  the people are all warm and so helpful. From arrival till departure, its indeed a home away from home.  Mercy, you made my stay the warmest!!  Nga
title: Business Meeting

hotel: Sankara Nairobi, Autograph Collection by Marriott
review: Had such a fantastic time at this hotel. Good resturants Good customer service and great room.  Sheesha at the rooftop bar is overpriced but generally happy with everything.   Will return on my next business trip.
title: Wonderful Hotel

hotel: Sankara Nairobi, Autograph Collection by Marriott
review: Lovely luxurious hotel, great rooms & great food... but it is the team that make this hotel stellar.  Only minor complaint is noise from whatever was above my room on 3rd floor but apart from that, great!
title: The Sankara staff make the hotel 5*

hotel: Sankara Nairobi, Autograph Collection by Marriott
review: I was recently passing through Nairobi for work and had another wonderful stay at Sankara. The service was exceptional (as always), my room was very comfortable and the breakfast delicious. Thank you for the wonderful stay!
title: Another Wonderful Stay

hotel: Sankara Nairobi, Autograph Collection by Marriott
review: I stayed in the Sankara for a week on business travel. June 3 through 9. Top notch service and experience across the board. The service from valet, front desk, gym, bar, room service, housekeeping - top notch. If I ever visit Nairobi again, there is nowhere else I would want to stay. NO issues with WiFi as I had at another hotel in Ghana. Rooftop pool and bar were awesome and fun. Loved it.
title: One of the best hotels I've ever stayed in period

hotel: Sankara Nairobi, Autograph Collection by Marriott
review: I stayed at Sankara Hotel for more than 9 days as we had an intensive training in Kenya! My title summarizes my experience.  It was my home away from home these days. Discrete 5 star service in all dimensions.    The room was cozy and spacious, in warm colors with several small details which make you feel comfortable as you would be at home.  Excellent matrixes, but above all rich pillows in which you fall asleep in a moment.    The food is an experience by itself. African tastes mixed with Indian choices and Italian delicatessens, topped with the best in bakery and deserts - the Danish cuisine... You will certainly enjoy this dimension.  Staff are another element of the story.  Discrete, always there and yet never too visible. You have a feeling your privacy is protected, while
title: Discrete luxury in Kenya!

hotel: Sankara Nairobi, Autograph Collection by Marriott
title: Calming

hotel: Sankara Nairobi, Autograph Collection by Marriott
review: I was there for business and was pleased with a very calming and peaceful experience when i used to be back and yet this was very central to the Westlands and a good place to stay.  The staff are amazing too :D Special thanks !!
title: Nice relaxing environment.

hotel: Sankara Nairobi, Autograph Collection by Marriott
review: An exquisite brunch with endless Champagne, met the Executive Chef Blane.   The food was amazing, excellent cold starters and salads.  The hot dishes were truly wonderful!  A live band played quietly and is open from 12-4!  Go there when in Nairobi.
title: Sunday Brunch

hotel: Sankara Nairobi, Autograph Collection by Marriott
review: I have stayed at the Sankara Hotel many times - this time for 3 weeks. The standard of service, the cleanliness of the room, the special treatment, the friendliness of the staff never wanes. It is always such an inviting place, and one that feels very much like home.   The bed is large and comfortable, the room is large and spacious, the amenities are good quality, and the bathroom has both shower and bath. The breakfast area, the coffee lounges, the champagne bar and the roof top restaurant are all worth a visit.   I particularly want to thank my turn-down staff member who came in the evening and was always so polite, friendly, and service-orientated with a big smile. Nothing was too much trouble for him on floor 3.   I will definitely return again.
title: I keep on returning to this wonderful hotel

hotel: Sankara Nairobi, Autograph Collection by Marriott
review: Friendly staff, good food - several restaurants to choose from. Rooftop bar and a nice spa and health club. Good location and high security. The staff is well trained and You avoid the usual issues with scams.
title: Consistant 5*

hotel: Sankara Nairobi, Autograph Collection by Marriott
review: Very well trained and friendly staff, lovely hotel and ambiance, anything you ask is never a problem or an inconvenience for them. Wifi NEVER gave a problem and it was so easy to connect to.   The amenities, bed and linen is of very high standards and i loved the little ornaments with a brief history of the ornaments that are left daily in the room.  A few negatives is that the bacon was always a little over cooked, the cappuccinos came a little warm instead of hot and the bathroom amenities were not always replaced and consistent after daily cleaning. However i would definitely go back to Sankara if i visited Nairobi again.
title: Top Class Hotel

hotel: Sankara Nairobi, Autograph Collection by Marriott
review: Have stayed here many times since it opened and despite new opposition retains the same standards.  Helpful staff and good food and service.  Well appointed rooms.  To be picky it took a while to get a short ironed late on Sunday evening for the Monday morning and breakfast lacks the raw juice drinks they used to do but otherwise the best hotel in Nairobi
title: First class hotel consistent quality

hotel: Sankara Nairobi, Autograph Collection by Marriott
review: I organized my high school Prom at this hotel in November 2016 and they had the best service I have ever witnessed in my life. From complimentary rooms to friendly staff, the entire atmosphere was very professional yet friendly.  Perfect location too, as it's in the middle of Westlands where most of the nightlife is located.   There's a rooftop bar and pool that has a perfect atmosphere for couples, and for a solo swim that overlooks the Westlands Area.  Def worth the price.
title: Best Customer Service

hotel: Sankara Nairobi, Autograph Collection by Marriott
review: I visited the Sankara recently, for the first time. It was a very good hotel, at the top end of the spectrum. Good facilities, including bars, restaurants, business centre, etc. The rooms were very nice and spacious. The WiFi worked, too. The mini bar was also well stocked.  However, I was quite shocked by the fact that the wall separating the bathroom and main part of the room had an enormous window, meaning that you could see right into the bathroom. This was not too bad, as I was travelling alone. But, if I had been sharing with someone, there would have been no privacy - at all. Not even when sitting on the loo! I eventually noticed a Venetian blind, which I pulled down immediately. So, this resolved the problem. But, what on earth were the designers thinking? I thought it
title: What an odd bathroom arrangement!

hotel: Sankara Nairobi, Autograph Collection by Marriott
title: Brief but nice visit

hotel: Sankara Nairobi, Autograph Collection by Marriott
review: I stayed here for one night during a business trip. It is not a "sky scraper" hotel, just a few floors. Check-in was efficient and friendly. The room was spacious, clean and well furnished. Wi-fi was free, easy to connect to and very quick - far quicker than a lot of North American hotels I have stayed at.  Breakfast was very good, with the breakfast area tastefully furnished. Check out was as efficient and friendly as check-in. I didn't use of any of the hotel's other facilities so am unable to comment. Short though it was, I really enjoyed my stay and will definitely stay here again when next in Nairobi.
title: Comfortable

hotel: Sankara Nairobi, Autograph Collection by Marriott
review: The hotel has seven stories built in an interesting triangle shape around an internal atrium looking down on the reception area . Carpeted passages which gives a nice combination of airy space but with a quiet warm feel.  Gym is on the 7th floor with a great view, and a nice jacuzzi.  Open top floor bar restaurant which is a great place for dinner. The conference meetings rooms are comfortable but a bit small if you have a group over 10 people. They have good sound insulation and doors which open up onto a balcony if you prefer fresh air. The tea and coffee stations are outside the room which means you can have your meeting without interruption.  Breakfast is decent and lunches excellent.  The bedrooms are well appointed and tastefully decorated. Wifi signal is strong and
title: perfect destination

hotel: Sankara Nairobi, Autograph Collection by Marriott
review: Nice but not extraordinary rooms. Very helpful and pleasant service. Lovely spa. But my room was vibrating until after 1:30 am with the loud music coming out of the hotel bar (be sure to ask for a room far away!). The room was too warm and there are no windows to open.
title: Good but with some weaknesses

hotel: Sankara Nairobi, Autograph Collection by Marriott
review: The Sankara is wholly clean, comfortable, and inviting. The staff are welcoming and helpful without exception. From Hilda in housekeeping to Eric at the bell stand to Eric the driver, staff are exceptional. I always look forward to my next visit to Nairobi, and to Sankara.
title: Love the Sankara

hotel: Sankara Nairobi, Autograph Collection by Marriott
review: I had a Strategic meeting at Sankara and my experience was very good.The staff were very professional.Rosemary our waitress was very attentive and well informed on the products especially the pastries.This was my first time to see a well knowledgeable waitress,calm and very joyful. The service was very ' very prompt.  The Manager checked on us and even proposed that we visit and experience their Brunch on Sundays.I will have to treat my family at Sankara as a way of appreciating your quality services. I rate you 9/10. You excel in customer service.
title: The Best of Nairobi

hotel: Sankara Nairobi, Autograph Collection by Marriott
review: Had an opportunity to book a friend that was in the country for treatment at the Sankara and the service was amazing from reception to the restaurants. Special thanks to Beth who referred us to the hotel and the reception staff that were most kind and understanding and Geff who on the 2nd visit waited for us till past midnight and got us a room despite the hotel being full and us making a last minute booking. He was very calm and collected made us feel very at home. Also one of the concierge who went to buy us meds on more than one occasion sadly don't remember his name. Also the breads at the deli are heavenly. Best breads in Nairobi.
title: Very hospitable

hotel: Sankara Nairobi, Autograph Collection by Marriott
review: I am late in posting, but decided, as I was reviewing a fantastic place, that i should actually submit this, as it was completely unacceptable. I reserved a table here with two colleagues for Boxing Day 2016. The actual restaurant and service by our waiter was good, and by no means his fault, that he received my ire. The menu and wine list were given. On the 3rd attempt we managed to obtain a wine that was in their stock (knowing it was Christmas and busy, one perhaps expects it, however, the waiter does not have to take &15 mns each time to see if there are any bottles in stock). My colleagues ordered just a main, both chose from the Indian menu, I decided to have a starter as well as a main course. I ordered the fish with chorizo and avocado starter. Imagine my surprise when
title: Artisan Restaurant - A Major Let Down

hotel: Sankara Nairobi, Autograph Collection by Marriott
review: The hotel is very good and the service is very lovely and proactive. I thought the price is too high but then I understood it was Nairobi high season. The staff are willing to help with outside arrangements for site seeing, external bookings and safaris. They keep making sure that you are fine. The business center was very good. The staff were attending to all the ad hock special requests that I made and were very patient and understanding.
title: 2 day business training

hotel: Sankara Nairobi, Autograph Collection by Marriott
review: I felt like going out for brunch and, since I saw the great reviews of Sankara's Sunday brunch on tripadvisor, I decided to try it. The food was rather disappointing, as there were barely any real "breakfast" items such as eggs -e.g., poached eggs, florentine eggs-, pancakes, bacon, waffles, or fruit, and the pastries and breads such as small croissants didn't seem too fresh. My friend and I had a nice time, as the music was nice and the prosseco was quite nice, but we agreed we wouldn't go back. Also, we were a bit shocked to see that they charged us for water! (especially since a smallish bottle of local water was 6 bucks! highly overpriced. At least 1 bottle should come with the 40 buck brunch tab).
title: Brunch was disappointing

hotel: Sankara Nairobi, Autograph Collection by Marriott
review: Good internet on the 6th floor, clean and amazing personnel and service.   Personnel is there to help and make you feel comfortable at all times.  I'm a fuzzy sleeper and had issues with pillows, they accommodated my pillows to the one I felt comfortable and was able to have a good sleep.  The business lounge is a good place to either relax or keep working, the service is good and good finger food.
title: Business traveller

hotel: Sankara Nairobi, Autograph Collection by Marriott
review: We had a private business Dinner at the Sankara.  I must say the service was excellent from the minute we walked in.  The waiters were very helpful and went right away to get my gingerale even though it was not on the menu. Got it in 5 minutes! The meal was really good too with amazing choices especially in the dessert section.  I would definitely recommend this place.
title: Went for Dinner

hotel: Sankara Nairobi, Autograph Collection by Marriott
review: I stayed at Sankara for 5 nights. I also hosted an international seminar at this hotel. All attendees praised the quality of the food and the service at the venue. As per my stay, Sankara offers high-standard accomodation and service. If you have the time, treat yourself at the spa, after a long day of work, the service and facilities up there are equally awesome!
title: A must for business travellers and for hosting an international conference

hotel: Sankara Nairobi, Autograph Collection by Marriott
review: I needed to book a meeting room for a days event, at short notice and I have to say that Dorcus (staff member) did an exceptional job. One phone call and 5 minutes later and everything was organized--all needs catered for in a very professional manner. It was an absolute pleasure to do business. Well done
title: great service

hotel: Sankara Nairobi, Autograph Collection by Marriott
review: This is a 1st class hotel by every standard.  Amazing service, food, beds...the steakhouse is fantastic -great value! I also enjoyed the cleanliness and little safari animals I received daily which are now on display in my son's room.
title: 5 stars all the way

hotel: Sankara Nairobi, Autograph Collection by Marriott
review: I've stayed at the Sankara more than a dozen times and like the hotel a lot. In general, the staff are friendly and accommodating.   Strengths: the hotel has good food, comfortable beds, a nice exercise area and steam room, and is well connected to other service partners like taxis and excursions.  Weaknesses: the hotel is run down, especially some of the rooms, the pool is in the bar area and so is not super comfortable to swim in--especially in the evening when there are many people at the bar watching you, once I tried to order high tea (which the advertise everywhere in the hotel) and it lead to 90 minutes of confusion and disappointment.
title: Comfortable hotel with friendly service, rooms are a bit worn down

hotel: Sankara Nairobi, Autograph Collection by Marriott
review: From the first greeting to a "look forward to seeing you again" the Sankara has to have the most polite and courteous staff (waiter, waitress, cook, door man, bartender, front desk, maids) anywhere.  Comfortable, safe and secure.  It didn't take long for hotel staff to address me by my name. Room was clean. The food the very good, a nice variety in the three restaurants/dining areas.  The fitness center is good, but could use some update. Internet connectivity could be improved.  The hotel is very accommodating and makes traveling easy. The surprise on my date of departure shows attention to detail.  Seeing that I was departing close to my birthday I was surprised by a card and tiramisu when I returned to my room.  Thank you so much and hope to see you again soon.
title: Why I'll be back again

hotel: Sankara Nairobi, Autograph Collection by Marriott
review: Great experience, friendly staff and great service. The room was good and the food too. Graze restaurant was exceptional. Business center staff are very helpful and alert! Moses from sales and Mathew at the business center were very helpful.
title: Good hotel for business trips

hotel: Sankara Nairobi, Autograph Collection by Marriott
review: Great spot to use as a base for Nairobi visits. All creature comforts available. Staff are super friendly and helpful. Well appointed rooms with great views. Spa gym and pool areas are great spots to unwind after a long day. Close to all the good lounges and bars in Westland.
title: Perfectly comfortable

hotel: Sankara Nairobi, Autograph Collection by Marriott
review: Very nice property. Not far from Westgate Mall or Sarit Center. Staff are very friendly and helpful. Clean rooms, no issues with using my power adapter or sheets not being changed, etc. If you are a sport fan, they have Super Sport in your room so you can watch football, rugby, etc if you want to chill.   I didn't try any lunches or dinners here, but the breakfast buffet was very good. Good selection of pastries, meat, fruit, etc, and the chef will make eggs how you like them. I used the gym a couple of times-dumbbells, benches, and one or two weight machines plus an elliptical and couple of treadmills. Good for a hotel gym.
title: Very comfortable stay

hotel: Sankara Nairobi, Autograph Collection by Marriott
review: The hotel is excellent in every single way!! From the guards, receptionist, the food, drinks and you should have a look at their rooms!! This is the place to be and their DJ on Saturdays night will leave you dancing the whole night!!!
title: Birthday treat

hotel: Sankara Nairobi, Autograph Collection by Marriott
review: Stylish upscale hotel, nice restaurants and good weekend entertainment by the rooftop swimming pool.  The live band is wonderful.  Rooms are very clean and modern and the service is exceptional in Nairobi.
title: Excellent

hotel: Sankara Nairobi, Autograph Collection by Marriott
review: Went to sankara for brunch with friends. The setting and welcome was good. The service was ok. The food was ok could have done with more variety and the dessert too could have better. The discount given to us was negligible. All in all we had a good time.
title: Brunch

hotel: Sankara Nairobi, Autograph Collection by Marriott
