review: Very stylish, well maintained and clean hotel with all the desired amenities of a modern, western hotel. Staff is very well trained and friendly. Service is professional and top class. Staff really makes an effort to attract and retain customers. Highly recommended for business trips as all functions and guest invites can happen here with an ambience of professionalism and dedication.
title: Highly recommendable stay

hotel: Sankara Nairobi, Autograph Collection by Marriott
review: I travel through Nairobi regularly on business and the Sankara is by far my preferred choice. There are lower cost hotels in town but not close to this standard, it feels totally safe, relaxed and the rooms are well laid out with a useful working desk area. The staff are very friendly and helpful, the gymn is well equipped and clean and there is a choice of eating and drinking areas. Not to mention the rooftop pool with the glass bottom section!  They can arrange airport pick up and drop off and also have twin rooms which can help with the cost if you don't mind sharing!
title: Another Excellent stay

hotel: Sankara Nairobi, Autograph Collection by Marriott
review: Great location, great spa, excellent restaurants and very friendly staff. It is always a pleasure to stay here. Pre order a transfer from airport, and the good service starts there. International breakfast
title: 5* in Nairobi

hotel: Sankara Nairobi, Autograph Collection by Marriott
review: My partner stays here on business as it's very central so he wanted me to experience it.   It is absolutely beautiful, very stylish and clean cut lines.   The roof terrace open champagne bar and bar are very relaxing and we spent hours unwinding there. There are several tables and couches for you to sit around their infinity pool and you can order bar snacks. We opted for a few tapas dishes and they were absolutely gorgeous.  Well worth the visit.
title: Fantastic stay

hotel: Sankara Nairobi, Autograph Collection by Marriott
review: Returned to Nairobi after 32 yrs. and boy has Westlands changed!  With  all the new development the Sankara Hotel and a welcome oasis.  It's a lovely boutique hotel that features amazing art and great service.  The rooms are spacious and comfortable, the restaurants serve delicious food and the view from the rooftop bar gives a great sense of the vibrancy of Nairobi. It has a well outfitted gym and the spa is lovely.  The hotel seems to cater to business mtgs and conferences, to which it is well suited.  Very close to shopping malls and services.  If you are planning travel to Nairobi, skip the chain hotels and visit the Sankara!
title: Lovely Oasis in Westlands Nairobi

hotel: Sankara Nairobi, Autograph Collection by Marriott
review: On many occasions, I have had impromptu meetings and brunch engagements at Sankara Hotel. I have always had excellent service from the staff and especially Faith (Hostess). She often went out of her way to accommodate my needs in creating a great environment for my engagements and even handling special meal requirements. I also like the security of the hotel. I consider it one of the most secure hotels I have visited. Overall, it is in a great location with access to many resources for visitors.
title: Hospitality of Staff

hotel: Sankara Nairobi, Autograph Collection by Marriott
review: On a week long business trip we had the most fantastic stay in the Sankara. The decor is bang up to date and of the highest standard, as are the rooms which are well appointed, with some really nice touches to make it a little homely.   One of the main highlights is the rooftop bar, which serves top notch cocktails and provides one of the best views of the city I've seen, particularly spectacular at night. Also well worth a visit if you get the chance is the steak restaurant - which must be one of, if not the, best in Nairobi!  The staff were fantastic throughout, and I'd like to particularly highlight Joyce, one of the customer service managers who was super helpful for the whole stay.  I would highly recommend the Sankara, it is easily the nicest hotel I've stayed at in
title: Roof Bar and view amazing, Staff fantastic!

hotel: Sankara Nairobi, Autograph Collection by Marriott
title: Rooftop bar is the best!

hotel: Sankara Nairobi, Autograph Collection by Marriott
review: Visited the Sankara Rooftop Bar with 40 people and stayed till the end. Really one of the best places to relax and enjoy yourself. Great staff, nice view, pool, secure and afordable. We can really recommend this!
title: Very good hotel in Nairobi

hotel: Sankara Nairobi, Autograph Collection by Marriott
review: A great hotel if you are travelling for business. Good internet, very good breakfast and good location. They give you little statues of the big 5 for you to build a collection and that makes it fun. The staff is very helpful and polite.
title: Lovely Sankara

hotel: Sankara Nairobi, Autograph Collection by Marriott
review: We were five people who went for dinner. All order three course dinner with wine. Filet steaks were very tender and juicy with a good taste. One was a bit disappointed by the tenderness of T-bone steak, but it had a really good taste. The restaurant personal was service oriented and kind. Good steaks, good ambiance and good service.
title: Graze restaurant

hotel: Sankara Nairobi, Autograph Collection by Marriott
review: This was my fourth time staying at the Sankara.  Each time has been a pleasure and exceeded expectations.  I have found all the staff to be very helpful and customer focused.  The rooms are very clean and well appointed.  The breakfast isn't cheap - but very good with many varieties of food available. For me - a hotel can always have a "good day" or a "bad day" but with four straight excellent stays - I will continue to book at this hotel when in Nairobi
title: 4th great stay in 2 years!

hotel: Sankara Nairobi, Autograph Collection by Marriott
review: The Sankara staff are very friendly and always attentive to guests' needs.  From the restaurant to the concierge and front desk staff, I felt that I was being pampered.  The restaurant is convenient and provides a variety of delicious offerings.  Arranging for taxi service and timely turnaround on laundry requests were all handled with a smile and desire to please.  The accommodations are very modern and comfortable.  No complaints.  this is the second time I've stayed at the Sankara and will go back again.
title: Safe, centric and overall outstanding place to stay in Nairobi

hotel: Sankara Nairobi, Autograph Collection by Marriott
review: I happened to stay at the Sankara during a business trip.  It's a brilliant hotel with amazing staff, the rooms were roomy and the bathroom was also great. The real highlight though, was the rooftop area where the young business crowd meet for after-work drinks and those who fancy it, take a dip in the pool. It has amazing views and great cocktails.
title: Swimming Pools & Dozens of Smiles

hotel: Sankara Nairobi, Autograph Collection by Marriott
review: The hotel is located in a busy part of the city but you would not know that once you are at the hotel. Great roof top bar to relax with friends over a beer or a good range of cocktails. Great breakfast -  excellent buffer selection. Dinner was also great with the waiter going out of his way to ask the chèf to modify a recipe for us - adding chicken for us non vegetarian.  The spa was awesome. I had one of the packages which left me refreshed and relaxed. Will definitely be back next time am in Nairobi.  Asante dans.
title: Serene escape in the heart of Nairobi

hotel: Sankara Nairobi, Autograph Collection by Marriott
review: A very comfortable hotel with great services and facilities. Very good value for money. A very welcoming front desk staff, comfortable rooms, very functional lounge and sumptuous breakfast. With a great atmosphere too at the bar on the top floor, we really enjoyed our stay.
title: Sankara Hotel Nairobi

hotel: Sankara Nairobi, Autograph Collection by Marriott
review: The hotel was everything you could ask for.  Good service, clean facilities, decent gym.  I would recommend this hotel. The only disappointment was the steakhouse in the hotel, which was overpriced and very average.
title: Excellent hotek

hotel: Sankara Nairobi, Autograph Collection by Marriott
review: On a business trip early November. Loved the room, the food and the service from all staff. Mercy at the front desk offered exceptional service and very friendly doorman by the name of John. Well done to SANKARA.
title: Lovely Hotel

hotel: Sankara Nairobi, Autograph Collection by Marriott
review: A long overdue review.  On a business trip earlier this year, our regular Nairobi hotels were fully booked, and we decided to try the Sankara hotel for the week.  Apart from the great location, super comfortable room, it was the staff and service received that has made this our regular hotel of choice.  After an initial misunderstanding, I was referred to the front office supervisor on duty that day, Rachel, to attend to the problem.  She was exceptionally attentive and professional in not only resolving the issue on the day, but also continued to follow up with us for the rest of the week to ensure a perfect stay.  A last-minute meeting room request was accommodated and well-prepared for. Special mention also to the breakfast staff for their attentive service each morning, to
title: Fantastic staff!

hotel: Sankara Nairobi, Autograph Collection by Marriott
title: Fabulous hotel

hotel: Sankara Nairobi, Autograph Collection by Marriott
review: Treated myself to a night away from home. Check in was quite pleasant and the ladies at reception upgraded my room :) the room was nice and bright, the bed amazing and the view of surrounding west-lands quite amazing. I had dinner in the room, can't remember but it was a chicken bacon dish - quite dry but not that bad.  Breakfast array was great but the lounge seats at the corners are not very comfortable for the table height.  They also agreed for a late checkout so I got to laze around in the amazing bed a while longer :)
title: A break from busy Nairobi

hotel: Sankara Nairobi, Autograph Collection by Marriott
review: An amazing hotel more so for business. The food, staff, facilities and rooms are excellent. My experience and that of guests hosted there was excellent. The security is also thorough and but extremely friendly.
title: Amazing hotel

hotel: Sankara Nairobi, Autograph Collection by Marriott
review: I love the staff in Sankara, they always make me feel welcome and not lonely. They do genuinely care about their guests well-being. I am looking forward to coming back later on this year to catch up with them.
title: Amazing Staff and Facilities

hotel: Sankara Nairobi, Autograph Collection by Marriott
review: This is a perfect business hotel. Wonderful bedrooms, excellent conference facilities, great food, and very well located, close to two malls. I went for early morning runs at 6am and quickly found very pleasant residential streets that felt safe. Staff were always going the extra mile. Highly recommended for business.
title: Superb hotel exceptional staff

hotel: Sankara Nairobi, Autograph Collection by Marriott
review: I stayed there as a Keynote Speaker from the US.  The compound is very safe and comfortable.  You cannot really leave the compound except via car as the area is difficult.  The breakfast buffet is excellent and the service is terrific.  The staff are friendly and professional.  The gym is nice and the pool is pleasant.
title: Nice hotel, great staff and service!

hotel: Sankara Nairobi, Autograph Collection by Marriott
review: The beginning was not really good, since I booked the room they asked me to confirm than confirm and re confirm again. Also the check in was too cold and without particular attentions to me, no one was ready to help me with the luggage. But the room was very good, well equipped and furnished. Breakfast it’s outstanding and the terrace bar an aggregating point with add value. During my stay the staff was very helpful, except while checking in, professional and ready to answer to all my needs. I’ll be back.
title: One of the best

hotel: Sankara Nairobi, Autograph Collection by Marriott
review: First of all they have the best Saturday night chill spot at their roof top bar with an awesome DJ who caters for all music tastes. The fact that they also have the gas warmers helps for the chilly evenings.1 Then their Sunday brunch is completely to die for, with their bottomless cocktails, proseco and beer... The dessert section is just ridiculously awesome and the food so delicious. Their staff are so welcoming attentive and ever so friendly Good job Sankara I would def give you more stars
title: Perfect weekend spot

hotel: Sankara Nairobi, Autograph Collection by Marriott
review: I remember first trying out Sankara's brunch at some point in 2016 and I enjoyed it. The salad bar in particular was super fresh and lots of fun, choices. Fast forward a year, and it's honestly become my fave place to spend a long, leisurely Sunday afternoon. First of all, Sankara have the most interesting mains choices. Added to that, I could not get enough of their salad bar and their dessert spread is beyond sublime!  Also, open bars. Your choice of cocktails, beers, and sparkles. It's a Sunday so you're really not going to partake that much, but you def feel as though you are getting the best bang for your buck.  Top job, Sankara! Definitely coming back soon!
title: My favourite Brunch in Nairobi

hotel: Sankara Nairobi, Autograph Collection by Marriott
review: Well located, good service and stunning meat restaurant. Only problem for sleeping is the noise from the bars and night clubs besides. In any case,  very good hotel for business trips. Location is great
title: Best hotel in Westlands

hotel: Sankara Nairobi, Autograph Collection by Marriott
review: Situated in the heart of  Westlands about 25km from the city, its quite central and safe. The staffs are quite helpful and attentive. The restaurants......... definitely worth a try, but a bit expensive.
title: Fancy, Chill and Relaxed

hotel: Sankara Nairobi, Autograph Collection by Marriott
review: One of the best place to stay in Nairobi  Great hotel ! Excellent service excellent food great fitness and great food ! I have always enjoyed staying there and will always comeback ! The staff is professional and genuinely friendly !
title: Excellent as usual

hotel: Sankara Nairobi, Autograph Collection by Marriott
review: 2nd time to go...Sankara has a good ambience..cant tell its on the cross road of busy westlands..very quiet rooms and the best part is warm heated beds. The asian masseuse ladies are good at their work...get the deep tissue massage and they step on your back. Costs approx $70 depending on massage.  👍🏽👍🏽
title: Relaxing massage

hotel: Sankara Nairobi, Autograph Collection by Marriott
review: I loved staying at this hotel, safe and comfortable. The room is perfect. The staff always makes you feel special. The rooftop with the pool is very nice; great DJ. The gym has all you need too. There are several restaurants in the hotel and therefore different food options (buffet, steak house...). I checked out to go on a safari and came back for my last night in Nairobi. Highly recommended!
title: Great hotel in Nairobi!

hotel: Sankara Nairobi, Autograph Collection by Marriott
review: I stayed in Sankara hotel Nairobi for business, the hotel location is just 5 minutes walking to our Regional Office in Westland area, however they give me compliment taxi ride from the hotel to our office or vice versa- really helpful when I leae office a bit late they can pick me up. First time travel to Africa and I experienced the warmest hospitality from the time I checked in up to the day I checked out, from the front desk staff to house keeping staff they are all warm, friendly and respectful.  The hotel room is spacious for me as I stayed alone, I like the idea of transparant wall between the bedroom and the bathroom, you can close the horisontal blind if you uncomfortable with that. If you kind of sporty person, they have gym at the 7th floor, at the same floor you also
title: Warmest Hospitality

hotel: Sankara Nairobi, Autograph Collection by Marriott
title: Stay here if you are on honeymoon!

hotel: Sankara Nairobi, Autograph Collection by Marriott
review: Excellent service and hospitality - couldn't do more to make our stay comfortable - especially Rachel and Mary!!  Lovely roof top bar and pool - very clean and safe - close to shops and restaurants. Reliable wifi!! Always a pleasure staying here.
title: Best of Nairobi

hotel: Sankara Nairobi, Autograph Collection by Marriott
review: One of the best in Nairobi and probably thje whole of Africa, their rooms are spacious, comfortable and classic. This Hotel is located in a safe, cool and friendly enviroment. Their staff are offer great hospitality in all ways. I recommend it to anyone willing to spend a night in Nairobi.
title: Safe, cool and comfortable

hotel: Sankara Nairobi, Autograph Collection by Marriott
review: Everything was excellent. The spa , room,breakfast was all amazing .They did a special honeymoon decoration in the room which was beautiful. Wife was very surprised.Will definitely plan a trip back there.
title: Truly 5 Star

hotel: Sankara Nairobi, Autograph Collection by Marriott
review: The staff was cordial, the team was polite, the rooms and halls were very clean, and the food was very good. The room was a bit pricey, but it was well worth it! I would definitely stay at the Sankara in the future!
title: One of the top 5 hotels that I've visited in Africa

hotel: Sankara Nairobi, Autograph Collection by Marriott
review: I frequent Sankara Hotel multiple times a year. I arrive and I’m greeted with smiles, professionalism and friendship.  The hotel rooms are clean and modern. The free miniature stone animal, that’s free, is a nice addition. I continue to stay at Sankara because they truly care about your experience.
title: Great experience

hotel: Sankara Nairobi, Autograph Collection by Marriott
review: We stayed at this property the day before leaving Nairobi, in hopes of relaxation and comfort.  Sankara exceeded our expectations on all counts.  The public spaces are lovely, front desk and all staff we encountered were friendly, helpful, professional and well trained.  Our standard room was very nicely appointed with great bed and pillows, great air conditioning, very nice toiletries, large shower and separate tub and very nice coffee service.  Fresh fruit was brought in prior to our arrival and we also received a soap stone mini hippo.  Breakfast buffet was very good as well as coffee shop and bar.  Shopping is right across the street at a mall or the rustic market with crafts and plenty of bartering.  I would highly recommend this property and if I have the opportunity to
title: Great Service, Food and Location

hotel: Sankara Nairobi, Autograph Collection by Marriott
title: Comfortable stay in a nice neighborhood

hotel: Sankara Nairobi, Autograph Collection by Marriott
review: Pros: - Hotel is beautiful with perfect service and nice staff. - Hotel's location is walking distance from West Gate mall, basically anything u need is there from shopping to groceries. - Nice flee market nearby for souvenir shopping. - I traveled for business purposes, hotel was relatively close to most location I wanted to visit for business. In Kenya's traffic this is as good as it gets.  Cons: - Rooms are not that spacious. - Same as most hotels in Kenya, there are no Smoking friendly rooms available, nor there are rooms with balconies.
title: A homely hotel in the right location

hotel: Sankara Nairobi, Autograph Collection by Marriott
review: Lovely ambiance, welcoming staff and artistic walls. The rooftop bar and swimming pool is a winner anytime.  In a fantastic location close to eateries, banks, ATMs, malls and clubs (if that is your thing)
title: Way overpriced, poor value

hotel: Sankara Nairobi, Autograph Collection by Marriott
review: A nice hotel, nothing special, but they charge over $300/day with no breakfast!  There are many other options that are just as nice at half the price in Nairobi.  The location is good and the staff are professional, although not especially friendly.
title: Good choice of hotel in Nairobi

hotel: Sankara Nairobi, Autograph Collection by Marriott
review: I was initially booked into the Hilton, but that was a disaster and was able to get a room at the more familiar Sankara.   Still a great property. Good food at the restaurants. Friendly enough staff. The rooftop bar is good and the rooms are still well appointed.   I first visited Sankara when it was brand new, so perhaps unfair but I feel like the rooms are starting to age. Little things here and there are broken. Nothing to prevent my return but I hope management are not maximising returns at the expense of the property.
title: Good, but deteriorating

hotel: Sankara Nairobi, Autograph Collection by Marriott
review: We stayed in a Superior King Suite just after Christmas and after an 11 day stay in Mombasa at a self catering villa this was just heaven for us. A hot bath to soak in, a spacious room that at times was filled with my wife's family visiting, a really comfortable bed, lovely bathroom area, totally attentive and courteous staff who were so friendly...we just couldn't fault this place. My only criticism.. the pool area on the roof was a little disappointing during the day. Not a pool one could enjoy sitting out by and quite small. However at night a good atmosphere with DJ and bar service. I also ordered a rump steak one night as an in room meal and it was the worst I had ever tasted, so tough a steak knife wouldn't even cut it. After I complained they offered me a complimentary
title: 5 Star comfort in the heart of Nairobi

hotel: Sankara Nairobi, Autograph Collection by Marriott
title: Great hotel in an amazing location.

hotel: Sankara Nairobi, Autograph Collection by Marriott
review: Great hotel in an amazing location.  Staff was very pleasant and professional.  Food at their restaurants was very good but their champagne bar didn’t have any local beers.  Rooms were clean and bright, but the shower drainage was a problem for various rooms we stayed in December during different occasions.  Hotel also has in-house cab service which is very convenient.  Hotel is in a safe location and walking distance to various malls and restaurants.
title: Quite nice

hotel: Sankara Nairobi, Autograph Collection by Marriott
review: Sankara Nairobi is a friendly, polished and comfortable hotel. Great central location. Staff are unfailingly courteous. Instructions are followed to a T. However one blemish we found was that the swimming pool water was turbid. We were also disappointed by the tandoori chicken dish at dinner time (overdone and reheated).
title: Nice lunch buffet

hotel: Sankara Nairobi, Autograph Collection by Marriott
review: Great place, i enjoyed the spacious room, hotel have good location, and secured, staff are friendly and professional, close to my meeting place, price is bit expensive comparing with Africa cost of living, if it’s not business purpose, wouldn’t spent as much for leisure.
title: Good Hotel

hotel: Sankara Nairobi, Autograph Collection by Marriott
review: The food is great and the staff are very welcoming. The room is clean and tidy and the little gifts left at our bed side is very creative.  The restaurants food are of good quality and you don't have to wait long for your food.
title: Excellent.

hotel: Sankara Nairobi, Autograph Collection by Marriott
review: It was a very nice new discovery of a hotel to stay in when being in Nairobi. In particular the location suits well for our local agent with regard to the logistics.  Very much liked the hospitality, personal service and care taking.  Breakfast was good with a wide choice of quality food and beverages.  Friendly service of the staff. Nice coffee ( cappuccino)
title: Very welcoming and care taking

hotel: Sankara Nairobi, Autograph Collection by Marriott
review: Sankara has been one of the best hotels in Nairobi for a while now and the service and quality has not changed... Very good restaurants and bars, courteous service and detailed cleanliness. Their meat restaurant is highly recommended ....
title: Still one of the best

hotel: Sankara Nairobi, Autograph Collection by Marriott
review: Good hotel at Westlands and worth a five star. Excellent service and very tasty food. Located in Westlands, it is accessible. The guards are very friendly and waiters too. Highly recommended. Will return
title: Excellent

hotel: Sankara Nairobi, Autograph Collection by Marriott
review: I really enjoyed my stay in this hotel - it is 7 years old and feels new, and the staff were helpful. So grateful to the bellman for coming to the craft market across the street with us. I wasn't quite prepared for the experience and was glad to have him there. Leave time to check out. Not sure why in the US you can check out without even talking to staff but here it takes 15 minutes.
title: Lovely hotel with terrific staff

hotel: Sankara Nairobi, Autograph Collection by Marriott
review: I used to like this hotel.  Something has happened.  The staff are lifeless.  I arrived late Saturday from a US flight. The music was blaring from upstairs lounge at 2AM.  The next day, there was constant hammering - on a Sunday.  I paid $60 for business lounge.  The place was empty.  There was no breakfast presented.  They had togo downstairs to get my coffee!  The power keeps going out.  My TV must have a short because it keeps going on and off.  They no longer have a pad and pen but a pencil.  Things must be bad.
title: Don't Stay Here

hotel: Sankara Nairobi, Autograph Collection by Marriott
review: A great place to stay in Nairobi.  Very friendly and hospitable staff.  Guest Safety is also one of their priorities. Room service is excellent and the amenities are fantastic!  Whenever I'm in Nairobi, I always stay at Sankara.
title: A Great Hotel!

hotel: Sankara Nairobi, Autograph Collection by Marriott
review: This place is great! Beautiful hotel with friendly staff and great food.   From the moment you walk in you feel like you are a VIP.  Make sure to talk with some of the staff as they are willing to help with what ever you need.  Definitely would recommend to anyone heading to Nairobi.
title: Amazing Nairobi Hotel

hotel: Sankara Nairobi, Autograph Collection by Marriott
review: 5 star service indeed. Very detailed.  Quick check in and checkout. The staff make Sankara such a superb place to be. The roof top bar Sarabi is alittle cold but great ambiance and music and food. The breakfast however lacked variety but maybe that's just me coz everyone else was enjoying. Thank you Sankara people
title: Place to be

hotel: Sankara Nairobi, Autograph Collection by Marriott
review: I had a great dinner at Sankara last week with a group of friends. The food was delicious and the service was great. We were on the rooftop and the ambience was lovely. It was also lovely to have a great view of Nairobi at night. We will definitely go back for drinks/dinner on the rooftop again since we had a great time!

hotel: Sankara Nairobi, Autograph Collection by Marriott
review: Very, very good Hotel! I can only recommend it! And I will stay here again when I come the next time.  The rooms are very good, the Food is very good, the restauraunts, bars are very good, the Spa is very good.  The only negative is that there is only 1 room in the whole Hotel where you can open the window. And unfortunately this is really important to me.
title: Great Hotel in Nairobi!

hotel: Sankara Nairobi, Autograph Collection by Marriott
review: Great hotel for business in a fabulous location in the heart of Westlands.  Upon arrival at the airport, you are warmly welcomed by the staff at the airport and at the reception desk. ALL the staff were extremely friendly and made me feel at home.  The hotel has upgraded/renovated its room which now have a new refreshing and more elegant decor. The rooms now have a larger interactive smart TV which enhances the viewing experience.  Dining experience was fabulous - I have eaten at several steak houses/restaurants at 5 star hotels in East and Southern Africa. I would rank Graze as one of the best. The food was excellent with a wonderful ambiance. It was packed every night so clearly a popular choice for a lot of people in Nairobi.  The club lounge - I had the flexibility to book
title: Best Hotel in Nairobi

hotel: Sankara Nairobi, Autograph Collection by Marriott
title: Sankara Nairobi.... nice place

hotel: Sankara Nairobi, Autograph Collection by Marriott
review: Excellent ambience, warm welcoming staff, delicious meals, ideal location near the city Centre and just next to a big shopping mall Sarit. I would recommend anyone anytime. The security is also wonderful.
title: Excellent customer service

hotel: Sankara Nairobi, Autograph Collection by Marriott
review: After having been dissapointed several times not getting value for money while on holiday mostly in Nairobi. The stay at Sankara was magical. It turned our stay into enjoyment. The hotel rooms are wooow. Just seeing the set up brightened everyone!  Was shown the first room and we needed not to see anyother!  The staff, ooh my tgey are sososo good. Readily available to serve.  The food was yummy.  The wine galary will spoil you for choice its a must come back city hotel. Thumbs up Sankara nairobi.  We will be back!
title: Ms Japanni

hotel: Sankara Nairobi, Autograph Collection by Marriott
review: Stayed for 4days, its home away from home. Very Clean, serene, and spacious  hotel with friendly courteous staff we experienced a seamless service. The WI-FI was fast and reliable, The food was so delicious with different menu,s to choose from. i would  definitely recommend the hotel , my family loved it and i cant wait to visit Sankara again. To sankara thank you for making my holiday worthwhile and your service was exceptional.  My family and i will definitely be back. cheers
title: Awesome hotel with  an  amaizing personalised customer service

hotel: Sankara Nairobi, Autograph Collection by Marriott
review: During my recent business trip all the staff at the hotel were very helpful, and always willing to assist you.  The club lounge is very good for business meetings and all the staff in the lounge looked after both myself and my guests very well.  I should also mention John and the other door staff, who were always happy to assist with getting taxis or to provide assistance.  I will definitely be using the Sankara the next time I'm in Nairobi.
title: Great Staff, good location

hotel: Sankara Nairobi, Autograph Collection by Marriott
review: The staff are most helpful, efficient, friendly and welcoming, from the security guards at the entrance, to the cleaners, to the waitrons and management. I believe this being my 19th stay certainly gives credence to my comments. The accommodation is modern, comfortable and clean, the food delicious and beautifully prepared Its the little things that count, and they excel at this.
title: Ideal Business Hotel

hotel: Sankara Nairobi, Autograph Collection by Marriott
review: First of all, the hotel is very nice.  It has all the typical amenities of any modern hotel, and is located in a nicer area of Nairobi.  But that’s not what makes this hotel stand out...the staff of the Sankara are among the best, if not the best, that I’ve ever experienced.  Everyone goes well above and beyond to ensure every last detail of your stay is positive and tailored to fit your needs.  The desk staff, doormen, concierge staff, waitstaff and service staff were all beyond excellent.  I’ll come back to Nairobi again, and when I do, I’ll be at the Sankara.
title: The People of Sankara Hotel are Amazing

hotel: Sankara Nairobi, Autograph Collection by Marriott
review: The hotel is lovely and the staff friendly and helpful. The in room dining menu was fantastic and service was great.   Breakfast was good.   The rooms are just ok but very clean and neat!  The most special thing for me was that they gave you miniature animals when they turned down your room instead of the same old boring chocolates. Fabulous idea!   Overall 5 Stars !
title: Lovely Stay 5 stars

hotel: Sankara Nairobi, Autograph Collection by Marriott
review: We received personalized service at the hotel. We were also impressed that the General manager went to receive our Senior Pastor. The General Manager and Caroline Linguli personally supervised the setting up of the room.  All the staff at Sankara were very friendly and very professionals
title: Signing of our MoU and dinner with our partners

hotel: Sankara Nairobi, Autograph Collection by Marriott
review: I stayed early December. It was a short stay well, I was connecting to Dar es Salaam but ended up loving it. The rooms are spacious, secure, modern, strong wifi connection(best ever in Nairobi), the best stake house I've been to in Africa. Most important part is the friendliness of the staff. They make you feel at home. I was travelling alone but i'm glad to have made lots of friends in Sankara. Solomon at the Concierge, Mary at the Guest Relation, Casper at the bar, Mary from the Steak house, the gate security, I remember just afew names but most of all, I have the great memories. I will be back Sankara
title: Beautiful Hotel

hotel: Sankara Nairobi, Autograph Collection by Marriott
review: Enjoyed the experience at Opera Great cappuccino, got it in a insulated takeaway cup - no need for sleeve protection. The ambiance welcoming. My son tried the strawberry trifle cake. It was most delicious.
title: opera Cafe

hotel: Sankara Nairobi, Autograph Collection by Marriott
review: I always enjoy my stay at Sankara - it is really great to be treated like royalty. The service from start to end and throughout the hotel is 5 star!  The Graze restaurant is simply exquisite; the food is excellent, the wines are wonderful in their variety and quality, and the service was perfect. Definitely make a booking there ahead of the time to get a spot.   The suite was very nice, although it was situated right next to the service elevators and the noise during the night was a little disturbing. That wont stop me from going back for more - but next time I will ask for a differently located room.
title: Comfortable luxury

hotel: Sankara Nairobi, Autograph Collection by Marriott
review: I simply love this hotel. Previously I have been staying at the Tribe and swiched to the Sankara and I have never left. The facility is being renovated and the new rooms on the 6th floor are exquisite. I always ensure I book my team at the Sankara. The Staff are amazing. Sharon at Guest Relations is willing to help and ensures that my team and I enjoy our stay. I will always stay at Sankara if I am in Nairobi.  Tips. Always ensure you upgrade to the lounge and enjoy happy hour
title: Excellent facility and Services

hotel: Sankara Nairobi, Autograph Collection by Marriott
review: Sankara is just the place to be. I know i will be back because my family and i had such a wonderful time there.If you want to know a place is clean just check the washroom. This is how i rank all hotels i visit and to be honest i was so impressed.I had never been to your hotel before but after my experience there i know i will be back. Sarabi restaurant is just breathtaking and the food is out of this world. I would even recommend people to go for meals there when around the area.
title: Excellent Sarabi

hotel: Sankara Nairobi, Autograph Collection by Marriott
review: Location is excellent and Parking efficient If raining you need an umbrella the parking has no shade though The food was excellent, well cooked The Staff fro the parking, reception, Spa, Room service were courteous and very helpful I didn't like the pancakes though. The staff at the Sarabi were a bit Lax
title: The Sarabi Bar and the Sauna/Steam treat was awesome, The rooms are magnificent

hotel: Sankara Nairobi, Autograph Collection by Marriott
review: We had a wonderful time at this beautiful property! Everything that we could possibly need, was supplied. The Hotel itself was gorgeous with outstanding views of the sorrounding. I would definitely love to return someday and will recommend anyone wanting to go to the Sankara Nairobi to look at this property first! It served us perfectly.We used that pool every day, it was never crowded. All staff members we met were friendly and helpful well trained,smiling We felt secure and safe the entire time. This was our first vacation to Sankara but it won't be the last, we would all stay here again!
title: Judith mubhori

hotel: Sankara Nairobi, Autograph Collection by Marriott
review: Rooms are clean, but price is high compared to what is being offered by competitors.  Buffet food at times is abit cold though variety is good.    Cleanliness in the coffee shop should be improved,   General price should be lower than what is being charged.
title: Excellent service

hotel: Sankara Nairobi, Autograph Collection by Marriott
review: My stay at Sankara was awesome, the staff were friendly and welcoming. Mercy who was at the front office was always willing to help. My wife loved the service at the restaurant and so did I. I would love to come back and enjoy their services.
title: Valentine's

hotel: Sankara Nairobi, Autograph Collection by Marriott
review: I am a frequent traveller to NBO and have stayed at Sankara Nairobi for more than 13 visits in the last 3 years.  Some of the best staff are at this hotel.  Mr Solomon and Mr John at the concierge are exceptional.  They have always greeted me with a smile and are extremely courteous to me and my clients.  I hope these guys are well looked after by the company management as such efficient and hardworking staff are hard to retain in todays world.  Kudos to them for fantastic 5* service.
title: Mr

hotel: Sankara Nairobi, Autograph Collection by Marriott
review: undoubtedly the best CS in Nairobi in the corporate and hospitality fields. I have worked for top hotels in the world and having done so, tend to be very picky especially with Customer Service. Sankara is impressive. From being ushered by their overall Manager at the reception area. such a nice touch, to the lady concierge with the best smile I have seen opening doors for you and seeing you off to a lovely day. Sankara is definitely a lovely place to be. I have not dinned there yet, shortly held a meeting in their convention center on the lower floor. They have their service standards well defined. Tried some quick to go pastries at the coffee shop! AMAZING! Well I could go on and on but, I must say I was impressed
title: Excellent Customer Service

hotel: Sankara Nairobi, Autograph Collection by Marriott
review: The room was great and the staff was incredible. This was a business trip, but I feel if I come back to Nairobi I will stay with the Sankara. The hotel was beyond accommodating and the security manager was the best security manager I have had the pleasure of dealing with.
title: The staff was phenomenal!

hotel: Sankara Nairobi, Autograph Collection by Marriott
review: This being my second visit to Sankara, I loved it even more. My wife loved it and she keeps asking for another dinner again (I will come back!). I will recommend it now and now again. Friendly, happy customer service team and ready to assist. It is value for money. I have not spent a night at Sankara though.
title: Excellent Quality Service

hotel: Sankara Nairobi, Autograph Collection by Marriott
review: Overall the stay was pleasant.  There was unfortunately construction. While I was there so I couldnt sleep late without being woken up by hammering.  Lobby staff and housekeeping staff are on point.  The little gifts everyday adds a personal touch.  The buffet breakfast lacks variety in the meat department and way below average for a five star hotel.  Definitely scores average for this trip if comparing hotels in the five star range.
title: Pleasant

hotel: Sankara Nairobi, Autograph Collection by Marriott
review: The carpet was filthy and the rooms were just average for the type of money charged. Weekends are very noisy {music} at night and that made sleeping challenging. Please close attention to your restaurants {fumigate}. Staff was exceptional and needs to be better compensated.
title: The picture looks much better than the facility

hotel: Sankara Nairobi, Autograph Collection by Marriott
review: I really enjoyed my visit at Sankara, the spa rooms are clean with friendly staff, i did a massage very relaxing and proffessionaly done, dinner at Graze stake house! very tasty, the steak was perfectly done just the way i like it.
title: Best place to visit

hotel: Sankara Nairobi, Autograph Collection by Marriott
review: Graze restaurant, steak house. The meal was yummy and very delicious. Five star service from the waiters.the restaurant ambiance is  wonderful. It is a must  visit foodzone when in Nairobi westlands as there is no comparison.
title: Mr ,mrs Emmanuel ngaira.

hotel: Sankara Nairobi, Autograph Collection by Marriott
review: Firstly; have you collected all of the Sankara Seven? Go ask reception!  I like this hotel, mostly for the oasis of calm and helpfulness that it provides between Westlands and Spring Valley, Nairobi. Yes, the security is the first thing that strikes you about the exterior but once inside you'd forget it was there.  I find everything works. Nothing Super fancy, but everything works from rooms to logistics. The open floor format on level 2 was filled with new art which kept the hotel feeling fresh.  What makes the hotel good for me is to have the MotoGari taxis available when needed, able to charge to the room and the Drivers will wait for you. I have had Drivers wait at dinner and when visiting the Sheldrick Trust, which makes it much easier to get around and know you're getting
title: First class comfort

hotel: Sankara Nairobi, Autograph Collection by Marriott
review: Sankara is a very cosmopolitan hotel with lots of events going on at all times including an art gallery display. I stayed at the hotel in 3 different rounds, each on average lasting a week or more. The rooms are comfortable and the staff are brilliant. the morning breakfast is a buffet style but you can order eggs and other breakfast items from the kitchen. there is a steak restaurant and a roof terrace restaurant/bar with somewhat limited but delicious menu. The was a big let down for me personally. their concierge services can organise trips and safaris and very efficient.
title: Confortable Stay

hotel: Sankara Nairobi, Autograph Collection by Marriott
review: Sankara is a very nice and comfortable boutique hotel in Westlands. The hotel has both an upscale and trendy feel but with a local African touch in the design and artwork. The rooms are very comfortable and in-house dining is very good. The pool bar is a trendy cafe/lounge where you can go for a drink and light bites. Overall highly recommend this hotel particularly if your visit will be primarily in the Westlands or surrounding areas.
title: Great boutique hotel in Westlands

hotel: Sankara Nairobi, Autograph Collection by Marriott
review: Very clean and tidy room with very friendly and helpful staff. Hotel well situated with multiple options for dining and shopping around. Power cut could happen from time to time but it's normal in Nairobi. Highly recommended!
title: Great hospitality

hotel: Sankara Nairobi, Autograph Collection by Marriott
review: the service from the reception was so wonderful the bell boys give a personalised service. The room was wooow with a good view and noise free the rooms look brand new,the bathroom was to the point and the amenities were exceptional .cleanliness is on point and everything on the room was functioning. Restaurant service is good and the food is worth value for money would recommend these Hotel to anyone in the city
title: ms sony maina

hotel: Sankara Nairobi, Autograph Collection by Marriott
review: The best place to be, rooms are very clean and high quality services... People are very friendly and ready to help you! It’s a but expensive but it will pay off the experience in the facility!     The food is delicious
title: Excellent Facility and Service

hotel: Sankara Nairobi, Autograph Collection by Marriott
review: Great facility...even better staff...centrally located.  The rooftop pool is large enough for laps, breakfast excellent. Westgate mall a 5 minute walk away, two excellent Indian restaurants around the corner.  There is some on-site construction, but the hotel staff were amazingly accommodating to move me to another room. Painless change in 15 minutes.
title: A great place to stay

hotel: Sankara Nairobi, Autograph Collection by Marriott
review: Initially when I arrived, I was allocated a room on/near construction work and it was SLIGHTLY noisy. Mary (Guest relations) almost immediately changed the room for me and this second room was just perfect. The view of the Nairobi skyline makes one feel like they are in New York. Comfortable beds (ask for the pillow menu for personalisation) and complimentary fruits and water. The bathroom is clean and well maintained, containing a tub and a shower cubicle separately. Designer amenities. My only complaint is that the room service menu does not cater well for vegetarians. The TV channels available are fairly wide ranging in terms of genre but basic in terms of options available. The room decor is fresh and positive with very welcoming vibes.
title: A classy and comfortable stay

hotel: Sankara Nairobi, Autograph Collection by Marriott
review: We stayed for four nights at the Sankara on a Club Level room. I made the reservation several months ago so our arrival was of no surprise to them. We arrived at the hotel at about 3:30 am following a 33 hour journey from our home in Los Angeles. Upon arrival we were warmly greeted by very friendly and professional staff who escorted us to a very well appointed room. Two days prior to arrival I received an email asking what we were looking for in a room. To that, I responded that we wanted a quiet room. At 7:30 in the morning, about three hours after we went to sleep, we were awakened by jackhammers in the floor directly below us, not a good way to start our stay in Nairobi. I phoned the desk in a stupor and was told that the hotel was going through renovation, I nearly blew my
title: Beware of onsite construction

hotel: Sankara Nairobi, Autograph Collection by Marriott
title: Lovely Stay!

hotel: Sankara Nairobi, Autograph Collection by Marriott
review: Booked their junior suite for 3 nights. The hotel is nice and clean. The staff as well is very friendly and professional. Loved their Graze Steakhouse with some amazing steaks.  We enjoyed our stay in Sankara.
title: Rude! Rude! Rude Clerk

hotel: Sankara Nairobi, Autograph Collection by Marriott
review: Nice hotel , very clean. However need to improve empathy against guests. Yesterday woke up early with big banging sounds. Called the reception, they sent someone over to check. The guy came over heard the sound and said I don't hear anything first. So I kept him waiting second time his eyes rolled up when he heard the sound could not deny. But he said it is coming from next door etc. Let me check . This continues for an 15 minutes and I cannot bear the sound anymore. Went out of the room checking where the sound is coming finally found out there is a gym upstairs and a guy throwing huge metal lifts to the floor. 5:30 in the morning!!! Called the reception they say sorry but this keeps going and never stops. Although they knew the sound was coming from gym, both reception and the
title: Staff is hiding obvious problems no empathy against guests...

hotel: Sankara Nairobi, Autograph Collection by Marriott
title: Great stay in Nairobi

hotel: Sankara Nairobi, Autograph Collection by Marriott
review: Great location downtown and away from the busy streets. Staff were incredibly helpful with every request and crazy question. Nothing was too much. Bed was perfect. I will be staying here on my next visit to Nairobi for sure.
title: Nice hotel

hotel: Sankara Nairobi, Autograph Collection by Marriott
review: The hotel is clean and pretty throughout. The rooftop is nice for dinner and/or drinks if you don't want to go for a swim. The DJ was great. The hotel is walking distance to one o of the malls. Security at the entrance. Friendly staff.
title: Very good business hotel

hotel: Sankara Nairobi, Autograph Collection by Marriott
review: I stayed at Sankara multiple times for business, it's a very clean hotel and the service is very good. The breakfast is very nice and the location of the hotel is very good. The steakhouse at the hotel is very nice and the food quality is excellent.
title: Most amazing dinner in a long long while...

hotel: Sankara Nairobi, Autograph Collection by Marriott
review: The roof top bar is an amazing lounge the ambience is great with a view of the Nairobi and a fresh breeze. It is a great place to have a drink with a loved one, the staff was helpful and friendly and the music was good
title: Amazing rooftop bar

hotel: Sankara Nairobi, Autograph Collection by Marriott
review: I was here for a conference. The evidence was really good. The food was really great compared to other hotels providing conferencing facilities. From cookies to everything else was amazing. I would highly recommend for meetings and conferences
title: Great Ambience Amazing food

hotel: Sankara Nairobi, Autograph Collection by Marriott
review: I chose Sankara again (after staying at the Tribe previously) while TDY at  the US Embassy.  Sankara  offers the highest  quality and outstanding customer service for the per diem traveler.  I took advantage every night of the business lounge where I finished my day's work and enjoyed a beverage and tasty snacks.  The rooms are very comfortable, and the staff go out of your way to make sure you are comfortable.  Taxi service was quick and efficient in both directions.     I will stay here again...my hotel of choice when in Nairobi.
title: Another Comfortable Stay...

hotel: Sankara Nairobi, Autograph Collection by Marriott
review: Really enjoyed my stay at the Sankara. Right from the efficient and friendly welcome my stay was a very pleasant experience. The room was large and very well appointed - a huge comfortable bed, table to work at, plenty of power sockets, safe and a large bathroom and shower. The quality of food and drinks in the restaurants and bars was excellent and we especially enjoyed the quality of the food in the Graze restaurant. The buffet breakfast had a large choice for guests. A couple of small niggles - the lifts were not working properly for a couple of days but the problem was soon sorted out. In the main restaurant the service was very slow one evening but otherwise it was efficient. Would happily stay there again.
title: Excellent centrally located hotel in central Nairobi

hotel: Sankara Nairobi, Autograph Collection by Marriott
review: I have stayed at this hotel over the years many times. It's consistently good. From John - the gregarious doorman who never fails to recognize a face - to Mary and Maurice in the Executive Lounge, everyone offers an incredible welcome to travelers. The food is consistently good, the accommodations incredibly comfortable, and there's nothing like an evening drink at the rooftop bar.   Professionally, I recommend Sankara as well. I just hosted a fly-in meeting for our agency's global staff and the Sankara staff could not have been more helpful. Excellent A/V and business service support.   Nairobi is a common stop for me. When my travel takes me there, for me it's Sankara.
title: When I'm in Nairobi, Sankara is home

hotel: Sankara Nairobi, Autograph Collection by Marriott
review: I went out with my wife and we had a great night out at Sankara in Nairobi. We had dinner at the Steak House. It was a delicious meal, big portions! The breakfast was an equally a great meal.  The staff, from the reception to the dining and the house keeping crew, all seemed determined to overwhelm us with kindness, very impressive.
title: Great Weekend out at Sankara

hotel: Sankara Nairobi, Autograph Collection by Marriott
review: Stayed twice pre and post safari and overall the hotel was excellent, great service, rooms very good, beds and pillows super comfy and the bathroom products fabulous. Negative sides, I booked for the roof top and champagne bar and was expecting to have a ‘sundowner’ overlooking Nairobi, however from 6pm each night it played loud music and more felt like I was in a night club, so we didn’t end up using.  I also emailed prior to staying and requested gluten free bread and was disappointed this didn’t happen, although they did rectify this for our 2nd stay.   We have stayed numerous places would stay again.
title: Some fantastic elements

hotel: Sankara Nairobi, Autograph Collection by Marriott
review: Well located hotel, with great amenities and good choice of restaurants. Superb rooftop bar and pool with good city views.  Staff are professional and friendly and a,ways willing to help. Well located in the developing area of Westlands.
title: Great, clean hotel with all amenities with exceptional  professional staff and service

hotel: Sankara Nairobi, Autograph Collection by Marriott
review: Visited sankara Hotel for Sunday brunch on Mothers day. Food was very good and plentiful, brunch includes unlimited prosecco which was lovely, the Dawas were also very nice. Staff were very friendly and took good care of us. We also received a bottle of wine in gift bag which was a lovely touch.
title: Mothers day brunch

hotel: Sankara Nairobi, Autograph Collection by Marriott
review: Sankara has lovely rooms with good features.The front desk staff is welcoming and room service is prompt.The only problem was that there is a nearby site where construction is undergoing.I'm certain my stay would have been more pleasant but for this.
title: Lovely Rooms,but...

hotel: Sankara Nairobi, Autograph Collection by Marriott
review: Lovely treat by graze team at josper steak, lead by Nelson and served by Solomon, Whaley and the rest. Memorable it will.  Grilled Steak was the best thing to try at graze. We love it,  And we do  Philip.
title: Diner at graze

hotel: Sankara Nairobi, Autograph Collection by Marriott
review: I stayed plenty of nights at sankara whether it’s this time or previous stays. The room is absolutely fine although their gym is very limited. John and Solomon at the bell desk are beyond nice. Especially John. If I would recommend anything, it would be to have John be in charge of guest relations because the people in charge of this now don’t have 1% of what John has. He’s the friendliest person in all of Kenya and he always manages to cheer me up after any disappointment. His interest in making sure that guests at the hotel is extremely genuine and sincere. If I stay at Sankara again, it’ll be because of John!
title: I’m only rating it as a 5 star because of John

hotel: Sankara Nairobi, Autograph Collection by Marriott
review: If you are looking for a gym with dedicated trainers and results, the Sankara gym is your kind of place. From the receptive security personnel to the managers, they have a way of making your visit memorable. Whether for a week or a month, check in at the gym for the training....it will make your day.
title: Best Gym

hotel: Sankara Nairobi, Autograph Collection by Marriott
review: We had a wonderful 3 night stay at the Sankara after a very long flight from the States. It was fantastic and relaxing time with a great restaurant and all the amenities. Special shoutout to John working the lobby for being so kind and welcoming, we felt so taken care of!
title: Great Stay!

hotel: Sankara Nairobi, Autograph Collection by Marriott
review: Was visiting Nairobi and had lunch with a friend at node ,She went back to work so I went to the next restaurant/hotel. Was given a warm welcome and treated well everyone checked up on me to see if I was okay. This is not normal when a woman walks in alone in a high end restaurant.  I was alone and still felt so respected.  Thanks to Charles and Enock they were so kind . It seems to go down all departments as I walked out Nathan at the gate helped me locate my uber and made sure I got to my uber. Am giving you a 5* because you've invested in 5* staff. Thanks for making it memorable.
title: Nathan (security)Charles(not sure manager/supervisor/waiter)

hotel: Sankara Nairobi, Autograph Collection by Marriott
review: This hotel was a real respite from our busy safari itinerary.  It was very elegant and modern, and the staff went out of their way to make sure we had everything we needed.  I loved how safe it felt.  The rooms were quite beautiful, and the shower has to be one of the top 5 showers I have ever had in 50+ years of traveling all around the world.
title: Lovely and modern

hotel: Sankara Nairobi, Autograph Collection by Marriott
review: Already stayed at Sankara a couple of times. The place is centrally located, have great rooms,  the restaurant serves good food. Really liked the people and the way they look after you. Definitely recommend the place.
title: Nice place, excellent service, worth your pay

hotel: Sankara Nairobi, Autograph Collection by Marriott
review: Everything is as it should be and better!!! The room, the food, the art work, the rook top reception and best of all the service.   For me it was also very conveniently located close to my meetings. A definite must stay the next time.
title: Amazing stay

hotel: Sankara Nairobi, Autograph Collection by Marriott
review: Thoroughly enjoyed my 2 nights stay at Sankara. Very well maintained hotel. Very nice, clean rooms with lots of space. The bed was really comfortable.  Hotel staff were very friendly and helpful. Good location too very close to a number of good dining locations including the Westgate mall. I will definitely like to stay here again when next visit Nairobi.
title: Extremely comfortable and clean hotel- service was excellent

hotel: Sankara Nairobi, Autograph Collection by Marriott
review: As a guest at Sankara, not only can you use the gym facilities but you can workout with the personal trainers, as well. I trained with Ahmed during my stay. He provided a good  training program that included boxing, lifting, cardio and HIIT exercises. It was evident that he was experienced in creating programs that were targeted to guest's goals and abilities. The workouts were always different and provided a good challenge. Ahmed is an exceptional trainer and as someone who enjoys working out, the sessions were always the highlight of my day.
title: Sankara Trainers are top notch!

hotel: Sankara Nairobi, Autograph Collection by Marriott
review: My room was lovely ....nicely furnished and wonderful shower with hot water and lots of pressure.  The staff could not have been nicer and I felt refreshed and renewed after my delightful stay there.  Would return.
title: A MUCH NEEDED RELAXING WEEKEND

hotel: Sankara Nairobi, Autograph Collection by Marriott
review: We enjoyed our stay at Sankara, they were so welcoming and so proffessional. the hotel is stunning and very clean. I would recomend it to anyone who visits Kenya, Nairobi. I also find that the staff at Sankara is always willing to help and go the extra mile for their guest. The hotel is in Westlands and right at the heart of the city/surbub so one could walk to the different malls/shopping centres and for those who want to experience a bit of their nightlife theres is a few great clubs that are about 1 or 2 km from the hotel. Sankara, AMAZING!!!
title: 5 star treatment

hotel: Sankara Nairobi, Autograph Collection by Marriott
review: I stayed at Sankara for one month and by the time I left, everyone knew my name and the hotel was kind enough to provide me my own housekeeper for consistency. Caroline Anyango was a kind and regular visitor who respected my privacy and made the room like new, each day so I felt each return to my room was my FIRST day in the hotel. In addition, the breakfast crew (great breakfast btw) were superb, particularly Rosemary and Victoria (and my "high five" hostess and woman cook, whose names escapes me at this time) and their boss who should be credited for leadership...all who greeted me each day and without asking, learned my preferences, which was very helpful when I was in a rush to a meeting. If you have to stay in one hotel for a long visit and don't want to get bored and feel
title: Great Hotel, very professional staff, true 5 star hotel (i.e. everyone knows your name)

hotel: Sankara Nairobi, Autograph Collection by Marriott
title: Great food

hotel: Sankara Nairobi, Autograph Collection by Marriott
review: Great food offered and good service too.Nice salads and soup...The budget has wonderful varieties of good.staff are welcoming too.The hostess are alert and readily available.willing to Assisi to a greater length...keep up
title: Mrs

hotel: Sankara Nairobi, Autograph Collection by Marriott
review: Great business hotel with all amenities . Staff is really good . Andrew was of great help . Will use this hotel again . Rooms were great and dinner restaurants were very good . Great steakhouse . Security is very good in the hotel . Centrally located and easily accessible
title: Super hotel stay

hotel: Sankara Nairobi, Autograph Collection by Marriott
review: The Sankara gym is exceptional. What makes it special is the staff and trainers who are always on hand to encourage you or push you a little further. Calystas has built a great team. I've worked out with all trainers and they have been excellent. Recently I've begun working out with Ahmed. He really has been helpful. He's pushed me further than I thought I could go and he is very instructive. He even goes into theory explaining the whys of training methods. If you're at the gym, look for Ahmed. He'll be of great help.
title: Excellent Sankara Gym staff

hotel: Sankara Nairobi, Autograph Collection by Marriott
review: For reasons I no longer remember had I in the past given the Sankara a by and after my first stay I just shake my head why I have not sampled this hotel much earlier. Already at check in did the pedigree of the hotel show, all my details were reflected on my check in form, my passport was copied - now a legal requirement across Eastern Africa and beyond - and I was given my keycard while a hotel porter had already loaded my bags on a trolley, to be delivered in due course. One of the guest relations staff showed me to my room, explained about the various gadgets and in room facilities, provided a second keycard for the power socket and before she left were my bags delivered, all very efficient.  I saw a bouquet of white roses was placed on the desk and a fruit bowl and welcome
title: My stay at the Sankara was quite something and then some more

hotel: Sankara Nairobi, Autograph Collection by Marriott
title: Excellent Service & Great Professionals

hotel: Sankara Nairobi, Autograph Collection by Marriott
review: Overall great experience as a business hotel, special call out for Fridah, at front desk/reception & earlier at guest lounge, being extremely courteous, professional and pro-active to understand/fulfil customer requests. Professionals like her make a difference in customer delight. Had a wonderful stay recently and in the past too. Staff is really friendly, rooms & service quality is really good. Highly recommend to business travellers.
title: one of the best,if not the best

hotel: Sankara Nairobi, Autograph Collection by Marriott
review: The kind of music that they play on Friday nights is so relaxing. Very good environment and good customer service. Been there several times and all the times I'm impressed with the service. Value fir money!
title: The place to be in Friday nights

hotel: Sankara Nairobi, Autograph Collection by Marriott
review: This must have been my 5th stay in Nairobi’s Sankara that I have adopted few years ago as my favorite business hotel in Nairobi. Rooms and bathrooms are always clean and well appointed and sized. F&B offering in the hotel both in their first floor restaurants and top floor pool bars is diverse, savory and consistently tasty. Staff is friendly. WiFi that is free could be improved though as during sole stays it proved hectic.
title: Yet another Business stay at Sankara

hotel: Sankara Nairobi, Autograph Collection by Marriott
review: The service was spot on, the rooms immaculate, and the food to die for! The location doesn't hurt either. Near enough to the city center that everything is within convenient reach yet just removed enough to take your mind of the hustle and bustle.
title: The only hotel to stay at in Nairobi. Period!

hotel: Sankara Nairobi, Autograph Collection by Marriott
review: Great Food! Friendly and helpful staff. Very well organised. Ably managed our event during the Sunday Brunch for the launch of a sustainable development project to save the dwindling African elephant population
title: Mr. Alex Kubasu

hotel: Sankara Nairobi, Autograph Collection by Marriott
review: Sankara has always been one of my favourites, but this time was over and above wonderful! My husband and I stayed for a long weekend to celebrate our anniversary... We were treated to amazing hospitality & service. Sankara is also well situated in Westlands with great bars & restaurants right nearby. Yes, the rooms are gorgeous, modern & well appointed (especially the bathroom) but really what makes Sankara the best are the staff, the warm welcome (but also privacy!)  & all of the special personal touches. Cant wait to stay again!!
title: Absolutely amazing stay!

hotel: Sankara Nairobi, Autograph Collection by Marriott
review: Sometimes you just want to sit on the roof and get away from the crowds. Sankara, located in the heart of Nairobi provides and excellent level of costumer service and amenities. Staff is friendly, the rooms are modern and the hotel is within walking distance of many shops and restaurants. Be sure to check your bill however if booking online as there were some discrepancies between confirmation prices and check out prices. All issues with fees were resolved quickly and professionally, but as with any stay at any hotel check the bill. Highly recommend Sankara!
title: Service is King

hotel: Sankara Nairobi, Autograph Collection by Marriott
review: I have been visiting Kenya for work, for over a decade and I have stayed in Sankara Hotel severally, As always I am very impressed with the consistency in their impeccable service delivery. I am a very finicky and picky young man, but I tell you, all the services I enjoyed (Business lounge, gym, Swimming pool, restaurant) were “tick excellent”. Their carefully selected front desk and reservations employees made the experience on my last visit (9th - 14th September, 2018) worthwhile and the ambience also complements. I have over the years stayed at different hotels at different times on my visits, including the over priced Kempeski Hotel, but Sankara’s services is just better and value for money. Keep it up guys!  Charles Adebayo.
title: An Amazing Experience as always!

hotel: Sankara Nairobi, Autograph Collection by Marriott
review: I visited sankara on 17th September 2018 and I must say I've had complains with their buffet I thereafter have had severe stomach pains! their customer service experience was not so good too.we barely ate a lot so no excuse to that.My friend and I were given forms to fill after our meals about not being responsible for any health issues,this was strange but we still did sign the forms!im afraid not to visit or recommend again! Please improve your services.
title: BAD EXPERIENCE!

hotel: Sankara Nairobi, Autograph Collection by Marriott
review: Great hotel if you need a place to stay in the Westlands area of Nairobi. Rooms are comfortable and the staff are friendly. The roof top pool is beautiful and the food and bar up there is good. They have a full breakfast option which I would suggest including when making a reservation. I would recommend this hotel and stay here again the next time I visit Nairobi.
title: Great Hotel in the Westlands

hotel: Sankara Nairobi, Autograph Collection by Marriott
review: Stayed here a night and the plus points with this hotel are its central location in Westlands suburb of Nairobi close to many of the malls, banks and commercial centers. Good if you are on business. Hotel offers good service and decent meals as well with a charming rooftop restarant with good views. Hotel itself not too grand.
title: Small but Nice corporate type Hotel

hotel: Sankara Nairobi, Autograph Collection by Marriott
review: Dinner was very good. The ambiance was also very good and conducive. The food was good and well presented. The waiter was excellent and knew the menu well and made very good recommendations. Overall everyone was courteous. It was a good experience
title: Dinner

hotel: Sankara Nairobi, Autograph Collection by Marriott
review: Good location and central to most places. Walking distance to entertainment places and safe. Hotel was great, excellent service, awesome breakfast set-up and choice of restaurants for dinner. Best dinner was at the steak house - The Graze, best food ever. The Pool and Bar on the rooftop was also an awesome place to chill after work.
title: Stayed at the Sankara for a week on business

hotel: Sankara Nairobi, Autograph Collection by Marriott
review: Checked in on the 14th of June with my friend from the moment we stepped out of the taxi the environment was so welcoming.The bellman was amazing very friendly fella remember him saying " I will be your friend whether you like it or not" I  always referred him as the bald headed fella.The front office as good rooms here so clean and buffet selection was great.I would recommend Sankara as the best would love to experience their service again would definitely bring my Zimbabwean friends over.
title: Amazing Kenyan hospitality

hotel: Sankara Nairobi, Autograph Collection by Marriott
review: Sankara is my favorite hotel in all of Kenya and I have made over ten trips and stayed at many hotels within Nairobi and throughout Kenya. The facilities are immaculate, well-kept, and very opulent but Sankara's most precious quality is the professional, attentive, and friendly staff. In addition to feeling "at home" I conducted a substantial amount of business on this trip. I must recommend the club lounge if you want a quiet place to work or a productive place to meet with colleagues. Oliver and the staff will ensure that your engagement is fully supported. I look forward to my next stay!
title: Favorite Hotel

hotel: Sankara Nairobi, Autograph Collection by Marriott
review: This is one of the best hotel experiences I ever had in my long time of business traveling. Friendly very helpful staff, clean well decorated rooms and great food. The executive lounge offers a magnificent business gathering venue with around the clock services..... as a bonus, it is across the street from our office in Nairobi and in the middle of Commerical, touristic and highly active night life area, that is the Westlands.
title: Great hotel, amazing staff and best food

hotel: Sankara Nairobi, Autograph Collection by Marriott
review: We stayed here for a few nights in September. Having heard some scary things about Nairobi we were pleasantly surprised. ON arrival, the staff were so friendly and helpful. THey explained the nearby areas and were quick to offer help when asked. Great service on check in. We had no issues during our stay.The rooms are well maintained, clean and comfortable. The small touches Sankara adds, such as the Sankara 7, were lovely to see. It was nice to see a hotel taking pride in how it represents itself. The pool and gym were well maintained and the food in all of the restaurants and room service was exceptional. Thanks Sankara for a lovely stay
title: Lovely hotel, great service and welcoming staff. A piece of calm in the centre of Nairobi

hotel: Sankara Nairobi, Autograph Collection by Marriott
review: The Sankara is a very nice hotel in a good location. The room was nice, large, clean and well-kept up with excellent amenities. The hotel has a number of dining options, and those that I tried, including in-room dining and breakfast were all very good. The lounge was great and well-stocked at happy hour, and the rooftop pool was a nice place to relax or do a little work (minus the stink of cigar smoke, which I could have done without). The location makes it fairly easy to get around to other parts of Nairobi, and it's next door to a mall so there's easy access to groceries, other restaurants and shopping. I would recommend staying here.
title: A very nice hotel

hotel: Sankara Nairobi, Autograph Collection by Marriott
review: Travelled a few times to Nairobi for work, and always stayed at the Sankara. The customer service has always been outstanding and on point. Eg. My shower leaked last time i was there, and they upgraded me to a higher room at no cost.  The hotel's restaurants are pretty good, specifically if you like a good steak, then it is def recommended.  Their rooftop bar with pool is pretty cool as well. on evenings you can join locals for a drink, with a cool view of the cbd.  Breakfast buffet was excellent, and worth the money you're spending on your room.  I've managed to collect all of Sankara's collectibles!
title: Very Enjoyable

hotel: Sankara Nairobi, Autograph Collection by Marriott
review: I went to the Sankara Hotel because a friend suggested it and from the moment I arrived I was pleasantly surprised, amazed, happy ! All the staff is not only very professional but also very warm, kind, caring. The atmosphere made me feel relaxed, very comfortable and feeling 'at home'. The quality of everything, from the decor, furniture, garden, services, food was superb! The best breakfast for quantity, variety and quality. Lunch and dinner extremely good and changing every day.The best 24h room service for choices and quality, we used it many times. It is an hotel where one can stay for days easily without even going out as there are many areas to pass the time well, including two pools and a gym, being looked after and not getting bored! Excellent Business centre with very
title: Amazing! Best Hotel in years!

hotel: Sankara Nairobi, Autograph Collection by Marriott
title: 5* hotel

hotel: Sankara Nairobi, Autograph Collection by Marriott
review: Roof top bar for the meet and greet, nice setting with a good ambience, very good service. Restaurant for a team dinner (14 of us )....we selected one of 6 set menus, but could have just as easily gone a la carte. Very nice setting with excellent food. Se vice was top notch. Not a cheap evening but top quality.
title: Business team dinner...

hotel: Sankara Nairobi, Autograph Collection by Marriott
review: The stay in the hotel was good. We were given complimentary drinks and food and Also our suite was upgraded for newly weds. The room was so clean and nice. Very comfortable. Friendly staff who made our stay very good.. I would definitely go back any day.
title: Honeymoon night

hotel: Sankara Nairobi, Autograph Collection by Marriott
review: My first trip to the country and the continent couldn’t have had a better start than at this fantastic property. I was here for just a day passing through to the Mara.   The hotel and the room was very comfortable. It was all nicely laid out and thought about. The food and service were exquisite. Graze - Steakhouse served some of the best meats I have had, definitely a must try. Nicely done, would definitely be back.
title: Craving for more!!

hotel: Sankara Nairobi, Autograph Collection by Marriott
review: Enjoyed our double dining experience at the Artisan. Samuel is a delight, an extra ordinary server and we had the pleasure to witness his wit and charm with guests from a different background as well. He makes you laugh, his easy on his smile(sometimes cheeky) and quick with his hands. Noiseless service and seemless.  We came back here just to be served by him!  A quick mention of Bridget, his supervisor who is always available and you can see that she queitly ensures excellency.  Thank you Sankara and see you again soon!
title: DINING

hotel: Sankara Nairobi, Autograph Collection by Marriott
review: We come to Sankara several times,exceptional service especially from Samuel.He is funny, friendly and humble person.,considering all the places we have been,this is one of the best service we have had in a while. Thank you Samuel for making our evening.
title: Artisan restaurant.

hotel: Sankara Nairobi, Autograph Collection by Marriott
review: The Sankara Hotel team is fantastic.... I stayed roughly two hectic work weeks for business meetings and I felt like I was always welcomed when I got back each day. The team from the executive lounge are warm, incredible and professional! The health club team are awesome! Poolside restaurants and staff were top notch! The hotel team from cleaning staff, concierge, security, and front desk get things done with efficiency and warmth! Bravo!!!
title: Managing Director

hotel: Sankara Nairobi, Autograph Collection by Marriott
review: I’m visiting from Zambia. Guys! This place is freaking amazing! First hotel and place I’ve been to when I came to Nairobi... The rooms, the people are kind and very attentive! The food is amazing! These waiters: Susan, Bridget and Dorothy are outstanding, I can’t remember the others but overall the staff is amazing! 5stars from me! I want to definitely come back again!
title: Amazing

hotel: Sankara Nairobi, Autograph Collection by Marriott
review: The Sankara is one of the best hotels in Nairobi. The service, food and rooftop is just amazing. In the weekends they have DJ's on the rooftop and a great view of Nairobi. The pool is beautifully situated with lounges surrounding it.  We were on our Honeymoon and got a free upgrade to junior suite which was decorated with rose leaves and roses. We also got access to the Executive Lounge with all it's perks :-)
title: #1 in the Westlands - Epic rooftop

hotel: Sankara Nairobi, Autograph Collection by Marriott
review: Sankara hotel is a gem in Nairobi. Highly recommended. Stayed there in October and it was a treat. Very professional, honest and kind staff. They will deliver on their promises and cater for all your requests. My check-in and checkout experience were both excellent and the lady who checked me out lovely!
title: Excellent hotel in Nairobi

hotel: Sankara Nairobi, Autograph Collection by Marriott
review: Stayed at Sankara for a 4 days Business trip. The staff is very friendly and always  helpful. Tried all restaurants, Food is good especially Sunday brunch, Expected steakhouse to be better but it was ok, rooftop bar is also great and breakfast is good. Meeting rooms are fine for small / medium group but not big ones. Rooms are nice, the only negative comment is that there was a huge noise I believe coming from electric generator. This was not nice especially at night. They need better isolated glass in the room to avoid this. My best experience and highlight of this hotel was Tony & George , the Coffee guys, they make the best coffee and were very friendly and always happy, thanks guys.
title: Friendly Staff

hotel: Sankara Nairobi, Autograph Collection by Marriott
