review: This is a great hotel in an awesome location. Walking distance from Sarit Center and many restaurants. The room was clean and modern, as is the entire hotel. The food can be a bit unpredictable. I ordered the same meal twice through room service, and it tasted quite different each time. Same for masala tea, ordered it twice and it was completely different each time. The Opera patisserie on the 1st floor is a great place for coffee and dessert.
title: Great location

hotel: Sankara Nairobi, Autograph Collection by Marriott
review: Upon checking in I tried to make a booking for a massage but they said they didn't have a spa. Yet on  the information on-line including on Trip Advisor there is indeed a spa. This is false advertising. Very disappointing for a hotel of this calibre.
title: No spa

hotel: Sankara Nairobi, Autograph Collection by Marriott
review: The place in clean, quiet and comfortable. The staff is all helpful, proactive and offer their services with a smile. Nairobi hotels are generally good but Sankara soars above them in class, comfort and value-for-money service. I will be back!
title: Serene place, Comfortable and unmatched Customer Care

hotel: Sankara Nairobi, Autograph Collection by Marriott
review: it was my first time in Nairobi, hotel stuff is super nice and friendly. After 2 words you are feeling like you are talking with good friend.  Rooms are very clean and bathroom is comfy and big.  Quite nice gym on top floor.
title: Very nice hotel in the center of nairobi

hotel: Sankara Nairobi, Autograph Collection by Marriott
review: The reception was splendid. We were welcomed with drinks as we were escorted to a table at the Graze restaurant. The food was amazing and the service was Not only amazing it was super. The ambience of the Graze was the best. The dessert was to die for. I will definitely tell my friends to have there family dates there thank you I enjoyed it♨️❤️. Sankara rocks 🔥💥🌟☄️
title: Family date

hotel: Sankara Nairobi, Autograph Collection by Marriott
review: Objectively very nice, clean, well run hotel by any US 4-star standard (which is international 5-star I suppose). Apparently undergoing a renovation to become part of Marriott's system of hotels, but I stayed in one of the unrenovated rooms and it in no felt old or tired. As far as the F&B was concerned, the group I was travelling with had a great experience on the rooftop lounge and with the coffee shop on the second floor each morning. We tried the steakhouse one night and were not impressed. The service was very good but the food was just OK. Also inexplicably it was the one place in the hotel where the mosquitoes were bothersome. I am probably a little pickier than the average traveler and apart from the mediocre steakhouse experience (which I might chalk up to 'everyone has
title: Great modern hotel to a western standard

hotel: Sankara Nairobi, Autograph Collection by Marriott
title: Honestly not sure the fuss over this hotel

hotel: Sankara Nairobi, Autograph Collection by Marriott
review: This is a nice hotel, quite expensive, but nothing particularly grand. I've noticed a lot of the very good reviews, and it seems to be the hotel of choice for many in my business. But.. I don't know, it seems that Nairobi has a lot of hotels to offer and I'm not sure why this one would be the hotel of choice.  If you need Westlands, this hotel is ideally located. Being in Westlands has good and bad, the bad being getting out of Westlands the wrong time of day is a problem. However, its easily in walking distance to many restaurants, offices and other hotels. I like the location.  The gym is ok - and it has a boxing instructor (I like that!). Decent equipment, a little small and crowded. The pool is up on the 7th floor, but its really a bar-pool. I don't really like swimming
title: Great hotel and staff!

hotel: Sankara Nairobi, Autograph Collection by Marriott
title: Strong professional service

hotel: Sankara Nairobi, Autograph Collection by Marriott
review: it is perfect for a business trip in Nairobi: the place is quiet, really felt safe, the breakfast is good maybe need to improve coffee and lovely attention each day when we come back (small gift to explore Kenyan culture).
title: Birthday surprise

hotel: Sankara Nairobi, Autograph Collection by Marriott
review: The Sankara is a great luxury hotel with world class service. From doorman to the bellhops to the front desk and even roof top pool servers (thank you Joe!) the level of service rivals 5-star hotels yet without the stuffiness. We used this hotel as a jumping off point for several multi-day safaris in the east Africa region. They were very accommodating with our specific needs. The Sankara is excellent by any standard and I would definitely stay again.
title: Luxury oasis in busy Nairobi

hotel: Sankara Nairobi, Autograph Collection by Marriott
review: I stayed for 10 nights while on a business trip. I felt completely at home the entire time! The rooms are very well appointed - extremely comfortable and elegant. The daily breakfast is fantastic - great variety, quality and all round deliciousness! The hotel staff were all incredibly accommodating and helpful - from restaurant recommendations, things to do and other travel advice. The gym was great too - Joab is a real legend and is there to help anyone with personal training and general gym advice - thanks a million to Joab! The rooftop bar / pool area is a highlight too.  Overall, a brilliant stay where I felt completely at home and very well looked after :)
title: Luxury at a home away from home!

hotel: Sankara Nairobi, Autograph Collection by Marriott
review: Rooms were very comfortable. When it came to the non-reception staff it was horrible. Clueles staff. Steak restaurants has elephant size mosquitoes, blunt steak knives!. Breakfast staff were lazy and apathetic. Took them 20 minutes to get a cup of coffee. They added a contingency cost to my credit card which I am still waiting a month over for them to take it off. They didn't inform us when booking that their Spa had closed. That's one of the reasons we went there!  Terrible Terrible Teririble. Stay at the Radisson Blue! Tons better and much more affordable as well
title: Worst stay at a Boutique hotel - ever!

hotel: Sankara Nairobi, Autograph Collection by Marriott
review: i liked the hotel, surrounded by supermarkets and not bad malls. the hotel has all the facilities that can fit a business meetings, saw tied meeting rooms, the hotel team opened 2 rooms and made it connected as we were big group, but even felt it is still not really connected in a way that make everyone see the presenter  other than this, i liked the facilities , the rooms are really modern and clean, it has all what you are looking for. don't miss the dinning in room it has very nice experience, the food quality is avg but overall i enjoyed my stay.
title: Good For A Short Business Trip

hotel: Sankara Nairobi, Autograph Collection by Marriott
review: Sankara is a beautiful, very secure hotel in central Nairobi. Loved the rooms and the view on the city, and the personal touch of the 'Sankara seven', which are little souvenir animals that were dropped in our room each day of stay. We particularly appreciated the high level of attention and kindness by Moses in room service, and Salomon at the conciergerie. Salomon in particular was so helpful and made our stay and wanderings into Nairobi perfectly enjoyable.  I loved the rooftop bar, but the hotel gets a little less points from me for the variety of breakfast served. Other than that everything in our stay was perfect, thanks!
title: Wish we had stayed longer

hotel: Sankara Nairobi, Autograph Collection by Marriott
review: Excellent service with friendly and attentive staff. Gym nice but a bit overcrowded in the mornings around 6 - but nice help from personal trainers to find options to machines that were occupied. Breakfast and lunch buffet wonderful - especially the desserts.The coffee bar had one of the best filter coffees I have ever had in a hotel. I also appreciate the reading lamps in the room.
title: Best coffee and personal service

hotel: Sankara Nairobi, Autograph Collection by Marriott
review: My goodness!The food was delish,they had a variety of foods to choose from including vegan options.The desserts were DIVIIIIINNNEEEE in the least to say-Even these had vegan options :).What topped the experience is,  the staff who went above and beyond their JD to make the experience memorable.
title: The amazing Sankara brunch

hotel: Sankara Nairobi, Autograph Collection by Marriott
review: Had the loveliest time with my daughter at Sankara for lunch that ended with us trying the delectable rhubarb pie with ice cream for dessert. we absolutely loved it and the service was impeccable. thank you Mildred you were a great host!
title: a rhubarb pie experience

hotel: Sankara Nairobi, Autograph Collection by Marriott
review: I had a pleasant stay and the staff are friendly. The room was nice with a comfortable bed and good quality food. I particularly enjoyed the dinner and would recommend the hotel to anyone looking for a nice hotel with good ambience.
title: Comfortable!

hotel: Sankara Nairobi, Autograph Collection by Marriott
review: Loved our stay at Sankara.  Ideal location and quiet.  Our room was very nice and quiet. Sankara Lounge was our highlight.   Thanks to all the staff for making our last few holiday days enjoyable! We are definitely going to come back again and again!
title: Location Location Location!!!

hotel: Sankara Nairobi, Autograph Collection by Marriott
review: Th Sankara hotel is very well designed, quiet, has great staff and food and is located conveniently from malls, business venues and other great amenities. The excellent turn down service as well as the gift in the form of beautiful animal sculptures each night of your stay is really incredible.
title: Excellent business hotel in a convenient location

hotel: Sankara Nairobi, Autograph Collection by Marriott
review: I stayed at the Sankara in October 2018 with my family. I would like to thank all the staff especially the front desk  staff for making our stay so memorable. All the staff made a wonderful job of making us feel special by being happy to organise anything that we required. We stayed in the Executive Suite and also had the adjoining room. This made it easy for everyone to access each other. The rooms were plain luxury! The space and  modern decor was mind blowing. We spent a lot of  time  in the swimming pool and even though it was a bit cloudy in Nairobi at the time, the weather did not stop the fun, as the pool was heated. My son could not get over the fact that one end of the swimming pool has a clear floor and he could see the people walking below. We had access to  the
title: A perfect stay!

hotel: Sankara Nairobi, Autograph Collection by Marriott
title: 5-Star Accommodations Through and Through!

hotel: Sankara Nairobi, Autograph Collection by Marriott
review: Every aspect of this property is 5-Star . . . guestrooms, common areas, lounges, gym, business center, vip, restaurants, room service, gift shop, knowledgeable staff, you name it! Centrally located. Tasteful decor marrying African and Western aesthetic. Prompt, courteous services with smiles all around . . .  Luxury Exemplified!
title: AMAZING

hotel: Sankara Nairobi, Autograph Collection by Marriott
review: Just wow. The rooms,stuffs( Vincent asante sana for checking on us) , and Breakfast(increadible variaty). No words. Thanks for having us. We Will definately recommend  you and come back. Happy New year guys.Greetings from  Norway
title: Excellant service!

hotel: Sankara Nairobi, Autograph Collection by Marriott
review: Available hot and could bathing water, very good workers, clean rooms, mini bar, tea, coffee bathing soap, body lotion, available safe, drinking water, hungers, animals of various kinds, TV that provide the visitors with more information and daily supply of news papers being local or English version.
title: Adequate Security,well trained Staff and humbole

hotel: Sankara Nairobi, Autograph Collection by Marriott
review: I have spent in Junuary several days at Sanakara for my business trip in Naorobi. Very good location, food is perfect, staff very helpful. Hotel has good amenities. It is easy to go to Westlands any place you need.
title: Mr.

hotel: Sankara Nairobi, Autograph Collection by Marriott
review: The hotel was beautiful, well furnished, and offered great meals. However that is not what made it memorable. I know this should be standard everywhere, but as a forgetful person I have found many hotels who deny finding anything when it is left in a room. My wife and I left an entire bag here and didn't realize for two days. When we did realize it and called them they said it was there and held it for us until our return. If I ever return to Nairobi I will certainly use this hotel.
title: Modern, Clean, Attentive

hotel: Sankara Nairobi, Autograph Collection by Marriott
review: Nairobi would have not have been what it was for us if we hadn't stayed at Sankara hotel.The minute se walked in we were given the best service and especial attentions such as a room upgrade and full access to the lounge. High standards in all senses: beds, linens, pillows menu, and very personalised service from all staff!
title: Great treat

hotel: Sankara Nairobi, Autograph Collection by Marriott
review: So many little things combined to make our stay here very perfect. Room: big, comfortable bed (you can even order custom pillows!) and can link phone to the TV.  Amenities: the rooftop area has a nice view. However when we went to order food the service was very slow so we just popped into the executive lounge. On checking in you can choose to pay extra for the lounge. It comes with free breakfast but even better, free happy hour where you can pretty much order the entire kitchen (and bar). Totally worth it.   Service all around was EXCELLENT.
title: Post Safari oasis

hotel: Sankara Nairobi, Autograph Collection by Marriott
review: Best way to spend Sunday afternoon with friends! It was excellent, elegant and wonderful. We spend the whole afternoon enjoying delicious food and drinks.   It was well spent afternoon and would highly recommend.
title: Sunday Brunch - Amazing!!!!

hotel: Sankara Nairobi, Autograph Collection by Marriott
review: I loved the ambience from the time I walked into the reception. Pleasant kind people met me. I went to seat at the restaurant before I saw my friend. I was given a lovely meal and drink. The room was beautiful as well and I was treated kindly. Thank you
title: Friend visit

hotel: Sankara Nairobi, Autograph Collection by Marriott
review: I have been there before and keep on coming to the same hotel when in Nairobi ! Great location, very nice and welcoming hotel ! The staff has been the same for many years so you feel like at home and are  treated with special care ! A special thank you as usual to Friday who’s very helpful and always smiling :) John also ! And many others...  one regret only !! The Spa disappeared !! It was so nice !! Thank you
title: Perfect as usual

hotel: Sankara Nairobi, Autograph Collection by Marriott
review: My experience at Sankara was out of bounds. Litterally and figuratively! It was all five-star from the reception all the way to the exit. Stopped by for dinner at The Graze Steakhouse with my family. The customer service was impeccable. Our hosts were warm and friendly to the extent of taking photos of us at our request. I recommend the Graze Angus deluxe hamburger. It was a genuine delight! Keep it up Sankara. We cannot wait to come back!
title: UNRIVALLED SERVICE.. 5 STAR QUALITY FOOD!

hotel: Sankara Nairobi, Autograph Collection by Marriott
review: My wife and I had a wonderful stay at the Sankara. It was centrally located in the city so no attractions were too far to get to. The staff was very hospitable and more than willing to help with any questions. The rooftop lounge gives you a great view of the city. Unfortunately the pool was being repaired during my stay so I didnt have a chance to try it out. The hotel is great for people traveling on business. Security was top notch to get into the hotel.
title: Safe and Central

hotel: Sankara Nairobi, Autograph Collection by Marriott
review: My Stay at Sankara hotel was wonderful: Services, spacious room, assistance are excellent.  Anyone (employee) you met everywhere in, is always ready to assist, making me feel very comfortable. I will just say thanks to friendly Sankara staff!
title: Excellent full week spent at Sankara Hotel

hotel: Sankara Nairobi, Autograph Collection by Marriott
review: On a positive note, the hotel is beautiful with nice rooms, great breakfast buffet, and very friendly staff.  But it simply wasn't worth the 5-star price which was at $100 USD more than comparable hotels. Here's why:  - The internet was down two of my three nights, so I ended up spending $65 USD of my own (roaming) data. They were kind enough to provide a discount at checkout (in fact, the internet went down during checkout for the front desk even!), but when you book a 5-star place, you expect internet to be working. - The pool was out of commission, and they could only offer access at a nearby hotel. - The walls were thin and doors were loud, so it was easy to hear people all around. - A simple hamburger ordered "medium well" for room service came with bright red, uncooked
title: 3-star rating, 5-star price

hotel: Sankara Nairobi, Autograph Collection by Marriott
title: Sankara is the place to be!

hotel: Sankara Nairobi, Autograph Collection by Marriott
review: Looking for a place to  relax and have the ambience at Sankara Nairobi soothe you the right way. Just a minute's drove off the main highway, find a haven for your, family and friends' Oh that ambience... you can,t believe that you are within just a few kilometers from the heart of the City center!
title: Great Ambience and Food

hotel: Sankara Nairobi, Autograph Collection by Marriott
review: Had a business lunch of 8 at Sankara. The meal was superb and the restaurant very well appointed. Great service! The seafood selection is great and would not hesitate to return. Hotel in the heart of Westlands with smoke free parking. Next to Sarit Centre mall and Westgate malls.
title: Hotel Review

hotel: Sankara Nairobi, Autograph Collection by Marriott
review: Well deserving of its stars - excellent food and exemplary service - its no wonder they earned the Autograph name. Shout out to John and Solomon at the front, who answered all questions and are engaging and helpful! The infamous roof top bar has excellent bar tenders and service, and the food is amazing. Room service was also a hit! The room was a great size and the bathroom was nice! Would stay here again!
title: Excellent Hotel

hotel: Sankara Nairobi, Autograph Collection by Marriott
review: Stayed at the hotel for business for two days, Had an amazing service and conversation with John- Mgr at the Rooftop Lounge; enjoyed the meal  John is a very fine host who observes well and engages with his customers to ensure that they experience a wonderful time.
title: Excellent Service and Guest Cae

hotel: Sankara Nairobi, Autograph Collection by Marriott
review: I have to recommend the amazing service! From the smooth airport transfer arrangement, speedy checkin, super quick and attentive room service, and thoughtful little animal giveaways given during the evening housekeeping service, the experience was one of the best stays I have had at Nairobi.
title: Amazing service

hotel: Sankara Nairobi, Autograph Collection by Marriott
review: Amazing service, great coffee and even greater tasting pastries.  The barista George was exceptionally delightful.   I advise all guests to request his service.   Will definately be coming back.  5 stars a the way.😀
title: OPERA PATISSERIE "PASTRY SHOP"

hotel: Sankara Nairobi, Autograph Collection by Marriott
review: Sankara is the best hotel to stay in if you are in Nairobi for business. Location and staff are great. A special thanks to Daniel who works in the bar at the top floor. He is the best host!  The only suggestion I would make is with regards to the Internet, it needs to improve  so that it is easier to work while you are in the hotel.
title: Great hotel

hotel: Sankara Nairobi, Autograph Collection by Marriott
review: I had a room close to the Jipsi bar and the noise was soo loud that I now know that they close at 5am. Coulf sleep for 3 hours as I had meetings the next day, did complain and a supervisor got me a room at the back. Super!  As usual was checking out the evening before but this trainee Moses didn’t know how the deblock my pre-authorisation. In the morning requistef for a car at 5am and had to find out just before going to the car that last night still needed to be charged although I specificly ask Moses the evening before that he had to take everything into account. You can imagine stress is building up...as you going to the airport. Breeakfast was good but you can see they are working with a lot a trainees who do not know there job. Most of the time a supervisor or senior has to
title: The accomodation is 5* but alot of employes are junior

hotel: Sankara Nairobi, Autograph Collection by Marriott
title: One of the best modern hotels I've stayed at, anywhere

hotel: Sankara Nairobi, Autograph Collection by Marriott
review: An oasis of calm in the middle of Nariobi's occasionally frenetic pace.  Super friendly staff.  Nicely appointed rooms, with comfortable bedding; great shower.  Pleasant rooftop bar. Security scanning was actually taken seriously.  Downsides?  The otherwise excellent breakfast was super expensive - but fortunately included in my room rate.  The safe in my room didn't work when I arrived, but it got fixed when I reported it.  The pool was being repaired.  Otherwise great!
title: Must stay - excellent!

hotel: Sankara Nairobi, Autograph Collection by Marriott
review: This is one of the best hotels I’ve stayed at. It is very contemporary and feels brand new thanks to recent renovations. All staff are extremely friendly and helpful - service is outstanding. I would highly recommend this hotel.
title: Where to Stay in Nairobi, Kenya

hotel: Sankara Nairobi, Autograph Collection by Marriott
review: Having stayed at Sankara Nairobi Hotel 5 times, I’m always impressed how the staff observes and interacts with all their guests. My experiences here have always been delightful, thanks to their entire team, especially Mercy, MaryAnn, George, Allan, Solomon and Kate (Catherine). Some staff I mention may no longer be working here, but these staff members made my stay memorable.   With a great selection of wine, excellent service, scrumptious food, comfortable beds and top-notch security, what more can one ask for in a five-star hotel in Westlands than the Sankara Nairobi Hotel? I appreciate that the staff at the front desk, including Solomon at the main door, make it a point to remember my name. This really adds a personal touch to ones stay at Sankara Nairobi. The staff is truly
title: One of the best hotel in Nairobi

hotel: Sankara Nairobi, Autograph Collection by Marriott
review: Truly a home from home. Staff are unbelievable. Nothing is ever a problem. From the moment you enter the hotel to the time you leave you are treated as if you are the most important person in the world WOW WOW WOW
title: Amazing staff

hotel: Sankara Nairobi, Autograph Collection by Marriott
review: Having been a guest at a number of 5 star hotels, I appreciate that each hotel has its uniqueness. However my 5 days stay at Sankara, it's staff, facilities, features and services stood out above others
title: USDOJ

hotel: Sankara Nairobi, Autograph Collection by Marriott
review: When you travel regularly you appreciate that all 5-star hotels have their subtle differences.  This hotel is centrally located and the rooms are well appointed. The restaurants are excellent and the roof-top bar is cool and relaxed. However, the real highlight was the service and quality of the hotel staff.   I have never been to Nairobi, so my Monday morning arrival started with Fridah greeting me at the front desk.  Possibly the friendliest and most professional person I have met in 25 years of travel.  She ensured my week started seamlessly.  John was a legend on the front door.  He helped me navigate around the local area most days.  Nothing was too much trouble. This trip reminded me that the difference between a great hotel & a memorable hotel is always the staff you come
title: Sankara Staff - 6 Stars

hotel: Sankara Nairobi, Autograph Collection by Marriott
title: Wonderful Staff and hotel

hotel: Sankara Nairobi, Autograph Collection by Marriott
review: I had a wonderful stay at Sankara- I would highly recommend it. The staff was fantastic- a special shout out to: Vincent, John, Peter, Elisabeth, joseph, Susan and Mary! They made our stay so memorable and were always willing to assist us where needed. thank you for going the extra mile!!
title: Artisan Restaurant Service is Excellent

hotel: Sankara Nairobi, Autograph Collection by Marriott
review: Went out for lunch with family. Was fabulous as expected with amazing and tasty dishes. Very family friendly and amazing stuff (Paul) who attended to us and exceptionally well. It offered great value for money and would definitely visit again.
title: Great Outing

hotel: Sankara Nairobi, Autograph Collection by Marriott
review: Excellent service and coordination with our safari group and guides!  Meals were excellent. Dinner recommendations for local restaurants during our transition times, were spot on for our needs.   Made our once-in-a-lifetime experience more exceptional.
title: Sankara - base of operations for Safari Adventures

hotel: Sankara Nairobi, Autograph Collection by Marriott
review: I stayed in a room on the 5th floor with a huge, comfortable bed. I loved getting surprised each day with a new animal figurine - Collins gave me a different one every day and told me some fun facts each time. The personal trainer in the gym, Tabitha, was amazing and made working out super fun even for someone as lazy as me. I would just leave a recommendation: the hotel shouldn't change the towels every day - it is a waste of resources and I don't think anyone would mind reusing the towels a few times.
title: Hospitality and great service

hotel: Sankara Nairobi, Autograph Collection by Marriott
review: It was a lovely hotel, well maintained and beautifully decorated.   The rooms were nicely clean and spacious. Toilets were in good condition, although I i think they could do with a good scrub in a few areas (just being really picky since it is a 5*) but there were very minor things and doesn’t take away any of the hotel’s quality.   Staff was friendly and efficient. We wanted to use the sauna after hours and the gentleman by the gym opened it just for us which was a very special touch and highlights their great customer service.   The food was very nice and good options for breakfast.   I would definitely return and is one of the best hotels in Nairobi. Lots of local bars and other amenities around the area.   The pool was under refurbishment but they have a deal with another
title: Very good stay

hotel: Sankara Nairobi, Autograph Collection by Marriott
title: Two visits - both good

hotel: Sankara Nairobi, Autograph Collection by Marriott
review: This hotel is a really luxurious gem in Nairobi. The rooms were very nicely appointed and the service was great as well. The hotel has a nightly happy hour too that has an assortment of desserts too. We visited one of the hotel restaurants on our first night and were delightfully surprised with the food and service. Although I didn't enjoy breakfast, there are many options there (with a cost) for those that aren't expecting a traditional American breakfast.   The only con about the hotel was the room service. At times where you don't want to leave the hotel you'd hope the food would be more reliable but it wasn't.
title: Beautiful luxury & prime location

hotel: Sankara Nairobi, Autograph Collection by Marriott
review: Africa is always an exciting experience.  The safaris, animals and nature are highlights the people are warm and friendly.  The roads tend to be a bit bumpy and some of the trails are dusty.  All this makes for a fun and memorable time and you are deserving of a bit of comfort and care as you end the day.  The Sankara  Nairobi is a very good Hotel, the atmosphere is relaxing, the rooms are spacious clean and very comfortable.  The beds are turned down in the evening and I noticed extra touches of care where requested ( I asked for extra soap and few were left for me the same evening).  The swimming pool was under "renovation" which left me with mixed feelings, on the one hand it is clear that management is sure to upkeep the place but as chance had it swimming was not available
title: A haven in Nairobi

hotel: Sankara Nairobi, Autograph Collection by Marriott
title: Great staff and hotel in the Westlands neighborhood!

hotel: Sankara Nairobi, Autograph Collection by Marriott
review: Our group of 4 stayed here for a night before leaving on our safari. The hotel is tucked down a side street in the Westlands neighborhood but still provides easy access to the area. The hotel space was very nice and our rooms were very spacious and well-appointed. The breakfast included a good selection of western-style items and a few African-specific. Overall, it was a great place to settle into Nairobi and get a restful night's sleep before departing on safari.
title: First class service

hotel: Sankara Nairobi, Autograph Collection by Marriott
review: It is always a great experience to visite Sankara Nairobi. The staff is nice and professional, always willing to extend a helping hand. Thank you Joan and the team. The amenities and the rooms are great. Very quiet. Definitely a place I can recommend.
title: Excellent hotel and great staff

hotel: Sankara Nairobi, Autograph Collection by Marriott
review: Amazing service... Good location... Amazing food and lovely services.  Friendly staff... From security to front desks to house keepers.   Highly recommended... One of the best hotels in Nairobi... Thanks for all what is done
title: Un habitat event

hotel: Sankara Nairobi, Autograph Collection by Marriott
review: We had a team of 7 that stayed at the Sankara in from late March to early April of 2019.  We were greeted by a team of well trained employees.  The outstanding service we received were from Caroline Linguli and two of the Executive Lounge employees - Peter and Elizabeth.  Caroline has an amazing personality and finds time out of her busy schedule to check on the welfare of occupants.  Peter and Elizabeth are truly superb employees.  I truly enjoyed my room, the breakfast spread and most of all the executive lounge.  Will stay at the Sankara again.
title: Outstanding customer service.

hotel: Sankara Nairobi, Autograph Collection by Marriott
review: The Sankara has been my hotel of choice when visiting Nairobi. Having lived in Kenya and knowing the city exceptionally well - The hotel is perfectly positioned so as to avoid the abisimal traffic - when trying to get anywhere.  The F&B section - Coffee Shop is on par with most top end hotels, the macaroons they make are exceptional. The Graze resturant serves fantastic steak and good service, breakfast buffet is truly great and caters for all tastes and dietery requirements. The only issue i have is the roof top bar - this is open to non residents, so you do get the odd bar fly lurking.
title: Safe Haven in the City

hotel: Sankara Nairobi, Autograph Collection by Marriott
review: Sankara is a place to come and be spoilt! The staff anticipate your every need and give you service that is truly superb! I will certainly be back.  Things I truly appreciated: the ultra modern and luxurious room, with superior amenities; the well equipped gym; the great spread on offer at the buffet breakfast; the availability of reliable and safe cars with internet access; a house clinician, when in need; and always the availability of a professional to assist with any request. Well done to GM Krishna Unni and his stellar team!
title: Superb service!

hotel: Sankara Nairobi, Autograph Collection by Marriott
review: I always stay in sankara because it is very strategic and safe. Rooms are very clean you can take water for free plus wonderful gifts. Also the restaurant server food in a high quality. Definitely If you are in Nairobi it is you destination.  Special thanks for the staff for their welcome.
title: Safe, hygein, and strategic place.

hotel: Sankara Nairobi, Autograph Collection by Marriott
review: I have stayed at Sankara on more than 20 occasions over the past three years. The hotel is like home and the staff is like family. Always a pleasant experience. I highly recommend this lovely hotel for business or pleasure.
title: Best hotel in Nairobi!

hotel: Sankara Nairobi, Autograph Collection by Marriott
review: My family and I stayed at the Sankara Nairobi a few weeks ago and I highly recommend the Sankara for your stay on Nairobi - the room was comfortable and beautifully decorated, and the staff at the hotel were extremely helpful when we needed it (special shout out to Evelyn at Sankara - thank you for everything!)   Sharika
title: Amazing hotel and service!

hotel: Sankara Nairobi, Autograph Collection by Marriott
review: A gem of a hotel already before it joined the Marriott Autograph Collection earlier in the year is the Sankara truly in a class of its own in this part of Nairobi, Westlands.  As a frequent traveler I ought to know luxury when I see it and at the Sankara it was evident from the moment of arrival to the moment I left for my next destination upcountry.  When I last stayed at the hotel a year or so ago was I told that a new range of rooms, and a Presidential Suite, would be inserted into the space where previously the Spa was located. While the Presidential Suite was beyond my means, were the new Sankara Executive Rooms not.  From the moment I entered my room was I busy checking out the new features, different from the ones on the lower floors.  A year ago I had stayed in one of
title: The Sankara - in a class of its own in Westlands

hotel: Sankara Nairobi, Autograph Collection by Marriott
title: Great experience

hotel: Sankara Nairobi, Autograph Collection by Marriott
review: Out of all the Marriott Hotels I’ve stayed at, this is probably in the top3.  The facilities and rooms are of excellent quality, the staff is helpful and friendly and they also do a great job of recognizing your Bonvoy status and accommodating for whatever need you may hace.  Would definitely stay again and recommend to anyone traveling to Nairobi, whatever the purpose might be.
title: A bunch of scammers and fraudster at reception!

hotel: Sankara Nairobi, Autograph Collection by Marriott
review: Staff attention to details are exceptional; great breakfast in the lounge and heavenly bed. I usually have difficulty sleeping in a new environment, but the bedding was extremely comfortable and feels like my own. Perfect place to be, beautiful establishment!!
title: 5 Star Accommodation in Nairobi

hotel: Sankara Nairobi, Autograph Collection by Marriott
review: i had the pleasure of  visiting the Artisan restaurant at the famous Sankara Hotel located in Westlands, Nairobi. this was for lunch. the buffet was well laid and a wide selection of meats including chicken, beef, fish, rice, vegetables. sushi was excellent too. one of the supervisors a Ms Joan Mwavala took me round the hotel and showed me some of the facilities the hotel has. overall this is an excellent location, hotel and restaurant. i highly recommend this facility to anybody planning a trip to nairobi.
title: best Sunday Brunch in town

hotel: Sankara Nairobi, Autograph Collection by Marriott
review: I really enjoyed my stay.The hotel is well designed.The rooms are spacious.The food and service at the Graze was phenomenal.Thanks to Maggie and Nick. At the front I met Joan who was very professional and kind. Ensure you book an executive room that will give you access at the executive lounge.if I have a chance to visit Kenya,I will always stay on Sankara.Keep up the good job
title: Great experience

hotel: Sankara Nairobi, Autograph Collection by Marriott
review: My family and I stayed at Sankara, Nairobi for 3 days and 2 nights. During our stay we were assisted by a very helpful and professional staff named Evelyn at the reception. I would highly recommend anyone staying at the hotel to seek assistance from her. The food at the hotel was amazing too! Very satisfied with our stay there.
title: Sankara Hotel experience

hotel: Sankara Nairobi, Autograph Collection by Marriott
review: Really nice hotel with excellent service. Staff of the hotel went an extra mile to ensure I had a great experience at the hotel. Geoffrey from the front office went the extra mile to trace your bag despite being very late at night.
title: Best in class service

hotel: Sankara Nairobi, Autograph Collection by Marriott
review: Absolutely amazing service and incredibly luxurious and comfortable hotel. The staff truly do look after your every need, and are so welcoming. It really was amazing stay, thank you Sankara! I will definitely be back.
title: Amazing service

hotel: Sankara Nairobi, Autograph Collection by Marriott
review: The ambience here was fabulous.... The decor tasteful.... The dinner plates looked awe so glorious.... Unfortunately though the Rump steak was too hard almost unchewable.... My date though had some really tasty chicken with Nan.... The staff were attentive to detail. Overall the experience was exciting.
title: The Sankara Birthday Treat

hotel: Sankara Nairobi, Autograph Collection by Marriott
review: I've just stayed at the Sankara Nairobi and what can I say...one word, Wow! I stay in a great deal of hotels for work and this has got to be in the top three in the country. The service is second to none. The staff are friendly, helpful and always great you with a smile. The rooms are some of the biggest I've stayed in, I was on executive  floor room and it was new and beautiful design. The shower was great, amenities were top of the range and the air conditioning was just right. I stay in a lot of hotels and this hotel has special place in my heart! We had a dinner meeting at graze and the staff we very attentive and the ambience was awesome. Thanks again The Sankara, you will definitely be my home from home when I come back to Nairobi. To the GM of this property, you are lucky
title: My Home Away From Home

hotel: Sankara Nairobi, Autograph Collection by Marriott
title: Superb

hotel: Sankara Nairobi, Autograph Collection by Marriott
review: Sankara hotel is superb. Nice decor. Nice and clean rooms. Very friendly staff and I mean extremely friendly and helpful. I enjoyed every bit of my stay. The breakfast was great. The internet was fast. I had nothing to complain about!
title: Lovely

hotel: Sankara Nairobi, Autograph Collection by Marriott
review: Staff friendliness and competency at this hotel is a real experience! The hotel is in a great location, although traffic to and from the airport can be a bit rough, with the trip taking anything from 45 minutes to 3 hours.
title: Great service, great location

hotel: Sankara Nairobi, Autograph Collection by Marriott
review: I want to make a special Mention for Joab and Brian and Tabitha especially Joab for being amazing inspiration and for their guidance and patience in looking after me everytime i visit . It is their personal touch that makes me come back here and not go to another hotel.
title: Compliment

hotel: Sankara Nairobi, Autograph Collection by Marriott
review: I had the pleasure of staying at Sankara for work in Nairobi on behalf of Johns Hopkins University. I also utilized a section of their conference room for a one day meeting with 15 people. The Sankara staff were highly attentive to the meeting participants and Joyce, the Director of Sales, made the planning very easy.   I highly recommend Sankara for your next stay.
title: Great rooms and conference facility

hotel: Sankara Nairobi, Autograph Collection by Marriott
review: My mother and I had the pleasure of visiting Kenya Nairobi and stayed at the Sankara Nairobi Autograph Collection hotel.  All I can say is “Epitome of Excellence”.  I travel quite a bit.  But, never in my travels whether for business or pleasure, have I ever seen such an outstanding team of employees who exceeded my expectations in guest services, culinary, security, and transportation.  Actually, they exceeded in everything.  They made my mom and I feel as if Sankara was our home.  They ensured our need was met every hour of the day, every day of the week.  And let me tell you, my mom loved every moment of it.  She loved the attention she was given which meant a lot to me.  We both did.  So, let me take this time to thank you all for the wonderful memories: Joan Allan Jermiick
title: Epitome of Excellence

hotel: Sankara Nairobi, Autograph Collection by Marriott
title: Superb and immaculate hotel

hotel: Sankara Nairobi, Autograph Collection by Marriott
review: Great customer service, this is home away from home home. Everyone is genuinely welcoming and warm, great facilities and the food is to die for. I enjoyed the music and cocktails on the 7th floor. Thank you for hosting me!
title: Sankara, home away from home!

hotel: Sankara Nairobi, Autograph Collection by Marriott
review: The staff were warmth,very attentive and cheerful through out stay. The service was extremely great at Graze Steak HouseRooms were excellent and services were first class The security measures undertaken were excellant
title: Excellant and superb stay- World class -Highly recommend

hotel: Sankara Nairobi, Autograph Collection by Marriott
review: we had a business meeting and I must say the service was too notch and customer service by Mary was simply high end thank you and looking forward to a next time.I would recomend the hotel to any who would like to have value for they money.
title: World class service.

hotel: Sankara Nairobi, Autograph Collection by Marriott
review: It was great to be back again at Sankara hotel. We are always given first class treatment. The room was well set and the services were excellent. The food was very sumptuous. It is always a pleasure to be welcomed by the General Manager himself and Carol Linguli.
title: Farewell party of Mike Mubea who was appointed Ambassador to Ireland

hotel: Sankara Nairobi, Autograph Collection by Marriott
review: I've been a long term guest at the Sankara. The service and warmth of the staff have made me forget that I am away from home. It's an amazing experience so far. Thank you for the attention to detail. I would highly recommend Sankara to anyone.
title: Amazing experience. Highly recommended.

hotel: Sankara Nairobi, Autograph Collection by Marriott
review: I really never leave reviews: I waited for the end of my visit at the Sankara before deciding to congratulate them on an amazing stay.  We didn’t intentionally stay at this hotel, however this was our third hotel of choice.  Without mentioning our first two choices out of respect, our decision was based on the cleanliness of the resort.  The two other choices of hotel were plagued with cockroaches, which were not just in the hotel, but also in the rooms.  My wife - including me to be honest - couldn’t stomach the first choices, but when we reached the Sankara, it was the only place we could genuinely relax.  The rooms - and hotel - was immaculate.  In addition, the facilities, friendliness of staff - everything actually - was immediately apparent from the moment we booked in.
title: Really really impressed

hotel: Sankara Nairobi, Autograph Collection by Marriott
title: Bethann is the best

hotel: Sankara Nairobi, Autograph Collection by Marriott
review: Fantastic service from Bethann at the front desk - great stay.  Very friendly service overall.  Accommodating and warm.  Good location close to restaurants.   Came here for business and conference.   Would stay here again.
title: Great experience

hotel: Sankara Nairobi, Autograph Collection by Marriott
review: The hotel is great, it’s design, the rooms, the staff. Nothing to say but good things. While I was there the pool was under refurbishment so couldn’t enjoy it but that is a temporary issue and they offered an alternative solution near by the hotel.
title: Sankara stay

hotel: Sankara Nairobi, Autograph Collection by Marriott
review: Good location and nice rooms. Okay gym but need weights between 18 kgs to 24 kgs and between 24 kgs and 30 kgs. Nice and helpful staff. Left my ray ban sunglasses in the room on a previous stay and they delivered it to me on my new stay. Very nice and helpful welcome at check in by the staff especially by Fridah. Concierge and security are very helpful and polite.
title: Got engaged. The staff went above and beyond!

hotel: Sankara Nairobi, Autograph Collection by Marriott
review: Best hotel to stay in Nairobi, close to shopping centers easy commute. The staff is extraordinary wonderful and humble. Kudos to the management on having staff who are there to help guests all the time. The Chef at breakfast goes an extra mile to get you food of your choice and taste.
title: Amazing experience staying at Sankara

hotel: Sankara Nairobi, Autograph Collection by Marriott
review: A very nice and modern hotel to stay.  The facilities were very good, the rooms were very nice and modern and the staff were all very friendly and helpful. Quite a few nice places to eat near to the hotel, with guidance from the hotel staff.
title: Great facilities, rooms and friendly and helpful staff.

hotel: Sankara Nairobi, Autograph Collection by Marriott
review: I was sincerely grad to be part of sankara family.the warm welcome i received was beyond expectation.I  lack words to express how my daughter Olive  and my son Silvanas always keep reminding me of how amazing everything was. And how they connected nicely to all the ladies and gentlemen mostly they keep on remind me of how Mr. Solomon was  very nice to them .FIRST CLASS SANKARA.I LL BE BACK SOON,
title: well done and bravo Sankara family

hotel: Sankara Nairobi, Autograph Collection by Marriott
review: Had a the pleasure of spending a week at the Sankara. Excellent hotel in the heart of Westlands with access to restaurants and malls nearby. Service was exceptional from Enock, Erick, John and team at the terrace to Paul and the team at breakfast. I’ll definitely be back.
title: Fantastic hotel and service

hotel: Sankara Nairobi, Autograph Collection by Marriott
review: Great hotel to be in. Legendary service. Joan at the front desk, Peter the bell captain and Stanley at the breakfast restaurant are some of the names I remember. They anticipate your needs, always very helpful and they do their job cheerfully with smiles. Rooms are spacious and every detail taken care of. All in all excellent value for money.
title: Holiday stay with daughter and grandchildren

hotel: Sankara Nairobi, Autograph Collection by Marriott
review: I spent a great night at Sankara Hotel Nairobi. I initially booked for 5 nights and when checking in I mentioned that I may have to check out next morning and travel to USA if my visa is found sorted out. Staff at reception explained to me that it was not an issue, asking politely just to be informed of my decision the next morning. Next day i had to check out and everything went smoothly, although I was dealing with a different staff who was equally professional and caring my satisfaction
title: Very customer-oriented staff at the reception - Clean and neat rooms

hotel: Sankara Nairobi, Autograph Collection by Marriott
review: Awesome place to be. I really had fun,the staff are warm and welcoming. If you are looking for a good place to stay while in Nairobi.Then Sankara is the place to be. Thanks so and God's blessings always
title: Dinner

hotel: Sankara Nairobi, Autograph Collection by Marriott
review: Lived in Nairobi when the hotel was built. Was back after 7 years and looked foward to stay there. But the place has not aged well. Dirty facade, room finishing is deteriorating and its signature pool and rooftop has lost its edge. The price is still very high but i think the new competitors in Westlands are both better snd cheaper. Sorry but won't come back.
title: Has seen better days

hotel: Sankara Nairobi, Autograph Collection by Marriott
review: The place is amazing the location gives you a good view of the surrounding, trained staff I felt right at home plus the price would say was fair Sure will visit again this is where I fell in love with Nairobi
title: AMAZING

hotel: Sankara Nairobi, Autograph Collection by Marriott
review: I stayed in Sankara for just two nights it was very wonderful. Always night to remember. They staff are very amazing, excellent service and good food. A lot of Yomachoma(roasted meat )around. Nairobi is a beautiful place with amazing people.
title: Excellent Hotel

hotel: Sankara Nairobi, Autograph Collection by Marriott
review: its been over 3 years coming to nairobi and staying/ living  in hotels for business trips and in the last 2 years i have come to acknowledge that sankara is home away from home and yes its taken me two years to get this in.   Sankara is strategically located in westlands which is central and accessible from every part of Nairobi . Westland houses a large number of hotels, Malls, Clubs, bars,Offices and residentials. Simply put, everything is found in westlands  From when it was just Sankara to now Sankara Nairobi,Autograph collection(Marriott Collection), its services and amenities has always been world class and excellent.  Stating from your arrival at the reception, you are  greeted with warm welcomes, professionalism, smiles and customer excellence. Thanks to Brenda, Vincent,
title: Review from March - October 2019

hotel: Sankara Nairobi, Autograph Collection by Marriott
title: Home from Home in Nairobi

hotel: Sankara Nairobi, Autograph Collection by Marriott
review: After just one visit, we were greeted by most staff with our first names when we walked through the door. After the usual security check, fast and painless, check-in was friendly and efficient even when I'd forgotten to book! Every room was spacious, clean and very comfortable. Tea-making facilities and water provided, not to mention the Sankara Seven collectables (small soap stone animals: hippo, rhino, elephant, zebra, lion, cheetah, giraffe) that awaited on the bedside table one on every visit. Favourite room overlooked the garden and swimming pool at the back of the hotel although neither belong to the Sankara but to the hotel behind. Very good gym facilities and helpful gym staff/personal trainers. The roof top with small swimming pool provided a calm place to enjoy a drink
title: Fantastic

hotel: Sankara Nairobi, Autograph Collection by Marriott
title: Sankara Review

hotel: Sankara Nairobi, Autograph Collection by Marriott
review: Excellent and personable service, excellent club lounge and well appointed rooms..this is sankara. I am an Ambassador level status with Marriott convoy meaning I stay a 100 nights or more at Marriott hotels around the world. Sankara is truly a gem. They have a fantastic GM who sets the standard for his staff and boy do they deliver. Keep up the good work.
title: Review

hotel: Sankara Nairobi, Autograph Collection by Marriott
review: Who said that details make the difference? Someone who stayed here probably. From the delightful carved keepsake beside the bed to an excellent breakfast (with a stand-alone stand for my jacket), I am thoroughly impressed. Comfy, stylish and very friendly, I'd recommend the Sankara to even my most particular colleagues.
title: A jacket stand for breakfast

hotel: Sankara Nairobi, Autograph Collection by Marriott
review: Stayed at Sankara with a larger group, not having made the arrangements and not knowing what to expect. What I found was a hotel that gets everything right, starting with a warm and friendly staff that was attentive, gracious, and knew my name.  The hotel was modern and elegant without being overdone or cold.  The rooms were lovely, the bathrooms updated, and the beds comfortable (with lovely linens).  The restaurant offered excellent food, a wide range of choices, and safe dining (food safety is not to be taken for granted in Africa travel).  I'll stay there every time I visit Nairobi.  It's a place that gets the big picture and the little details just right.
title: Gets Everything Right

hotel: Sankara Nairobi, Autograph Collection by Marriott
review: The team at this hotel went way above and beyond my expectations on service and sincere care for a guest. After more than 2 days of travel to reach Nairobi, my luggage was lost.  Hearing of this the team offered to follow up for me, knowing I was only to be in Nairobi for 48 hours before heading off again on an around the world business trip.  The team chased my luggage all day with the airline and delivery service. From the Porters, to the Front Desk to the Concierge, everyone was concerned for me.  They located my bag and pushed for same day delivery saving my trip!
title: Service above and beyond wildest expectations!

hotel: Sankara Nairobi, Autograph Collection by Marriott
review: The Sankara is a gorgeous hotel in the center of Nairobi.  The rooms were spacious and clean and the staff could not do enough for us when we checked in and throughout our stay.  Huge shout out to Vincent at the concierge desk, who really went above and beyond.  The beds were very comfortable, and the bathrooms were spacious and has all the required amenities and more.  The Sankara was also very helpful in getting transportation arranged whether it was round tip airport transfers or rides to and from the office.  Overall, a great hotel experience.
title: Clean and Comfortable Hotel

hotel: Sankara Nairobi, Autograph Collection by Marriott
review: Had a super stay at the Sankara. Excellent service standards, incredibly polite staff who will always greet you when they see ypu and make your day, good rooms and amazing food at Graze and the main restaurant.  I did go to to Gym too. Very efficient one with a good trainer.  Highly recommended.
title: Excellent Service Standards

hotel: Sankara Nairobi, Autograph Collection by Marriott
review: This hotel is really awesome and definitely meets Marriott standards. The staff is providing excellent service and the rooftop swimming pool is also a nice experience. Dinner at the famous Graze Restaurant is one of the best in Nairobi, mouthwatering. This will be my new home
title: Amazing

hotel: Sankara Nairobi, Autograph Collection by Marriott
review: When visiting Nairobi—make your life easier—and stay here. The team was an absolute delight. Honorable mention to Vincent and tall John with the dimples :-).  The hotel is impeccably maintained (excellent location), centrally located in the Westlands (the swanky part of time—with quick access to great restaurants and night life), the rooms are  very clean, and the staff is extremely responsive. It’s very obvious that the staff goes the extra mile to ensure the safety and security of its guests.   I’ve traveled the world, and this was bar none—the best hotel experience with staff that I’ve ever experienced.   I will certainly stay here when I return.
title: Wonderful experience!

hotel: Sankara Nairobi, Autograph Collection by Marriott
review: The hotel is located next to a mall which can be helpful if one is traveling there for business. The reservation process was efficient and quick. Once I arrived at the hotel I was disappointed by a number of things: 1. Noisy rooms with music blasting either from the rooftop or an establishment next to this property. I had to be moved at 2:00am because I couldn’t sleep  2. Both rooms I stayed in were small and not particularly well kept. If this property were cheaper I would sort of understand but not at this high prices  3. Limited selection of food and beverages at the executive lounge. Very limited!  4. Incredibly high prices for room service  On the positive side, the hotel design is attractive, it has a descent gym and the staff is very polite and helpful. I wouldn’t
title: Average hotel at five star prices

hotel: Sankara Nairobi, Autograph Collection by Marriott
title: Classy, relaxing and excellent service

hotel: Sankara Nairobi, Autograph Collection by Marriott
review: Enjoyed an overnight stay over the long holiday in October.  Very friendly service and by name.   The desserts were exquisite! I really enjoyed the variety, taste and presentation available for Sunday brunch.  I will definitely stay there again or just visit for dessert!
title: Best Hotel Experience EVER

hotel: Sankara Nairobi, Autograph Collection by Marriott
review: From the front door to the front desk, the restaurant and the cleaning staff. I have never come across better staff. The heard it was our sons first birthday and arranged a cake, a present and had the whole team sing to him - it was amazing! Resturant food was lovely and Graze is not to be missed. Coffee in the restaurant was always good. The room was lovely and spacious, but could have had a better in-room coffee station.
title: Best hotel stay ever!

hotel: Sankara Nairobi, Autograph Collection by Marriott
review: The Sankara is now in the running for my favorite hotel. The staff goes above and beyond in every way. They are incredibly friendly and welcoming. It’s a beautiful space with all amenities travelers may need - lounge, gym, good restaurants, meeting space, etc. Also, it’s a lot of fun collecting the different animal figurines they leave in your room each day!
title: Stay at this Hotel - My New Favorite

hotel: Sankara Nairobi, Autograph Collection by Marriott
review: The brunch at sankara is fantastic. Great food,lovely ambiance, fabulous service. If you have a sweet tooth,this is the place to be. The dessert section is one of a kind. Well done. Hats off to Erick for the great service. Mr John is definately one of the best host I've come across, kudos boss. See you soon.
title: Sumptuous brunch

hotel: Sankara Nairobi, Autograph Collection by Marriott
review: Sankara has the best staff that make you feel at home and provide the best service with a smile. The room are lovely and spacious.  Special thanks to Joan, Vincent, Andrew, John (Bell), John (Porter) and Rosemary (Hostes).
title: Great service

hotel: Sankara Nairobi, Autograph Collection by Marriott
review: I am a platinum elite member at Bonvoy.  I've travelled the world and stayed in numerous hotels.   This is definitely one of the better hotels I have stayed.  The hotel felt very secure, was very clean and my room (upgraded to junior suite) was very nice, loved the style and the comfort of everything in the room. The staff was very helpful and very friendly.  They always escorted / accompanied me if waiting for a car or took shortcuts in/out of the hotel towards my business meetings. The area around the hotel is under heavy development.  Bright years ahead for Nairobi / Kenya! Will definitely come back and hope I’ll receive the same attention. Constructive criticism; Breakfast choices could be better, orange juice was very aqueous. I'm a heavy lounge user when traveling.  Would
title: Excellent attentive service and cleanliness

hotel: Sankara Nairobi, Autograph Collection by Marriott
review: The stay was beautiful, and the staff very courteous and helpful, The atmosphere was very beautiful inside and the food was delicious. I wasn't initially made aware of the amenities of the executive suits but the staff came to the rescue. Overall it was a pleasant experience. This is the choice if you want a good clean hotel with professional and courteous staff.
title: The stay was beautiful, and the staff very courteous and helpful.

hotel: Sankara Nairobi, Autograph Collection by Marriott
review: Warm reception from arrival to the rooms and through the facility.  Cool Ambiance for a date at the roof top pool bar Bird's eye-view to view Nairobi in the night and count the stars when the sky is clear. Rooms are excellently set up and sound proof away fro the traffic noise in the city. The cuisines are awesome and mouth watering. The Spa was awesome and the heated swimming for a morning session topped it all.
title: Saturday Social Sarabi

hotel: Sankara Nairobi, Autograph Collection by Marriott
review: Because my husband was hospitalized in Nairobi, I stayed at Sankara for about two and a half weeks in December 2019. The staff remembered me from a prior stay and were especially attentive when they found out that my husband was in the hospital. They even brought roses and fruit to his room at the hospital! I really do not have enough good things to say. The hotel itself is stylish and great with fantastic service. I do not have enough good things to say!
title: stay at Sankara was great

hotel: Sankara Nairobi, Autograph Collection by Marriott
review: Everybody was very friendly and hospitality was great. Starting at the reception witha warm welcome and smile. The extracted and towels in the room were provided while we could have a drink in the lounge.
title: Very friendly

hotel: Sankara Nairobi, Autograph Collection by Marriott
review: Am at your opera cake house getting some dessert and I just remembered to make a reservation for the brunch on Sunday.we were there a few weeks back and it was packed.Nice move by the way moving the brunch to the pool side ,the scenery is fantastic!food quality is top notch ,desserts are to die for ,prosecco by the pool is a wish come true.only down side is the DJ I wish u could bring the band you have on Friday's it's always the best.As usual attention to details from the service team of Eric ,fridah and john was superb. See you over the weekend and hope the weather behaves this time
title: Fantastic brunch at the rooftop

hotel: Sankara Nairobi, Autograph Collection by Marriott
review: This is by far the best hotel i have stayed in when visiting Kenya for business. From the doormen that greet's you with a smile as you enter, to the check in staff and even the room cleaning service staff. Everyone has such a positive and welcoming attitude. Thank you very much for making my stay so memorable. All the best in the future!
title: Excellent. Professional. Oustanding

hotel: Sankara Nairobi, Autograph Collection by Marriott
review: Never had a better Hotel experience. The hotel is a masterpiece, the food is delicious, the staff are incredible. Perfect holiday destinations with executive clients access to 24 HR gym, sauna, steam and heated pool. I would definitely recommend. Thank you Sankara.
title: The best hotel experience yet!

hotel: Sankara Nairobi, Autograph Collection by Marriott
review: Set in the hustle and bustle of downtown Nairobi, The Sankara is an Oasis of classy service, food and entertainment options galore and very spacious and comfortable rooms. I strongly recommend the delicious steaks in The Graze Restaurant, the incredibly comfortable beds and the attentive staff throughout the property.  The Sankara is indeed my Home when in Nairobi, setting standards can be hard work, maintaining them takes great management, vision and great staff training and retention. Hadn’t been there in years but the standards are still extremely high. GREAT JOB!!
title: Dining & Entertainment options galore, provided in a first environment.

hotel: Sankara Nairobi, Autograph Collection by Marriott
review: Sankara is a very beautiful and elegant hotel with all the services that you require. It is value for money and you will definately enjoy the excellent services offered. You feel at home away from home
title: Sankara a place to be

hotel: Sankara Nairobi, Autograph Collection by Marriott
review: Traveling with my mother, we spent two nights at the Sankara in Nairobi before heading out on safari. We enjoyed our stay so much, that upon returning from safari, we switched hotels to spend our final two nights at the Sankara before returning home.   The attention to detail and level of personalized service was exemplary.  The food was delicious and the rooms were both clean and well-appointed.   As a frequent traveler, we were able to enjoy the executive lounge, with employees remembering us from our earlier stay and asking how we had enjoyed specific aspects of our trip.....  The hotel arranged for a driver, Stanley, to take us around Nairobi for the day—he was so fantastic, and of course, for transport to and from the airport. We are grateful to Mary, Edwin, Solomon, and so
title: Love this hotel!!

hotel: Sankara Nairobi, Autograph Collection by Marriott
review: hotel was very clean, modern and well kept. room was just big enough for my young family. staff here were all very friendly and happy to help. The pool on the roof was never used... too cold and not heated as we were led to believe Breakfast was part of the booking, but was served on the 7th floor lounge not in the main restaurant, we were told it was being refurbished and we were told its because there were not enough people staying at the hotel for them to bother with the much larger venue. This meant that the lounge was occasionally over crowded and certain dishes would be empty if you got there too late, although the staff do try and get you anything thats missing. convenient for the sarit centre shopping mall and also for a base to travel from.
title: nice hotel

hotel: Sankara Nairobi, Autograph Collection by Marriott
review: The Sankara Hotel in Westlands has been around for a while, and I have stayed there often over the last few years. It seems to finally have settled down into a place where it all works, the big and small things receive the right management effort, and it has reached consistency of experience. This is good in the Nairobi market, where hotels often suffer from hit-and-miss quality.
title: Consistently Good : Sankara Nairobi

hotel: Sankara Nairobi, Autograph Collection by Marriott
review: From the moment we walked through the door we felt the Sankara hospitality. Their staff was very pleasant and warm to us and our kids. We hosted a party and stayed the night. It exceeded our expectations. The food was phenomenal and the staff made our night really special.  The rooms are modern and very comfortable. What amazed us was the attention to detail and the impeccable service. My husband forgot his cuff links at home and their concierge went to the store and purchased some for him. All which was complimentary. I cannot recommend the Sankara experience enough.
title: Wonderful experience

hotel: Sankara Nairobi, Autograph Collection by Marriott
review: The hotel and rooms are beautiful and the hotel has a very cool pool and nice gym. But what really stood out to me was the staff and the lounge. The staff went above and beyond to accommodate my family during our stay all throughout the hotel, from everyone at reception to the valet, lounge attendants, and chef on the 7th floor!! The food and drinks in the lounge are incredible - we ate breakfast and dinner during “happy hour” on multiple nights and were very impressed with the selection and quality of food. The welcome gifts also put a smile on our faces - just like my cafe latte at breakfast in the hotel :)
title: Well above expectations! (Bonvoy Platinum)

hotel: Sankara Nairobi, Autograph Collection by Marriott
review: My stay was very pleasant thanks to the courteous and super friendly staff. My luggage was delayed from the flight, but the staff was very helpful in helping me trace it through the airline. Since I was on a business trip, I needed to find clothing ASAP. Geoffrey the concierge was very helpful. He went as far taking me to the nearest store to help me buy clothes and all this was done through the heavy rains. He stayed with me throughout the shopping and went back to the hotel with me. All this while assuring me that eventually my luggage will arrive. His service really made my trip more bearable. Thank you very much Geoffrey, Sankara Hotel has a gem in you!
title: Excellent Service from Geoffrey

hotel: Sankara Nairobi, Autograph Collection by Marriott
review: Great stay in the Sankara. staff are Brilliant. In particular a staff member called Vincent. He was very good, 10/10. His customer service was impeccable and he also was very helpful working in the gym.Great job!
title: Great stay

hotel: Sankara Nairobi, Autograph Collection by Marriott
review: We stayed for 9 days split into 4 and 5 with a 3 day safari in between.  One of the best elite amenity hotels I have stayed in from the breakfast to the evening lounge experience.  The service was superb.  The staff in general was extremely inviting and friendly from the security guards, front desk, customer relations, gym, to the lounge.  The customer relations team of Solomon and Vincent set the stage and took care of all of our needs.  The lounge personnel - all of them were excellent - as was the food.   Especially Mary, Brenda, and Peter - all went out of the way to make our stay remarkable.  I'm mentioning the amenities because when I booked, I had no idea what to expect as an Marriott elite member.   It was one one of the best elite experiences I've have had.   One
title: Superb elite guest experience

hotel: Sankara Nairobi, Autograph Collection by Marriott
title: Amazing visit in January

hotel: Sankara Nairobi, Autograph Collection by Marriott
review: We had a wonderful time time in this property from the minute Vincent welcomed us at the front desk. He ensured that my family was well taken care of and any requests he followed up personally.. That's what customer service at its best and Sankara delivered. In the exexutive lounge Mary was so welcoming remembering our names and what we usually ordered. Solomon was quick to address minor defects that we encountered. Checking out, it's like leaving home and that is why we will recommend this hotel and come back whenever we are in Nairobi. Monica and peter in houskeeping kept our room sparkling.
title: A remarkable experience in Nairobi

hotel: Sankara Nairobi, Autograph Collection by Marriott
review: Our experience at Sankara was nothing short of remarkable. The level of service and hospitality was up there with the best hotels I've ever stayed at. The staff is warm and welcoming, and you feel at home from the moment you walk in.  We had to return to Nairobi unexpectedly after a disruption to our trip, and came back to Sankara. The helpfulness of the staff during our second stay went above and beyond expectations. They made us feel like family.  As for the hotel, the rooms are clean and well furnished. The beds are incredibly comfortable. The food in the restaurant is great. The pool is awesome. The wifi is fast. And there is a reasonably outfitted gym. So it checks all the boxes.  If you are coming to Nairobi, I unequivocally recommend Sankara. You won't be disappointed
title: Consistently Terrific!

hotel: Sankara Nairobi, Autograph Collection by Marriott
review: Your rooftop bar needs abit of a renovation I was there last week been away for a few years and nothing much has changed..am glad u decided to go with the live bands instead of DJ.Both bands are fantastic,Gogosimo I used to listen to them at K1 way back and the other one on Saturday is quite good I didn't get their name but the claret and vocalist are fantastic thumbs up !Service is exceptional as usual,the new manager is very professional and has quite a vast knowledge and experience my chat with him was very interesting.frida hostess and simon the barman were exceptional.This weekend I will coming by before I fly out .Sankara is always a gem.
title: Sarabi Bar (Roof Top/ pool bar)

hotel: Sankara Nairobi, Autograph Collection by Marriott
review: The warmth of Sankara staff, from the doormen to receptionist to the cleaners. You all warmed my heart. Everyone was so helpful and cheerful. The food was just as awesome.Sankara is the real definition of customer care and hospitality combined. I really can write an entire dissertation with you Sankara as a case study of Excellence in Hospitality.. Kea leboha.
title: Top shelf!

hotel: Sankara Nairobi, Autograph Collection by Marriott
review: Sankara is a home away from home, primarily due to its staff at ALL levels. They create a welcoming and warm environment.    I stayed in the suite which was fabulous. The interior was elegantly decorated.....good choice of art, comfortable beds. fast and reliable wifi.   Sankara is now part of the Marriott autograph collection, however, it still maintains the Kenyan hospitality that comes so naturally to all those who work there.   There is plenty of choice for food via the various restaurants at the hotel. The club lounge has very good meeting rooms and great food.   I have been staying at the Sankara for the past 10 years and it has only got better every year.   Keep it up Team Sankara and wishing you to get to greater heights.
title: Best hotel to stay in Nairobi

hotel: Sankara Nairobi, Autograph Collection by Marriott
review: Friendly staff and very helpful. The lounge is great to work from, Graze had great food. Vincent on reception was very helpful arranging all my checkout needs. Hopefully be back soon for more Sankara Animals.
title: Great hotel and excellent service

hotel: Sankara Nairobi, Autograph Collection by Marriott
review: Summary:  Outstanding hotel with amazing staff. I felt super welcomed all the time, safe and very comfortable. Great breakfast and dinner. The tour organizer did a great job and Nelson took me to a great half day Safari.  Details:  Rooms: -	Rooms are great. Modern, super comfortable and clean. The hotel is new and in a state-of-the-art condition, comfortable and well equipped. -	No balcony, windows are not to be opened -	coffee machine  -	High floors have better view. But only city view -	Comfortable bed and linen. -	Sofa and table in the room available -	Modern, basic bathroom with shower, no bath tube.  General Areas: -	Pool is on top floor. Small but ok.  -	small lobby area, but clean and bright -	Parking is free -	fast internet -	Club lounge is modern and in the top floor,
title: Outstanding hotel in Nairobi with extremely friendly staff

hotel: Sankara Nairobi, Autograph Collection by Marriott
review: Everything about this hotel was great and it is certainly now my preferred place to stay when visiting Nairobi for business (or pleasure). Every member of the staff with whom I interacted was friendly and helpful. The room was great - spacious, clean and well maintained by the house keeping staff. The food at the restaurant - which also handles room service - was amazing. Literally one of the best salmon dishes I have ever had (I ordered it on three of the nights I stayed at the hotel) and beet root salad was also delicious. In addition, the executive lounge was nice and offered a substantial breakfast. Plus, Sankara has a very well equipped gym with bikes, elliptical, treadmills, rower, free weights and machines. I also appreciated that this hotel is not a giant property, so
title: Friendly staff, incredible food, nice rooms

hotel: Sankara Nairobi, Autograph Collection by Marriott
title: Sankara Nairobi - A City Oasis

hotel: Sankara Nairobi, Autograph Collection by Marriott
review: Stayed at Sankara twice recently with the family on our first trip to Nairobi. Chose the suite which was more spacious and was upgraded with lounge access. Beautiful hotel with great service all around coupled with well appointed and luxuriously furnished suite. Ample armed security personnel were visible around the hotel and these were reassuring to us.   I saw a plague indicating Sankara Nairobi being  awarded the 2019 Africa winner for best luxury boutique hotel - truly a deserving award in my view. Congratulations and thanks to all the staff for making our stay a pleasant one!
title: First class service as always

hotel: Sankara Nairobi, Autograph Collection by Marriott
review: My third time visiting clients in Nairobi and the Sankara is the first and only hotel in mind when visiting. A high level of customer service from the minute you enter the hotel with friendly staff such as John and Solomon on the door with Frida and Nicholas on the reception. The staff have clearly been trained to a very high level as they make every effort to remember you and welcome you on arrival and through the security.   The rooms are of a very high standard with a lovely desk area for working and a luxurious bath and shower facility. Hilda in house-keeping went above and beyond the call of duty to make sure my room was comfortable and tidy.  A great gym facility with smith machine, Olympic weight-lifting bar, running machine, rowing machine and cycles. Expert help from
title: Great hotel, great staff!

hotel: Sankara Nairobi, Autograph Collection by Marriott
title: RED CARPET DINNER

hotel: Sankara Nairobi, Autograph Collection by Marriott
review: I spent some days this week at Sankara (my fisrt stay since the pandemic). All is back and the teams are really making efforts to make your stay as it should be). Special thanks to Salomon and the Sankara Lounge team (specially Nicholas). Asante sana
title: First stay at Sankara ... since pandemic

hotel: Sankara Nairobi, Autograph Collection by Marriott
review: Without doubt one of the favorite hotels I stayed during my time in Nairobi, Kenya if not the best. Upon arrival we were warmly welcomed by the staff Charles, Esther and general manager,  I was upgraded later to the Presidecial Suite. The staff was extremely friendly, Solomon, Joyce, Vincent at the Exective Loungh great guy...vagalegacy, who works as a trainer at gym  as well, is such a warm personality and highly motivated trainer  (recommendable!). I truly enjoyed working out with him after he fixed my lower back pain. Note this hotel atmosphere is so special that it really felt like home to me. Respect to the general manager who does a great job there.
title: Great Hotel

hotel: Sankara Nairobi, Autograph Collection by Marriott
review: It was great to be back at Sankara once again. We were greeting with warm welcome from everyone we met at the hotel and the service was excellent. I especially appreciated the assistance of Solomon from concierge who helped me arranged my travels and activities so that I was able to achieve everything I needed to do in a short space of time. The restaurants provided great food and great service, with breakfast on the 7th floor very well managed and Graze still delivering a first class meal.
title: Great place and wonderful service

hotel: Sankara Nairobi, Autograph Collection by Marriott
review: It's a very nice Hotel closer to Sarit Center. The have very good rooms. Their Services are exceptional while the Staff is very friendly. special thanks to Solimon, Vincent (Lounge) and all staff members who made our stay very nice. I have just one concern about the Swimming Pool that they should open for the guests (fully understand the COVID19 constraints).
title: Very Nice Hotel and Excellent Services

hotel: Sankara Nairobi, Autograph Collection by Marriott
review: We had a one-week training at one of the conference facilities offered at Sankara, the service was exquisite, we always had someone to assist us at all time. The staff was very friendly and efficient. The conference room was very airy and clean. Sankara is also located in an easily accessible area at a secure location. The food was also very delightful and enjoyable.
title: Fantastique
